As long as the seller stays the same, I will definitely be ordering more of these. Highly recommended if you want an absorbent towel with a soft sturdy texture. Also, the towels are a good size, considering I like towels big enough to feel like a blanket....these achieved just that. Keep in mind I'm not that big (5'10"; 125lbs.), but they are still wide enough to cover me entirely and long enough to wrap myself like a burrito. Hopefully, this helps you make your decision.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2020
Author: Christina Wilson
Title: Great towel
Body: I bought these towels not sure what exactly I would be getting. So I was very pleased when they arrived and I started using them. They are holding up quite well after a couple of years.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2018
Author: KK
Title: Awesome!
Body: These Pinzon Egyptian towels are just beautiful!  I bought two sets one in Wedgwood Blue and one in Driftwood and both colors are rich.  The Driftwood has a gold look to it.  They're soft, absorbent, plush and of normal weight.  Be sure to wash them first to remove the sizing or they won't absorb water and never use liquid fabric softener or dryer sheets as both inhibit water absorption too. The first time in the dryer the lint trap was fairly full but that's normal for just about all bath towels including the expensive ones and it hasn't affect the look or absorbency at all.  High Kudos for these towel sets!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2014
Author: MM
Title: Great quality for the price
Body: Great price for what you get and the quality is good too. You really can't buy towel sets at this price and quality; we've done a lot of looking and trying! I waited until I washed it twice before posting a review. After the 1st wash lint would be left behind on wet skin...and I hate that. But after a second wash there has been no lint! Very happy about that! They are soft and aren't very heavyweight but it definitely is worth more than what you pay for and will be our staple towels in our house. I just hope Amazon never stops making these or changing colors on me.*Edit: I originally wrote that there were no additional thread pulls after the 2nd wash however upon closer inspection I noticed several additional thread pulls. The dark blue seemed to fade a bit after the washing and drying as well. Still believe it is good quality for the cost.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2018
Author: gbcheetah
Title: Color Bleeds Out
Body: Was originally very happy with the towels.  They at first appeared very thick, comfortable, nice color, good quality but after just a couple of washes started seeing spots on them as if they had been washed in bleach which they were not.  It got worse after each subsequent wash.  Ended up throwing them out along with some beige ones we got as well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2017
Author: Island Marie
Title: Pretty towels
Body: I bought these towels more for decoration than anything else. They are beautiful and a set of 6 in 3 sizes. They are not thick and fluffy and don’t look like they would hold up after a few washes. Reviews from other folks can confirm, but overall work well for what i need them for. The moss color is beautiful and goes with my zen theme. Good buy for the cost.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2017
Author: BigSilverHotdog
Title: Feels nice but fades, tears, and discolors far too easily.
Body: I like the softness and feel of these towels but they tear up, fade, and discolor FAR too easily. I bought 2 different color sets and both are coming apart within months instead of years despite careful use and careful washing. Very disappointed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2014
Author: Bri K
Title: Must have towels!
Body: So, I am probably one of the pickiest when it comes to towels. We have a load of towels in our closet because I have tried to find ones that I liked. I hate towels that are too big or two small; towels that are like sandpaper or the ones that are sooo fluffy they don't absorb water at all! And don't even get me started on lint! I was extremely frustrated with all the towel fails I had been through and was really searching for my "dream" towel. I went out on a limb buying a towel set online because I couldn't feel it and that made me nervous. But, I was not disappointed at all! OH MY GOODNESS! These are totally my dream towels! I actually get excited when I get to use these! They make me sooo happy! They are SO soft, but they absorb water really, really well. I haven't had a single problem with lint (yay!)! And the best part, is they are the perfect size for me! I'm 5'4 and wrapped around me, it covers everything comfortably without being a beach towel! I love these towels and HIGHLY recommend them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2015
Author: B. Davis
Title: Worse than that
Body: The towels look Ok but when my wife washed them for the first time, the washer was filled with towel lint.  Worse than that, the hem's started separating which indicated that they were probably "seconds" not meant for regular retail sales.  I'll try to include a picture.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2018
Author: Deep Puddle
Title: You wont be dissapointed
Body: Excellent soft towels that wash well and dry easily.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great Towels!
Body: Nice quality towels for the price (nice thickness, wash and dry well).Very pleased and will be ordering more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2017
Author: Merrill R. Mcalister
Title: Still great
Body: Soft and well made. Added these to replace older towels that were not Pinzon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2018
Author: hollow rock
Title: These are a good deal. I wouldn't use them as daily use ...
Body: These are a good deal. I wouldn't use them as daily use towels, they are in my guest bathroom for occassional use. They are just a bit thinner than I'd like for daily use. They are soft, easy to take care of, and don't shed. I give these three start because they are indeed "ok." There is absolutely nothing wrong with these, they just aren't close enough to daily use for me to give a higher star rating. If you're looking for something to put in a guest room, I'd recommend these. If you're looking for something for more consistent use, I'd recommend these until you could afford something better.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2017
Author: Julie
Title: maybe a little too nice?
Body: This bath towel set is so soft and fluffy. It is thick and luxurious and the border has a rich sheen to it that I did not expect. I bought these and embroidered my in-laws initials on them as a gift to replace the old (did I say old) bath towels in their guest bath that my hubby and I have to use when we visit. (Yes, this was a self-serving gift.) They have a very nice bathroom, but when we hung these up they look like the best thing in there. I was surprised how great they look. The only problem now is that they are so nice we aren't supposed to use them. So we are still using the old towels. Sigh.I hope this review helps! If so, please click "yes" below.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2018
Author: Reese K.
Title: ... a tough one for me because it was the perfect color and the material was excellent but it bleaches ...
Body: So this is a tough one for me because it was the perfect color and the material was excellent but it bleaches incredibly easily! I am very careful with my towels and I wash them according to the instructions but NEVER use this for anything other than toweling off after a shower. I wish I had known this because after I'd wash my face I'd dry it with the towels and now they are all bleached. I used all kinds of face washes to see what would happen and all of them bleached them. Kind of a pain since that's what they are there for. Again, as long as you know this, maybe they will be okay. But like I said, they feel great and don't leave any residue on your body. Just always have a face towel present so your guests don't ruin them either.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2018
Author: muddigger
Title: ... some of the reviewers but I know I don't like really thick valour type towels
Body: Im not sure im as strongly opinionated as some of the reviewers but I know I don't like really thick valour type towels. I have ordered these towels both as just bath towels and others in sets with  face washers and hand towels iand bath towels n different colors ...and im happy to report I've got no complaints from my family of lakesnakes who can go thru towels pretty quickly .these towels are the right thickness..even for a hairy sasilian and absorb well.. look fine.. have been color fast and I will reorder as needed

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2017
Author: carolyn
Title: A must buy! Very good towels, price, quality and softness.
Body: I bought a set of these towels a few months ago, I love them! The bath towels are a nice size and the thickness of the towels are as good as Martha S. They held up very well in the wash and the price you just could not beat it. At the dept store starting with an M, even on their clearance sale you would pay more for all 6 pieces than the deal you get here. And yes I am impressed especially at the texture, soft and absorbent that I order 2 more sets as gifts.This is a win,win.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2017
Author: Dale Lawson
Title: Great Towels
Body: Great towels, especially for the price. I haven't had any problems with them falling apart in the washer/dryer, and they produced very little lint. Even after the first wash I had no problems with link/fuzz sticking to me after a shower. Now that they've been broken in a bit they are easily the best towels I've ever bought. I'll buy these again if the ones I have ever wear out, which they don't show signs of doing any time soon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2014
Author: Caro Thomas
Title: Pinzon & Egyptian have done it again
Body: This towel set arrived in a gorgeous Plum Colorand I like the feel of the towels.  But when I washed and driedthe towels (which came out great),  the hand towels and washcloths had slightly fallen a part.  Very disappointing becausecompany will be visiting us and I wanted them to show nicely.I suppose when I can get my sewing machine set up (after Imove)  they will be easy to fix.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2016
Author: DMC
Title: Pros and Cons and I Think they will probably be great towels.
Body: I bought 20 sets of these to use in 2 vacation rental homes on the Oregon coast, based on good reviews and the decent price.Pros-- its nice that they came in sets of 6:  2 bath towels, 2 hand towels & 2 washcloths per set.-- these have the Amazon brand on them, which usually means its a no-nonsense product of decent quality at a decent price.-- the price was good.-- they are bright white.-- the detail bands at each end of each towel are really nicely done.Cons-- it sucks that in can Only buy them in sets.  I wanted to get a lot of extra washcloths that matched the set, but I could not find them on Amazon.  I ended up buying a bundle of 24 washcloths that seem to be from the same manufacturer, but the look was not identical.-- enough fuzz came out of them from the first run in the dryer that I think something must be wrong.  If it keeps up there will be no towel  left.  The reviews mentioned this problem, but almost no one said the towels eventually fell apart.-- the Amazon page said these were made in Turkey, but some of the towels say made in Indian and others say made in Pakistan.-- I saw 3 variations  across the 20 sets I bought.  1)  most of the towels are bright white, but about 6 sets had "almost bright white" towels.  They are supposed to be identical, but when the bright white ones are next to the other "matching" towels, the other ones look a little dirty.  This means the manufacturer(s) are not paying attention to product consistency.  2)  We also had inconsistent sizing.  A group of sets had handtowels that were about 1/2 inch different in size, for no particular reason that I could see.  Again -- manufacturer doesn't pay attention to consistency..  3)  Tags tags tags.  Some towels had shiney silky sown in tags.  Some had paper tags.  Some had just one tag.  Other towels had 2 tags per towel.  I had to cut off the paper tags because they would have made a mess in the washer, and I wanted to cut off the silky cloth tabs because they were  way too big.  So I spent more than an hour cutting of an estimated 70 tags.  Ug.Based on what I know so far, I would buy them again.  I'll update this if anything changes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2013
Author: Joy M.
Title: Much Better Than Expected
Body: I took a chance and ordered these towels thinking "just how good can they be for this price?"  When they arrived I immediately washed them with the expectation that I would see seams coming apart.  I was pleasantly surprised.... aside from a lot of sloughing of fibers from the manufacturing process, all was well.  They dried fine and I am extremely pleased with the thickness and thirstiness of the towels.  Because I have to fit 4 bathrooms with towels, I find $20 per 6 piece set of this quality a great bargain.  Needless to say I have bought several more sets and highly recommend them for the money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2016
Author: Squatch
Title: ... this grey color towel after the first washing looks like someone put bleach in the washer with them
Body: I've purchased this same brand of towels in the pass and had no problems with them put this grey color towel after the first washing looks like someone put bleach in the washer with them, which didn't happen.... they are all very blotchy from a poor dying process... buyer beware,, deals to good to be true likey are....

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2016
Author: paco
Title: Priced Well, Quality Product
Body: For the price, these are a great set of towels. Color purchased was purple. After first wash, color was slightly  muted but still acceptable. Better than anything else you can get for price. Had grey set from couple yrs ago and they have held up nicely. I am very happy with my purchase!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2016
Author: Brian
Title: Awesome quality..
Body: These are so amazing I've bought four sets recently. Two for my main bathroom and two for my guest bathroom. They will release fuzz in your dryer the first two washes. It goes away after that though and you are left with some pretty amazing towels. Highly recommended.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2018
Author: A. Rothstein
Title: Utilitarian and Not Very Plush
Body: These towels were a disappointment.  They are utilitarian and functional.  They are not plush or very thick.  I held them up to the light;  I could see through them.  Rather than wash and use them, I returned them to Amazon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2016
Author: Lennart
Title: There's a reason why these are so cheap...
Body: ...and you get what you pay for. They don't hold up to washing and tumbling and start to look worse for wear quickly. See the picture of the unraveling hem on a large moss colored one after a handful of washes. They produce lots of lint, especially the cranberry ones, which I would suggest washing/drying at least 3-4 times before using it or you'd look all fluffy. Still $22 is very cheap for this set and they do work well, however, they look like they've been around and used frequently for years, not months so use gentle washing and drying cycles.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2015
Author: Deborah Koons
Title: I liked these at first
Body: I liked these at first, but ordered the grey ones, as well as the maroon ones, and the grey ones are getting all discolored after a few washings.  They shed, and don't seem to dry as well as our other older towels.  I would not get them again for these reasons.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2015
Author: Delebird
Title: This towel set feels great and is very well stitched
Body: This towel set feels great and is very well stitched. It dries quickly and is also able to be packed tightly for when I go on an outdoor adventure. having 2 sets means I can keep one in the house and another with my camping/hiking supplies.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2014
Author: Roe604
Title: Do not buy because they fall apart after 1 wash
Body: I wish I listened to other reviewers I now own $20 worth of rags. The seams don't hold even for 1 wash. Usually Amazon Bestsellers don't lead me astray this one is definitely not worth it at all. Learn from my mistake!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2013
Author: stat
Title: Very skeptical about ordering towels I can't touch first
Body: I am very skeptical about ordering towels that I can not touch first.  Then again, I have bought towels that are very soft but push water around rather than absorbing it.  I want them oversize for me at6'4" tall and 325 they are going to have to be larger, lol.  This is it.  These bath towels are large enough to wrap myself up in comfortably. Even the wash cloths and hand towels are larger than you'd typically expect, which just gives the towels extra absorbency and utility

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2016
Author: Jasmin Mousavi
Title: Color changes after washing
Body: I ordered the plum towels, and after a couple washes the purple die fades into a blotchy pink. However it does the job of a towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2013
Author: Ashley
Title: DON'T BUY UNLESS YOU WANT A PILE OF BLUE LINT
Body: TERRIBLE towels! for $20 they are still not worth it. They unraveled after one wash and left blue lint EVERYWHERE!! Shop around and stay away from this brand.........

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2013
Author: Deborah
Title: Beautiful towel
Body: The color is very rich.  The towels are soft.  An amazing amount of lint during the first washing but that seems to be improving.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2017
Author: JeffySarita
Title: I really wasted my money purchasing these
Body: I have been using them since the end of April, 2017.  The hand towels started loosing their dye color.  They are now part yellow.  Now the wash clothes are starting to turn.  I really wasted my money purchasing these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2015
Author: Sophie
Title: One Star
Body: It leaves fur residues >.< never buy again.. do not buy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2013
Author: L. McNerney
Title: NewlyWed gift
Body: This was a gift for my sister and her husband.  Not knowing him I was unsure what to get them for christmas. I heard that they needed towels, not getting any from the wedding.  However I havent heard from her on if she liked them.  The towels were soft and fluffy when we shipped them, taking up much more space than an average towel.  I admit i was a little selfish and was tempted to jsut keep them, but instead I did the right thing...*see that sis?!?! I put you first!  Yup....now when you stop laughing you can thank me!*....yeah, unlikely she will read this.They looked worthy of the price, but my fat round bum never felt the soft caress of these towels.  Lucky sister I say....

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2015
Author: Raphaël Burkhardt
Title: more quality control needed...
Body: Did anyone wiped his ass on the brand new towels I just unpaked??Thank you Amazon...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2013
Author: phillip olive
Title: Lint everywhere
Body: Way too linty, even after washing. I have to brush lint off of my beard stubble after washing my face.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2019
Author: MARMich
Title: Very nice towels & good absorpency
Body: I have Pinzon percale sheets that I am very pleased with, so when it came time to order new towels, I thought I would try the Pinzon brand again. And, I was not disappointed - these are great towels. I ordered the white, and I did wash them before the first use with Tide Free and a cup of white vinegar in the wash water. They did produce a lot of lint in the dryer, but no unraveling, no loose threads, etc. Unlike most new towels, the Pinzon towels were very absorbent after their first washing. Most new towels have some kind of starch or treatment on them that takes quite a few washings before the towel becomes very absorbent. That was not the case here. Also, these are slightly oversized and very fluffy without being too thick to make washing and drying them a hassle. Some reviewers mentioned that the towel continued to leave little lint balls or flecks of lint on their wet skin despite multiple washings. Out of the 8 towels I purchased, only one had that problem, and it was resolved after the third or fourth wash. I highly recommend these, and I would purchase them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2019
Author: GiGi
Title: Really great Towels!
Body: I bought several sets of towels in all price ranges to try out in my new bathroom.  These were the best.  They are thick, but not too thick (I don't like overly thick towels) and they are very absorbent.  They are also very pretty.  I got the grey and they look like the picture, except the picture doesn't do them justice.  I used them after washing them once and I was pleasantly surprised.  There was VERY little lint in the lint trap of my dryer and no lint on me when I used the bath towel for the first time.  Really...no lint!!  I almost never write reviews (although I rely on them a lot), but I had to write one on these towels.  It's really hard to buy towels online because until you wash them, you don't really know what you're getting.  These are a winner.  I have already ordered more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2018
Author: A. McCrae
Title: Not the quality or the color I was expecting, returning.
Body: I'm finally admitting that bath towels are one of those "you get what you pay for" products.  I just moved from a 1-bathroom apartment to a 3-bathroom house, and I am trying to furnish the additional bathrooms on a budget.  I figured that Amazon would be the place to save money while still getting a decent product.  These towels had excellent ratings and were reasonably price, but unfortunately, the quality and color are lacking.  They are really thin and some of the thread loops are snagged... my 18-year-old J.C. Penney bath towels are actually in better shape than these brand new ones!  I was already planning to return them based on the quality alone, but then when my purple bath mats arrived and I compared the color to these towels, the towels looked faded.  And I hadn't even washed them yet!  I know actual color can vary from what you see on a computer screen, but compared to the "plum" colored mat I bought, the towels are more of a true purple, not the beautiful deep plum I was expecting.  After so many years making due with hand-me-downs and Goodwill finds and using things till they're threadbare (who else out there can relate to the bachelorette life?), I am ready for some quality things in my home.  So I guess I'm going to have to bite the bullet and pay double the price for the good towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2018
Author: Equestrian Lady
Title: Absorbent, yet thin, not lasting well.
Body: I don't agree with other reviewers. I'm a big fan of Amazon products and was happy to hear of the Pinzon Egyptian Cotton brand. However, after the first pre-use, gentle wash they are already piling and losing threads. (I am aware that upon the first wash there will be lint. This is different than losing threads or pilling).  They claim they are 'heavyweight', I would disagree. As seen in the picture, they are very thin. The pattern is nice and the outside border should prevent fraying long-term. They are a nice size though, between a regular bath towel and a sheet. I will use them as every day towels, but would not use them for guests. I feel like I could have gone to a department store and got nicer towels for the same price. I will follow-up in six months and see how they have held up. Incidentally, I purchased the Pinzon organic hand towels. They are much thicker, softer and durable than the bath towels and currently,  you get six for $21.99.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2019
Author: Brent Robison
Title: Towels mysteriously losing color.
Body: I am an Airbnb Superhost and I purchased six sets of these towels about two months ago for guest use.  I do a lot of wash and I never use bleach.  After the second washing I noticed that two towels were looking bleached out.  I thought that perhaps my guest had used a facial product that caused this to happen. I soon realized that it was happening to all of the towels.  To date, I've had to throw away approximately 4 of the 6 sets because each week I notice more of the same problem.  I am convinced that this is a problem with the dye that is used in manufacturing these towels. I've had to replace all of the towels with another brand.  I will never purchase Pinzon towels again. A big waste of money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2020
Author: Patti
Title: Great towels, worth the price!
Body: I was nervous to get these based on some of the negative reviews. I was wroooong. They’re great!When I got them, I ran them through the washer and dryer. They’ve help up to multiple washes, are very fluffy (after the first washing) and look very crisp and clean. Turned my tiny bathroom into a luxury space! I even ordered the extra set of four towels too. Definitely worth the price

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2019
Author: Bouvier Mom
Title: Meh
Body: A few pros:—The towels are soft.—They have a decent weight to them.—They are absorbent.—The color is rich and beautiful.—They’re econmicalNow the cons after a month of use and being washed at least 5 times:—They produce a ridiculous amount of lint. Anything washed with them comes out covered in red bits and so is the bottom of the shower after drying off—The color is still bleeding, which has turned some of my white towels a weird shade of pink.Will I keep using them? Yep.Would I buy them again? Nope.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2020
Author: Mary W
Title: Soft, thick, and fluffy.
Body: I didn't know what to expect because of the huge difference in reviews. For the price, i thought I'd try a set. They are really thick, soft towels. After the first wash, there is very little lint. I like them so much I ordered more today.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2019
Author: Valerie Dupont
Title: Changed color after washing
Body: See attached picture of wash cloth. I purchased WHITE these towels to hang in the bathroom and not to be used.  Well we decided to use them. As you can see in the picture the wash cloth was used 2 times washed 2 times. After first washing with other white towels it turned a color  gray and did shrink.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2018
Author: MishaMisha
Title: Not high quality and color seems off.
Body: I purchased the set in grey to match my new shower curtain, etc. They aren't the best quality towels, but I guess I got what I paid for. My big gripe is the color just looks off for some reason. Kind of dingey and maybe with a touch of brown tone to them? I'm not sure but they aren't a true grey like I was expecting. I've already washed them so I can't return them. I won't be purchasing this set/brand again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2019
Author: Erik
Title: I took the larger bath towel camping for a week....
Body: ...and my wife noticed it was missing.  The fact that I selected this towel to take on the camping trip AND my wife noticed it missing, well that rates 5 stars.  The towel has a thick, absorbent and soft feel.  Nice.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2015
Author: DT
Title: Great Quality, Nice Price
Body: These towels are excellent quality and a good price.  The color was exactly as expected.  I washed them with vinegar when they first arrived to keep the color from bleeding, and they came out of the wash nicely.  I am a bit baffle about other reviewers complaining about lint and fuzz that keeps coming off these towels.  There were some pretty dramatic stories of lint catchers being full and lint coming off for months.  I had no such issues AT ALL.  just the normal amount of lint after the first wash.  Towels came out soft, and I haven't seen any problems with fuzz on the towels.  I highly recommend these towels and would definitely buy them again the future.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2018
Author: ilsa mayer
Title: Good deal for the money.
Body: Received these 2 weeks ago. Washed them immediately before using, didn’t leave excessive lint. They are of medium weight and they dry your body very well. Soak up water very well. They are not overly soft, but still nice. At no point did they leave lint on my body or hair.  Overall  I’m very pleased. My only worry is that the Dobby border might shrink in the future. Will see. So far so good.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2018
Author: Ohio Michelle
Title: Pleasantly Surprised!
Body: I’m glad I read a previous reviewer’s comments about how fluffy these towels are after washing, because I was bummed when I opened them and saw how flat they were. But they came out of the wash SO soft and fluffy! I can’t speak yet to their longevity, but so far, I like these towels much better than others I’ve bought at Penney’s.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2015
Author: Mollymae
Title: Does not match the shower curtain it was ordered for.
Body: I bought this along with a shower curtain and some rugs.  All the items were suggested as going together.  You know, that "customers who bought this"..........  Well the shower curtain doesn't look anything like it's pictured.  It's practically black, not gray.  The rugs weren't gray at all.  They were all a taupe color. And these towels were horrid. They didn't match anything at all.  They were more of a taupe/gray color as well.  Everything ended up going back and I bought a shower curtain on Bed Bath and Beyond and went to the store and matched it up with rugs and towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2020
Author: Alex Walker
Title: Great towel just not a lot of longevity
Body: They are great for a few months but just don't hold up over time. The seams start to go after about 6 months.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2018
Author: MikeWilkes
Title: The Most Gorgeous Towels Ever!  Purchased 2x
Body: I wanted to add an accent of olive or moss to my bathroom and these were perfectt that I purchased them 2x.  They also perfectly match the following bathroom rug:  Kassatex 100-Percent Egyptian Cotton Kassa Design Bath Rug, 20 by 32-Inch, Moss

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2015
Author: art stanley
Title: Awesome!
Body: So, I read a lot of reviews on these towels and decided to purchase 2 sets cause we have  Egyptian cotton sheets that we love. Because of the reviews I decided to wash my new towels in cold water and little detergent. The lint trap in the dryer had more lint than I've ever seen in the trap. I was pleasantly surprised when I snapped the towels to see how much lint would come off. There was none, 0 lint and so soft! The bonus, these sets are half the price of high end towels. I will buy again should the need arise. I highly recommend these towel sets.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2015
Author: JJR
Title: These are by far the worst towels i have ever bought
Body: These are by far the worst towels i have ever bought. My biggest regret is i didn't start using a set out of the six i bought till months after so i can't return them. I've washed and dried 6 times as directed and these things leave you covered in fur, literally fur not just alittle lint but giant balls a furry cloth head to toe, even worse if you have some stubble. DO NOT BUY THESE !! There so bad i won't even don't them i'd feel bad for who ever got them. Cheap towels but pretty expensive rags, oh wait you can't even use these as rags as what ever you clear would be covered in furry lint !

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2020
Author: Megan
Title: Best towels
Body: These towels are perfect! So soft and super fluffy! It has taken me forever to find a decent towel that is large and fluffy that doesn’t cost an arm and a leg.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2018
Author: Tarheelsonly
Title: Mediocre Towel that degrades rapidly after washing
Body: Gift for my son in his new house. Went up 2 mos later and he showed them to me after limited use. Cheap and will degrade after just a few washings... Spend a little more and get a more substantial towel. Unimpressed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2016
Author: Luana Henry
Title: very disappointed..
Body: very disappointed....I first purchased this set months ago, loved the taupe/driftwood color.  Needing more of the same I clicked on"buy again" thinking I would get the same towels.  The color is miles apart.  The set that just arrived are gold.  no where near the driftwood/taupe I had gotten before.  Cant return them because partner washed them to get the stiff newness.  Very disappointed in color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2016
Author: Yujin
Title: it gets an ugly orange "bleach" stain EXTREMELY easily. I have a regular drug store face wash ...
Body: These towels are decent quality wise (haven't unraveled or come apart) but depending on what chemicals come in contact with it, it gets an ugly orange "bleach" stain EXTREMELY easily. I have a regular drug store face wash I use that when I dried my face afterward, the towel turned bright orange.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2017
Author: allhallowseve
Title: Fluff all over my face
Body: Fluff, fluff all over! Washed them twice and dried off after a shower to find my entire body covered in fluff. All over my face in my mouth and eyes. Since then they have been washed five times and they still cover me in fluff. They don't even feel like they are drying.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2016
Author: Shoeman79
Title: perfect towels for any home
Body: I'm a single guy and was looking for some good towels.  I went to a local store and they wanted $10-$20 per each good towel so I got these. I love them sure there might be a better towel, sure there might be a higher quality towel, but these are great quality for a great price. I recommend following the care instructions and wash all of them all together in a solo wash. There was some color bleed but you would not wash a new red shirt with your white load now would you? It was as expected and there were a few solo threads that came out, like 2 threads on one or two of the six towels. I cut them off and no problem since. I actually think I 'm going to get another set in another color. I use to work in the 3rd best golf course in my state and they had really nice high quality towels and these almost come close to them...almost.Update 9/22/17 I have since bought a 2nd set I now own the grey set. I remodeled my bathroom and they grey towels are the perfect match. I originally bought the navy. I think the grey look a bit nicer and since they match my new bathroom I'm pretty stoked. Final thoughts I still love them. Navy has lost a little bit of fluffy feel but still feel like a good high quality towel. I get compliments on the hand towel in my bathroom. There's a bit of lint the first few washes but it goes away and one or two strands that I cut out of both sets. I bought navy because I love blue and I read in the reviews the color fades. Well my navy has lost no color in about 1 years time.My concern with the grey is it's lighter than the navy and I have some light color towels that you can see stains. If I have any problems with the grey set I'll post it here.Update 5/19/18I bought the plum color towel set as a gift for someone because they always comment how nice my hand towel is in my bathroom...They love they towels and is all they use now. I've had the navy for almost 2 years and they still look new. My grey set is still like a new set of towels no fade, still has new fluffy feel. All 3 sets that I have purchased had the same upfront issues of 1) You need to wash all of them together in a separate load because there is a first wash bleed. 2)  There are loose strands and lint after they come out of the dryer, I use toenail clippers to remove the strands, and after a few times through the wash it will stop...I honestly forgot about the strands until I was rereading this review. 3) There are tags on every towel that are easily able to rip off.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2014
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: they are kind of soft and look nice but they're almost too absorbent
Body: they're weird.  first off, don't wash them with any other clothes the first few times, especially black!  even my lint trap was packed full of fuzz.  they are kind of soft and look nice but they're almost too absorbent.  I need two towels to dry off, and I'm not a large person.  you can dry half your body and then the towel is so soaked that you need a second one.  cheap cheap cheap.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2018
Author: James Welch
Title: Soaking wet item!
Body: The only reason I'm giving such a bad rating is because the towels showed up soaking wet, literally. The box was perfectly fine, not wet or damaged. I noticed condensation in the plastic around the towels. Opened it and could literally wring water out of the towels. No mildew smell luckily.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2014
Author: Joseph Marino
Title: Luxurious delicate cotton. Wash them as you would any delicate luxury cotton shirt and they will last a long time
Body: Absolutely amazing quality towels. I purchased 3 sets of these towels and I must admit that I am very happy with them. Although, we made a mistake when washing the first set. With the first set we had, we didn't pay attention to the tag and washed them incorrectly like we used to wash our old regular cotton towels, which were not egyptian cotton. That was a mistake, because after washing them wrong just once they started to fray a little bit.These towels are made of extremely luxurious cotton, the cotton you would find on an expensive Men's polo shirt such as bobby jones etc, so they must be washed delicately in order for them to keep their soft feel and to stay in good shape.I highly recommend these towels, but make sure that they are washed the same as your delicate clothing is washed, the cotton is very soft.PROS:- Extremely soft Egyptian cotton, soaks up water very well.- Very big towelsCONS:- Since these towels are made of Egyptian cotton they are delicate and need to be washed as you would normally wash delicate expensive clothing. Cold/warm water, delicate/low setting and don't over dry.Country of Origin: Made in Pakistan

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2017
Author: Frankie Bellucci
Title: These are nice..
Body: These are nice....not nice enough. They fray very easily. I brushed up against something gently and the towel frayed.No quality towel should "pull apart" easily.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2017
Author: B Grvs
Title: Would order again
Body: Excellent towels! Love the softness, and absorbency. Washes and dries well, with the minimum of flint in the dryer. The color has not faded. Would order again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2013
Author: Jen
Title: Liked 'em so much I bought three sets!
Body: I was looking for a new set of towels, and came across these.  They had high reviews and the price was right (cheaper than buying the pieces individually from Wal-mart, even) so I went for it.I'm really impressed with these towels.  The color was true to the picture, we've had them for several months with no fading or lose thread problems, and they look very high-quality.  I love when I buy pretty inexpensive things and they look like I spent a bunch of money on them.After buying the first set, we bought two more in different colors for our other bathroom and a spare set.  I will definitely buy these again if I'm in need of another set, or I'll recommend them to the next person I hear is looking for new towels.-------Update January 2014: Over a year and a half later and the towels are still holding up very well! I would buy these again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2018
Author: Chris
Title: Five Stars
Body: Nice towels for the price and they are very absorbent. Nice and soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2017
Author: Bob
Title: A great set of towels for the money
Body: I have five set of these towels, purchased more than three years ago. I use them almost every day. I think they are great towels and they have held up quite well. I have also purchased Pinzon towels with a much higher weight (725 and 820 grams) and I actually prefer these less expensive towels -- the heavier weight towels get so thick that it seems they repel water, rather than absorbing it. To me, this weight of towel is just about right: it is thick enough to be luxurious but it still absorbs water well (which, of course, is a towel's basic job). But the main thing I notice after all these years is the value for the money. These are amazingly well priced! Yes, I read that some buyers had problems immediately with the towels; in that case just return them. Amazon is good on refunds. But if the towels as solid when you get them, I suspect you will get many years of good use, just as I have.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2014
Author: aimlynn
Title: Good quality towels for not much $$$
Body: The good:They're thick and big towels.  Nice colors.  Cheap (but not cheap quality).The bad:As others have noted in reviews, they fuzz all over EVERYTHING at first.  Empty the lint dryer several times the first time you dry them, and wash them alone.  We're on 4 washes now and this has calmed down but the amount of lint that came out of them at first was unreal!They do seem less absorbent than my old towels.  Not terrible, but noticeable.Lastly, I got the dark green color and use face creams/washes that contain chemicals (salicylic acid, Retinoids) and it seems that it might be bleaching small spots into the towels :(.  Be careful if you use face washes that have fancy chemicals in them and buy a dark colored towel.  Again, it's not horrible, but disappointing since I've only had them for a month and it's likely only to get worse over time.  I'd buy a light color next time.Overall, I'd purchase again, just buy a lighter color so I don't have to worry about bleaching from face wash.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2018
Author: Rhonda K Chapman
Title: After several washes the color has faded in blotches,
Body: After several washes the color has faded in blotches, it looks as if they had bleach splattered on them but I don't use bleach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2017
Author: LA
Title: Quality towels
Body: Excellent color and quality. I have a bnb so these will be beautiful for guests.I will reorder these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2017
Author: Sean
Title: One Star
Body: Owned less than a year and they are very faded and the stitching is coming out.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2017
Author: Eva L
Title: not what I wanted
Body: I was looking for thick luxurious towels, - NOT these

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2017
Author: Jennifer S
Title: Nice color. Good price for average towels.
Body: Just a bit too thin. Wish they were more absorbent. Just an average bath towel. Lovely color green.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2017
Author: java coder
Title: Five Stars
Body: A very nice product, exceeds expectations, soft and warm

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2017
Author: Elena
Title: Good towels.
Body: Soft, tasteful, absorbent. Good towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2017
Author: Maddog5950Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: good towels and great quality good price love them

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2017
Author: Oldshovel
Title: Five Stars
Body: I have a dozen of these I love them

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2017
Author: Nightlark
Title: Nice
Body: could be fluffier.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2013
Author: Smde
Title: why it doesn't get 5 stars
Body: I got the white towels, they are pretty large towels, very absorbent.  Yes, they did  leave a lot of lint in the dryer, but after a few washings, it is not that big a deal. My only complaint is that I bought 3  six-piece sets.Out of all those, one wash cloth completely unraveled on one edge after the first wash, all the rest were fine. I did not return it as I felt it would have been a lot of trouble to send back a whole set for one washcloth. Other than that, I am really pleased with these towels, they are really soft and absorbent, and for the price, you really can't beat it!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2017
Author: Slim2u
Title: They are very nice items and will compliment any bath set admirably
Body: These definitely are heavy, luxurious towels.  They are not a soft as the "hyldocotton" towels that I purchased elsewhere.  Nonetheless, your guests will be impressed with the high-quality workmanship put into these items.  I awarded only 4 stars rather than 5 because I have not yet seen how sustain multiple washings and because they are not as soft as I expected them to be.  Do not take my evaluation of their softness as a criticism, though. They are very nice items and will compliment any bath set admirably.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2016
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Color washed out immediately
Body: After washing these towels once and using them maybe two times they became discolored.  It looked as though the color simply washed out in places.  I was sent a replacement set and the same thing happened. The towels were washed in a mild detergent and used to dry like any other towel.  I have not had this problem with any other towel.  Clearly there is a manufacturing issue with these.  All I can do is warn other people not to buy these towels.  I couldn't be more disappointed with my purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2015
Author: Ethan
Title: Plush and strong before first wash....and then....
Body: I wanted to like these towels.  They arrived, and they felt great.  They are very plush, and a good size.  Hence the two star rating.  As with anything, I washed them first, and followed the directions of washing them one at a time.  After the first towel was washed, the threads came apart on an entire length.  This in turn caused the cotton to separate, and made a rather ominous mess in my washer.  Another item that I noticed was that after the first wash, the towels were not as soft and plush as they had been.  I had no choice but to return this towel set.  I hope they fair better for you!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2014
Author: Penny
Title: Pinzon Egyptian Cotton 6-piece Towel Set, Cream
Body: I always hate to write a negative review, but these Egyptian cotton towels just do not get you dry.  I tried  Egyptian cotton sheets once, and I was very disappointed  with the cotton.  Well, I got stung twice, but  this will be my last experience with Egyptian cotton.  It is just different from cotton grown in the USA.  Oh, and also, once the towels are made damp, they remain wet, even hanging. They just don't dry out.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2015
Author: Kevin Boulder
Title: Initially liked but would now discourage anybody buying after half a year of ownership.
Body: I struggled with giving these a 4 or 5 star review. I'm afraid my ignorance of how any towel might perform when washed is giving it an unfair "ding" when, for all I know, any new "Egyptian cotton" fabric would behave the same way.Just be careful after the first wash. I bought two sets of these and threw everything into the wash. That means, 4 large towels, 4 hand towels and 4 wash cloths. Per the care instructions, I tumble dried them on low heat. This takes forever but it's fine. After the drier shut off the first time, I opened the door and nearly got a face full of lint It had spilled over the lint catcher and there was a bunch still shoved up in the door where it sucks it in before sending down to the lint catcher. So... first round, approximately two entire lint catchers full of lint. But they weren't even dry yet. Turned it on for another round. About 45 minutes later, still not quite dry yet but another catcher full of lint and still a touch damp. So, third round, went to bed.In the morning, pulled them out fully dry along with yet ANOTHER catcher full of lint with a little bit still stuck up in the door. So, do a set of two and expect somewhere between 3-4 lint catchers full of lint. In other words, keep an eye on it and empty the lint catcher frequently.As for the quality of towels apart from the sick amounts of lint on the first wash, they seem really nice. Heavy, absorbent, nice color, nice feel and they didn't shrink very much at all. I wish I could give them a 4 and a half rating instead of 4 because I just don't know how common shedding that much lint should be on the first washing. Again, it was two sets so expect half that much for one set. But for the price... WORTH IT.Update: so after the first wash and the results I mention above, I had one full size towel, one wash cloth and one hand towel all hanging in the bathroom for several days. I noticed that the towels continue to "emit" fibers and I was cleaning this lint off of the toilet tank (towel rack hangs above it), the baseboards and the floor. I imagine it's going to take one or two more washings before I see a drop-off in the amount of stuff shedding off of these towels.Update two: after several months of ownership, these things still love to shed lint. I figure at this point, it's going to be a good year of multiple washings before they stop leaving a linty mess all over the bathroom floor. I might bump them down to an unofficial 3 star in this update but I'll probably leave it officially on 4 stars. They are decent towels and will eventually be great when they stop leaving a mess.Update three: the towels are still "emitting" lint and fiber so many months later. I'm not even sure now I consider them safe with all this stuff floating around in the air. For the longest time, I couldn't figure out why a ring of grey was appearing around the water line in my toilet several days after each cleaning. It wasn't the usual pink or other film that appears as it progresses to needing a cleaning. I finally realized it was fiber from the grey towels hanging on the rack above the toilet. Just, unbelievable how much and for how long these things shed. They still continue to overwhelm my dryer's lint screen after dozens of washings. So now it's officially a 2 star review when I initially debated 4 or 5 when they first arrived. I'd rather discourage anybody buying these towels at this point.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2015
Author: Test 1 4 U
Title: Not nearly as nice as advertised
Body: Not nearly as nice as advertised. First of all they were uneven. When I fold towels I like them to be even and squared. These were neither. The color, weight and size were good but they had snags right out of the bag and they were cut uneven. I have to reduce squares for that. We ended up going to a local store to buy some more at about the same price but they were made uniformly.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2017
Author: Jamie J.
Title: These towels do not absorb well and keep shedding fabric ...
Body: These towels do not absorb well and keep shedding fabric. I have washed them 4 or 5 times and they still shed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2016
Author: Roland
Title: A great product for a great price.
Body: I don't know why I see quite many not so good reviews, we have purchased many towels on Amazon; some towels double the price, these are the best in quality, absorption, softness and longevity. We just purchased another set. We don't have problems after washing and drying them the first time before use. A great product for a great price. Highly recommended.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2016
Author: AllegraRose
Title: I ordered one set and was happy with it
Body: I ordered one set and was happy with it, so I ordered a second set. But one of the towels came out of the washer looking thin and rather threadbare across large portions of the towel. It's so thin in some parts that you can practically see through it if you hold it up. So three out of four bath towels I'm happy with. The hand towels and washcloths are all fine.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2017
Author: Josh Chu
Title: Nice towel, bad quality seams
Body: Only buy these if you don't mind having a nice towel that has ragged seams.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2014
Author: ARM
Title: Colors continued to bleed after many washings
Body: I had previously purchased a set of these in white, and like them very much.  However, this burgundy set bled color after more than 5 washings.  Washcloths would bleed when used in the shower.  Also, the towels appeared to have some sort of coating that seemed to make them repel water.  Not a good quality for a bath towel.  I cannot recommend these towels in any color but white.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2017
Author: Animadverto
Title: Pinzon is AWESOME!
Body: This is my first set of these. Prior to purchasing them, my favorites were Restoration Hardware - at 500% + the cost.  These are 100% cotton, have a nice weight to them, don't loose shape washing them, absorbent, and feel nice using them (soft).  I buy almost everything, 100% cotton Pinzon products.  Love them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2017
Author: B
Title: WORST PURCHASE EVER! STAY AWAY!
Body: Received this set as a gift for college because i was moving into and apartment and They are literally the worst towel set ever! The two large towels are different sizes, they came faded so some pieces are darker than others, and after one use one of my wash clothes literally fell to pieces! Im so mad! DO NOT PURCHASE THIS SET! *I received the set from a family member two days ago*

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2015
Author: JR
Title: LINT, LINT, LINT!
Body: Have washed and dried them about 10 times, and they still produce more lint in the dryer and in the bathroom than I've ever experienced with towels before. Until I washed them about 5 or 6 times they even left lint on me when I dried myself. Great look and feel, but I wouldn't recommend them or buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2016
Author: ARL
Title: Not absorbent
Body: These are soft, fluffy towels out of the box. Only one problem--they don't absorb water. Drying off after a shower was more of a squeegee experience. We thought they would get better with time and repeated washings (past the time we could have returned them). Now, we're shopping for new towels. Very disappointed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2015
Author: S. LeVan
Title: Bold color, huge bath towels, and great value!
Body: My daughter loves purple and I wanted to surprise her with a bathroom makeover. These pretty purple towels are a perfect match to a new frilly shower curtain, decor and throw rug I bought to complete the look. As far as color goes, what we got pretty much matches the picture I saw here on Amazon. The bath towels are huge! And I love love love the price for this set. As with most cheap towels and darker colors, there's a lot of colorful lint the first few washes. I have not noticed it get on my daughter after a bath though, just in the dryer lint trap.I'd suggest washing them alone the first one or two times just to be sure you don't get lint on other items. However, they look great after a couple washes and feel comfortable compared to other towels I've bought in the same price point. These towels aren't used more than twice a week in our house so if you need something for daily use, a tighter weave white may be better. But, I love these and will be getting a set in a different color for my bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2014
Author: Watchful Reader
Title: Bad Purchase
Body: I bought 3 sets of these towels as a gift for my daughter.  This was 3 months ago.  Now, (and I have seen them) they are stringy and the gray color has turned tan.  She did not use bleach, just regular detergent.  I buy from Amazon all of the time, and this has been my worst purchase!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2015
Author: Rachel
Title: Color not as pictured
Body: I ordered this set in "cream" and on the item received, the sticker read "ecru" and is much more yellow than depicted in the image. I think "driftwood" might be closer to what I'm looking for but very hesitant to reorder now!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2017
Author: Dana Lormor
Title: One Star
Body: After a few washings color faded in spots like it if was bleached.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2017
Author: Dave I.
Title: Looks great, for the first week...
Body: These look quite nice, but after two weeks of semi-regular hand drying use, and 2 times through a regular wash cycle (a week apart), numerous strings are unraveling from the hand towels.  I'm afraid the search for great towels continues...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2015
Author: M. Kukta
Title: I cannot recommend these towels to anyone.
Body: The reason I gave these towels 1 star was they have some qualities, however, I would never purchase them again.  Put them in spare bathroom and whatever someone did, they discolored and are now tan & orange spots all over.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2013
Author: L Andrews
Title: Don't waste your money on this towel set!
Body: I don't understand how these are the #1 bestseller on Amazon for this category. These are the worst towels I have ever bought and returned them immediately. After one wash, at least half of them were frayed and looked like they had been chewed up by a dog. They were absolutely horrible to use, and didn't absorb any water whatsoever. I have another set of Pinzon towels and they are great, but I won't be fooled by this brand again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2013
Author: Clarence Abraham
Title: good towels
Body: They are not very absorbent at the begining but after a few washings they are very good towels. I had one that the end threads came uraveled, but I can live with that. one out of 12 isn't bad

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2016
Author: JayMon
Title: I've seen these
Body: I actually returned these towels.  I had ordered them with a set of Utopia Towels.  Without even opening the package, I could tell they were relatively thin in comparison to the Utopia's.  They appeared to be about 30% thinner. They reminded me of a average towel you get at a hotel pool. I was looking for a thick Premium Spa Towel, this was not it.  I think one advantage to this type of towel, is it would dry quicker.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2017
Author: Mel-Mel
Title: but they are excellent "big" towels
Body: The purple is not as "rich" a color as in the photo, but they are excellent "big" towels.  Very thick and absorbent.  I plan to buy more and recycle my "crappy" towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2013
Author: Grace G.
Title: Worthe the Money
Body: When they arrived they seemed thin but after a washing they are really large and thick towels. I think we will enjoy them. I love the burgundy color I ordered also.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2016
Author: Atlantic Traveller
Title: No regrets!
Body: Great quality towels, especially for the price.  I was wary given some of the negative reviews but I've experienced no color run, shedding or shredding problems.  I would recommend these towels to anyone and I would and probably will buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2013
Author: Sergey
Title: average
Body: They're not *bad*, but nothing to write home about. I've owned many cheap walmart towels that were comparable in their absorption.I'm still using my set, but for my next set I'll look for something nicer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2014
Author: Ms. Joanne M. Felci
Title: Falls apart and sheds easily
Body: Even after several washings and dryings the towels continue to shed and leave lint all over you.  Very disappointed with the quality of this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2016
Author: Cat
Title: Long & Sturdy
Body: We've used these several months now and love them.  Longer than most towels, so great for tall people like us.  Holding up well in the wash too.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2013
Author: Kelly Homan
Title: I wish I could return them
Body: Good size towels. However after a few washing, the towels began to frey and unravel.  I wish I could get my money back!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2016
Author: John A.
Title: Happy
Body: Definitely worth the price! I bought 3 sets. I would recommend washing them at least twice to get out all the excess cotton before using them Your dryer will hate you, but after that they actually dry you and feel great. There was very little loss of color as well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2016
Author: marie caffey
Title: Great towel set
Body: Great towel set especially for the price. I will order another set!  After using a couple of times the hem stitching is coming apart. Otherwise they are great!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2015
Author: Lisa
Title: Wouldn't buy these again
Body: After just a few washes, these towels started falling apart.  They look like my cat has used them as a scratching post.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2013
Author: Nickiaz
Title: Just Dont Wash Them!!
Body: These towels are very nice looking prior to washing.  In the wash however, the sides always fray horribly.  Even washing on gentle does not seem to make a difference.  Don't waste your money!  If you do, you will be replacing them within a month.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2016
Author: Steven L.
Title: Pretty soft towels however like other reviews have said
Body: Pretty soft towels however like other reviews have said, after a few washes these towels start to break easily

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2015
Author: Geoffrey Coco
Title: Very poor quality. Loops coming apart after one washing
Body: Very poor quality. Loops coming apart after one washing. Inconsistent design (towels hung side by side obviously made on different looms with different patterns. Also, the cotton is coated with something - after toweling off, you still feel wet.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2017
Author: Nishigandha Sonavane
Title: Good but leaves lint after super long time too
Body: Good towel but very heavy and leaves lint for a very long time even after several washes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2013
Author: Beth Wilbur
Title: Cheap!
Body: I had to wash these 4 times before the little fuzzes stopped coming off, and after they were washed so many times, they started to fray at the edges.  As if this was not bad enough, they didn't dry me off!  They don't absorb water.  They are TERRIBLE!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2015
Author: dirmest
Title: A waste of money
Body: A waste of money, as I don't have time to return them. Extremely poor quality and appearance.I'm afraid to wash, for fear they will disintegrate all over my other clothes  I liked the Superior Egyptian cotton 6 piece also sold by Amazon, which looked and washed well, similar price.Can't believe the good reviews these got; perhaps different lots of the same style and color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2016
Author: Geoham
Title: Four Stars
Body: Great Quality after more than a year of use, no fading either.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2017
Author: jj
Title: Towels
Body: Great thick soft towels. Washes up nicely

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2014
Author: Marlon B. Guillory
Title: nice. Be sure to wash them a few times ...
Body: The towels came packaged in their own plastic bag, nice. Be sure to wash them a few times before using them !! Or you will have fuzz all over the place.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2015
Author: Alejandro Miranda
Title: I have to use 2 towels to get dry
Body: I have to use 2 towels to get dry, very little absorption

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2017
Author: Sandra K.Cain
Title: The towels and wash cloth feel wonderful. They are soft
Body: The towels and wash cloth feel wonderful.  They are soft.  However, the color is spotting as if I used some kind of bleach on them which I did not!!both the towel and wash cloth are spotted with pink spots all over and I purchased gray. i will never purchase these again

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2017
Author: Brandon
Title: Great product
Body: Good quality towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2015
Author: Mary O. Kjos
Title: I hate gray and I hate bath sheets
Body: I thought I ordered BROWN TOWELS.  I rec'd gray BATH SHEETS.  Was this my mistake or was the wrong item sent?  I hate gray and I hate bath sheets.  The fabric was nice, however,  and the quality appears to be good.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2014
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Started falling apart after TWO washes
Body: Began to separate from the seams after only washing twice, to the point that you can see threads.  Each time they were washed there was an extraordinary amount of lint in the dryer.  It seemed as though most of the 725-grams ended up as lint.  Not a good quality item.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2015
Author: Hml
Title: One Star
Body: does not absorb water.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2014
Author: DMV Reader
Title: One Star
Body: The fabric of these towels are very cheap and they continue to fade after several washes. Do not purchase

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2016
Author: Barb
Title: ... times now & they have proved to be very good quality for the price
Body: We've used these towels several times now & they have proved to be very good quality for the price.  Very absorbent and fluffy.  Quality is really good.  We've just ordered a second set because we liked the original set so much!  Recommend this to anyone who wants good quality for a really inexpensive price!Update - have had these towels for 3 years and they have retained their color & quality.  Very glad we purchased these!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
Author: ChattyCat
Title: Nightmare lint and color bleed
Body: Great absorbency,  pretty towels BUT... an absolute nightmare with the lint and the bleeding of color even after 5 washes. I washed them in hot like they said for the first time. I used dye catchers in the wash and they were solid red when I took them out. Next time I washed them in cold and used four more dye I catchers than should have been necessary and the catchers were still red. Lint everywhere, on every other article in the washer. All they did was lose color every single wash. Surprisingly, the towels were still vibrant, so I don't know how they could look that way and still lose as much dye as they did.I bought the Crimson ones and finally gave up and returned them. It's too bad really because they we're very nice towels as far as thickness and absorbency.  I don't know if the other colors perform like these, but definitely do not buy the Crimson if you care about anything else in your washing machine. I'm just sorry I wasted about 25 color catchers trying to get the dye to stabilize in the towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2018
Author: Barnacle Bill The Sailor
Title: I think Amazon spec'd these towels pretty well when you consider weight, feel, looks, performance, and price.
Body: I looked and looked for towels to go with a master and guest bath I just renovated.  There are tons of choices with advertised GSM weights from 300 to 900 and prices all over the place like the weights.  The marketing touts Turkish cotton, Egyptian cotton, and others.I ended up ordering these Amazon Pinzon branded towels, 3 sets each in green and white.  The 600 GSM weight seemed like a good balance of weight and price.  And I liked the colors.I was a little concerned by reviews that said they were "too thin" or "cheap" but those are subjective things.  If you're used to 900 GSM spa towels yeah, they may seem thin.  But I decided to give them a try.The instructions said to give them an initial wash and they will fluff up.  I found that to be true.  They are packed pretty tight and looked compressed right out of the bag.  But after a wash and dry, they fluffed up and feel really nice.As for being "thin" or "cheap", they seem very nice to me.  Personally, I don't like super heavy towels.  Like everything else this GSM weight thing can be taken to extremes.  I think there's a balance point between a towel that's easy to handle and one that feels like you're grabbing a rug.  Also I've found that the really heavy weight towels don't necessarily dry me off any better or faster than a mid weight towel like these.  And those big thick towels can be hard to hang over a towel bar.At the end of the day, I think Amazon spec'd these towels pretty well when you consider weight, feel, looks, performance, and price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2019
Author: AussiegirlIngrid
Title: Quality Cotton Weave, Strong Binding
Body: I love anything Pinzon. I've bought their sheets and this is my 2nd set of towels.  I am very picky about my cotton linens. This is quality cotton, the binding edging is sewn very well and it has a good thickness and absorbency in the cotton towels. Cold water wash, add a cup of vinegar to the rinse water to set the dye they come out beautiful.Great towels for the quality and. price. Update: I have washed these towels as stated above, and have had no problems, with lint or shedding at all. Some of the reviews here are very old and maybe the manufacturing has changed, and posts need updated to be current. I love these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2020
Author: Dan
Title: A Year Later....
Body: And these are still fantastic towels. I have been using them for over 12 months and have had no issues with wear or tear and they have held up to washes really well. They are quite absorbent so you will not have any issue drying yourself off and they are thick and still pretty soft. If you are looking for a solid set of bathroom towels these are a great option.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2020
Author: IslandHawk
Title: Great towels with a real problem
Body: I loved these towels at first and quickly ordered a second set. They performed well for a while, but within a few months they all unraveled at the hem (see photo).  I would give these towels 5 stars if it were not for the fact they all came apart at the hems –  and that costs almost as much to fix as purchasing new towels.  The fabric is still good and has lots of wear left - but I am going to have to replace.  IF they fixed this problem they would be excellent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2019
Author: Michaelman Merchandise
Title: Great, Durable Towel Set
Body: We use these for our vacation rental and they are really great.They are thick, good quality, and durable enough to stand up to repeated washings without discoloration or losing their shape.They do tend to get a little rougher over time, but I think that’s because we use all natural detergents and no fabric softener.This is our second set in 2 years...and that’s only because pieces of the set were lost and we wanted to get back to a full set.Overall, these are a fantastic value for a great quality product. :-)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2020
Author: Stanton B
Title: After 1 year of use they’re falling apart
Body: Overall the towels are substandard. They are not particularly absorbent or soft or thick. They also shed pretty consistently. But I could forgive that if they weren’t literally falling apart. EVERY SINGLE Towel is coming apart at the seams. In terms of volume, we bought 8 sets of these. For that many sets to be coming undone is simply unacceptable and hence the reason for this “one year later” review.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2019
Author: Dan
Title: Lint factory
Body: They’ll probably be decent towels once I wash them another 10 times but right now they are the lintiest towels I’ve ever bought. They have been through the laundry 3 times so far and are still so full of lint that when I dry off with them I’m covered in blue fuzz. This might not be an issue for some but I don’t have a washer and dryer in my apartment so it’s really not convenient to have to keep taking them to the laundromat over and over before they are useable. I do understand new towels will have some lint at first, but these seem excessive. Fair warning, you’ll have to launder these several times before they’ll be usable.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2019
Author: Joey Hindinger
Title: Wouldn't recommend
Body: In the interest of letting you know what you're getting yourself into.....I've washed ALL these approximately 50 times most of those times they were by themselves hoping the fuzzy debris would eventually stop, at this point I could have probably made another 3 sets of towels with just the fuzz balls that have came off of these.  I've officially turned them into cleaning rags, because after washing them that many times every time I dry them the lint trap is completely filled with pieces that have came off this product.  The first time I used them after showering I had to get another shower because I was covered in pieces of the towel after drying off.  While they have maintained their vivid color after all those washes I unfortunately think this would be best suited for cleaning rags unfortunately.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2020
Author: chris
Title: Excellent quality and oversized
Body: I was so pleased when I held up the bath towel and it almost reached past my chin...I'm 5'4 and it's a great chunky soft absorbent big sized bath towel. Then I looked at the luxuriously sized hand towels and washcloths and was thrilled. The stitching is excellent. The color beautiful and the quality superb.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Keeps shedding!!
Body: Really want to like these towels, but it hasn't happened yet.  I bought the Pinzon Egyptian Organic towels last year, but they haven't restocked them so I ordered these in the hope that I would like them as much as the other ones...they are soft and fluffy, but... Not happening!  They have been washed and dried four times, and they haven't stopped shedding lint! After we towel off, we look like as if our skin is exfoliating.  We are covered in white lint.  I've never had towels do this.  Back to Costco towels....

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2019
Author: AMD
Title: An excellent buy
Body: Pros:Good size bath towelsThick quality fabricEven after several washings, nice vibrant blue colorCons:Bleeds and sheds horribly in the beginningIN CONCLUSION...To prevent the shedding and bleeding, I strongly recommend that you wash and dry the towels & rags at least twice before using them.  Even with that said, this is still a very good towel set and an excellent buy.Four out of Five stars

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2020
Author: Tarena Boggs
Title: Nice towels
Body: Bought for display so can not rate absorbance. They washed/dried nicely w/ little lint. I chose purple & would say they are lighter than color shown. More of a muted than deep shade. They are a nice quality. Fluffed up nicely after wash/dry & are very soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2019
Author: MBarrett
Title: Just okay
Body: These are just okay. I say that because I was torn between these and the Turkish luxury Turkish cotton towels so I bought both. The Turkish ones blow these out of the water. These are okay but not nearly as soft or plush as the others. If I didn't have anything to compare these to I may like them more. They are soft enough but not really worth the price. To quote my younger self....I've had better.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2018
Author: JLM
Title: Cheaper and Thinner than Prior Versions
Body: I bought these Pinzon towels several years ago and needed some new ones. These are nowhere near the quality of the prior version. They are lighter, thinner, and even the label is a cheap plastic label rather than a fabric label. Very disappointed that the quality has been compromised. I don't understand when you have a great product, does every new product manager have to justify their existence by making it cheaper? I mean, yes, you make more money, but isn't the whole point of having a great product is that it remains great? Who are these people who make these decisions to cheapen products. Constant cheapening means we go elsewhere to find someone who makes decent products. Shame.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2019
Author: NYCDapp
Title: Linty Trash
Body: These are linty trash so far. My whole bathroom is covered in navy blue lint, every surface. It has to be wiped every few days. Never seen this in my whole life. These may go in the trash. They are ruining the bathroom, blue lint pools everywhere. It's disgusting. They've been washed numerous times, lint trap in dryer is always full, bathroom is filthy with lint over and over.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2019
Author: SC
Title: Good, Solid Set of Towels
Body: I don’t know why all the bad reviews?  No, those aren’t tremendously luxurious towels but you’re not paying for that. These are a good, solid set of towels and the color is spot on (red). I’ve washed and dried them and they came out perfectly.  I’m using as an accent, rolled up to go into a black iron hanging towel rack. They look great in it.  What’s all the fuss about here?
