Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2018
Author: Burbank310
Title: VERY thin towels. Poor quality. Don’t waste your time.
Body: I bought a set based on all the positive reviews for our master bath, hopeful that Amazon is actually selling a nice, inexpensive towel set. Very disappointed! They are so very thin and cheaply made. I am returning them immediately. I was hopeful that Amazon was offering a good deal, but you get what you pay for, I suppose. I definitely do not recommend these towels. Also, they don’t feel like cotton, but something synthetic.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2018
Author: La Wanda
Title: I was disappointed with this product
Body: I was disappointed with this product. The picture shows a plum color. However it came a light lavender color. I kept it only because I have a lavender shower curtain and could decorate my bathroom with this towel set. I also want to state when I washed them (right from the package) a lot of the the material had washed out and caused much lent all over the product and my washer.I ended up having to hand wash the inside of my washer because of how much material came off.Do not recommend this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2014
Author: Rhonda
Title: Very Soft and Like NEW 15 months later!
Body: We got these towels within a few days of order them and they arrived in bags. They're good quality for the price but they were lighter grey than I thought they'd be and can't be hung with our other darker gray towels - which works okay for us since I bought two sets.UPDATE: 15 months after buying these towels and they're still soft and look new! Other towels that we bought about a month earlier look old and are rough - and, we've used these more than those because they're softer. I'm changing my rating from 4 to 5 stars (I had some issue with the color being a lighter gray than I thought they'd be) - and ready to buy this brand of towels for our new house once we decide on the interior decor. Best towels ever! We're building our dream home and I'll definitely be buying this brand of towels for the new house.

It doesn't give off any more fuzz than other new towels I've bought. All towels lose a lot of fuzz the first few times you dry them. They are good sized, soft, and pretty

Title: Very nice towels for the price
Body: These are very nice towels for the price, actually quite a bargain.  They are just heavy enough to feel great but not so heavy they loose absorbency. The towels are both soft and absorbent. The one downside, as noted in several reviews, when new they produce a lot of lint in the dryer. Wash them twice before using them and the lint problem is solved.  Haven't had them long enough yet to comment on the durability but they feel like a quality product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2015
Author: T Stanley
Title: Threads are pulling after first wash
Body: I didn't notice at first because I didn't wash these before I started using them, but I washed a single set of these by themselves on a warm cycle in a front loading Samsung. I then dried them on delicate setting twice which is low heat. At least two of the items have pulled threads. I looked these over fairly closely when opening so I know this happened in the wash. I took a second look at target towels and I think these are comparable with what they carry now - in terms of initial looks and feel. Most of my existing towels have pulled threads now, but I know it wasn't after the first wash. So disappointed because I thought I had scored such a great deal. Still a good price if you receive a set without the issue so I am hesitantly giving a second star. I'm returning all of mine - I'll pay more for better.***original review***These were on special for $5 off when I bought the set - I bought 3 sets. And I'm not disappointed. They seem plenty big - bigger than expected, but I was hoping for fluffier towels. These aren't bad at all - they are way better than anything local at this price point. But they don't compete with towels that you'll pay $20 each.  One can dream, right?  But they'll dry quicker and they are plenty hefty for the price I paid. I don't know what the big deal is with Egyptian cotton. They seem like ordinary cotton to me but again they are nice towels. They are nicer than the towels they replace that came from target. All towels shrink 3 or 4" so I expect these will also. Out of the package these aren't the softest - I suggest washing them first. These probably deserve 5 stars because they are such a great value but I struggle with Egyptian cotton supposedly being better and I can't tell it is anything special.

Title: By Far the Wost Towels that Could Be
Body: Although before purchasing I had read that these towels were bad, I thought that perhaps it was a critical person writing and that the towels were very  inexpensive. I would rather have burned the money I spent than deal with these towels. I washed them prior to using and boy did they ever shed with the edging coming apart so lots of long threads. With respect to Amazon, I could have returned them but fell ill and in hospital so could not retrun in the time given.  I decided to try washing two more times and then picked all the little pieces off and used the towels.  The little pieces were all over my shower and bathroom. in mass.  They still haut me weeks later as they I guess I can not clean the room well enough to get rid of them.  They even have shown up in other clothes that I wash in my washer.  I write this review in hopes that in warning others about them I will calm down that Amazon would sell such an inferrior product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2016
Author: Her Royal Peepness Princess HoneyBunny Blayze
Title: Plum/Cream Pinzon  Bath Sets
Body: Looking for bath towels here was a little daunting,  as many people had the same complaints  against and praises for each towel  that I looked at.  Finally I asked my boyfriend If he had ever purchassd towels here and found out he had and liked his Pinzon towels.These towels also had the conflicting reviews but, decided to give them a try and placed 2 orders; a set of plum for myself and cream for my grandmotherWhen they arrived  the bad reviews made me cautious about the first  laundry experience with them.  Each set was washed separately with 1/2 cup of white vinegar to remove the chemicals sprayed on them. We didn't have any of the towels fade or fall apart on the first washing. They still look brand new, we have had them three months now.. I was impressed with both the thickness and size of the towels and wash cloths. My grandmother, found them to be too thick and the wash cloths to large for her to use ( wring-out  etc..)  I personally didn't have the same issues.They are 2x's softer then towels bought at Target or Wal-Mart. I have long thick hair and like not needing to use  2-3 towels to towel dry my hair part way..Plum seemed to be a darker color from the picture shown while the cream is a true butter cream color. Over all  really pleased with these towels and would recommend this product to others.

Author: Tlucare
Title: Surprisingly good product
Body: I have had this towel set for a few weeks now.  I held off on the review until I had washed the towels a few times.  I am very pleased with the purchase.  I washed them before the first use, and immediately I could tell how thick and fluffy they were.The price is unbeatable.  I purchased the gray towels.  I have washed them a few times and the color hasn't faded and they are still soft and plush.  They didn't get any strands pulled out.  The only thing is that after I first washed them, they produced a lot of lint.  When I use the body towels to dry off, a bunch of the fuzzies fall off.  They don't really stick too me, they just get onto the floor.  But it's nothing a quick cleaning can't fix.I gave this product 5 stars because they work extremely well for the price.  I was surprised at how thick they were considering how much I paid.  The fact that they shed a little doesn't bother me.  I'm pretty sure that after I wash them a few more times that will stop happening.  I would definitely recommend this towel set!I've had these towels for about 6 months now.  They are softer than ever and no longer shed.  Great purchase!!

Title: Very great towels
Body: These towels are actually great. I was pleasantly surprised due to the low price. They’re thigh and heavy, not the softest but they still feel great. I’ve washed them a few times now and they’ve kept their color with no snags. I plan to order another matching set soon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2015
Author: AMER Corp
Title: Time Tells All
Body: We had the towels for a few months when they began to change color, looking modeled and attractive.  It seems the material is not as resilient as common towels and even a slight amount of hand sanitizer caused light spots to appear.  Some hand soaps and cleaners contain bleach like antiseptics, the towels not only proved to be no match, but welcomed the discoloration.  Over 45, wife, two kids in college, I have never before seen such a fragile group of towels.  A year later not one matches the other, we got 8 sets, and two have lost their edge binding completely.  You would think we have a vicious laundry machine or that we mistreated the towels from Amazon, when in fact, due to their poor performance we handled them with more consideration than any common-use towel should receive.The rub is simple, it takes time for the flaws to appear, it does not matter what type of washer-dryer we have only used HE machines with no agitator.  By the time the towels began to fall-apart we were past the return period to have them replaced and have since relegated them to rag status.  Its another shame.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2018
Author: Carl G.
Title: Terrible quality!
Body: Within a couple on Months had strings hanging off all over these towels! Don't waste your money!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2017
Author: Gail N.
Title: Ahhhhhhhh!  Finally, a Great Towel at a Reasonable Price!!!
Body: I'm picky about towels, and my husband is even pickier.  We bought some wonderful towels a few years back, and when the place where we bought them was out of business, we went on a hunt for some that would be at least a little like those, but not cost an arm and a leg.What we wanted was:* Oversize (but not quite as big as a bath sheet).* Soft enough to be comfortable, but thirsty enough to dry a person quickly.* Thick/dense -- at least 500 grams.* Not fall apart in the washer after a few washes.* Not get "hardened" in the dryer.I am absolutely thrilled to say that these towels have fulfilled all of the above, and then some (the towels are 600 grams).  I bought some on a sale price ($18 for the set, what did I have to lose?) and after the first time using them, I immediately bought a second set.  And now I am getting ready to buy a third set (and as soon as they get the color I really want back in stock...I'll get a fourth set).While we haven't used the hand towels much, we've used the towels and washcloths and they are wonderful.  They are a fabulous bargain, and I would not hesitate to recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2018
Author: Ngoff
Title: Great towels
Body: These towels are awesome! I love how soft and fluffy they are, and they were a great price too!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2014
Author: Stephanie C
Title: Satisfied overall, but with flaws
Body: For the price, these towels are great.  My one complaint is that they make a lot of fuzzies... no, really, like a LOT.  I washed them several times before using them per the reviews I read, but they still left an almost comical amount of little fuzzies all over my skin.  I washed them several more times (with vinegar, not fabric softener) and the fuzzies have diminished, but not quite normal yet.  I'd say I've run them through the machine 15 times now - I think by 20 or 25 they'll be fine.  If that sounds like too much work for you, then I'd suggest more expensive towels.  For the price though, I'm happy.  I'm not a towel connoisseur, but I think they're very soft and plenty absorbant.  (BTW, If you ARE a towel connoisseur, I would ask why you're shopping for these in the first place...?).  For the average household, they're the perfect balance of price and looks/quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2018
Author: TwinkieKat
Title: Great value
Body: We’ve ordered multiple times in different colors and haven’t been disappointed yet. Not too plush and they wash well.

Title: Nice thick towels
Body: nice and thick towels but the fuzz literally took 7 washes before it stopped coming off them. It did eventually stop and these towels were good for the price

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2016
Author: MCB catlady
Title: I was very pleased with the initial looks of all the pieces along ...
Body: I just purchased this set the end of 09/2016. During unpacking, I was very pleased with the initial looks of all the pieces along with the packaging. This would make a very nice wedding or any occasion gift. I washed them with a few other of my towels. There was quite a bit of "cotton" in the dryer vent filter. It was pristine lint, I could have used for cotton balls. LOL. But I threw away. I bought the white towels by the way too. After the wash/dry, the towels, hand towels and wash clothes were still flat to fold (the corners didn't draw up or the edging either), soft, and fluffy. They seem to me to be the middle of all on weight, thickness, softness, fluffiness. This is how I love my towels, but others want different things. I will be ordering more. I just want to use them a week or two to be sure they hold up like I think they will. For the cost and the number of pieces and the quality of them all makes them a very good deal. Even compared to the general shopping stores that I won't name, they are better to me than any you can buy at these places. Also, they are 100% egyptian cotton.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2018
Author: Me 🙂
Title: Great bath towel set for the price!
Body: Love these bath towel sets for the price. Ordered last year and ordered more now for our travel trailer this summer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2018
Author: Vinster
Title: Worst towels ever
Body: Worst towels I’ve ever had. Don’t believe all the positive reviews. They stained the first time I washed them. Just horrible. There’s at least 10 off color stains on one towel alone. Don’t waste your money. Luckily Amazon game me my money back so they must of had a lot of complaints about these

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2018
Author: Christian Stock
Title: Great set of towels for the price
Body: If you're a lone person looking to replace some towels or have some back ups, these are rock-solid for day in day out use. Good size and comfortable, not sure what people got that could make them so unhappy. Exactly as expected.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2015
Author: Sue Too
Title: You get a bit more than what you paid for
Body: For $22 you are getting two bath towels, two hand towels and two face cloths.  Let's face it...for that price you aren't going to get super-high quality.  That being said though, I am quite impressed with what $22 will get you with these towels.After renovating one bathroom I bought two sets of the navy blue towels figuring that they would not be used very often so why not give them a shot for that price?  While renovating the second bathroom I used the new towels and LOVED the size and absorbency of the bath towels so much (more like a bath sheet size) that I ended up buying two sets of the cranberry for the second bathroom.I was a bit disappointed that the cranberry bath towels were a little smaller than the navy blue ones, but still larger than average.  I have seen complaints that the hand towels and face clothes are a bit larger from some other reviewers but I didn't really find that to be the case with my set, so apparently the sizing depends on the lot you end up purchasing.The colors are rich and have held up well after several washings.  The navy is a true navy blue and the cranberry leans a bit toward the burgundy side with a hint of red which is fine with me since I really wanted burgundy anyway.  I have only seen one or two very tiny pulls out of the entire four sets.  I cannot attest to whether or not the colors ran upon the first (or subsequent) washings since I always wash them separately from other items.  There was quite a bit of "fuzz" in the lint trap after the first couple of washings but I think that is pretty typical of any new towels.Will these towels hold up after five years?  Probably not.  But find me anything you paid $22 bucks for that you actually got five years out of.  In five years I'll probably be redoing the bathrooms again anyway and will want a different color.I give this product five stars, based on quality for the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2020

Title: Worth Every Cent!
Body: These are the best quality towels and are worth every scent.

Author: Chris
Title: Great Color - Fell Apart at 1st Wash
Body: I chose this product because of the Pinzon name, and how much I like their sheets. I washed the towels by themselves according to instructions and the towels fell apart in the washer, getting tons of cotton fibers all clogged in my washer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2016
Author: gr8hnd
Title: Great towels!
Body: We just repainted our bathroom and wanted towels this shade of blue. I read the reviews, which were extremely positive, and decided to give this brand a chance. The price was extremely low for a set like this. We were thrilled to find that these are beautiful, thick towels. I saw some comments about lint. So far the only real heavy lint I've seen was in the recommended prewash where I emptied the lint trap twice during drying. There was some lint in the bottom of the washing machine after first wash also. However, the towels washed beautifully, no fading, and dried normally. They are very soft and the bath towel is bigger than the bath towels that came with our other sets. I went back and purchased a second set and will probably buy some more. My only disappointment is I found no bath mats to match this shade of blue. Still, the towels are definitely worth looking around a bit for a mat.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2013
Author: Casey McCabe
Title: Major Lint Factory
Body: I had to wash these red towels 4 or 5 times before they could be used, I even dried them on the 'no heat' setting a couple of times just to get more lint off.  I had to clean the lint trap every 20-30 minutes.  I don't ever remember other new towels being nearly this bad with the lint problem, I couldn't even dry my hands without being covered in red fuzz.  It's weird because I also bought the same towels, but in the 'driftwood' color and those were ready for use after two wash and dry cycles.  All the laundering cycles has already started to fray some of the edges of these towels and they are only a month old.  As cheap as these were compared to other towel sets, I'm not impressed and not that happy with spending my money on them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2018

Title: Color is not dark.
Body: They are pretty but not the deeper color of purple depicted in the photo, which is what I was looking for. I did have a few loose threads after washjng a couple of times. They are nice for the price.

Author: wlr/buddysbuddy
Title: Perfect for my needs.
Body: I got new kitchen curtains and decided to get 2 sets of these to add more green color to the room.  They are just the right thickness for the job.  I keep a bath towel hanging from the refrigerator handle and one on the drainboard to set washed dishes on.  I keep one hand towel on the oven handle and one is a cover for a small, easily dented/scratched freezer that people keep throwing things on.  The washcloths work well as dishcloths.I washed them first and of course there was a lot of lint in the dryer.  I have never had new towels that didn't shed like mad in the first wash.  I have not had any trouble with snagging or pulled threads.They are soft and absorbant.  They are bigger than towels I have had in the past.  I consider these towels a good purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2015
Author: JoanneR
Title: Great for every day use.
Body: These are pretty good towels.  Soft, made pretty well.  I wouldn't go so far as to call them "luxury" - but then again, it depends on what you're used to.  I first bought a bath sheet from this seller and this maker - and liked it, so I came back to Amazon and bought the set of 2 bath towels, 2 hand/face towels, and 2 washcloths.  I washed everything before using and a little color came out in the wash but not that you could tell from the color of the towels afterwards.  Just wash first.  Then after using the washcloths first - no color leached out at all.  I came back and bought a second "set" of the bath, hand towels and washcloths.  Good price, seller is very nice (they wrote me upon delivery of the first item to see if all was well with my order).  Perfect for every day use.

Title: Five Stars

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2013
Author: Tami
Title: Holds up nicely after washing!
Body: These are really nice towels! I waited for this review to see how they did after being washed about 10 times. I am happy to report that the band stays in place nicely. I have purchased so many towels that after awhile begin to look like the band has elastic in it and the towel distorts terribly, but these are holding up perfectly!  I have not noticed any fading of the color and they are absorbent and just as soft as the day they arrived.***A little tip if absorbency is an issue for you.  Do not use fabric softener on your towels or dish towels. It makes them repel water. Stiffness is not a problem either when dried in the dryer.

Author: GGourley
Title: Five Stars
Body: These towels are great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2013
Author: 2 Cats
Title: Nice Towel Set
Body: The description says these towels get softer with each wash and so far so good.  My husband and I have only had this towel set for a few weeks, and we love them.  They're a good size, very soft, not too thick or too thin, I'd say just the right amount of thickness for our taste.  We don't like super thin towels or super thick towels, because neither dry us off comfortably.  We also love the price for this set.  The threads have snagged a little, but it's not that noticeable unless you're looking for it, in which case nothing a little snip of the scissors can't fix.  We ordered the grey set and now we plan to order more colors to stock up and toss out our old towels that have run their course.  We do recommend these towels for the reasonable quality at this awesome price!  For a 19.99 towel set, you wouldn't think the quality would be much of anything, but this set will prove that to be wrong.  Very nice towel set!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2015
Author: Jane Eyre
Title: Pinzon Egyptian Cotton 6-Piece Towel Set
Body: This set of towels was a nice surprise because of such nice towels for the great price.. The towels are 100 cotton Eqyptian. They have the traditional looped pile that gives a good light scrub when drying oneself. The set was complete with 2 good sized bath towels, 2 hand towels, and 2 washcloths. I bought the off-white for me, because it suits our bathroom, and another in wedgewood blue set for my hubby. I like towels I can wash in hot water and these, although suggested with warm temp, did not shrink or warp. The packaging was minimal, just a protective plastic bag with one paper tag pinned throug. I easily trimmed the labels. If you like good old traditional towels at a comfortable price, I recommend these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2017
Author: Charles Ellis
Title: Five Stars
Body: Feels soft and is very sturdy. Also, looks homey and hotel-ish.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2019
Author: Kimberly Shirley
Title: Amazing quality!!!
Body: All of these towels have stayed super plush for the past year that I’ve used them. The bath towels are the biggest bath towels I’ve ever used. They actually cover my body. Will probably buy more soon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2014
Author: Great Faulkner's Ghost
Title: Great for the $$$
Body: I'm quite happy at this price. The bath towels are really thick and thirsty. However, the hand towels and washcloths are not quite as impressive, and seem a little thin. (The bath towels are actually a little nicer than the Ralph Lauren towels I have been using, but the others seem a bit "budget" thickness.)  My niggling complaint has nothing to do with the quality, but the color description: the so-called "cream" color I bought really isn't cream to my eyes --  more like a light beige. Still looks nice, but not quite what I was expecting. Still, no complaints at this price, and color is subjective, after all. These really are great for the money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2013
Author: F. D. Waterhouse
Title: Poor Quality of Construction
Body: When I opened the package, I was thrilled with these towels. They were thick and fluffy and I loved the color. I tossed them into the washer and then into the dryer -- as I do most every fabric item before I give it to my family for use. When I took the towels out of the dryer, I noticed that the entire side of one of the hand towels had separated from the towel. The binding had come loose. After checking the other towels, I noted that the other hand towel was raggedy, and the binding on it was ready to come loose. The same was true of both washcloths. Very poor quality of construction on these items.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Large, soft and will dry you fast.
Body: I love how large these towels are. I'm a big guy. 300 plus pounds and I have no problem wrapping one of these around me. I dry off faster and after two months they are still soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2013
Author: S. Bukaty
Title: They Fall Apart.  Already returned.
Body: I have returned these towels.  When they arrived, I was a little disappointed that they were not a little thinker, but was wiling to live with them.  I liked the color, and they were just going to be guest towels.  Then I threw them in the wash.  After only one wash, the towels were frayed.  It wasn't just one of the towels; all of the towels were fraying along the sides.  Additionally, there was so much lint in the lint trap that I could barely get the tray out (I clean it after every load).  The towels are a waste, so don't bother buying them.  I will continue my search for grey towels for my guest bathroom.

Author: Frank Damocleez Barajas
Title: Really good towel at a great price
Body: Great value for the price and level of quality. Not the plushest nor softest towel I have ever had but does the job well and without complaint. You would probably have pay twice the price to get a slightly better towel, but if you want a really good towel at a great price then go no further. Colors are steadfast and have held up well after many washings. Like most new towels they will lint a little when new about after a couple of washes you are good to go.For my family, the pricing made it possible to give each family member their own color while keeping in line with each bathrooms decor, which ended the fighting over whose towel is it anyways. That alone made these a great buy for our household.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2013
Author: bandazar
Title: good value, you get what you pay for
Body: These are not quality towels.  But if you like big fluffy towels that feel good on your skin and are a good value, then these are your towels.First time I washed these towels, I noticed some runners (loose threads).  And these things produce a ton of lint in your dryer filter.  These towels aren't exactly the most absorbent of towels that I've used either.But you still get a lot of towel for your money.  The hand towels are pretty large, and the big towels are quite thick.  If you want a good value, then buy these.  If you want quality, then expect to pay for it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2013
Author: carcap
Title: pinzon towels
Body: I was a little leery to purchase these towels based on  some of the negative reviews.  However, the excellent price for 100% Egyptian cotton, and the fact that I didn't have to drive out to store and buy them, compelled me to take a risk. I ordered five sets (I have a big family).  Well, I got the towels yesterday and so far  I am very happy with the product!  I ordered them in grey, and the color is true to the image on line.  Unlike some of the reviewers experience, the towels were not frayed, thin, or smelly.  They are beautiful!  I am going to give them a wash first before I use them, and if anything changes, I'll post.  I would not hesitate to buy them again.  For those who had a bad experience, it must have been a fluke.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2018

Title: Five Stars
Body: Great absorbency and color!  Finally found red I was looking for!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2014
Author: Brad
Title: Fair
Body: What can you say about towels other than their quality. In this case these towels are only fair quality. I do like the set package. My complaint being that they don't absorb water very well. Strange, I know. Perhaps it's because they're brand new. But when I get out of the shower I notice that after toweling myself off that the water sits on the outer part of the towel and doesn't get absorbed so much. To get dry I have to use one side of the towel to get some water off and then use the other side of the towel to finish the job. They have gotten slightly better over time. Overall, they get the job done.

Author: Flynt86
Title: Good guest towels
Body: Good quality for the price, they are thicker and softer than other towels around this price point on amazon. Whereas the other towels were shredded after their first trip through the gentle cycle, these went straight from the package to the washing machine and survived with a very very small amount of threading, no color bleeding (I purchased them in beige > "driftwood") and no crazy lint balls flying when I shook them out and folded them. While they are not GREAT quality (I wouldn't keep them for regular/frequent usage because I feel like they won't last through a ton of washes without further fraying) they are a good idea for guest towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2017
Author: Vive
Title: Not Happy
Body: Not happy - on more than one of the towels a bottom seam opened and the towel frayed. Now I use it as a cleaning rag. Too expensive for that.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2013
Author: LeRub
Title: After washing and drying 5 times, still leaving pills all over the house
Body: I am setting up a rental property and needed decent white towels that were not a big investment so replacing would be easy. These towels had great reviews so I ordered them and they came quickly. I opened them up to wash them and the pills started right away, and I figured I just needed to wash them. I have never seen so much lint and pills in my life, and they got all over the entire house. I had to clean out my dryer and it was such a nightmare. I will be returning these right away and going with something I can feel in person. Be weary!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2013
Author: Stephen K.
Title: Good value buy, somewhat questionable quality
Body: These towels are certainly a good buy in terms of value, however as some others have stated, they've started to fall apart a bit.  They're definitely soft and comfortable towels even after washing them a few times, but there have been some loose strings and strands, especially on the hand and face towels.I'd probably buy these again simply because for the amount you're getting, the price is better than going to another store like walmart or target.  These towels are a nice quality despite their short comings.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2020
Author: Ray J. Davis
Title: Wonderful towel set !!
Body: Very nice, larger towel set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2020
Author: Tom E
Title: Not like the old ones
Body: This product is significantly lower quality than earlier versions. Returned.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2013
Author: kyle
Title: Good towels for the money
Body: I bought these towels because I'm a poor college student and got tired of using the very cheap towels from walmart that my mom bought me. The first ting I did when I got these was wash them and dried them. I ran them through the dryer twice, because a lot of lint built up on the filter, probably could have went for a third time. When I pulled them out there were some loose strings I just cut them off and there hasn't been any more since. The towels are huge and soft. They are good at drying. The wash clothes are huge. A lot bigger than a normal one. I would recommend these towels to anyone looking for a good set and not wanting to spend a lot of money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2013
Author: Taylor C.
Title: Not sturdy for long-term use
Body: I've had two sets of these towels for a little over a year, so I can speak to their long-term durability. They started unraveling at the side seams after a couple of months. It took probably 20 washes to get the excess lint out - even after being washed a number of times, they'd leave lint on my body when I used them to dry off. They're also not very soft. The price I paid a year ago was cheap enough, but I think I'll go for a higher quality set when I replace these ones. I expect towels to last longer than one year.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2017
Author: Melissa
Title: One Star
Body: Color fades fast

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2013
Author: Adybaby1
Title: Color is off, but towels are OK
Body: I'd probably rate these more at 3.5 stars, if I could.  The color isn't quite gray, but more of a bluish gray.  It's OK for my bathroom colors, but thought others might like to know.  The gray towels don't match the gray bath mat.  This one, at least:  http://www.amazon.com/Pinzon-Luxury-Banded-Bath-Sage/dp/B000OMT47Y/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1358033394&sr=8-1&keywords=pinzon+bath+mat  Bath mat is more of a true steel/dark gray.As for the quality of the towels, they are just OK.  Definitely soft, but I think that's some sort of coating that is on them as, after one wash, they weren't quite as soft.  They are absorbent, though, and a good size.  Overall the towels seem cheap with uneven hems and loose threads.  Definitely wouldn't pay the listed price of $60, but for $20, I'd consider them a steal.Last thing, they seems to catch easily and the threads come out of the loop.  So after a week of continuous use, I have a couple of washcloths that don't look so nice since the threads have pulled through.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2017
Author: Eduardo Nagar
Title: Bad quality
Body: Don’t last even a year

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2017
Author: kevin
Title: Four Stars
Body: Very good product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2017
Author: S. R. Kruse
Title: Very thick. Wash well, color is true.
Body: Very thick.  Wash well, color is true.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2014
Author: BobbyG/YTWB
Title: Very decent quality for the price
Body: Needed 2 sets for my RV. After seeing 1 negative review for every 3 great reviews I took a chance. They must use different vendors because the sets I received were great. After several washes not one stitch came out. After the first wash and dry cycle I probably cut only 5 wild threads out of all 12 pieces. It was nothing. On one towel the embroidery was off slightly in one place and in one set the moss color of the wash cloths was slightly different. They came out soft, absorbent and beyond expectation for the price. I'm very pleased.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2014
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: They are great. The material is nice
Body: I ordered a set of these towels about a year ago.  They are great.  The material is nice, thick enough to be absorbent, but not too thick.  They have held up well over the last year and still look good.  I bought the cocoa and the cranberry colors.  The cocoa is just as pictured.  The cranberry is like a burgundy color, I think the photo makes it look a little more red than what they look like.  But, a very nice, color.  I also sent both of these colors to a friend who has used them and had the same experience and is very pleased with these towels.  Great price, great product and I would recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2017
Author: Amazonaholic
Title: Very soft!
Body: Excellent towels! Large and soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2014
Author: Erin A. OBrien
Title: Nice towels, but you are compromising on quality for price
Body: I bought these towels as a quick replacement for my Pottery Barn towels that had a mysterious encounter with bleach in their last wash.  This color looked similar to the Sandalwood color of my existing towels- and in fact- they are nearly the exact shade which was a pleasant surprise.  However, that is where the similarity ended.  These towels were much thinner, less plush, and I could see the fade in color after the first wash. They are soft though and will serve their purpose for my family- though I don't expect them to last that long.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2017
Author: Arctic circle  Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: So soft and fluffy!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2018
Author: Mark J.
Title: Five Stars
Body: This was a gift for my neighbor and they liked it very well

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2014
Author: Carol from Miami Beach
Title: I bought these towels with great expectation that they would be the perfect towels for ...
Body: I bought these towels with great expectation that they would be the perfect towels for a summer home.  They were priced well, would be used for three months, and what could go wrong?  I waved off others' description of the need to wash them 3-4 times before using them because of lint accumulation.  The color was indeed perfect as was the large size of the bath towel.  However, the summer has not yet ended, and the towels have been in use (by a family of 3 adults) for less than three months,.  They are worn and threadbare.  The color (a pale cream to begin with) has disappeared entirely (and I use cold water).  I regret the purchase.  The only good news is that they can be thrown away at the end of the summer.  Terrible disappointment.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2017
Author: Donald Williston
Title: Five Stars
Body: THESE ARE WONDERFUL, THICK, SOFT TOWELS

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2013
Author: AAV
Title: Good Buy
Body: Yes, other customers are right - these things shed like a mother early on, but it's important to note that that does decrease over time. After about 2-3 washes, it didn't shed so much any more. I think that's just a function of washing a brand new towel - it'll happen with any brand.The towels themselves are soft, absorbent, and look exactly as pictured. I don't think that buying a fancy set that is twice as expensive is worth it - I'm very impressed with these, and for the price it's a great bargain!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2018
Author: Pam
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love these towels they are super big and so very soft

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2018
Author: Chelsey
Title: High quality!
Body: These towels are amazing... and not just because of the price! I will continue to recommend to family and friends. Love love love them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2014
Author: C. P
Title: Pinzon Egyptian 6 piece towel sets
Body: First the pros;They are really pretty, absorbent and a very nice size.Cons;I have never in my life seen so much lint in my life.I advise to wash twice before using.  You don't have to use soapboth time BUT do wash twice but run them through the full cycle both times.Be sure to Check your dryer lint catcher EVERY FEW MINUTES AND EMPTY.Would I use them for guest. Yes but only if washed and dried at least twice.would I buy again yes and I did BUT I washed and dried them twice before using.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2017
Author: Alec Ferrell
Title: Five Stars
Body: Very nice, but more yellow/gold than they are beige.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Nice quality
Body: Great bath towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2017
Author: K.G.
Title: the dye comes out in the wash, super ugly
Body: These towels immediately got orangish spots like they came in contact with bleach.  I was asking my kids, checking how they were washed, trying to solve the mystery.  Every time they were washed, more spots turned up. Absolutely every one of these towels is bleached-looking, and everyone of my other towels in the house is fine... conclusion: its the towels.  They look old and gross and like they've been used to wash the car or clean the floors, but its just poor quality dye, I guess.  (To be clear, they never discolored anything else in the wash, but have only gradually lost their own color.)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2017
Author: Evan
Title: The towels were nice but after washing once they started to shed badly ...
Body: The towels were nice but after washing once they started to shed badly and now even when drying off it sheds onto the body leaving cotton all over your body

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2017
Author: Pen Name
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great towel set

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2017
Author: diana
Title: Great for decorating
Body: I purchased these towels for decorative purposes and I just love them. They complement the rest of the purple items in the bathroom really well. Would definitely recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2013
Author: 4pierre
Title: Get what you pay for
Body: Pros:Very thickSoftinexpensiveCons:Lots of excess lint even after the third washMany loose threads lots of fraying-----------1 month more use on these and the fraying has stopped after about the 4th and 5th wash and there is minimal lint in the catch in the dryer.  (should have waited 1 more wash before posting the first review).  So still a nice towel for the money, just needs some care to get it going.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2019
Author: BRed
Title: Unravel quickly
Body: Significant unraveling during first wash (see photo).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2017
Author: Anthony Onofrio
Title: Not what I was expecting durability wise
Body: Nice and soft but threads already starting to unravel already after only a couple months use.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2016
Author: Julia
Title: Very very good towels for the money - Recommended
Body: Very inexpensive towel set, ordered the cranberry which is a very deep vibrant red.  I washed them immediately and then dried in the dryer on medium heat.  There was some lint, only to be expected with new towels, but none stuck to the towels which sometimes happens with inexpensive towels leaving them scruffy and tatty looking forever!  The borders contracted a bit, but easily stretched back into shape with a tug when still slightly damp from the dryer.  I am most impressed, they are fluffy and thick even after washing.  For the price you can't do better!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2017
Author: PS
Title: Not worth it.
Body: Not soft at all.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2017
Author: BigFoot14
Title: Great Towel set a great price
Body: I've found that purchasing towels over the internet is a real crap shoot.  Finding the towel that is large enough, absorbing enough and has great texture is very difficult.  Well Amazon made it very simple.  I received an email from Amazon that included a blurb about the Pinzon Egyptian Cotton towel set.  I purchased 3-sets Olive, Beige and Cocoa in color.  I couldn't be happier.  The towels are wonderful.  They are soft, absorbent and very comfortable on my skin.  The Pinzon Egyptian Cotton towel set is a great value and pleasure to use.  I recommend this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2018
Author: Rachel
Title: A lot of Lint
Body: Excellent absorption but too much lint. Washed and dried 3 times and there’s still a good amount of lint. Not too happy about all the cleaning because of it

Title: Five Stars

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2017
Author: Jacerin
Title: Soft AND absorbent
Body: These towels are super soft without sacrificing absorbency; great quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2014
Author: heidi
Title: Soft fluffy towels
Body: Arrive quickly and well packed. I washed these and then fluff dried them about ten times before using them because they shed a lot of red fluff. They are the guest towels in our rental space. All of our guests have commented on the soft fluffy towels, so the extra fluff is worth the guest's enjoyment. They've been washed many times and continue to hold good color and softness and thick fluffiness, but they do also continue to shed a bit. I would buy them again for their softness, though.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2018
Author: Paula Marie Hill
Title: I will be ordering more soon.
Body: Very soft and thick and i love the true color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2017
Author: KN
Title: One Star
Body: These look and feel cheap (because they are!)  Oh well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2013
Author: Arnold Kool
Title: My review: 1 year later
Body: Waited an entire year to write this review.These towels are simply the best I have ever owned. They HAVE NOT faded, shredded, thinned, or lost any quality whatsoever over the course of the last year. We wash them twice a week in the laundry machine and they are still perfect; if anything they are even better as they feel crispier and dry well.Do not hesitate to order these. You will not get a better deal anywhere else.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2017
Author: Jason McCullough
Title: GREAT TOWELS, BUY THEM.
Body: I am always leery about buying important things like clothes, shoes, or delicates from Amazon. I saw the high rating on these things, and I decided to take a chance. After a bunch of washes, they're still really soft. They haven't bled as much as everyone else has been saying, so I'm going to assume people are just washing their towels in a strange way. I would absolutely recommend getting these. Great price for a great item. It doesn't always work out like that, so when it does I like to make sure I write a good review.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2013
Author: jason collins
Title: Little Disappointed
Body: I really wanted this towel set to be a GREAT deal. Unfortunately, they really aren't worth even the very low asking price. After the first wash, I had massive amounts of threads coming out, both in the seems and in the individual thread loops. I mean like 3 foot long threads coming out. In addition, for claiming to be Egyptian Cotton, they feel extremely synthetic to me. Almost as if they resist being absorbent, which is not exactly what I look for in a towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2013
Author: J Baldini
Title: I think this is my first 1 rating these towels suck.
Body: First I did when I got these like I do with anything especially since they had a slight oil smells to them, is wash them, I washed in hot on my washing machine.Now hot here, in this house, it's not hot, it's just above warm because the water heater is turned down more than normal for safety reasons, not my call, so I'm saying first wash, just above warm you can totally leave your hands in the water, no bleach, and all the towels were completely ripping at the seems.  I don't remember if it was after the wash or the dryer but this has never happened to me before with a new towel, I've seen towels do this over time, like a lot of time, not the first wash, one towel I might think it's a fluke, but it was all of them, all 5, not worth my time to return, they suck, don't buy them, they are worth a dollar at the dollar store, not if you have to wash cold and air dry, that's ridiculous for a towel, this isn't a silk dress shirt.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2017
Author: D. S. Hayes
Title: Poor quality towel
Body: Will not be ordering this again! Less than two months old and already coming apart. Towels should hold up better than this

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2015
Author: steve king
Title: Use as display in bathroom.
Body: Not a chick so sure "display" is wrong term. We use as matching towel set hanging up in bathroom and when guest come over we give them matching towels set so we don't look like drunken rednecks with mismatched towel. For the price a great deal. Everyday towel? Who knows, am still enough of drunken redneck to not use the "good towels" everyday and use mismatched towels. Am feeling funny about the spelling of towel now. Say it in your head towl, towell, towwwelll??? Weird yea?

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2013
Author: Xanna V.
Title: Puffy, Fluffy, and Bright
Body: I can't agree with the warnings about these shedding -- but only because there is so much fluff left *after* laundering.I always launder before use, and the dryer filter was loaded with lint. Okay. Then I used them that week for guests and laundered again. Filter full again.But... they are still wonderfully fluffy and heavy, by no means the cheap flimsy ones one expects for the price.I consdier them a good deal.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2017
Author: Myrna Schoon
Title: Love these towels
Body: Love these towels! Washed beautifully.  Bought for guest bathroom,  but thinking about using them in the master, like them that well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Poor quality control
Body: Save your money. Bought 2 sets and the hems started unraveling almost immediately. Have about 1/4 of 2 sets left that haven't unraveled but afraid to use them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Four Stars
Body: The color and the quality of the towels are good.  Good buy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2015
Author: J
Title: Not absorbent but look nice
Body: We wanted absorbent towels and thought 100% Egyptian cotton would surely be that.  I saw the other reviews that said these towels were not absorbent - and those reviews were right.  "Except for / Exclusive of decoration" must mean more than just the detail stitching, because the towels do not absorb.  We will have to put these items somewhere in the house where it's enough that they look elegant. Two stars because the towels feel soft and look good.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2015
Author: Gregory T Reid
Title: Lint, lint, and more lint.
Body: Unbelievable how much lint ends up in the dryer lint filter ... even still after three washings.  There was a cubic foot of lint from washing and drying six towels the first time.  Perhaps 3/4 cu ft the second time and 1/2 cu ft the third.  I'm amazed that there's any towel material left!  But still, they feel soft and strong and dry well, so I'll give 3 stars.  Hopefully the excessive lint shedding will end in anther wash or two.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: they get me dry every time

Title: Got destroyed my first wash, ruined other towels/sheets.
Body: I hate these damn towels. I bought them and washed them right away of course with similar colored sheets.Well the seam came out of a few of the towels, DESTROYING them and putting link all in my washer and messing up other sheets - no clue how I'm going to un-ruin them now.DO NOT BUY THESE as if you want to get a refund - good luck, costs as much to ship it back!!!

Title: Color fades in a spots and looks like bleached!!!
Body: Do not buy, they fade in spots after only a few washes.  Horrible.

Author: Laura
Title: Pinzon Egyptian Cotton 6-piece towel set is very good for the price.
Body: The two bath towels, hand towels and wash cloths in this set are large enough for me at 5'4" and about 135 lbs. They are very absorbent and living on a fixed income, I think the price was right for this set. I would buy it as a gift  or for your own use. The only thing I noticed is fading of the color after washing them. Otherwise I like them very much.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2013
Author: Thea
Title: Towels are pretty
Body: The towels are true to color and soft! It took 4 washing to stop them from shedding. The first time the fabric came off all over me and the bathtub! Same thing happened 3 more times after washing! Now after 4 Washington it has stopped! They are soft and hold the color well, just wish it didn't take so many times. Other than that, great!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2018
Author: Marcia Shumaker
Title: I love these towels and have ordered several sets
Body: I love these towels and have ordered several sets. However on this order I only rec'd 1 washcloth instead of 2. This is the first time this has happened.

Title: I regret this purchase!
Body: I would give this towel set no stars if it was an option....it was used 3 times in a guest bathroom and it is falling apart!!!!!!!!!!!I asked Customer service to replace the set since it was clearly defective...but most they will do is send me a partial refund once they receive the set back...what a hassle to bother with return. :-(

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2015
Author: Jeremy B.
Title: Works perfectly in the capacity as a towel.
Body: I read some negative reviews before purchasing these towels that they fell apart or the colors bled easily, so I was a bit concerned at first but my fears were unfounded.  I am a lazy man and started using these towels right out of the Amazon box without pre-washing, treating, or any other preparation.  They did not bleed color at all, did not shed, and held together perfectly.  They are quite soft and do their primary function flawlessly, they dry me when I am wet.  If you need towels, these are the epitome of what a towel should be.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2018
Author: Cassie Moore
Title: One Star
Body: Unfortunately these towels became discolored with big yellow blotches after only one use. They are ruined now.

Author: Private
Title: Please read before ordering
Body: Lovely towels. Must wash these towels at least four times before use, to wash away excess color, which bleeds. Don't wash with anything white and, wash only with black clothing. After washing the towels do fade noticeably but, the quality is descent. The body towel is larger (wraps around mens waist 38 and under with no problem) the hand towels are large too as well as the wash clothes.

Author: JD in FL
Title: One Star
Body: Towels shrink after 1st wash and keep shrinking.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: These are very pretty
Body: I like the towels, but make sure you wash them at LEAST two times before you use them or you will be covered in fuzz. I washed mine twice and took a shower and I tried to dry off and ended up with red fuzzies all over. I had to rinse off again. After I washed them again they're fine now and work as a towel should. Just don't forget to wash them!!
