Author: Sandi
Title: Hems Unraveling
Body: The hems are starting to unravel after the first wash. Even before the first wash, the two washclothes in the exact same spot, were not sewn/hemmed well by the decorative area. I'm not going to return them only because I can't deal with the hassel. I'll get out my needle and thread and make it work. Just what I ordered- another project. (sarcasm)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2017
Author: Kellie Collins
Title: Great Quality, Thickness and Price
Body: I have had these towels for a year now and feel like they have held up better than some of my other towels through the years. I actually ordered a second set a couple of months ago. I love the colors and honestly you can't beat the price for two sets of towels. The towels are very thick which I love and the bath towel is larger than most bath towels. Will continue to buy this brand in the future.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2018
Author: Keith Larsen
Title: too large for occasion but very nice
Body: too large  for occasion but very nice towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2014
Author: DMCramerica
Title: Unraveled After First Wash
Body: I bought 5 sets of this 6-piece Towel Set after reading a lot of the reviews. I was hopeful that the negative reviews were wrong; however, the negative reviews were completely right. I washed them per the manufacturer's instructions. After one wash and one dry, EVERY SINGLE BATH TOWEL had frays or strings or this weird pill issue. I have never had towels do this before or have bought such terrible towels, not even from Walmart - and that's saying something. These towels are complete junk.PLEASE, do not buy these towels. And all the other reviewers who bought this Towel Set and wrote a review without having washed them first, should go back and change their reviews. I am confident they are all have had the same issue since they washed them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2017
Author: orlando
Title: Five Stars
Body: Really nice towels. Very absorbent The packaging they arrived in was immaculate. Great job.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2014
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great towels
Body: This are best buy towels but have one major flaw that is easily fixable!  You have to wash and dry the towels at least three times in a row to get the excess lint out of them. After this, they are wonderful. Everyone seems to complain about these particular towels!  To get this many towels for $20 anywhere else is almost impossible!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2013
Author: AngelCake
Title: Very poor quality towels
Body: Lured by the rockbottom prices, I bought these and they have ruined every load of laundry we have put in since. They shed like crazy and the lint sticks in the washer and dryer and to any other loads that go in right after. I threw in some colored cotton towels with these the first time I washed them and haven't been able to get the white flecks off them since. The toweling material sticks to skin and hair as well. The texture is not great either, not very soft or absorbent.  I buy Pinzon sheets and towels all the time and have had no problems with those - I would guess these are a defective batch that they are trying to get rid off by slashing their price so buyer beware!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2014
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Pinzon Egyptian Cotton Towel Set, Plum
Body: The towels are beautiful...the color is perfect...HOWEVER...after 3 washings the stitching has unraveled, ALL the towels have freyed on the sides...It is very disappointing, that the quality in workmanship is VERY POOR...I could not recommend these to anyone....they are an embarrassment to have in the bathroom....

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2013
Author: Saved Man
Title: Nice but sheds...
Body: Nice towel set, good price, drys well, but be prepared to wash and dry in a dryer 3 or 4 times.  These shed a lot until they are washed several times.  Keep an eye on your dryer filter, we needed to stop and clean ours a few times the first two washes.  After that they are fine.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2014
Author: Joe Gaines
Title: On first sight these towels seem to be great. But only after two washes the stitching along ...
Body: Okay let me explain why I gave this such a low rating. On first sight these towels seem to be great. But only after two washes the stitching along the sides are starting to fray. Also as mentioned by previous buyers these towels are ruining my washer and dryer. I am just very disappointed in the quality of this product. This will definitely affect my future purchases with Amason.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2013
Author: Happy Human
Title: Nice Towels
Body: I got these as part of a friend's wedding shower gift. Since they came in a resealable package without attached tags, I washed the towels before putting them with the rest of the gift. They washed very nicely without falling apart. I was impressed with these towels! They were very soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2014
Author: Tasha Spearman
Title: Towel sets
Body: I guess you get what you pay for. I would have thought out of 2 sets that 1 would have arrived with out rips. However that was not the case. I have fixed them easier than trying to get them back in a box and mail back. The color was exactly want I wanted.These really should be marked as seconds.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2017
Author: Eliyohu Kramer
Title: Good, but not incredibly absorbent
Body: The towels are not as thick and absorbent as I would've hoped.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2013
Author: Ian
Title: Hmmm
Body: Im wondering how I should write this review....I hate new towels.. They never seem to wick the water away.. They always kinda just move it around and sometimes pick it up.These towels are no exception. My wife hates them even after I explained they just need washed a few times to start working.Pros:Extremely softGreat color (if you like grey)Great qualityCons:Maybe just me but leaves fiber bunnys on you after you get out of the shower. Esp as a male my face scruff tends to collect a lotTakes a few washes to become a towelI would buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2017
Author: Peter R Zajichek
Title: hate them!
Body: threads popping out everywhere!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2015
Author: JL
Title: Great Balance of Affordability, Quality, and Ease of Maintenance
Body: I initially purchased a single pack of these towels for a guest bathroom, but I liked them so much that I eventually replaced all of my towels with them.They are nearly unbeatable for the price. I have been using them every day for three years, and they've held up extremely well to regular use. Also, I can confidently say that they don't require any special care. I'm not the type of person who follows tag instructions when laundering things, and that seems to have had very little impact on these towels over the last three years.They have a really well-balanced texture that you typically have to pay much more for in retail stores. It's strong enough to dry well, but soft enough that it doesn't feel abrasive. This is particularly important to me because I have very sensitive skin. Hotel towels feel like sandpaper to me. I've actually taken to packing these when I travel.There are softer, and more luxuriant towels out there. These are not perfect. The cost/benefit ratio is certainly in their favor, however. I really feel like they provide the best balance at an affordable price point.So, if you are looking to invest in a really good (yet affordable) towel set that will hold up well to regular use and careless laundry habits- I would really recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2017
Author: Michael Kim
Title: Pretty disappointed.
Body: I  was excited about these towels but after one a few uses the color of the towels started to turn. This was after using it a few times.Pretty disappointed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2014
Author: Kimberly R.
Title: Furball Alert!
Body: Great after about a million washes. They shed like crazy for a very long time and you get bits of red stuck all over your wet, nude body that you have to then spend 10 minutes picking out from between your toes, your hair and an assortment of different crevices if you don't want to look like Elmo. Not cool.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2013
Author: Suzi
Title: Plush towels
Body: These are very plush towels, although after the first wash they were still shedding really bad. Hopefully after a couple more washes the fuzz balls will disappear. I will definitely be purchasing more sets. This is a great set of towels at a great price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2014
Author: Deborah Lloyd
Title: Hoping for the best....
Body: The best qualities of these towels are the thickness and the color. However, we think there is some kind of coating on the fabric, as water is not absorbed well. With each laundering, the absorption is improving, little by little. We are hopeful these towels will work out for us....

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2018
Author: rachel cooper
Title: Large good for price absorbant
Body: Love the absobacy and colour very thick

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Some nice towels... Some with loose threads...
Body: I bought four of the 6-piece towel set and one of the 4-piece set all in gray.  I really like the towels.  I think they are a nice weight - heavy enough to be absorbent and soft, but light enough to dry throughly throughout the day.  I did experience an issue after washing all of them the first time:  I had 3 bath towels, 4 hand towels, and 1 wash cloth that all had loose threads.  I contacted amazon and I'm exchanging 2 of the 6-piece sets to see if I can get non-defective ones.  You can see the loose thread issue in the images below.  I hope that the exchange items don't have issues, as I don't want to waste my time repeatedly returning towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2017
Author: Karen Drasler
Title: but we purchased these based on the number of good reviews. From a cost over time standpoint
Body: If you're looking for a towel that will last more than 6 months, this set is not for you.  We have owned approx. 6 months, washed weekly in a high end washer / dryer and virtually all of the edges are frayed and falling apart.  Conversely, we replaced towels from the "Hotel Collection" at Macy's which lasted five years - the edges never frayed, they just got crunchy when they got old,  Of course, the hotel collection was significantly more expensive, but we purchased these based on the number of good reviews.  From a cost over time standpoint, these are completely not worth the money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2013
Author: Oshelle
Title: Great quality for the price
Body: I've purchased several sets of these towels in different colors, and they never disappoint.  When first removed from packaging, they are not very impressive at all.  However, after they are washed and dried, they easily stand up to most department store brands.  The sizes of the towels and cloths are quite generous as well.  As I said, I've purchased these many times and will probably buy again as long as they are available.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2017
Author: Satish Pennathur
Title: Two Stars
Body: Grey towels faded to a patchy pink within a week of use.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2014
Author: Chuen Li
Title: Dissappointed due to running threads and holes
Body: I received the towels within a week of my order but unfortunately I was looking at towels with running threads everywhere and holes in the towels itself.  This is very upsetting that Amazon did not at least make sure that certain quality of the product was met before these items are shipped out.Every piece of the towels received are having running threads from the sides or middle.  The bath towel have holes in them making it rather displeasing and not presentable.I hope something can be done about this

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2013
Author: Harper
Title: Great loft but poor seams
Body: As previously mentioned these towels did fray in the first wash on at least three pieces. However the towels themselves are great, even the binding material is better than normal, it is just that the seams that keep the binding on are very poor quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2013
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: very poor quality
Body: everytime I wash them you see fuzz on them and a lot of shedding.  the threads are coming off in long strands.  I bought 2 sets and the green one is even worse and needed to be wash by themselves so I do not have my entire laundry covered in greenish fuzz.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2015
Author: Granfallooner
Title: a great deal.
Body: Expect lots of fuzz in the lint trap first washing. Deal with it. Not that big of a problem. Some people are whiners. Minor fraying evident. Again, no big deal. Soft towels. Absorbent to a point. If you're in a hurry to dry off, might not absorb moisture quickly enough for your liking. But for the price, a great deal.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2014
Author: Buckeye Fan
Title: Color is lighter then it appears in photo. Received ...
Body: Color is lighter then it appears in photo. Received them today, and read about snags after one wash. Well I washed mine as soon as I got them, and I have snags! If this wasn't ordered for a spare bathroom that won't be used a lot, I would probably ask for a refund. They are  ok quality, and since I didn't pay a lot for them I'll keep them. I wanted deep cranberry & gray for an Ohio State Bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2016
Author: Christoper E.
Title: Great towels
Body: Very soft and absorb very well. It took many wash cycles to completely eliminate the lint from coming off when drying with these, but I think that's normal for new towels. I can't have any lint come off of towels because I wear contact lenses so any lint on my hands when I'm putting them in is problematic. But they're fine now and they're great!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2017
Author: Elizabeth L Roberts
Title: Love them
Body: I wasn't sure what to expect buying towels from amazon and not being able to touch them before purchasing. It turns out they are awesome! They are a great weight, no loose loops, pretty detail and very rich color. I have bought cheaper sets at Walmart for sure. I will be buying another set of these and definitely recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2017
Author: southernbfarms
Title: ... years of use with weekly laundering and still looking great
Body: Over 2 years of use with weekly laundering and still looking great

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2014
Author: Dee Grogan
Title: DO YOU LIKE STRINGS?
Body: These towels got washed before use.  We used them one time and washed again.  They kept their color but are already fraying at the edges, with lots of strings.  They seemed like a deal but -in this instance- we got what we paid for!  Very much a disappointment!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2014
Author: MD-11 Driver
Title: Not Worth it!
Body: These towels are garbage!  After 3 washings, just to get the loose cotton off of them, they still shed all over the place.  Had about 1/2 of lint on the screen on my dryer each time.  Junk.  I may keep them to wash my car but that's about it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2013
Author: Cindy
Title: This Terry Sheds A Lot
Body: The terry on this set continues to flake off in annoying pieces all over me when trying to dry off. I had to get back in the shower to get it off and out of my hair. I have washed them several times and the shedding is gradually lessening but I may end up donating them to the animal shelter if they don't stopp shedding.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2013
Author: Nipsey Russell
Title: fell apart
Body: these towels started to disintegrate upon first washing.  many threads are poking out of the body of the towels and the hems on some are falling apart.  Otherwise they might have been good for the price.  but that is kind of moot.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2016
Author: Carl A. Greco
Title: For a discount towel set the quality is very good. The color has not faded after a couple ...
Body: For a discount towel set the quality is very good. The color has not faded after a couple of washings. The towels are large, thick and absorbent. Only much more expensive towels are thicker and more absorbent. So far I would recommend these towels as a very good, low cost product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2014
Author: KP
Title: Good towels for the price
Body: The towels were good, when they first came out of the package they were a bit flat and I was originally a bit disappointed. After I washed them and had a turn in the dryer they were fluffy.  They are pretty soft standard towels; I wouldn't use the word luxurious. These are your daily towels, not too much fluff when washed, and the color (grey) was what was pictured. All in all, not bad.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2017
Author: Marcelino Mercado
Title: Sheds a lot and are fairly thin.
Body: Although they look nice in pictures and in person, they shed and are fairly thin. I washed them right after receiving them to make sure the shedding wouldn't be a problem, but it still did not stop after washing them twice.I would not buy this product again in the Driftwood color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2014
Author: Trish
Title: This Is Not Egyptian Cotton
Body: I have been using Egyptian cotton towels for a long time, these are not that...they are better than regular towels but the texture is nowhere near that if high quality Egyptian cotton towels...do not buy, they are a waste of money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2015
Author: Rs6096
Title: Worst towels ever
Body: These are some of the worst towels I have ever used.  The wash cloths are thin and rough.  The towels are also thin, what was left of them after the first wash and dry cycle.  Most of the towels went into the lint trap.  Waste of money, at any price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2013
Author: Mamadubbs
Title: Best towels I've ever purchased!!
Body: I bought 3 sets of these towels in different colors and just love them.  They are big and luxurious.  They washed well with no pilling.  Ultra absorbent and oh so soft!  I'll be buying more of these for sure.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2014
Author: Gmom56
Title: poor quality
Body: Received these for my guest bathroom for guest that were coming.  Threw them in the wash to freshen them. Pulled them out of the washer and the hem of the wash clothes has shredded.  Just a hint of advice, sometime Walmart can beat Amazon for product quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2013
Author: Pecat
Title: Really great towels!!!
Body: Great towels very lush and soft, the color grey is perfect. After washed very heavy, but dry well. Soak up water great after shower and soft to the touch. Really love these towels need to but more! Also would get theses for gifts.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2014
Author: K. Royal
Title: good towels
Body: Good, not great towels. Heavier than your run-of-the-mill towels but not spectacular. They shed bountiful lint in the dryer and continue to shed lint even after multiple washings. Will have to see how well they hold up.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2016
Author: Young
Title: returned immediately after receiving
Body: We returned these immediately after receiving them.  These towels are not 600 weight and are thin.  We have happily used the Wamsutta Duet bath towels from Bed Bath & Beyond for 3-years now - which are 600 weight and are much thicker.  We do not recommend this towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2014
Author: TerriL
Title: Dreadful!
Body: I washed these towels with vinegar before use & dried them with wool dryer balls (rather than dryer sheets).  They were VERY linty and not at all absorbent.  Four washings later, they had not improved one bit.  After wrapping my wet hair for ten minutes, it still dripped water freely when the towel was removed.  It was like trying to dry off with a plastic bag.  I ended up throwing them in the trash!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2014
Author: Sandra
Title: These towels are really soft and a great size! You just definitely have to wash them ...
Body: These towels are really soft and a great size! You just definitely have to wash them first or you get little fuzzy purple stuff on you after you get out of the shower from the towels which is a minor thing! But, That can be prevented we washed them all and it hasn't happened again and they are holding up great and wash nice!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2013
Author: Elaine
Title: Shed a lot even after 8 months!
Body: I like the size of the towel, and they are very soft and comfy. However, the only thing I don't like about them is they shed a lot. I bought two sets eight months ago, and I use them pretty frequently. They still shed even now- red fibers can be found on my comb when combing my hair, and of course on the counter and bathroom floor.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2014
Author: Kelsey
Title: Fluffy towels!
Body: I've had these towels since April (it is not July) and use them all the time. Some say they fall apart, but mine have not. They did shrink a little in the drier, but nothing too bad. They are soft and match my bronze/copper bathroom hardware.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2013
Author: Tara Blakely
Title: Very nice towels for the price
Body: I really like these towels especially for the price. You really can't beat it! No, they are not super high end towels but they are still very nice fluffy towels. I have paid more for much worse! So far they wash nice too!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2017
Author: TINMAN26
Title: One Star
Body: The color goes away so fast...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2016
Author: Marianne
Title: I love, love
Body: I love, love, love these towels!!!!! Bigger than your standard size, nicely plush but not too fluffy. Just perfect. They did not fall apart in the washer and did not leave that much lint in the trap after the first wash. Highly recommend these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2015
Author: ScoobyJules
Title: Best towels! Definitely a YES!
Body: Absolutely love them! Nice thick, absorbent, and soft. Will certainly buy more! Very durable stitching that holds up well. And the color stays true through washing. Very highly recommend! I bought the Platinum, might even buy some nice whites to alternate. 5 STARS!!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2013
Author: Ajaey
Title: just right
Body: perfect weight and size, absorbent , washes nicely, dryer dries nicely. A great value, for those looking for a towel that actually dries you off, not just smears the water around :)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2015
Author: V.P. Deaton
Title: Excellent quality.
Body: Excellent quality. I didn't really know what to expect on the "Egyptian" cotton material but I am very happy with the quality. The color is true to the photo (although it might vary from monitor to monitor) I was happy with the color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2016
Author: Drathys
Title: For the prices this towel set is awesome. Most people would think I treat my towels ...
Body: For the prices this towel set is awesome. Most people would think I treat my towels horribly, and after a year, still in great condition. Buying another set today to start filling my hallway closet ;)Also, I am a big/tall guy, the big towels work great after the shower, which was an initial concern when I first purchased.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2013
Author: patton1728
Title: Great price and great quality
Body: I love these towels.  They are nice and fluffy, and you really can't beat that price.  I do warn the buyer that the color of gray is a little lighter than how it appears on the screen, other than that, perfect.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2014
Author: Eric Dexter
Title: Great towels for the price
Body: Better than average quality towels. I've purchased several 'lots' of these over a long period of time and I've found the material somewhat inconsistent. Towels took many washings before they absorbed well. I believe the material is treated with softeners which prevent the cotton from being fully absorbant at first. Once they've been used for a while, they've become much better. Stitching is good, but I've found slight imperfections, preventing these from being considered as high quality towels. Overall, very good for the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2016
Author: Ken Eddie.
Title: they shed EVERYWHERE
Body: Beautiful rich color, was very excited at first. Unfortunately, They shed everywhere. They have been washed 8 times, and I am still covered in red fibers every time I use them. the fibers are also everywhere in my bathroom. in the grout, on the sink and counter, it is impossible to get it all up.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2014
Author: lady Puffkin
Title: Bath redo
Body: These went with the other changes in my middle bathroom. Everything I've bought from Amazon, matched perfectly.  It made a big difference. Thank you so much for being the first choice, whenever I'm looking for anything.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2013
Author: Customer1
Title: Sheds
Body: These towels are a good deal for the price, but they seem to shed for a couple of washes so there are brown particles all over the washer when I washed with other clothing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2015
Author: Just say no to trans fats
Title: These towels shed too much lint
Body: Two wash & dry cycles, and these towels are still shedding, sticking to my skin and going all over the floor. They are weighty but obviously something isn't a high enough quality. Will not purchase this brand again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2016
Author: Amanda C
Title: Fantastic deal for the price.
Body: I can't believe I got all of these towels for the price! Nice size bath towels and hand towels. Great washcloths too. No shedding like some other reviews mentioned. If I ever need bath towels again, I will get these, maybe in a new color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2016
Author: Paul
Title: Economical, works, but be prepared to 3x pre-wash
Body: They're towels, they do the job, but the set I received had a lot of broken loops and had to be washed several times before they stopped shedding (blue) fuzz. I bought other towels at the same time, so I had a direct compare on the shedding.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2014
Author: shelda foxx
Title: pinzon egyptian cotton 6-piece towel set, wedgewood
Body: The towel set was great.  The towels and the hand towels and wash clothes are real nice sizes.  I would recommend them to anyone needing new sets.  I received them quickly.  Thank you very much.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2013
Author: Dyson
Title: Still going strong
Body: Bought a set of these several months ago and they are still rocking and rolling! After several washes and such, it hasn't begun to shred or anything. Gotta love the weight of these!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2013
Author: Midnight Reader
Title: Super soft and good deal
Body: For the money, and even if they were more money, these towels are great. They are soft and thick and absorbent. I meant them for the guest room and ended up using them myself.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2013
Author: Michael G.
Title: Thready and falls apart
Body: The fabric is nice and soft and the towels themselves are beautiful, but wait until you run them through the washing machine and you will wish you had purchased another brand.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2013
Author: G. Burke
Title: Great "Wash and Dry"
Body: I bought these for my daughter for Christmas.  The color is a difficult one to locate and Amazon had them.  They turned out to be great - quality was fantastic.  She loves them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2015
Author: Photo Nut
Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
Body: LOVE LOVE LOVE these towels, thick BUT DO dry quickly. Plush true PLUM color! Soaked in vinegar & salt in pre-wash. No water fade and no towel streaks. For the price: good quality no pulls or strings. HAPPY and so much so bought another color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2014
Author: jjbbss
Title: Huge towels
Body: I like the size, and softness of these towel sets, can not beat the price.It is true, you should wash & dry several times to get the loose lint off, and bring out the softness.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2013
Author: Monte
Title: nice but not luxurious
Body: nice but not luxurious, not cheap but not thick either, decent quality and weight. nice burgundy color. I miss the pinzon cotton/bamboo towels. They were my fav.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2013
Author: Ashish Musale
Title: Disappointed
Body: I bought these towels in Navy blue and when i first used it, it left lints all over my body. I thought it was because I was using it for the first time. So I washed it couple of times and saw a think layer of lint in the dryer.Even after using it for a month now and washing it so many times, it still leaves lint on my body. Not what I expected from these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2016
Author: Christa Beebout
Title: Unraveling after two washes
Body: I was prepared to love this towels. I bought one set of the Pima cotton and one set of the Egyptian cotton. They were super soft and seemed great after the first wash. But sadly they are unraveling at the edge after just two washes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2013
Author: Joyce
Title: Quality was terrible..
Body: I had to send the towels back for a refund, since they fell apart on the first washing.I don't recommend that anyone else spend time and money on  this towel set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2014
Author: Becksdog
Title: WORST TOWELS EVER
Body: WORST TOWELS EVER. DO NOT ABSORB WATER, THEY FEEL AS IF THEY HAVE A COATING ON THEM (SIMILAR TO WHEN YOU USE A DRYER SHEET). I had hoped that once they had been washed a few times they would be OK. Awful !

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2014
Author: R. Nicholson
Title: Poor Quality!
Body: I have purchased Pinzon brand more than once.They all have poor thread work and lose fibers all over the place.The price may have been lower due to bad quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2014
Author: Leonard Simmons
Title: 0 (ZERO) stars - I wish I could give this product a ZERO!!!
Body: These are terrible.  They shed lint after 3 washes stillllll.  The majority of the smaller hand towels fell apart after one wash and I'm sure the rest of them will after a few more.  After several washes we still find lint on our body... folks were staring at my head at work until I looked in the mirror and noticed that there were a few specs of these towels still there after taking at least 5 minutes to specifically brush them off after the shower this morning.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2014
Author: Dolphingirl1970
Title: Awesome!
Body: OMG these are nice, I can't believe how thick they are and for such a great price!  I wish they came in more colors than what is currently offered, but I will definitely be buying more!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2014
Author: TiggerOC
Title: not super thick but I like that
Body: I have these for about two weeks and they have been washed twice.  They are soft, not super thick but I like that.  They doen't seem to "shed" and are high quality for the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2016
Author: wscherm1
Title: A great bargain. Admittedly Im a towel snob and frugal
Body: A great bargain. Admittedly Im a towel snob and frugal, but these passed all tests. Nice size, not small or too big, absorbent and the trim edges don't shrink up out of shape. So far with 2 washes, the color hasn't faded.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2013
Author: Cultech
Title: The gift recipent was happy with them.
Body: This was a gift set. It arrived quickly and is very soft and did not feel cheap. It was reasonably priced compared to others. The gift recipent was happy with them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2014
Author: Olivia F.
Title: Sheds!!
Body: Soft towels, but they shed like crazy, even after being washed multiple times. My shower and bathtub is full of little blue fuzzies and so is my body, feels gross when I put lotion on.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2017
Author: Dogman
Title: No quality control
Body: No quality control AT ALL. I ordered several sets of different colors and in this set one hand towel was already coming unraveled when it arrived. The edge of the other hand towel was completely shredded upon arrival.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2015
Author: TC
Title: But after washing them 5-6 times so far and using them we consider them a good buy, Nothing more
Body: Based on the price I didn't expect high end hotel towels. But after washing them 5-6 times so far and using them we consider them a good buy, Nothing more, nothing less.We will probably buy another set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2013
Author: JWC
Title: Xmas Gift
Body: These towel sets make great Christmas, wedding and housewarming gifts for my family and friends.Color selection, quality and sizes are good for the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2015
Author: Jack
Title: Colors have washed out and became noticably blotchy in just ...
Body: Colors have washed out and became  noticably blotchy in just over a month..  I wash in cold and never have bleach in my laundry room.  I have not changed detergents in that time.  Very unhappy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2017
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Soft but Poorly Constructed
Body: I bought these towels about a year ago. They're  soft and the color is great BUT they are constructed terribly. All the seams came out of the towels within a couple of months, I bought four sets in three different colors so it wasn't just a fluke set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2014
Author: Amafina
Title: Inconsistant quality
Body: I've purchased 2 sets of these towels, and the long edges on two of the large towels started to fray after about the 4th wash.  Unfortunately I just stuck them in the back of the linen closet and forgot about them until after the return/replacement date.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2016
Author: Heather Sears
Title: I absolutely LOVE these towels
Body: First of all, I absolutely LOVE these towels. The colors are as rich and beautiful as shown in the photo. I've had them for a while with no issues with wear or tearing. Towel itself is very soft and absorbant.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2016
Author: katsu_mmm
Title: Bought it because of its price & high rating (it's ...
Body: Bought it because of its price & high rating (it's Amazon's product, so IDK if it's manipulated or not). Anyway, the color came off when I wash it. SO be careful when you do laundry. Avoid washing it with white/light color clothes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2013
Author: Anna faye
Title: Best deal on GREAT towels around!
Body: We went with charcoal grey. Most towels leave cotton particles even after a few washes. These are well crafted.Perfect size, feel and quality...buying more now!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2017
Author: Peggy Milligan
Title: Highly recommend
Body: Very, very nice. No as thick and luxurious as some, but these were bought for the guest bathroom and actually color was the deciding factor. These are great and comfortable to use. I would buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2014
Author: Gary J. Conner
Title: Bath Towel set.
Body: A very nice set of reasonable quality bath towels. Certainly not "hotel" quality but perfectly fine for everyday use in a bathroom. for the price, I have no complaints.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2015
Author: KWACOLO
Title: Good value. Great Price
Body: Replacing old high end towels with these.  For the price, they can't be beat.  Yes, they have a TON of lint new.  Wash them first...maybe twice!  After that, they are just fine and soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2013
Author: Anthony
Title: Ok For Now...
Body: They looked worn out of the box and there were loose threads hanging off every towel. My instant reaction was: "return!"Then I figured since it was for a second bathroom that no one uses and it was only $20 for the set I'd keep it.Recommendation: do not buy unless you're expecting low quality towels but just need an inexpensive set. The description is highly misleading. It's a cheap, Walmart-quality set with an expensive sounding description.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2015
Author: Another Amazon Customer
Title: Don't make the same mistake I did - a little too cheap!
Body: I did the exact same thing you are doing right now. I read all the reviews and thought, how bad can they be. I brought them, washed them once and they shed so much that they're pretty un-usable (unless you want pieces of fabric all over you). I'm afraid they are a little too cheap - don't do it.If this is useful please click it so others can see this tooThanks!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2013
Author: Randall Thompson
Title: Toiliet paper would be a better purchase!!!!
Body: After using the towels for about a month, they are starting to fall apart! And the Lint... GOOD GOD IT IS EVERYWHERE! I can't get rid of it, The rim of the shower, all of my black pants, the floor... EVERYWHERE!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2017
Author: anitar
Title: ... in areas of every piece and it almost looks like bleach spots-very disappointed and threw these away due to ...
Body: After about 6 weeks and washing a few times the dye came off in areas of every piece and it almost looks like bleach spots-very disappointed and threw these away due to the unsightly discoloration.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2014
Author: Sonflower
Title: Great color tho
Body: Ok, but not the thick, quality towels I was shopping for. Great color tho; very true to the online depiction. If they were thicker I'd definitely be keeping them.....

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2014
Author: Dayversity
Title: Very satisfied
Body: These are very well suited for my use, which is light, and I love the color. I think they will last a long time for me. Definitely worth the price; just plum dandy!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2016

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2016
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: I'm happy with my purchase
Body: I'm happy with my purchase. These are a little on the thin side, but they are also inexpensive, so I wasn't expecting anything superb. But they do still have some nice thickness to them. They are better quality than you would expect at this price, let's put it that way. I mostly bought these as bathroom decor, I have my own separate bath/shower towels that I use, So I won't be using these regularly. I unfortunately can't comment on longevity. However I had no problems with snags or imperfections on the towels. I would recommend washing these in cold water before using them. My mother used one of the washcloths to clean something with, and when she ran it under the water, she could see some of the dye come off. Cold water will remove excess dye and seal in the color.

It's thick, it absorbs really well and I have wash them several times and I have not have any issues with them falling apart as per other reviews. There were some pictures of reviews that looks like the towel was snagged into something (jewelry, hanger, rings, etc...) you just have to be attentive on how you handle your towels but if you follow the directions mentioned on the towels you should not have any problem. I wish it would come in more colors so that i can get them for my boys (yellow, red, orange, etc...) definitely would recommend these towels for anyone who is tired of having their towels wet hours after you have finished taking a shower or drying your hands....

It's really disappointing when you have an awesome shower only to find that the towel leaves lint all over your body. Hope you can do better, Amazon!

This time I did a test and washed one set and used the other directly without washing. The one I used without washing changed color from blue to light pink in many places after my first shower. I do not bathe with any unusual products -- just body wash. This product is defective.

I think some people just do not know how to do laundry properly.

I can't believe that towels that have only been washed a couple times and used normally should be doing this.  Towels should hold their dye for a while you would think.  Not happy at all!

Title: Good Value
Body: These towels are good quality and nice & plush. I think they are a great value and the color is true to the picture!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2014
Author: Jacquelyn Cuellar
Title: Fluffy!!
Body: Soft. Comfy. Fluffy. Love it!! Great price!! So tired of paying $12-$15 a towel at the Dept. stores!! Won't need to replace these CHEAPER ones for a while!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2013
Author: King
Title: red everywhere!
Body: the towel runs end of story. nothing much to say. if you like your whites not to be white wash it with these towel. oh and the towel will leave little bits of fiber all over your body after a shower.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2014

Title: Three Stars
Body: These are a nice color but I would have preferred them to be thicker and slight larger.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2015

Title: Good Product
Body: Good product, fast shipping, like it considering the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2013

Title: Disappointing
Body: I received the towels this week and washed them before the first use. They already fall apart: The seam unravelled on most of them and I long threads hanging on the sides. Very disappointed quality and now I can't even return it, because they are already washed. Don't buy!

Title: One Star

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2017

Body: Very thick towel, all I use now is this set

Title: Not good
Body: These are crappy.. I was looking for nice towels with good absorbency.  These are not that.  They move the water around.  Waste of money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2014

Title: But not to bad for simple uses
Body: Yep. They are towels. A little thin. But not to bad for simple uses.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2015

Title: however the large towels shed fiber like crazy. I'm not sure if it is the ...
Body: After a month the large towels shed like crazy still. I'm incredibly disappointed and would not have purchased the towels had I known they would shed all over the place. They make a mess.

Title: Four Stars

Title: Two Stars

Title: ok
Body: Didnt care for the color, I ordered driftwood and the color doesnt look like the picture. They are like a puke yellowish.

Body: Faded and frayed after one washing. sorry.

Title: Great set of towels at an affordable price and still ...
Body: Great set of towels at an affordable price and still has great quality. I loved that I was able to get a complete set for my husband and I.

Body: Very cheap and good quality towels. Love them. Also there are lots of spare towels in the package so you will have extra.

Body: One of the washrags hems came out after the second wash and started unraveling. Don't know about the rest yet.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2015
Author: Elizabeth
Title: Three Stars
Body: the color is dull, not like the picture

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2014
Author: Jordon Ferguson
Title: Deteriorates after first wash.
Body: All towels started to deteriorate after the first wash. I thought the red lints were coming off because they were new but I was covered in more red towel residue after washing it. Thought it was a good deal for 6 towels but not worth it if I'm going to look like I have red skin after a shower.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2015
Author: edee bolognesi
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great towels love them would by again

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2016

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2016

Body: Soft, fast shipping, doesn't stain when washing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2014
