Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2014
Author: nini Wiseman
Title: I have washed those towels 6 times, but every ...
Body: I have washed those towels 6 times ,but every time has many fiber on the filter,and the color is awful fading. I put it into a trash bag and never want to use again. They totally destroy my clean bathroom floor every time I use it. i wouldn't order those towels again ,I want to return  it if still available?

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2016
Author: bookreader
Title: Five Stars
Body: love these big soft fluffy absorbent towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2017
Author: MoxiMinx
Title: So very soft and super thick
Body: I will definitely be purchasing more of these :)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2013
Author: Geoff Munroe
Title: Not what expected
Body: Whenever I use these towels they shed fuzz everywhere. After drying off in the shower I feel like I need to shower again to get all the fuzz off. Even after running them through the wash several times, the issue still remained. Completely unsatisfied.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2016
Author: Marvin
Title: Bath Towels
Body: Good price, good product and delivered promptly

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2015
Author: Paul L.
Title: Shed like crazy, even after repeated washes
Body: While the towels look nice, they shed like crazy. I ordered the navy set and washed them three times, hoping that the shedding would stop. It sadly did not. Any use of the towels leaves a coat of navy linen all over one's hands and body -- rendering the towels effectively useless.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2013
Author: rachel
Title: crap
Body: On the very first wash before I even used them, they completely fell apart. Will not buy this brand again

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2014
Author: Connie
Title: Shredded on 2nd washing
Body: One of the bath towels shredded on the 2nd washing. They are not as absorbent as I expected. You still feel damp after using them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2017
Author: X23
Title: One Star
Body: Sheds lint like crazy despite laundering.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2016
Author: Eileen d.
Title: I love these, but after several washings
Body: I love these, but after several washings, they are still giving off more lint than I'd like.  But they're beautiful and I'm glad I bought them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2015
Author: Roy M.
Title: Five Stars
Body: 2 years and still wash well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2015
Author: Gail
Title: These towels REPEL water
Body: These towels are awful.  They repel water instead of absorbing it.  I bought 2 sets in gray and 2 sets in wheat.  the gray are worse than the wheat, so there must be something in the dying process that affects absorbency.  Now I am stuck with towels that are useless.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2020
Author: Raven Rose
Title: Soft, thick towel But...
Body: This towels 'would be' a fantastic towel. It has nice thickness, soft to touch, even would be a luxary towel.  But after reading all the reviews of good and bad I expected things to happen and had to see for myself. After receiving the 4 pack of white towels, I place them into the wash and dried them to get the lint off. Yes there was a lot of lint as the reviews said, (expected).  But after the first wash and dry, it did come unraveled from the sides, which brought disappointment being I paid $10 a towel. I figured out why this is. They are not preshrunk, after you wash it, it shrinks but the thread they use does not shrink. Being that said, it loosens the thread around the sides, so I broke out my sewing machine and went around the edges really good. So now, I hope they will last longer.  Will I buy them again? No sorry.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2019
Author: Rick and Ashly
Title: Plush but these SNAG in washer!
Body: Pros:I love the green color of theseThickabsorbentsoft feelConsHad to return due to quality issue and it happened with the new ones tooEnd seams come undone in the wash (2 out of 6 towels within a month)The little terry cloth loops that make bath towels wonderful snag immediately within 3 washesExpensive for what you getVerdict:After the first wash and 3 towels with "hanging threads" from loops breaking I returned these and asked for replacements. These were recommended on a "best of" website so I wanted to keep trying. I received my replacements and within a month 2 more towels had ripped at the bottom end seam. We wash these with gentle clothing and no buttons or anything to snag on. I did not return a second time but am disappointed with the value for the money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2020
Author: Cara
Title: Have good points but value priced for a reason.!
Body: I bought my 1st set of these towels in December and liked them enough to get a 2nd in another color in February.  Unfortunately, I'm starting to have issues with the first set.  Let's start with the positives though...the size is nice, so is the thickness and the colors aren't bleeding or fading.  But now that I've been using them 3 months,  they are starting to unravel a little every time I wash them. I've already cut off 4 other long strings and found 2 more today.  Then, the towels absorb just fine but now seem to take a long time to dry so by the next day, may still be damp and I worry they may eventually smell moldy.  Of course, I got the whole set of 6 for $22 so my expectations were probably a little high due to the high reviews.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2019
Author: Alice Marsupi
Title: Hotel Quality and Then Some
Body: After I'd originally ordered another towel set that became unexpectedly unavailable for some reason, I found this set in the Amazon Warehouse.  I bought them, not expecting anything special, and what a pleasant surprise these have turned out to be.  These towels are plush, luxurious, and absorbent.  The deep purple color is gorgeous.  Absorbency is the main quality I look for in bath towels and these are perfect!  I strongly recommend Pinzon brand towels.  As for the "Blended Egyptian Cotton", well, I've never seen that kind of fiber content label before but apparently it simply means that 30%  of the cotton in these towels is NOT Egyptian, and that the remaining 70% of the cotton IS Egyptian.  Whatever...100% cotton is what I wanted and that's what these are.  BUY THESE TOWELS!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2019
Author: KV
Title: Great value! Great quality!
Body: I bought these towels for a spa and I couldn’t be happier with the purchase. These towels are larger than the standard size, very soft and absorbent. I don’t use fabric softener and  honestly, they don’t need it because they are soft without it.  I purchased the white ones. They washed beautifully the first time and no more lint than any other load of laundry. I can’t say  anything about longevity as I just purchased them and only washed one timeso far.  But by the quality and after having washed them once, I think they will be around for the long haul.  I don’t understand why anyone would rate them anything less than a 5 star.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2018
Author: Daisycat68
Title: Wonderful towels!
Body: Having seen there are mixed reviews, I took a chance and purchased only 1 set of 6. I thought, if they suck, I won't have a ton of them. I was shocked at how amazing they are.First, I got the MOSS. Maybe different colors have different quality? They towels are a rich, dark green and very soft, both before and after washing. They are thicker and heavier than any towel I have ever seen. They do take a while to dry, but only because they ate so dense.I did wash them once and have been using them. I can't speak to their longevity at this point, but other Pinzon products (like my comforters) have lasted forever. I hope the quality stays with these. I plan on ordering more sets over time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2020
Author: Katie Pelcic
Title: Decent but annoying
Body: Let’s cut to the chase. The towels are big, comfy, and absorbent BUT had to wash a few times before use due to the amount of dye coming off of these. Two first initial washes, the water was a deep navy blue. By the third wash, water was clearer. Great, time to test them! Nope. These things do not stop pilling. It gets all over the place and I’m still constantly finding more little fuzzies on my body throughout the day.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2019
Author: Dendal
Title: What Has Happened to Ordinary Sized Bath Towels?
Body: This is a very fine towel, however it is more suitable for the beach than for my bathroom towel rack. I didn't check on its dimensions closely before placing my order. Now I find that it hangs nearly to the floor on the bathroom towel rack! What's more, I couldn't find any suitable size towels in the color I want (other than white) on the website. Is everyone using beach towel sized towels in their bathrooms now? I'm keeping these - for use on the beach.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Don't Buy These Towels!
Body: I purchased this towel set a few months ago.  At first, I loved them so much especially for the large bath towels.  I was ready to buy another set in a different color (I bought brown) when I noticed that the border is torn away from the bath towel.  I never had this experience for towels before, even cheap towels.  It seems, each time  I wash them the border is tearing away even more.  I believe $24 is alot for towels which are junk!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2018
Author: Monet
Title: GREAT TOWELS!!!
Body: We all know that buying towels is a hit or miss mission. Most towels shed even after the 50th wash. Most towels fall all the way apart after the 3rd wash and most towels leave you needing a second rinse off just to get the residue of fur off. So I figure I'd give these towels a try. I purchased the purple set (my favorite color) and low and behold they are holding up pretty swell. The color is so pretty and has not faded and I'm not left with a fur coat of shedding right after a shower when drying off. Also, they are super soft. I really do love these and will buy these in EVERY single color soon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2020
Author: Douglas Pearson
Title: Great Value for Price
Body: I have been using these towels as my main set of towels for my bathroom. I notice they are significantly softer and more absorbent than my previous towels. Additionally, the towels don't retain as much sweat odor as the towels I was using before. The new towels come in a variety of monochromatic colors to choose from and feel great on the skin. The material they are made of will ensure durability over time and so far the wear has been reasonable when washing although I don't need to wash quite as frequently now that I have towels that don't retain as much odor. The price is reasonable for what you get. I definitely recommend these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2019
Author: VH in PA
Title: Unsure about dry time
Body: Second review: Next day after washing. Used at 5:30 am. Absorbs well. Hung unfolded on towel rack. At 5:00 pm towel was still mildly damp. By next morning it was almost completely dry and was ok to use. It has been very rainy and damp here in PA and my windows are open so that may have an effect.First review: Just received these yesterday. One set purple, one set green. Washed per instructions. This is resulting lint from first wash. Green was about the same. Will revise if my opinion changes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2020
Author: mike mazzeo
Title: BUYER BEWARE
Body: I was so excited when these towels first arrived! They were big, fluffy and very soft to the touch. However, within a month the seams started to come undone and those annoying strings started to show on the ends of these towels. A little disappointed considering the price paid for these. While the reviews were pretty good, the actual product does not live up tho the hype. Buyer beware, DO NOT BUY  these if you are looking for a long lasting towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2020
Author: Eileen
Title: Worth the Wait
Body: Had to wait several months for these towel sets, but it was well worth the wait, as the towels are just the right thickness and softness, plus absorbent enough to do the job.  Also found them to wash well, which is a plus!  The only drawback is that the towels are so thick, that they take a very long time to dry.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2020
Author: GTD
Title: Not smelly at all!
Body: I was buying cheap towels from target for my kids. But they would stink a few days later after washing causing the whole bathroom to smell moldy. These so far after a month, have not smelled at all. They are also a good thickness, better than the target ones. Also they are not linty and the color hasn't faded. Like these a lot.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2017
Author: M. White
Title: Issue with Wash Cloths, Towels Are Fine
Body: Towels are very large and soft, this is good.  They came with some small round stickers on them and when I pulled them off, they unraveled the underlying threads.  I've washed them once and so far they've done okay.What I don't like are the wash cloths.  They are so soft to the extent that they lack effectiveness when trying to clean underarms, for example, where you've got deodorant and sweat and want to be able to feel squeaky clean.  These wash cloths are so soft that they lack the needed texture.  Poor design.I'll keep these, will likely use the washcloths as dust cloths, but I won't be ordering another set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020
Author: Mel B
Title: These towels are fine
Body: I was very excited because some reviews say how crazy soft and amazing these towels are...theyre average. Average at best. Theyre not extremely soft, but not scratchy. Theyre a good size. Havent noticed shedding or color bleeding. I bought in navy and gray. They seem about what id expect from such a low price, but no one would mistake them for high end towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2019
Author: C. Patterson
Title: Very nice towels
Body: These towels are highly absorbent and soft, while not being mushy. It's the cotton. I've had Turkish towels with good absorbency but somewhat rough with no pile which were inexpensive, and I've had French towels which are super soft but not all that absorbent but were very expensive. These hit the sweet spot. I'm going to order another set! The neutral color also adds a relaxing, spalike feel to my bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2019
Author: tonybazz
Title: Fraying after six months!
Body: These are not the nicest towels in the house, but they work nicely for our two guest bedrooms.  I wanted a towel that was easy to launder and was good quality.  These towels are working nicely for our busy AIRBNB.UPDATE: After only six months one of the towels became frayed at an edge.  I have bought this brand several years ago and they have held up beautifully.  Not so this time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2020
Author: Jd321
Title: Out with the Old!
Body: I was long overdue for new towels.  My old towels were plush but not very absorbent. These towels do a thorough job with drying, they are extremely absorbent, and made of great quality material.  Cream color goes great with my bathroom decor.  The material is very soft, however I always use fabric softener with my towels so that could be why also.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2020
Author: MMS
Title: Badly made product
Body: These towels seemed very nice when I first purchased them but after about only two washings the Hem fell out of one washcloth  then after several more washings the Hem fell out of the other washcloth. I do not use these towels for everyday use, they simply hang in my bathroom. Very disappointed in this product and will not purchase again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2019
Author: T. Bedwell
Title: Soft, but non-stop shedding. Would not recommend.
Body: I have used these towels multiple times and have washed each at least half-a-dozen times and they are still shedding. They are soft, but I don't anticipate these will last long, at all. After I dry off, I have to spend another 20 minutes using my hand to go over my entire body - especially through the hair on my head and stubble on face - to remove the insane amount of shed lint. Would not buy again. Would not recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2020
Author: Kim
Title: Nice towels that lose color
Body: I wanted to love these towels. We got them as a wedding gift and then bought an additional set for our home. They look really nice but after a couple of washes they started losing their color from use and showed the orange base dye like they had been bleached. We don't bleach our clothes so we are very disappointed in these!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2014
Author: An Educated Consumer
Title: Could be five star if...still a good value for $ spent...extra half star!
Body: When these cream colored towels first arrived, I was thrilled with their weight, color and luster...despite the fact that threads were not trimmed almost every place the edges of the towels were sewn.After two washings, it was evident that the decorative band shrunk in...not attractive.After the third washing,i noticed that the face cloths were a lighter color.  This usually does not happen with towels so early in the game.These towels could be wonderful if...threads were trimmed, band did not shrink and color did not fade in facecloths. I am concerned that the towels themselves will lose their color in subsequent washings...so Pinzon might check the dying process.Still these towels are a good value for the money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2020
Author: Julie Macomb
Title: Nice towel
Body: Great bath towels! The olive green is holding its color well after several washings. No fraying this far and thickness is good. They feel like a mid-range bath towel, not scratchy, but also not plush soft. Durable and nice for every day use.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2020
Author: Tab
Title: so soft! so fluffy!
Body: these are great! soft and fluffy but still absorbent, plenty big enough and little shedding (though they do drop a lot of lint in the dryer). my spouse is 6'3" and complains that most towels are too small for him, but is impressed with these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2020
Author: Morgan G.
Title: Medium quality towels
Body: I have been using these towels for about six months. They are soft and absorbent, but are clearly not great quality. Some strings are hanging off of the towels and for some reason after we've used them and washed them they've gotten bleach stains (we don't use bleach!). They're fine, but you could probably find better.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2020
Author: Paula
Title: Not bleachable!
Body: I bought white towels so I can put them in my whites load with bleach. I assumed they were and to be bleached and the listing didn't say anything different. The care tag specifically stated no bleach. I sent the towels back prior to use.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2020
Author: Crissy
Title: Worth every penny!
Body: Bought these for our daughter and her husband. When she used them for the first time, she called to tell me that she'd already purchased a set of new towels and had not wanted to tell us but that after using these, she was so amazed at the difference in thickness and quality compared with the set she'd purchased herself that she just had to tell me thank you again, lol.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2018
Author: Tobias
Title: Average Towels, Good For the Price
Body: I bought the plum-colored set of these towels. They are relatively soft, though maybe not as thick as I'd normally prefer. The color is duller than the images for sure, and they are not bright at all. They do get the job done and are really great for the price. I washed them before use and found that I was getting covered in little purple fuzzies when using them. However, after a couple more washes, the fuzzies have stopped. These towels are a good option, especially if you're looking for good towels on a budget.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2020
Author: Paula Brown
Title: Well made, super soft & thick. Color is beautiful!
Body: I guess these towels were a return, although I don't know why?  Must have been the wrong shade of purple...?They are AMAZING!  Soft, thick and very high quality!  I'm highly pleased with this set, they're beautiful & well made!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2019
Author: Bry
Title: Very Nice Towels
Body: I bought these to go out of town. I prefer my own sheets. They didn't shed too much they did not leave lint all over your body after the shower and they were very soft sheets. Also I loved that the towel was a little larger than the average size towel. Now they were no where near the plum color that was displayed. However that did not bother me as any set of purple towels would have been fine.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2020
Author: Amazing Customer 000
Title: Good towels
Body: Got these for some guests that were visiting. My first set of guest towels! Finally! I was told they are very lucurious and the experience was hotel like (could be just very polite guests). They wash well, didn't she'd ALOT and there doesn't seem to be any piling or pulling after couple washes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020
Author: david
Title: do not buy these towels.
Body: these towels are trash. they are rough to the touch. they do not feel like egyptian cotton. they shed like crazy. i've washed mine 3 times and they are still leaving tons of lint everywhere when i try to dry off.i'm returning them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2014
Author: AmericanDreamer
Title: Pleased for years, five for the first set and a year for the second
Body: I've owned one set of these towels for five years (a papaya color that is no longer available) and a cranberry set for the past year. These towels are used daily and have held up nicely over time. Absorbent, great for drying off after a bath or shower, in the best thick way the highest-quality bath towels wrap around your body. When we moved last year, I replaced most everything old with something new, but the original set of five-year-old bath towels was the one exception. I bought the new set of towels but we continue to use both sets, and I have been extremely pleased with the quality of Pike Street, Amazon's original name for their "in-house brand" of home goods.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2020
Author: DeAnna
Title: Great buy!
Body: They wash up great and they are nice and thick, but the size is also fantastic! I hate small bath towels, but these are perfect. The absorbency is good, but I did wash them first before use. They look really nice as well. Also. My daughter accidentally used one of the hand towels to clean off her water color brushes... ugh... instead of a rag, and with a little stain treatment spray, it washed right out. I will be ordering more of these to replace our older towels in the house.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2018
Author: S. Young
Title: Soft and sturdy even after years of use!
Body: These towels are really great and very soft even after a few years worth of use. I purchased these towels 4 years ago and at first they left quite a bit of fuzz on your skin while drying even after the first dozen or so washes and tumble dry's. However, even after 4 years of continuous use and many, many washes, these towels continue to be some of my favorites as they have held their integrity and dry incredibly well while staying very soft and plush.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2019
Author: tawny martel
Title: JOB WELL DONE AMAZON
Body: Bought these as a test of the Amazon brand linens for use in my vacation rental.  We reload our vacation rental each year with fresh linens and have used Costco Luxury brand till now.  These are a near match for quality of Costco and with Prime they will be our choice this year.  Thank you Jeff & Co. once again, Job We’ll Done!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2020
Author: Vicky L
Title: Perfect
Body: Please tells are absolutely wonderful! I have already washed these and dried them with no frays or tears.  I love the length of them and size Comic they just completely wrap-around you I'll snug and cozy Thank you for reading my review and I hope this helps.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2019
Author: sher4gul
Title: Acts Just Like Egyptian Cotton!
Body: I purchased some Egyptian cotton towels several years ago.  Once I discovered this fabric is terrific for drying your skin without the towel getting soaked, there was no turning back.  These Egyptian cotton towels are very close to the ones I purchased originally.  They hold their moisture without getting you wet again.  What more can you ask for?

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great towels for the money
Body: These are wonderful towels, soft and absorbent.  Reviewers saying they shedded lint badly must have received bad batches, because these haven’t  shed any worse than any other towel I’ve had.  I also love that the band at the ends isn’t shrinking.  I bought blue and purple and both colors are gorgeous.  Would definitely buy more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2018
Author: Kay1928
Title: Not impressed, but not disappointed either
Body: The towels are fairly decent quality, but after only washing and drying the towels before even using them once according to the tag’s directions, there are already loose threads coming out of them. I also don’t find them overly soft, but they aren’t course, either. On the plus side, I have not had any issue with them shedding during use so far. There was a normal amount of lint in the dryer lint catcher after the first washing, as well, and the cranberry color is true to the picture. Lastly, I’ve found the towels to be very absorbent.Overall, I was hoping for a towel with a higher quality, but I also understand that you get what you pay for. For the price paid, I think it is a decent purchase and for someone looking for a nice towel on a budget, I would recommend this towel set. If you’re looking for something a little more high quality, I suggest investing more money into a nicer set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2019
Author: Taxi
Title: At this price, I was afraid they'd be scratchy but they aren't.
Body: Perfectly decent towels, needed a color change for different digs.  My other towels were Chortex & Ralph Lauren Home.  These are not as thick but certainly adequately absorbent (maybe not for very hirsute males) and for the price I do not care.  Another review indicated there might be differences according to color - I got purple.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2020
Author: lisalo
Title: Quality towels at a great price!
Body: This is my 2nd set of these towels. I use them in my "guest bathroom " so they don't get used daily (other than the hand towels). Nevertheless the 1st set has lasted for several years. The quality is better than you would expect for the price! Definitely a good value.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2020
Author: stellac
Title: Quality of towels very good for the price
Body: Best things about towel set:Color (ordered green) was true as shown in picture and this was important to me.Absorbency seems to be good..........after prewashing and using for one week...the normal amount of lint from any new towels.Would recommend this product -- great price for the quality!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2018
Author: stoney
Title: i have hesitated a long time to write this review ...
Body: i have hesitated a long time to write this review as you can see by the order date.  The first time i laundered these towels, one of them came out with a huge faded spot - i thought i must have spilled something on it to cause it - then a couple more showed up with faded spots.  by that time i felt i had waited too long to return them.  but now over two years later i am still getting additional spots,  has anyone else experienced this and i wonder if the seller can do anything at this point to compensate me - i can no longer use these when i have guests.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Poor Quality
Body: Upon receiving the towels, I washed them in cold water and dried. They immediately faded to a purple from the navy blue color. Never had a chance to use them to determine absorbency. They felt semi-soft, but definitely won't hold up with washing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2020
Author: Tevin
Title: Kind cheap
Body: The towels work as towels sure enough however. They had to be washed twice and dried and each time the dryer was FULL of lint after just washing the towels. Low quality but they are kinda cheap

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2020
Author: johnjhogan
Title: A solid gift idea
Body: We ordered this as a gift and it was well received.On inspection, the towels seemed absorbent, very soft to the touch and thick.They were competitively priced and certainly worth consideringJohn J Hogan

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2020
Author: Cierra
Title: Perfect
Body: Great color! I was scared what color these would be in person but it is a beautiful deep beige. They came nicely wrapped and folded together. They are soft and holding up well. Love how it came with a good amount of towels for the price. Would definitely order them again!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2020
Author: Yumii
Title: not worth it, can't get them wet??
Body: I've used some of the smaller towels in the set to realize the second you wash them or even run them under tap water all the color comes right out. They look bleached and went from she green to a brownish yellow color.  Two are ruined and the rest are only decorative for now.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2020
Author: JP
Title: Walmart Towels are Better
Body: A cheap set of towels.  I ordered two sets, one in blue and one in gray.  I thought they would be softer and more absorbent but… hey, they’re pretty cheap, I guess.  I probably won’t order this again.  For a little more money, you can get more than double the quality.  Do yourself a favor and check out Bed Bath and Beyond.  Even Walmart brand is probably a better value.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2020
Author: Taylor Inman
Title: Amazing quality for the price
Body: These towels are amazing for the price! I absolutely love them! They are soft but not so soft that the don’t dry you off. They are nice size. They feel way better quality than you would expect for the price. The hand towels are massive too!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2020
Author: no problem
Title: didnt like
Body: while usable, these sheets were not as soft or pleasing to the touch as i had expected them to be.also, they are supposed to be 100% egyptian cotton, and the picture of the label says different.anyway, disappointing. would not buy again..

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2020
Author: Lisa Kline
Title: Large and Luxurious!!
Body: Absolutely better than i expected!!! Beautiful, rich color and excellent loop size creating luxurious comfort against your body. Heavy, yet lightweight when being washed and dried. Large sized hand towels and wash cloths. You will not be displeased

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2018
Author: Maggie's Mom
Title: On The Fence
Body: Just received.  I'm on the fence about returning these towels.  Plush is not a word I would use.  Disappointed.  I was hesitant on ordering something like towels that really need you to feel their softness.  In a store, I would pass them by.  I give a 3 star only because I would have to use them, wash them to really know better.  3 star is generous.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Unraveling
Body: Is five months a long time? Because that’s how long we’ve had these towels before two of them started to unravel. Very disappointing! We thought they were nice towels before taking them out of the dryer and finding them tied to everything...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2020
Author: Katie
Title: Sandpaper softness
Body: I read A LOT of theses reviews and decided to give them a shot. Nope. I’m in the market for a super soft towel and these just are not them- scratchy and stiff (even after a couple washes). I guess you get what you pay for...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2020
Author: Frank
Title: Good price. Good towels.
Body: For the price these are some great towels. Yes, there was a lot of lint upon first wash, but that was expected. Over multiple washes, I have been getting less and less lint buildup. These towels are thick, soft, and absorbent. I will be purchasing more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2018
Author: tarheelgrad
Title: Decent quality, edges unravel after a few washes
Body: Towels feel great, initially liked them a lot (once you pre-wash them 3 or 4x in a row before using to keep so much fuzz from getting all over); however, after less than 10 washes, the towels started unraveling at the top and coming apart at the edges. Not holding up that well around the edges and have used them for less than 2 months. Keep having to cut threads off that shed off after each wash now (also using a brand new Maytag Bravos high efficiency washer/dryer). I have had lesser quality towels last for 15 yrs without unraveling.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2020
Author: Puremichigan
Title: Rough but thick
Body: Nice and thick, but rough in texture. I cleaned my face with one and my face was beat red after from roughness. Feels like they will last a long time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2019
Author: Magnus Knight
Title: Not very absorbent
Body: These towels are ok, but I can't recommend buying them.  They're somewhat soft and somewhat absorbent, but just not absorbent enough.  They pick up some of the moisture, but the rest get kind of gets pushed around your body, so you're still not dry.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2019
Author: andiflo
Title: Worth the money and then some!
Body: I was skeptical about these because the price seemed “too reasonable”.  And then today they arrived.  Much to my surprise they are thick, not too thick, very well made, plush.  Ended up ordering 2 sets of burgundy, and 2 sets of the gray.Very pleased!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2020
Author: Colin
Title: Everyday use towels
Body: Have bought these towels for multiple houses and for other people. Great value and actually work. Don't fall apart, leave material on you and are absorbent unlike some towels. I would recommend washing first though like any towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Pretty nice
Body: These towels are very soft and I didn't notice any excess of lint in the dryer after washing. However, they do leave lint on your skin after you shower. Also, some of the colors (I ordered 4 different colors) started to lose their color after just 1-2 washings (the gray turned orangey in spots and the green turned a minty green- no bleach was used).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2020
Author: Gretchen M Pearman
Title: Wonderful.
Body: I love these towels. A great price for a quality towel. This is the second time I have ordered them. I really love the Egyptian cotton. I have had plush towels and don't fine them absorbent. Actually am slowly replacing all my towels and washcloths with these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
Author: K. L. K.
Title: Worth the price.
Body: These towels are amazing.  I’ve had one set since Christmas and wash them once a week.  I recently bought another set and I noticed that once the newer ones were washed the colors were the same.  No fading.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2019
Author: Aurelia
Title: Really nice towels for a great price!
Body: We love these towels! They are soft and very effective, and they have kept that way for awhile now. They are still as great as when we got them! I can highly recommend these, they are a good price, so you do not overpay, and for a product that is reliable and nice.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2018
Author: Mark A. Lizyness
Title: Couldn't be happier!
Body: I ordered one set to test before buying more. I had them over a month and washed a handful of times. LOVE THEM. The color is a true plum (dark purple). Color is still rich. Soft and AMAMZING price. Just ordered more. Very Happy. - I was a little nervous because of other reviews. Wash them first - there will be lint - but nothing crazy. I spent hours trying to pick out towels. HAPPY!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2020
Author: electraflux
Title: It looked OK
Body: I ended up returning this item because it was a lighter and thinner than I expected.  The loops seemed really loose and easy to snag.  I returned it unwashed and new, so not sure if it gets better/fluffier after washing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2018
Author: CDB
Title: Great Towels
Body: Great towels that I bought for someone else and washed them do they could be used immediately.  They washed up well. Nice color, weight, appears to be absorbent and did not leave a lot of dryer fluff.  They were sent immediately and were packaged well.  Will buy some extra towels for me too! Nice selection of colors.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2019
Author: Sammy Slammer
Title: Lacking in Quality
Body: Before I even washed them for the first time, every piece in the set had threads hanging off of them,  hems not completely sewn on, and loops of material that didn't get sewn in place.  Mistake on My part for buying this stuff../Maybe it will be good enough for the dog and cat to use.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2018
Author: Gailkate
Title: Too soon to tell
Body: These towels washed well without an exorbitant amount of lint. Since I've only washed them once, I'm unsure about durability. They are midweight, good for bath or hair.The reason for 4 stars is that the color is not as rich as in the picture.  We like them and will keep them, but don't count on the exact color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2020
Author: Meghan
Title: great towel set
Body: i bought these and love them. i washed/dried these after opening them and they look/feel great.  i’m very happy with this product

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2019
Author: J. Blankenship
Title: Shedding Problems
Body: Had to stop using these towels because nothing I did would stop them from shedding fabric all over our bath rooms, laundry room, and clogging up our dryer vent.  Very poor quality.. Even washed them in vinegar to try to stop the problem, but didn't help.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Not what we're looking For in a towel
Body: These towels were  disappointing. We've been spoiled by the great quality and thickness of the Pinzon luxury towels. I hope they get the marine blue back in stock.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2019
Author: LLB
Title: Color has changed bot good towels
Body: I have purchased these towels 3-4 times so good towels.  Just ordered another set and the color is a totally different green.  Doesn't match the rugs or the other towels anymore so I was a bit bummed.  They are good towels though.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2020
Author: BestBuyer
Title: A good value
Body: Some say that these leave a lot of fuzz on you and in the dryer but we have not found that to be true. We were impressed by the quality of the towels. They are thick and soft even after washing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2020
Author: Matthew Martinez
Title: Ripped after only a few washes
Body: Opened up the box and thought these were going to be great for the price. Started to wear thin after only a few washes and then ripped. Now use them for dog towels. Won't buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2019
Author: Elegant Wind
Title: They last about 6 months each.
Body: These are nice the first few times but man do they shed. My whole bathroom has been covered in specks of red (the color i got them in) since i bought them. They start to smell after about 6 months (wash them weekly). Definitely would consider other towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2020
Author: KSums
Title: Looks nice!
Body: Nice towel set for the spare bathroom.No problems or issues. Sized well. I love the mossy green color we ordered.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2020
Author: Peggy N.
Title: Sometimes you need to find out for yourself
Body: I was hesitant to purchase these after reading the reviews,  but I took a chance and I love them so far. I washed them and there wasn't a lot of fuzz and the color is great so far so good.  They are a good size and I would buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2018
Author: P
Title: Average quality
Body: I purchased this a month ago and started using it as soon as I received the package. When I first used the washcloth, the fabric started falling apart and leaving small bits of it on my face and hand. The quality is not as great as it seems. Other cloths that I purchased before this were of the same price but better quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2019
Author: Leanne and Kimberly  Hitchens
Title: DO NOT waste your hard earned money here
Body: I guess since zero stars are available I have to give it one. These towels are still leaving lint on skin a year later and they are all unraveling. Awful. Not sure how the other reviews are even good. Save your money and buy something else. Literally anything else

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2020
Author: Janet C. Aubry
Title: Refresh A Guest Bathroom
Body: Nothing like a good scrubbing, new soap, a candle, a piece of art and a fresh set of towels to make an old room new!These fit the bill perfectly. Thick, soft, absorbent, color as shown!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2019
Author: brd01
Title: Nice for tall people
Body: I purchased the original gray cotton bath towels about 2 years ago and loved them.  The size was exactly what my tall husband needed.  These were nice and big but just not as good as the original.  But its a good buy nontheless.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2018
Author: Teresa Hawkins
Title: Awesome Towels
Body: These towels are just as described and the color is just as shown.  I was very impressed with how thick these towels were when I received them, so I figured for the price I paid they would fall apart in a short period of time...I was wrong, they are still thick and they haven't faded either.  I would highly recommend this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2019
Author: Thanatos
Title: Nice
Body: So far so good. My wife said we needed new towels so I ordered five sets of these. I washed them with 1 cup of vinegar and dried them on low with tennis balls before use. All I can say is they are soft and absorbent plus the wife likes them . They are better than the last ones we got at a linen store.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2020
Author: Dan
Title: Great towels
Body: I bought these as a gift and was skeptical about the quality; however, they were well received and have gotten a shining review from the recipient who is planning on ordering more of the same.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2018
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Poorly made
Body: This is very much a get what you pay for product. I didn't even have to open the bag all the way to know that these were the cheapest crappiest towels. The $2.99 ones from Target are better quality and I will be sending these back. It is easy to see if I throw these in the washer they would likely Fall apart.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2017
Author: Renny
Title: Good for the price
Body: These are some amazing towels. Very thick and they keep their color after a few washes. They kind of glide on your body, not SUPER absorbent, but they do work. They won't leave you soaked, put it that way. If I could change one thing, I would make them a little more absorbent. Other than that, I love the towels and they are gorgeous. I would honestly buy more when needed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2018
Author: albert pozar
Title: Low quality and shed lint on your body
Body: These are low quality and shed lint on your body. I have bought these in grey 2 years ago and was happy. These white ones are awful and shed lint on you after 8 washings. I'm very disappointed and these continue to shed a crazy amount and will I fear become thread bare in time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2020
Author: Brooke M
Title: Great purchase!
Body: We needed to replace our towels for years and finally decided to try these.  I'm so glad we did!  They are very nice, plush, soft, quality material.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2019
Author: dianejmac
Title: Great towels for the price
Body: I was surprised at the quality of these towels when they got here for the price.  got the dark green or sagebrush whatever color they call it and their wonderful.  Wanted them for the guest bath and they are perfect.  NOw if I could just get throw rug to match.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2017
Author: Julianna J.
Title: They'll grow on ya
Body: Not thick and luxurious like I was expecting. Not a bad looking towel for the price. We'll see how they survive the wash.Update: They have done great through multiple washes and held up well to 3 kids. They haven't faded much. The longer I have them the more I love them. They were a great choice for towels for the kids. I may even get some for myself.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2019
Author: Mac's Books
Title: Exactly what I needed!
Body: I have been using these towels in my Air BNB for three years and I will not ever use any other. This particular brand and weight are perfect. They absorb well, launder well and never lose their color. I recommend them fully!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2020
Author: Dave
Title: They work but....
Body: They work and are nice but there is constantly lint falling off them and it is covering the floor and shower with it. Even after washing several times it keeps shedding like a dog!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2020
Author: Whitney
Title: You need these!
Body: Do yourself a favor and order these towels! They’re amazing. Really nice quality not so thick that they’re too heavy when you wrap your hair up in it, but also not too thin. I will be ordering more!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2020
Author: Paul M
Title: I love these
Body: I liked these so much I bought another set and had a few friends buy them too.  They are a great bargain for this quality of a towel set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2018
Author: Wil Talbert
Title: Great Towels Hate the Tags
Body: Great towels and good price for the quality, but I hate the large tags on all the towels.  Can you just put a sticker on the towel with the washing instructions, etc. that we can remove?  The towels look great, but the large tag on all of them gets in the way and makes them look less quality.  Please make them easily removable or just leave them off.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2018
Author: Pandora Gem
Title: Love these towels
Body: I love these towels - I have them in lots of colors. Few problems: 1) the towels are made of tiny hoops, so if you have a loose piercing/shirt earrings, it will get caught and snag the hoop stretching it out! 2) the beige is more of a yellow beige and not a brown beige so it doesn’t match as well

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2020
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Skip these towels
Body: Size is good; absorbency good. These towels needed washed 3x before they stopped turning our skin red and green, respectively.  They also have been quick to pile. They look pretty; but, for actual use, skip these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2019
Author: Amy Lynn Lee
Title: I really like these towels
Body: The towels I bought were moss green. The striped towel you see there are merely for contrast ~ they aren't for sale. These are really nice ! They washed nicely too ~ not a lot of fuzz came off them. Plus! they matched super good!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2019
Author: Budd Cardone
Title: Dissapointed
Body: The towels are actually smaller and of no greater thickness than what you can find at Target or Walmart. More significantly, their "navy blue" is purple and does not match with navy blue rugs. Not worth the money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2020
Author: RJK
Title: Deforms and changes color when washed
Body: After these were washed for first time the shade of green changed and where the band is shrunk so towels do not lay flat

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2019
Author: Jane Austin
Title: Great buy!
Body: Not sure why all the drama about lint? New towels = lots of lint. I've bought expensive towels and cheap towels - they all have loads of lint initially.Very soft and absorbent, easy to care for. I would buy these towels again. They're towels, don't over think it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2020
Title: Nice
Body: This economical towel set get the job done.  There is a little piping that addsxa touch of class.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2018
Author: HipJesse
Title: Towels that dry
Body: I bought one set as a test and liked them so much I bought a second set. Good size, thick, not the kind that seem nice until you take a shower only to find out that they don't really dry you off and just push the water around. Yes, I've been burned before... it was horrible. My therapist says I will recover in time, but the flashbacks get to me sometimes... FWP.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2019
Author: Smokeymike
Title: Lotta lint!
Body: Received these this week.  Before using, washed them.  My dryer lint trip had more lint than I have ever seen!  Towels seem thin and scratchy.  Not sure they are very absorbent.  Would not buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2020
Author: N. Cox
Title: So soft and great quality.
Body: Excellent quality for the price I paid.  Super soft and absorbent, after just one wash.  Lots of lint sticks to you for the first couple washes, but then it's gone.  Beautiful olive green.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2020
Author: Angela C
Title: Softness not so much
Body: This was my 1st time purchasing towels over the internet and it will probably be my last time. Overall good quality but not as soft as I prefer.  I'll have to use these as guest towels for now.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2020
Author: Elizabeth Sara Robles
Title: Perfect towels!!!
Body: I had purchased these towels for my sister last year and then decided to redecorate my bathroom and purchase the same towels since she was so pleased with them. Well, I must say I am greatly pleased as well! There are exactly what I was looking for. The color matched perfectly. They are not too thick or too thin. The absorbency is amazing and soft to the touch. If needed, I will be purchasing more!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2019
Author: B. Wright
Title: Excellent bath towel
Body: I purchased these bath towels a year and 3  months ago and have used them constantly since. They are very large, thick, plush and soft. You can't beat their quality for the price.  I highly recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2020
Author: CathyP
Title: The Pinzon 6pc Blended Towel Set in Wedgewood is Amazing for the price!
Body: Bought for my sons in College and they love them.  The quality seems to be very good and they seem to absorb better than some of our other more expensive brand towels.  Thanks.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2018
Author: chrissy
Title: Great towels!!
Body: I love these towels!! I just bought a couple to start with to see how I liked them because there were a few bad reviews about them unraveling, etc. I have had no issues whatsoever and I recently bought more and they are the only towels I want to use now. They are thick, soft & larger than normal towels, they are just great!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2020
Author: Nicole Busto
Title: Nice towels but they are falling apart after four washings
Body: Initially I was very pleased with these towels. Unfortunately after only 4 washings they are shredding at the ends. The stitching is completely coming apart.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2019
Author: chocolatemoose
Title: SECOND PURCHASE - STILL GREAT!
Body: This is our second purchase of these towels.  The first (in purple) are still holding up well, despite a couple years of solid use.  This second set did not disappoint--fluffy and well made, and the moss green color looks great.  Excellent value.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2020
Author: Ryan
Title: Unraveled in the wash
Body: I’ve had these towels for about 3 months and they have been great until one recent wash where the stitching came loose and the end started to unravel. Otherwise I really enjoyed them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2019
Author: Katree E.
Title: Highly absorbent
Body: I love these towels, because they are highly absorbent, have my preferred range of colors and are reasonably priced. Before use, wash them alone to get rid of lint. You may want to wash them by themselves a few times to avoid lint getting on the rest of your laundry, but after that they're fine. I've only had them for a short time, so I can't give an accurate assessment for durability, but I think they'll be fine.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2020
Author: Nichole
Title: BEST TOWELS EVER
Body: These are so great and I would of expected a higher price! This is a steal for 24.99!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2019
Author: Nathanial
Title: Great Value for Money
Body: These towels are really quite nice for the price, I used to have Sheridan towels and I feel like these are very similar. Nice large size, absorbency is good but they take a while to dry being so large. They aren't overly soft like a luxury towel but they are a great in-between, would definitely order again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2019
Author: C. Byrum
Title: 1/3 of shipment missing
Body: Received two body towels and two hand towels but no wash cloths. The softness I expected from a new set was not there, but they will play the part until I make it to a store and by a better set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2019
Author: Maegan McCrea
Title: Great towel set
Body: Great towel set. They do leave a lot of fuzz in my dryer vent, but they don't fuzz when being used and haven't faded like other reviews mentioned. Very happy with this set and will purchase another set for the guest bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2020
Author: Deborah
Title: Great Towels
Body: Great towels, true to the color you see. I plan to buy more colors. I just like to wash them a few times to get the new fuzziness out that can stick to your body.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2020
Author: Persicus
Title: Poorly absorbent
Body: These towels perform poorly at absorbing water. They are more similar to a simple cotton sheet than a decent quality towel for drying purposes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2019
Author: Steven Richardson
Title: Great quality and durability
Body: These towels are great quality! Very absorbent and the bath towels are a great length. Then nearly come to my top of feet from neck down( I'm 5'10")They do not feel short. Wash very well, loose no more linting than other thick towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2019
Author: ADK
Title: Great value
Body: I just received these and washed them to be ready for use.  I can't critique on absorbency or if they pill yet.  The color is perfect for our home (moss green).  It's much nicer than show on the site.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2020
Author: Grandma Kay
Title: Good quality, nice color.
Body: I bought these to brighten up the bathroom for the holidays. The Cranberry color is exactly what I wanted. I washed them before using. They retained their color and did not fade on other clothes. Good quality, plenty absorbent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2019
Author: MNich
Title: Great for the price
Body: Bought this as a housewarming gift for friends. They said the material is durable and soft. Easy to wash and does not transfer color or lint to other clothes/laundry. Great for the price. Wish it also came with the bath sheet size.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2019
Author: TM
Title: Good quality
Body: I first discovered these towels when I visited my mom. They were soft and seemed to be a more durable towel. My husband even noticed the quality without me saying anything. At his request I purchased 2 sets in different colors and we love them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2019
Author: Bobbi K
Title: Great guest towels
Body: Bought as guest towels for our guest bathroom and my roommate loves them too much to not use haha He said they’re very comfortable and absorbent. They look great too. I plan to buy more colors

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2019
Author: Anonymous.
Title: 4th round of Pinzon Towels
Body: They keep getting better with each purchase. We like the bath sheets over the towels but you can’t go wrong with either. If you like white, thirsty, all-cotton, nice hotel-like towels. These are the ones. Will buy more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2020
Author: Stephanie
Title: Perfect towel!!
Body: These are a little on the expensive side but very much worth it. They are nice and thick and soft but still absorbent. Bigger than a standard towel without being a beach towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2019
Author: Ed
Title: Excellent items, a definite quality purchase.
Body: Very pleased with this purchase, these items are of actual value. Good quality, construction, craftsmanship, they washed in cold water beautifully, and they dried with no issues. So unlike many other items\brands in this category.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2020
Author: Kat Brandau
Title: Good set of towels
Body: The towels are big enough to wrap around comfortably. Good price for towels, hand towels, and washcloths.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2019
Author: Donald A. Lambert
Title: Towels with "dandruff"?
Body: Received towels. Washed same according to tag directions. During the use of the towel following a shower, I noticed a significant amount of small particle fall out. Hopefully, after another washing this issue will be resolved. So far, not happy with the product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2019
Author: Balengblanco
Title: Great quality, thick, soft, beautiful color!
Body: I love these towels. Yes, there’s a lot of lint but they just recruited a few washes and pay attention to the label! The color is perfect, as expected and the softness and quality is amazing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2020
Author: Webvira
Title: bad grey dye!
Body: the grey towels do indeed turn orange where the dye comes out. it happens after the first couple washings. run away!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2020
Author: Paul Iseminger
Title: Great towels
Body: Great towels.  I am getting ready to buy another set. Great size, really absorbent, and soft. We didn’t get the amount of lint we were expecting from the first few washings, but there was some as expected. Overall we feel these were a great value.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2018
Author: Jonathon  Estrada
Title: They are great for the price
Body: They seemed a bit rough at first glance. After unpacking them and washing them i packed em up went camping to my surprise they are very soft. I have 2 more colors on order. They are great for the price. I know these are my everyday and travel towels now. Ill be buying at least 4 other sets ( i have 7 people in my house.) I took a chance on these and found something i liked!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2019
Author: Jr.
Title: Soft and very absorbent
Body: These are very good towels. Large and thick. Yes they loose a lot of loose fibers the first couple of washings. But that stops. And their is more than pleanty left to keep the towels looking and working and feeling great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2020
Author: Rena R Trent
Title: Be sure to read the tags on these before using.
Body: Nothing to dislike at all! Got my bathroom redone and had purchased a new shower curtain; a woman needs everything to match. Thse are wonderful!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2019
Author: Felicia Lattimore
Title: Good deal
Body: Acceptable quality for the cost. You get lots of towels and they're a pretty color (especially the purple ones). Not the softest texture ever, but that is to be expected for the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Seems pretty good for the price point
Body: Seems pretty good for the price point. Pinzon is also an Amazon brand, a step up from the Amazon Basics line. Serves the purpose for light use in a guest bathroom, probably wouldn’t be great for everyday use. I feel like after multiple washes these might start to get torn up. Not bad for the price, though.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2018
Author: Janine
Title: Just ok
Body: I purchased the towels for decoration in my downstairs bathroom and they aren’t a true Navy. The color is more of a blueish purple color. If you are buying the towels strictly for its color I would not recommend the purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2018
Author: Brian
Title: Fall Apart
Body: Have had these for about three months.  Strings galore on every towel.  Stitching on one hand towel unraveled.  Purchased white set which is now turning grey (towels were only washed with other whites).  I have cheap Walmart towels I bought in college that are still going strong while these things are falling apart.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2018
Author: furg
Title: Makes me feel so very clean.
Body: These towels are truly 100% cotton I love them I do not know how I ever filled clean before using these towels are truly one hundred percent cotton I love them I do not know how I ever felt clean before using the washcloth in the bath towel it

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
Author: Wesley Steven Stone
Title: Thank You AND God Bless!
Body: Simply, The Best Quality,  I have ever seen a towel have!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2020
Author: Linda Riley Kruppa
Title: Great Towels
Body: I have been looking for good quality towels that won't easily snag. I love these! Bigger than average bath towel, but not a bath sheet. It covers well, even a pretty big guy. Very nice colors, soft and thickness is great.  washed them once. Not too much pilling or fuzz.  Colors shown on Amazon are pretty accurate. I ended up getting 2 sets of the moss and 2 sets of the cranberry for the new house.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2020
Author: ap9125
Title: Plush towels Great value
Body: These are the best towels!  Plush and soft at a great price.  Buying more expensive brands are a waste of money. I have purchased multiple sets.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2020
