Title: Great
Body: Best towels. Not too thick, not thin, really absorbant.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2019
Author: Nicole Rubio
Title: Good quality for the price.
Body: These are in my store room for travel trailer business. They haven’t gone into rotation yet but appear to be good quality, as I expected. Not too if the line expensive towel set but I didn’t pay those prices. They are great for our travel trailer business.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2019
Author: Kraftylady
Title: Nice towels
Body: I bought these for my new bathroom and they are perfect.  I washed them before using and dried them with the wool dryer balls in the dryer.  They are soft and fluffy and the color looks great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2019
Author: Sparky
Title: Love these towels.
Body: Love the color and the absorbency. They wash nice and not matting. The color has not faded at all. Would definitely purchase this set again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2020
Author: MississippiR
Title: Love these towels
Body: This is one of my best Amazon purchases. We love the thickness and softness of these towels. Will be order additional set soon. :-)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2020
Author: Terry
Title: Not too soft and not too thick.
Body: I like these towels a lot!  They absorb well, are a nice size, and do the job I got them for - drying my body and wrapping up my hair after a bath or shower!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2020
Author: BargainHunter
Title: Cranberry-colored towels
Body: Bath towel, hand towel, and washcloth are plush and the size I expected. So far no snags but still quite a bit of lint.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2020
Author: 2Tremains
Title: Ok
Body: Great! But After about 12 months I ordered more and that is when I realized how faded the first ordered towels are already!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2019
Author: LeAnn Austin
Title: 3 stars
Body: While the towels are nice, I experienced not one, but two shipping delays only to then receive the wrong color towel set. Still going to keep after all the trouble.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2018
Author: Rae Stabosz
Title: You want these Egyptian cotton towel sets!
Body: I love, love, love these towels. I've been buying them for a few years. They are soft and fluffy, thick and capable of drying one thoroughly after a shower. The washcloths put other thinner washcloths to shame. I've bought these for myself and given them as gifts. Excellent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2018
Author: Frequent Shopper 236
Title: Quality towels
Body: Very thick and absorbant towels, true color (dark blue). Haven't washed them yet, and I won't be surprised if they bleed color, but the quality feel of these towels suggests the color will hold up well. All pieces in this set are a generous size, and a great value for the money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Wonderful towels for price
Body: Just as pictured. They are a light purple, but the color is beautiful. The towels so far have been great, no issues so far in the few months I’ve had them. I like the size of them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2020
Author: Upton Nancy
Title: Good!
Body: Cuando leí las características del producto, me convenció la garantía de durabilidad y que no se decoloraran; sin embargo, cuando recibí el producto, esperaba un tejido muy terso e, incluso, acolchado, el cual no fue así. A pesar de que la tesura y la suavidad no eran lo que esperaba, las toallas han cumplido muy bien su función, son de batalla y, efectivamente, han aguantado muy bien las lavadas.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2018
Author: Rylea
Title: No regrets!
Body: Fantastic for the price. The color is great and didn't bleed after two washes. Held up well. I was surprised that lint didn't even come off of the towels onto my skin after showering since they're so new. I plan to buy again. Also, bonus: matches my shower curtain perfectly!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2019
Author: Lucy peguero
Title: Too much lint
Body: These towels feel great however I've washed them five times already and they are still getting a huge amount of lint all over everything else... I'm worried I may have nothing left after a year of washing!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2020
Author: BrooklynReader
Title: Poorly made and thin
Body: Despite the high rating, these towels are thin, not absorbent, and scratchy.  The washcloths develop a moldy odor when damp, which I’ve never experienced with any other washcloth.  Do not buy these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2019
Author: Beth
Title: I was surprised how thick & soft these turned out to be!
Body: We love these! I really like that they aren't so thick that they take forever to dry in the dryer but are thick enough to feel soft & plush! I would buy this brand again! I was really pleased! They wash great!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2018
Author: J. Book
Title: Good balance of luxury and value
Body: This towel set is a great deal for the price.  We bought this to replace a set we had for a long time, and we were not disappointed.  They are thick enough to feel somewhat luxurious, but thin enough that they don't take forever to dry (which is important here in humid Florida).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2019
Author: Robert Jacoby
Title: Great quality, excellent value!
Body: So far very happy with the quality of these towels. They are thick and large and the color was perfect for what I was looking for. After seeing some other reviews, I’m going to wash on cold and gentle and hope to avoid fraying, but that comes with most towels eventually.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2019
Author: Kate
Title: Nice for the price
Body: These are nicer and thicker than I expected. I really like them. The only small complaint is that the color faded a bit on the first wash.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2018
Author: Robert Folen
Title: Good quality towels. Absorbent. Not like the ones at cheap motels. Those do not absorbe water. These Do
Body: These are good quality towels. I ordered them again. These towels are cotton and absorbent.Do not have to use 3 of them to dry off. I will buy more.Hope you do not have to use more than one to dry off from a shower because you only need one of these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2018
Author: michele russo
Title: Not bad
Body: These towels were gorgeous, the only issues I had was the the larger towels were still not as large as I had hoped and they faded a great deal after the first wash.  When I first got them, the purple was so vibrant and pretty, one wash and they were faded and no longer vibrant.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2020
Author: Google shopper
Title: Soft and pleasant
Body: This towel set is thick enough (not too thick or heavy). It absorbs well and it is soft to the touch even after several washes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2019
Author: Paul Keney
Title: low quality
Body: I purchased these towels last year and a few months later I noticed the towels started to shred. needless to say they did not last long. the cheap towels that I has purchased at wal mart have outlasted longer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2020
Author: Daniela
Title: Super absorbing!!
Body: Very good absorption!! I tried many brands before. This is like hotel towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
Author: Matt Hornbeck
Title: Great towels
Body: Super soft, great towels, bright color. Well worth the price

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2020
Author: Laroyaltieproduction
Title: Lovely
Body: Thick, strong, big enough to wrap about and adult wasit. U cant go wrong with this will have to buy more

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2019
Author: R. Mallette
Title: Excellent product
Body: They have to be washed and dried several times to get the lint off but they are excellent towels after that. I have some very expensive Egyptian Cotton towels that I don't like as much as these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2019
Author: Stephanie
Title: Beautiful, Soft Towels
Body: Super soft, they don’t seem to bleed out the red dye that some new towels do. Beautiful, quality towels, I would definitely buy them again!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2013
Author: Rick Longstreth
Title: Disappointed In Tennessee...
Body: These towel sets are marginally acceptable. I ordered mine a couple of weeks ago and this is my opinion of them:1) Bath towels were not oversized by my standards. I've had "oversized" bath towels and these are simply standard size. The washcloths and hand towels are both larger than standard towels but the bath towels are not.2) The absorbency of the towels is no better or worse than any other towels that I have owned. Actually, several years ago I purchased a different set of Egyptian cotton towels and to this day they are FAR more absorbent than these sets.3) I am still waiting to see when the lint stops coming off the towels. I expect that the initial wash and maybe a few days thereafter, will produce small pieces of fiber falling off and onto the floor or shower, but it's been 2 weeks now and the lint balls continue.4) One of the hand towels has been washed twice now and after the second wash one side of the towel has begun to fray. The seam is already coming unraveled.CONCLUSION:I purchased these on sale and the price was decent. However, if I wanted so-so towels I would have gone to one of the local "box-stores." In the future, I will. But the price is good, just don't expect a quality set of towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2017
Author: Sharon
Title: Super soft towels
Body: Super soft towels, great price.  I plan to purchase more for my other baths.  I was very pleasantly surprised at the weight of the material and the actual size of the bath towels.  They were more like bath sheets.  Not quite true to color (purple) but still a nice shade.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2018
Author: Shopper
Title: I was surprised on the quality!
Body: These are great towels for the price. I bought them as back ups for my car to help with spills or cold kids and they matched with my interior. Didn’t want to spend a lot and was presently surprised at house nice these are!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2020
Author: Jaxs
Title: Quality not quite there
Body: Not as fluffy as they look.  After first wash, a bit disappointing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2019
Author: Mother Crone
Title: Thick and thirsty
Body: Great towels for the money. Terry is thick and thirsty and colors retain their vibrancy.  Purchased 2 sets...going for more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2018
Author: Jessy Dvorak
Title: ... I did wash them first and they held up better than my towels I got as a wedding gift ...
Body: I just received these but I did wash them first and they held up better than my towels I got as a wedding gift from Bed Bath & Beyond. They are still really soft, very thick and durable. They are so much better in quality then the ones I had. Very impressed with these!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
Author: Shano
Title: Faded after the second wash and lost color.
Body: Really disappointed-lasted a single wash before fading? How does this have such high reviews?

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2020
Author: Jaylyn
Title: Great color
Body: Great color that doesn't fade. Dries well and soft

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2018
Author: Emilie K. Gables
Title: Don't Buy These Towels
Body: After washing they were full of lint and scratchy.  Not soft like you would want to wrap around you after a nice relaxing shower.  The refund was an insult - I felt robbed.  I would never purchase from this company again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2020
Author: ABookReader
Title: Fluffy after washing.  You’ll love em!
Body: Wash them before you rule them out.  I didn’t think I liked them, until I washed them.  They fluff up so nicely.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2018
Author: Ahna
Title: Love these towels
Body: Love these towels! Got in a cream and gray tone. They are a sturdy thick cotton that soaks up water very well, no wet feeling after drying off. I expect them to hold up very well over the years. Also, we did not have a ton of shedding after the first or subsequent washes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2019
Author: John Pastorino
Title: Light weight contender.
Body: Was really embarrassed because I gave as a gift.  Ratings were good but these were wimpy towels with little substance.  Had ordered Superior towels a couple years ago and they are the finest.  These are really embarrassing in weight and softness.  Don't go there.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2018
Author: SSG
Title: Two Thumbs Up for these Excellent Towels
Body: I like these towels. I washed them twice before the first use, so there was minimal shedding. The larger size of hand and body towel is greatly appreciated. They also soak up wetness efficiently. Plus, they look great. Two thumbs up!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2020
Author: Sheri Spruill
Title: Regular towels
Body: Not bad for the price they gave me the wrong color though. If you want super soft towels I'd go with the newer bamboo fiber kind though.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2019
Author: Kathie
Title: Good quality
Body: I like the finish and the thickness -- just right!  Will buy more of this set as needed.  From experience, I can say that this is better quality than other sets that cost twice as much!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2020
Author: Beatriz Kelly
Title: Worst product ever
Body: Before even the first wash they started to decolor. I cannot believe it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2020
Author: Michael Doyle
Title: Great value
Body: I do not use any softenerI use wool dryer balls insteadTowels are wonderfully soft and absorbent

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2020
Author: T Dorcey
Title: So plushy!
Body: My first really nice set of towels. Love the color and the feel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2019
Author: Austin Baird
Title: Cheaply made, and likely not really Egyptian cotton
Body: We ordered a set of these "Egyptian cotton" towels a few months ago, and maybe the second time we put them into the washer, they started to fall apart with long strings coming out. The material is not especially soft and is almost certainly not authentic Egyptian cotton.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2020
Author: Bonnie Bear
Title: A review
Body: Towels are ok. Expected them to be softer and idk....more. But it’s a good price for the quality. Serviceable.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2020
Author: Marla Jenae
Title: Good choice
Body: Decent towel. Color match was my main focus. Went well with my look. Wash cold dry medium. Pretty with my decor

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2018
Author: Gnat
Title: Great towels
Body: I've ordered towels from Amazon for years. These some how were a lot bigger than the rest, even hand towels and wash clothes. Have a nice shine, seem to be holding up well in wash. Colors very bright and true to picture.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2020
Author: Momma-Tee
Title: Okay
Body: It's alright for your first apartment but not worth the money. The color ran when I washed them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2020
Author: Gregory S Boggs
Title: 5 star review
Body: All other towels I’ve purchased in the past after washing, drying and using the first time leave lint all over you. These do not and are very absorbent. The stitching is very durable. Other brands came apart after the first wash and I returned for a refund. The color is true to the photo also.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2018
Author: ZidaneLeon
Title: It's pretty good however
Body: It's pretty good however, for about $10 for each towel I was expecting something way more plush and fluffy. The colors and size of the towels are accurate. I don't know about the durability of these towels but I hope they last me a few years.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2020
Author: R. A. Kelley
Title: Super nice!
Body: Whoa supper nice and fluffy!  Look like expensive spa towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2018
Author: AmyB.
Title: Great but missing wash cloths 6 pc not 5. Insert sad face.....
Body: Wonderful towels. Large soft. Only problem.....was supposed to come with 2 wash clothes only had one which made it a 5 pc set instead of 6. I hate to see d them back. I unsure how to handle it. I haven't received s response.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2020
Author: Eric H
Title: Excellent value!
Body: Not as heavy as some Turkish-made, Egyptian cotton towels I have had but a great value and were really liked by the recipient of my gift!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2018
Author: Jason
Title: Nice quality for the price
Body: I am delighted with this purchase.  The towels arrived exactly as described, in the color and shade depicted, and they are soft.  I expect a little shedding with brand new towels, and that is what I got - very little shedding.  I recommend this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2013
Author: Kevin DuJan
Title: These are nice towels.  Very happy with them.
Body: My boyfriend's parents just gave him their old towels for many years, so nothing in his bathroom ever matched.  These towels were the first step in getting him to have some nice things of his own that all go together.  They are wonderfully soft towels that look great in his bathroom...and fell great when used.So far, we've washed them about 5 times and the color has held up nicely.  They also still feel soft and fluffy after the washings.I like these so much I think I'm going to order him some more of them in a month or so...that way we'll end up with four big towels.  To be honest, we really don't use the little ones or the wash cloth very much (use loofas in the shower)...so the smaller towels that came with this set actually ended up being used in the kitchen, where they are great.I know families probably get a use out of the smaller towels and wash cloths and stuff...but I think this set was a nice price for just our using the two big blue towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2020
Author: Greg Hamilton
Title: Good towel
Body: ...and good for the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2019
Author: deb
Title: Bad stitching
Body: The green ones seem to have issues with the hemmed stitching wash cloth has come apart already....I should have returned them but have not done so

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2019
Author: Lanianna
Title: is not absorbant
Body: for the price I guess I can't accept much right? it is soft...it sheds ALOT esp first few washes. Not absorbant so its not the best purchse.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2017
Author: ccarp001
Title: good value
Body: good value for towels that have held up well for over 18mos of washing. recently ordered an additional set.**Update - still going strong 3yrs post-purchase. They still are bleeding color a bit, so be careful washing w light colors if u buy the burgundy.**

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2013
Author: Kenneth Wilson
Title: Great Value
Body: I am really happy with this set. I usually purchase new towel sets every couple years. Usually, as I am a poor art graduate, purchase lower price point towels. So, with that, I do not have super big expectations. I gambled with purchasing towels over the internetz and was really happy I chose to go with these. I think they are as good of quality as you can expect for the price range. They are large, soft and absorb well. They are not super thick and fluffy but they are thick enough to be sturdy and absorbent and still soft.They are holding up well since I got them in January and I haven't noticed any significant fraying or wearing away yet. The color has held up well too, but I use only cold water in the wash. I'm sure there has been some minor fading but I have not noticed anything to the point to make me upset or feel ripped off. To be honest, unless something catastrophic happens to any of these in the next couple months, I'll be returning to Amazon to stock my towel sets! My only complaint is that I wish they offered this set in black.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2020
Author: Becky L.
Title: Very happy with towels!
Body: These are the softest towels! And they absorb rather than "smear" water around like some newer towels do.  Love them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2019
Author: gj
Title: Good product for the price
Body: Towels were nice and fairly soft for the price paid. However after plenty of washes, towels still shed color lent on body.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2019
Author: Joylynn Clark
Title: Great value for the money!
Body: Wow, I was not expecting these to be as nice and fluffy as they are. Very soft, fluffed up nicely after the first wash. I’ve been very impressed with The Pinzon sheets and wanted to see if the towels were good value. I use these for our Airbnb, so we shall see if they hold up to continued abuse.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2020
Author: Sharee Maffettone
Title: Takes too long to dry after used
Body: Dries the body good but then takes a long time to dry, still damp the next morning. Blue color is pretty.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2020
Author: Binky64
Title: I want more
Body: Purchased for decoration came on time color is accurate will purchase more

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2017
Author: Maegen Somerhalder
Title: At first I was very pleased with this towel set
Body: At first I was very pleased with this towel set. I felt for the price it was good quality and I was pleased with the color and feel.I then washed the set and quickly became very unhappy. I washed the set in cold water, used absolutely no bleach (I don’t even own bleach so there’s no possible way it could have gotten mixed in), and washed them with other dark towels. They came out of the washer discolored. Now there are splotches all over the towels. None of my other towels in the same load have this discoloration. Would not purchase again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2020
Author: Linda Schumaker
Title: Not good quality
Body: The towels were very cheaply made. They are not good looking. I’m looking for someone to give them to.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2014
Author: Laura
Title: Good towels for the price
Body: As another reviewer stated -- "Be prepared to wash, wash, wash and dry, dry, dry these towels!"  After washing the towels the 1st time, I was left with a washer full of lint. I shook the towels out & my floor ended up covered in lint. So much lint was still visible on the towels, I decided to wash them a 2nd time & added to my linty mess. I was very frustrated at the mess but decided to go ahead & put them into the dryer.I cleaned my dryer's lint filter 3 times during the 1st drying cycle! I had never seen that much lint - thick enough to be a blanket - in my dryer filter.  I ran them through a 2nd drying cycle, and found a "normal" amount of lint to be on the dryer filter. I must admit I almost gave up on these towels during these initial washings & dryings and I worried there wouldn't be anything left of them whenever I finished. I also worried these towels would leave lint stuck all over me whenever I dried off with them but they have not.After getting through the initial Lint Hell Phase, I have been very pleased with these towels. I have found them to be large, very soft, and super absorbent. In my opinion these are a good purchase. Just remember the initial washing & drying prior to use will be a mess! I ran mine through 2 wash cycles & 2 drying cycles prior to use. I also recommend NOT using fabric softener or dryer sheets so not to interfere with the absorbency.

Author: Maricicc
Title: These towels look great!
Body: The towels are thick and appear to be made well, a great bargain for the price. I washed them before using and they came out nice and fluffy. I gave them a 4 because the fabric has a strange feel next to the skin, I can't really describe it, except it's not that soft, snug cotton that cushions you...hard to explain. I'm hoping with more washes it will come around.I had to come back to edit my review. After 6 months, the silky, plastic feeling that I couldn't really describe earlier has still not gone away. The towels have held up well, however, I have to admit, I don't reach for them first when I grab a towel from the linen closet, since I prefer the feeling of real cotton. Another poster said theirs had the same feel and were made in China. Mine are made in Pakistan. Clearly, the product is not consistent, as can be understood when reading the reviews. So many people complain of thin towels that frayed, shed and faded after just a few washes. Mine still look good.

Author: Lisa A
Title: Great value for the price
Body: I ordered these towels in 4 different colors along with a boatload bedding, because I suddenly had 5 extra people coming to stay. I really just needed to cover the bases so I wouldn't run out, and I tried to coordinate towels with bedding sets.I was pleasantly surprised by the quality.  I ran them through the wash to get them nice and soft, and everything was great.  I washed darks together, and the cream, which is more like a lovely butter yellow separately.  Yes, there was a bunch of lint I kept clearing from the dryer, but after all was said and done, they are fine towels for the price.Oddly enough, the thickness varies from color to color, and from size to size, but none are embarrassing.  The hand towels are thinner, which is okay with me for a guest situation.  The thickest were the plum color, which are a lovely, rich shade of amethyst.  The moss and Wedgewood are pretty too.  Quite happy with this purchase.

Title: Disappointed
Body: I read all of the reviews before I purchased these towels, and decided to buy them anyway.  I ordered 2 sets in the Driftwood color and they arrived yesterday. I opened one set of the towels, and I was very impressed by the size of them.  I did notice an odor (as noted in many of the reviews) so I pre-washed them as the instructions on the label and the card that came with them read.  One of the hand towels completely turned to shreds in the wash!  The others didn't fall apart, but they surly no longer looked new.  (I have some towels that are over 10 years old that are holding up better.)On a good note, Amazon customer service was stellar as usual and told me to return the towels for a full refund.Perhaps this was just a bad batch, I don't know, but I was disappointed with the quality of the towels.

Author: V. Karl
Title: Very Pleased!
Body: Decided to take a chance and order this towel set for my newly remodeled bathroom as I had ordered a similar set several years ago from a department store and had good results despite reviews to the contrary. When they arrived, I laundered them and couldn't be more pleased. I expected a great deal more color loss since it is such a rich, dark color but the bleeding was minimal in my opinion as was the lint.  They stayed intact, dried beautifully and are a terrific value for the price.  I don't like extra-thick, heavy towels that take forever to dry and these are perfect, an excellent weight, lovely rich color...as far as I'm concerned there is nothing to not like about them. I have no regrets at all about this purchase.  I would recommend them and buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2014
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: I am amazed that Amazon can sell such beautiful towels at such ...
Body: I am amazed that Amazon can sell such beautiful towels at such a bargain price. They are just as nice as towels that I've paid three times as much for: thick, luxurious, and generous in size. I paid more for a set at Walmart that weren't half as nice. The color is a true navy, so that's a nice plus. And having them arrive in two days so they could be in the bathroom for Thanksgiving company was such a plus! Recently, I read that new towels should be washed with a cup of vinegar the first time to remove a protective coating and make them more absorbent, so that's what I did. I also dried one set at a time, as there is often quite a lot fo lint on new towels these days--especially those made of Egyptian cotton. Once again I was pleasantly surprised to find less lint in the dryer screen than expected. I'll order these again.

Author: Laura
Title: Pretty good towels for the price
Body: Got these in the mail yesterday. I was excited so I washed them immediately so I could put them in my guest bath. After the wash I was a bit nervous because some threads had already come loose. After drying them I noticed my lint slot was packed full of white lint!!! I was surprised at how much was in there! I clean it before each load so it was only from the towels. While folding the towels I noticed there was still lint on them and it looked like it was snowing when I shook them to get it off. The towels look wonderful hung up although they seem harder than I imagined, especially since it said Egyptian cotton. The label actually says its 100% cotton and 100% Egyptian cotton loops...I'm not sure what that means but it doesn't seem like the entire towel is 100% Egyptian cotton. I can't complain, $20 for a set of towels is an unbelievable price. The towels are big! As long as you don't prefer super soft towels these seem great.

Author: Cas
Title: Beautiful, thick towels
Body: Let me just say that the color of this set is even better in life than it is in the pictures.  It is a very pleasing shade of blue.On top of that, the towels are very thick, warm, and big.  These are not your grandma's scraggly little towels that barely cover your rump; these are nice big towels that wrap around your whole torso and keep you very warm while you do whatever it is you do post shower.The hand towels and wash cloths are also bigger than standard, which I find to be a plus.The towels do continue to shed for a long time after purchase, but the shedding is pretty minimal and I haven't noticed any decrease in the thickness of the towels. I will definitely be purchasing my bathroom sets from this company from now on!

Author: Kyle D.
Title: 2 different feels
Body: I finally remembered to write this review. :) My old bathroom towel's needed to be retired, because they lost their softness. After reading the reviews for this set, I bought them to replace my old ones. I had my maid washed my them as instructed; "For best use, wash separately on first use." But contrary to what it also states-"This will not affect the look, feel, or performance of your towel set.", my aide brought it to my attention that one of the bath towels the feel definitely changed, it was course, compared to the other which was still soft. The one was actually more coarse than my retired towels!  She read the tags and the numbers are identical, but that's all that is identical. I won't even let her dry me off with the other bath towel, because it's too course against my skin. My retired bath towels are even are softer than the 1 new bath towel!

Author: NBD
Title: The best towels for the price.
Body: I have been in the processing of replacing towels and have purchased four different sets varying in weight from 600gsm to 900gsm from Amazon and some other websites. I also bought these in white for my daughter. Although the 900 gsm towels are the most luxurious of the towel sets they take longer to dry and are too heavy to use to wrap around head after a shower. These towels are still very plush and absorbent and in my opinion the perfect weight. They are 40% of the 900 gsm cost. Assuming they continue to come through the wash well, I would rate these towels the best value and quality of all the sets I have bought. I have just bought three more sets.

Author: Shamrock
Title: 1st impression didn't last
Body: When these arrived I was very pleased with how soft they were.  However, when washing them before first use, I had to actually wipe the red lint out of my washer.  Following that, I removed an impressive amount of red lint from my dryer filter. At this point they still felt soft and luxurious. I thought surely their "shedding" would be finished, but when using one to dry off before stepping out of the bath tub, again there was red lint sprinkled throughout the tub.I haven't washed the set a second time yet, but I'm a little leery about how long this "behavior" will continue.  While the towels originally felt fluffy and of good quality, because of this unexpected and disappointing fact I will not order Pinzon Egyptian Cotton towels again.

Author: Hippy
Title: Great towels, especially for the price
Body: I stay in good to nice hotels all the time, and these towels exceed all them.  They are very soft, heavy, and dry you off almost instantaneously.  We have only washed them a couple times, but they have held up well and haven't bled any.  I really love these towels.  My wife's only complaint is that the towels aren't big enough (i.e. bath sheet size), but if the usual hotel size towel is OK for you as it is for me, then the larger ones included is not a good buy, but an excellent buy.  5/5 stars easily earned with plenty of room, and that's not even considering the extremely reasonable price.  We have bought many sets of these for the whole house.

Title: nicer after washing
Body: These towels are a pretty color, but I did not feel they were as soft or fluffy as I expected. 3/4/2015 Having used the towels and washed them several times, the color has held exceptional well, as well the towels seem more soft. Perhaps the new "stiffness" was a factor in my first review.I do not use softener in my laundry due to allergies, so the fluffiness or softness of a towel is really what it is.I would recommend washing the towels sets with themselves or at least separate from light colored clothing at first, they do tend to "bleed" as do most dark colored material. I had no problem with transference though, as I washed them with my darks.

Author: Bettina
Title: Nice looking towels
Body: I wanted to wait and use these for a few months before writing a review.  These are nice looking towels and wash cloths: large and fluffy.They are used and washed nearly daily.  It took about two months of daily use (and being washed and dried) before they stopped leaving lint all over the bathroom, not terrible but annoying....would wash and dry hands in order to handle contact lenses and would get lint from hand towel on lens.They are not very absorbent either-that would be the biggest complaint.  Wipe up water splashes on the counter and it would merely smear the water...major annoying!  Washed and dried without any type of fabric softener or dryer sheet but has not improved the absorbency.

Title: Quality not the best, take care washing/drying
Body: These are good, serviceable towels. They are soft and seem clean right out of the package, but (of course) I washed before using. One of the hand towels has already begun to unravel at the seams (this is after only one wash with Woolite and tumble dry on low). I don't think this will be a good, lasting set like some of the other towels I own. But I bought them mostly for decorative purposes anyway. I would prefer not to have to be so gentle washing and drying (I don't have a clothesline and otherwise cannot imagine hanging towels to try to prevent them from coming apart along the seam like the hand towel did).

I haven't washed them yet but feel they will withstand up to a good one. One other thing- there were no hanging threads on any of the towels and the seams on the towels are very nice & sturdy. I would buy them again and in fact I'm going to purchase 3 more sets next month. I could have spent my money at Macy's or Bloomingdales but I'm sticking with these- I love them!

Author: Judy
Title: Great quality for a great price!
Body: My daughter bought a couple sets of these and recommended them to me.  So, I ordered a set some time ago and they are great quality for such a low price.  I won't hesitate to buy more of them as the need arises.  The first couple times of washing them will cause a lot of lint in the dryer, so it is recommended that half way through drying to clear the lint trap.  After the 3rd drying, the lint is more normal.  They are still as soft and fluffy as when they were new, so the lint issue does not lessen the quality of the towels.  The color was what I was hoping to see.  The white ones can be bleached and not lose quality.  Perfect for families with children.

Author: Rachel Slaton
Title: My white sets are pristine and look like new. We originally picked these as our "guest" ...
Body: I bought 6 sets of these towels almost two years ago - in that time, they've been used, washed, dried, etc, who knows how many times. The towels are soft, plush, and absorbent. I remember some shedding on skin and in the dryer the first few times they were used, but now they never even drop a thread. I have one single grey bath sheet (out of six sets - so one in 12) with fraying, but no holes. I have one single grey washcloth with some color loss, but I'm 99% certain someone used it with bleach. My white sets are pristine and look like new.We originally picked these as our "guest" towels, but they've made it into the regular rotation because they're just so nice. I looked at them today while folding laundry and thought I should order more, so here we are!Quality may have changed in the past few years, but I've had a great experience and will be ordering another few sets of towels.

Author: Andrea K.
Title: Wow, these are huge, great towels!
Body: Omg, these towels are really big, I'm 4'11 an a half, and petite, and theses are great, I knew the size, but was surprised when I got them, they're big thirsty and well made! The reviews threw me off abit, but reading that they are Egyptian cotton, I took a chance and got them and am so glad I did! I must admit though, the washcloths are a little large, but it's fine, and the handtowels are big also, but the quality makes up for anything anyone may not like about them, I liked them so much, I got another set right away, an the price had even dropped a bit! Thank you Amazon for having these wonderful towels at a good price!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2014
Author: Anderson
Title: Worst purchase of my life Zero Stars Quality!
Body: This towel set is the absolute worst thing I have every purchased. I do not know if this is a "bait & switch" or the seller just does not care. The quality is so bad I could not even give them away. First washing they shed a large amount of cloth. Subsequently they are falling apart in spite of being a only a few weeks old. After two gentle washings they are now light blue instead of navy. I do not know what part of Egypt the material is allegedly from but I suspect these are rejects as they are not even bargain store level. The seller should be ashamed and Amazon should bar them from selling on their site.

Author: JC Butler
Title: Incredible Price
Body: I wasn't expecting much based on the low price although the reviews were mostly good.  I'm glad I purchased 4 sets (all different colors).  Normally one towel is the cost of this whole set.  All the items are good sizes and very plush.  Yes you get a lot of fuzz in the dryer but the towels come back just as thick.  I would recommend following the instructions to wash them before use.  I didn't on one set and when I used the towel I got a lot of lint on my skin.  Not a good feeling.  Needless to say I washed the other sets to avoid this problem again.  Hightly recommend this product.

Author: CyberTilly
Title: Not So Bad!
Body: I really loved the color of these towels on the internet, and after reading all of the reviews about these particular towels and the issues, I was hesitant to get them, but I did.When I got them, I immediately washed them twice.  I looked at the quality of them after each wash and there were a few strings, but not really bad.After I got them out of the dryer, they were all nice and fluffy and gorgeous! I am really glad that I read the reviews FIRST about these towels, or I would have been extremely irritated at having washing them only once and then me having to wash my body after drying off because of the shedding issue. Make sure you wash them twice FIRST. You will not be disappointed.

Author: Alicein Wonderland
Title: Great Value
Body: We purchased numerous sets of these towels for our AirBNB and are incredibly pleased at the value and the quality for the price. They shed a lot the first time I washed them, but less the second, and hardly at all now when I wash them. At first I was concerned with how fast/how well they would dry after use, it seemed to take a long time, but after a few times of washing them, they seem to dry a lot quicker now. This is the best value I could find for towels, even compared to Walmart or stores like TJ Maxx/Home Goods - they couldn't beat this price. My biggest "complaint" (if it can be called that) is too many hand towels! I suppose someday we'll be thankful for having so many. I also like that these were available on Prime Now in our area.

Author: Cozette
Title: For the price these are fine.
Body: There's a lot of reviews complaining about these towels but hey, you're paying $22 for a 6-piece towel set! If you're looking for quality go spend more money. For the price these are fine. I don't understand what other people were expecting. The bath towels are a good size. I haven't washed them so I can't comment on them falling apart but, so far out of the box they are fine. I didn't really have the highest expectations for these because of the price. But I will update if they fall apart.My only issue is I ordered the grey and it's a little darker than the photo.... might just be my computer monitor so who knows. But I kind of wanted a lighter grey to go with my bathroom but it's not the end of the world. I will survive my towels being a few shades darker than I wanted.

Title: So Far So Good
Body: I purchased these towels for my son to take to school.  He began using them before taking them and they are good so far.  I've washed them a few times and they are holding up.  The towels are large and plush for the price.  I would like to have two additional wash clothes, but that is a personal preference.  When I purchase towels I usually buy extra wash clothes because they are used a lot more than the towels and in the long run they tend to wear out before the towels. Buying extras wash clothes solves this issue for me.

Author: Jason Dittberner
Title: Should be listed as 400-grit
Body: Very disappointed in these towels. The Egyptian cotton apparently comes with a lot of sand because these towels are ROUGH. I normally buy cheap towels from Target, and they are 100x softer than these. Additionally, after the first washing, they already started to fade and are pilling and falling apart. I had to cut off all kinds of stray "strings" after the first wash cycle, and I washed them on the delicate cycle. As a special bonus I had to spend 10 min cleaning all the carnage out of the washing machine after.If you are looking for a towel set, look elsewhere. Now I own towels that are rougher than my "cheap" car towels.

Author: Annamaria T.
Title: Great absorbency, but sheds like a dog
Body: I got excited when I tried this towel at a friend's place and didn't read the reviews before I bought it. Most towels unfortunately start smelling after a couple of months, even the very pricey ones, and I also find everything I tried so far not absorbent enough. I ordered a red set and my friend ordered a blue one and now both of our bathrooms are pretty much ruined because they shed so much. Even after washing them 3-4 times, it is still really bad (not to mention what they do with the dryers). The tub, the heating system and the fan grate - they're all red. However they absorb water really great, and after 2 months of usage they don't smell.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2016
Author: S&S
Title: 3 Stars if they were more expensive- ok but not luxury
Body: I would say, for the price, these towels are ok.  I was hoping for a little bit more substance and softness, but they're not horrible. I would compare them to a higher end Walmart towel, if there is such a thing. I washed them first and dried them about 4 or 5 times as recommended by other reviews. They did produce A LOT of lint but that didn't bother me... they're new towels after all. The pulling that I saw others complain about was there but it was minimal, so that didn't really bother me either. I would give these 3 stars if they were more expensive, but you get what you pay for. They're fine, they're average, they're functional but I won't buy again.

They still hold together decently but I imagine they have maybe a one year life max before you're going to want to throw them all out and restock those towel shelves

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2013
Author: CoastTraveler
Title: Massive lint and frayed edges
Body: Washed these new towels twice before using. The feel is fine, but quality control is lacking. They threw off almost two large dryer traps of lint and left link throughout the washer. While I assume that this will drop off, I was more disturbed by the fraying of the edges, several of which I had to cut off on three of the six towels. One was almost a foot long. It appears that either the edge binding is not sewn far enough over the center material or that a larger binding is needed. Also, a few center pulls appeared, even though the towels were washed and dried by themselves so had nothing to catch on. Given the lack of quality control, I would not purchase these again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2013
Author: Anne Withanee
Title: BEST DEAL IN TOWN!
Body: To-date I have ordered three sets of these towels and am very, very pleased.  Granted, they leave a lot of "lint" in the lint filter of the dryer for the first few washings but the color is exactly as pictured and where else can you get a six piece towel set - two large bath sheet towels, two hand towels and two washcloths - for $20?  They are plenty absorbent and the color has remained "like new" after many, many machine washings and dryings.  Great value for the money!

Title: Soft, but poor construction and doesn't seem very absorbent
Body: Yes these towels are soft, but they still shed a little after 2 washings. Some of the seams started to show stray threads that had to be trimmed, but then part of interior started to come apart.You get what you pay for with these towels.If you're just looking for something large to use, I guess these will work. But don't let the description fool you, they're nothing special. Also on cold days these towels don't feel very absorbent, they don't keep you warm, just kinda wick the water away.There's got to be better a product available

Title: Too much lint, sheds even when hanging on the towel rod.
Body: The towels look very good but shed so much lint that they were unusable.  I thought that a few washes and trips through the dryer would take care of the problem but the last dryer run was almost as bad as the first.  I was worried that a fire might break out in the dryer or lint exhaust pipe. It really was that bad.  They looked so good that I wanted to donate them since they were nice and clean, but didn't want to pass on the horrible lint problem so I put them in the trash.  We couldn't even use them for rags.

Author: Ryan Mease
Title: Soft, but Persistently Linty
Body: I've read online that towels that produce lint are actually higher quality, but after 10+ washes, I'm getting tired of little red flakes and strings showing up on my body and face by surprise. These towels are definitely soft, but I'm ready for the lint phase to end. If anyone reading this feels I gave this negative review when the problem is not the product but my washing/drying habits, feel free to leave a comment. I use a clean lint trap and dryer sheets every time. My online research indicates that it's not me, it's the towels, but I'm open-minded to the possibility of being wrong.

Body: I ordered a set of these towels about a year ago. They are great. The material is nice, thick enough to be absorbent, but not too thick. They have held up well over the last year and still look good. I bought the cocoa and the cranberry colors. The cocoa is just as pictured. The cranberry is like a burgundy color, I think the photo makes it look a little more red than what they look like. But, a very nice, color. I They came out soft, absorbent and beyond expectation for the price. I'm very pleased. also sent both of these colors to a friend who has used them and had the same experience and is very pleased with these towels. Great price, great product and I would recommend them.

Title: Not high quality.
Body: I read the reviews so I purchased these for my mother-in-law as her towels had become stringy and threadbare. Since she lives is assisted living, I decided to wash them first so the service that does her laundry wouldn't have to worry about bleeding. I had to wash them 3 times and even then, they were still bleeding, lost any softness or feel of thickness that they'd had when they were received and turned a rust color (burgundy is her favorite color). I was very disappointed but gave them to her anyway. They are better than what she had but not what I had in mind.

Author: Janet K.
Title: Pinzon Egyption Towel set
Body: These towel are perfect. The purple color is beautiful and they are made extremely well. I was really surprised at the quality. They absorb very well and did not fall apart when I washed them. It just made them more fluffy. One thing, the color does run a little and I expect that from a dark color like this. They way I bleed them the quickest is put them in your bath tub in as hot of water as possible and mild soap. Let them soak till the water is cool. Repeat. Then let them set in cold water. Squeeze excess water out and put them in the dryer on medium setting. Permanent press is the best. That should cure any color  run you get. By the way, I did not get any lint at all...none.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2013
Author: Danny Parker
Title: Towels feel great and good size, too but bad when laundering
Body: I liked these towels and they felt substantial when I used the large bath one.  Most towels do a good job of getting you dry but I noticed these ones do absorb the water well - you don't feel like your towel is getting damp as you finish drying yourself like some towels can.I picked these towels because other Reviewers thought they were also good value and I am sick and tired of the cheap crap you sometimes get in the stores.  It really is a case of paying for what you get.  Most towels look nice and plump on the shelves in the beginning, so I was pleased to see the laundering didn't break their texture and softness after washing.  WARNING: Be careful not to wash these with other colors, though, as they shed lots of fluff and contaminate other items in the load!I'd recommend these towels to anyone who does not want to spend a fortune but at the same time wants a reasonable quality set and some durability.  For families or roomies, you can get different colored sets, so there's no fighting over whose towel belongs to who.  I will update the review if I notice something else as I continue to use them.UPDATE: March 2014. I purchased the towels described above in two colors, Cream and Burgundy. Unfortunately, the Burgundy towels are also made by Pinzon but are described on each Towel Label as "Egyptian Cotton Loop" and they are absolutely dreadful. They shed constantly and after 3 months and maybe 6 washes, they shed red fluff everywhere - even when they are being used in the bathroom. I just pulled them out of the Washer and they have covered red speckles all over the other laundry items, especially black and blue items. For God's sake, stay away from these crappy Burgundy "Egyptian Loop" towels. Sorry to anyone who may have been fooled by my rosy review above - the review above still holds true for the Cream colored Towels, or if you wash the burgundy towels with no other colored items in the same wash.

Title: Ummmm not sure they are very strong.
Body: I thought since I love everything I buy from Amazon has always been great but this set sort of did not want me to ever buy them again. They are soft to use but not as thick as I thought they might be but even that I was ok with. Sadly after only 2 washes the hand towel was just frayed to death. It will be interesting to see if the other 2 towels in the set also fray. I will state that Amazon who always wants the best for their customers gave me a credit for the hand towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2015
Author: Mee
Title: Luxury on a budget!!! GREAT VALUE!!
Body: These are GREAT towels! We're very happy with the generous size, weight, feel, quality and price! Great value! We've had no issues with pulled threads or lint or fading (as some other reviewers have mentioned) from the first pre- use laundering and after several weeks of regular use and washings. I was a bit hesitant because of those reviews but decided to take a chance on them and am so glad I did! They perform perfectly! We've paid twice as much for towel sets that are not as nice as these. IMO they are nice enough to give as a Wedding gift!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2015
Author: Kallah
Title: Fuzzy, large, and true to color!
Body: I picked up these towels in navy blue and found them to be true to color, which is nice, as "navy blue" all too often describes "anything vaguely dark blue". There's a very vibrant hue, despite the dark color, without any of the almost faded gray I've seen in other sets. I've washed them in hot water and dried on high heat with no fading or strings coming off. All the towels in the set are soft to the touch, and the bath towels soak up water great when drying off. If only they had a matching bath sheet set, I'd buy that too!

Author: browneyes1143
Title: Nice and Plush
Body: This set of towels is thick, soft and plush.  I got the plum color and it's true to color from the picture.  I washed them a couple of times to get the lint out of them, which is normal with any new towel.  I love them and plan on ordering another set in another color.  They would make a wonderful gift for anyone.  You can see by the thickness of the towels, which are all a very nice size, that they will last a long time.  Very much worth the money; you won't find better towels at this price anywhere really.

Title: Excellent Value
Body: I was concerned because of the negative reviews stating that these shed so much. I always wash towels before using them to remove the sizing which interferes with absorbency. I was expecting an inordinate amount of lint in my dryer screen, but that was not the case. Yes there was some lint, but the amount was relatively small for new towels! They came out beautiful and soft. I see why they are so popular. I am very happy with this purchase.

Author: Jon Solomon
Title: Great towels for a great price.
Body: I've been using these for about two weeks now and they feel great. I washed them in cold water and let them dry before using them the first time. They shed a bunch in the dryer but I was diligent about emptying the lint trap multiple times during the cycle so that the drying could be efficient. The towels have a good weight to them and feel nice on the body. They're absorbent and have a weight to them but never feel too heavy. I'd greatly recommend these to anyone looking for a set of new towels and washcloths.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2013
Author: Rachel
Title: WONDERFUL quality and value! Highly recommend!
Body: Really couldn't be happier with this purchase. I don't think you can find a better value anywhere, especially not at this quality. They are not overly soft, which I prefer in a towel, as it makes them more efficient when it comes to drying. I ordered the purple set, and about the only thing I can say negative is that the color is slightly different than online. The online images seem like a more royal or blue-purple, and in fact they are a bit lighter and more of a plum color (but still a very nice color and the difference is very slight). Even my fiance commented that he liked the set a lot, and we will be buying a second one (probably the black ones) at some point! Plus, since they are $20 I only had to find $5 more to get free shipping thanks to Amazon. :)

Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Great fabric, poor stitching
Body: The fabric is heavy and of high quality. Before washing they had an unpleasant smell, presumably due to being treated with sizing. After washing twice the smell and strange feel went away. Being thicker and more luxuriant fabric they do not dry as fast as thinner towels. If you want a fast drying towel buy something cheaper and thinner. The main problem, that justifies only three stars, is the quality of the stitching. Some towels were poorly stitched; this should have been picked up in quality control. Other than that they are wonderful towels and well worth the price.

Author: Heather Schinn
Title: Overall pretty happy
Body: I am pleasantly surprised by how accurate the stock photo is (in terms of color). I have shopped online for towels quite a bit and have been disappointed by picture-vs-reality, but this is very accurate. I am also happy about the price. Really happy.Now for the downside: I have been using these towels consistently for over two months and they are just now started to let up on the lint. I washed them and then placed them in the dryer repeatedly (at least 4 times) before the first use and the lint that came off of these was just unreal. There has been cranberry lint all over my bathroom for over two months (not to mention freshly showered me!), no matter how much I clean. Like I said, though, they are starting to let up on the lint which is making the quality of my life much better.Overall, I would still recommend these to a friend, especially for this price.

Title: Returning customer for 2years
Body: I've been buying these towels for a while now.  I learned after the first time tho, that you'll get covered in fuzz drying off with them at first when they're new. So now I wash/dry them 3-4 times when I first get them, before ever putting them away to be ready to use. So keep that in mind. After that, they stay thick for at least two years I can say from the first set I got that I'm still using. Good quality, easy care, and great color variety. And best of all, amazing price for the quality.

Title: Towel set not up to standard
Body: I purchased these because they were "Egyptian cotton", supposedly absorbent, etc. etc. In reality they are not very absorbent. I used then washed these towels to see if that would improve their absorbency. These towels realeased a lof of "fluff" (fiber particles) in the wash and a huge amount of fluff in the dryer. I had to clean the filter several times during the drying process. I will now use again and see if absorbency has improved but I know they will have to be washed separately because they are not really color fast. I had bought another set, another color, that I am returning because this one was so unsatisfactory.

Title: Perfect!! Very satisfied!
Body: Okay, so after reading so many mixed reviews, I was nervous about these. However, the price point and the easy return policy made me take the risk and I'm so happy I did! They are soft, but not too soft, thick, and the bath towel is a very generous size. I've had NO issues with them so far and they have laundered twice now. I did take other reviewers suggestions and for the first wash, I washed them alone and on "ultra clean" because it gives an extra rinse cycle.

Author: 0x123456789
Title: Poor quality!
Body: I've been using these towels for about 2 months—mine are purple color.Ever since I've purchases them, my white bathroom is covered with purple dust coming from these towels.My initial guess was it will stop after a few washing cycles, but these purple particles and dust are everywhere, even today—all coming from the towels.Whenever I use dryer and these towels are inside, I clean off large amount of purple particles, so you could make a pillow for your kids using that deposit.Disappointed, regardless of positive reviews about this product.

Author: S. York
Title: Overall I like them well enough
Body: These are decent towels for the price. Overall I like them well enough, however, I have yet to really be able to use them. I have had to wash and dry them three times now because they continue to shed lint from them. Each wash/dry cycle gets more lint off, which is common for the first time of washing and drying, however, I have never had to wash and dry new towels this much to stop the shedding. I do not think I would buy these again based on the lint shedding. I purchased two sets, and both seem to have the same issue.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2013
Author: Tracy W.
Title: Disappointed
Body: I needed new towels that matched my dark gray accents in the bathroom and I was thrilled at the color and price.  They were big enough for my needs, although other reviews complained about this.  I had to wash them a few times before they became absorbent, but they were still soft.  Then this week I started to notice they were turning ORANGE in a few places.  I don't use bleach on my towels or to clean my bathroom so I was puzzled, but decided to be more careful.  I looked at both the hand towel and washrag today and it looks like they are tye-dyed orange (just in time for Halloween).  Either my hand soap, Noxema, or possibly toothpaste are reacting with the color.  So now my new towels are going to be banished to the back of the linen closet.  Probably be okay in a white but I wouldn't trust other colors.

Author: Richard Lake
Title: Great Towels for the Price!
Body: I was looking for some blue towels to go with my new Victoria Park Shower Curtain, and when I came across these I couldn't believe how well they matched! And with a great price for a six-piece set, I purchased these too. I washed them before using them, and there was a lot of lint that came off in the dryer. But these are very soft, absorbent, high-quality towels with a nice weight to them, and I'm very pleased with my purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2015
Author: Julie
Title: Excellent quality for the price.
Body: These towels are bigger than I expected. The bath towels aren't quite bath sheets, but big enough to wrap around my generous proportions. The hand towels and washcloths are also larger than average. I washed before using, and the fluffed up nicely. The towels are soft and absorbant--the cotton really is high quality. These aren't luxury towels, but they're definitely better than the bargain ones I usually end up buying. I'd compare them to the higher-priced towels at Target or Kohl's. The price for the six-piece set is crazy low, considering the quality.  I've been repeatedly impressed with the Pinzon products.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2016
Author: Casey O
Title: Launder Repeatedly Before Using, Trust Me!
Body: Made in Pakistan and had to be laundered three times before it quit plugging the lint trap 4 times a dryer session. Just an unbelievable amount of lint, I'm shocked any towels were left. I could have made another set of towels from the lint if I had a loom. Really ridiculous, actually.Still, even after all the trips through the laundry the towels held their color and softness, so not a bad purchase. This was one of three sets I bought, and the sets made in Pakistan shed lint horribly while the set made in India only gave off the kind of lint you'd expect from new towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2013
Author: nana
Title: Not worth the money
Body: Very poor quality, after the first washing the towels were shedding all over. The entire inside of my washing machine was covered with lint. When I got them out of the dryer they had little fuzzy things all over them. I wish I could send them back but too much of a hassle and I would have to pay shipping. I usually read the reviews about the product but I didn't this time. I have learned my lesson. ALWAYS READ REVIEWS!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2013
Author: LA
Title: These towels deserve more than 5 stars
Body: I usually purchase our towels from Penney's or Macy's.  I needed some towels for an RV & thought I would order some cheaper ones because if they accidentally got left or ruined somehow while camping, it wouldn't break the bank.  I am happy to say I will be purchasing more of these towels for our home.  They are GREAT!  The color is vibrant (I got Wedgewood), they are thick & plush & as absorbent as the more expensive ones I usually buy. The sizes are wonderful, I haven't seen any shrinkage or fraying of the fabric.  I read other reviews about excessive lint, I really didn't see an increase in the amount of lint than with any other new towels.  I can't say anything negative about these towels.  I would highly recommend these towels.  They are very high end without the high end price.

Title: Good, thirsty towels, however---clearly seconds
Body: These towels are thick and absorbent, for the price they are worth it.  Please be aware however that they are seconds.  I've purchased two sets and both have defects.  One the vanilla cream ones, the thread was overrun on the washcloths which made them fray badly making it a candidate for the rag bag.  Two of the large towels have stitching defects that are pretty obvious.  So, they may not be for the guest bathroom, but still good towels for the price.

Author: Chuck G.
Title: Softer than expected
Body: For a 6-piece set I wasn't sure how soft the item was going to be and I was nicely surprised. Hand towels and the wash clothes are soft. When I used the bath towel for the first time the water just absorbed into the towel like a sponge. My only complaint is the fist wash I did see a few strings loose on the towel, but not enough to really be concerned or complain about really. I love this set. Probably will get another.

I am NOT disappointed with my purchase. Time will tell if the color remains as nice as when purchased, but, hey, even my Landsend towels have faded!

It took about 8-12 washings before they lost their water-repelling tendency, and now they're really lovely - I'm ordering another set in grey to round out the bathroom color scheme in our new place (I'm just going to have to run them through the wash a whole bunch before we actually use them).

Title: These Feel Expensive
Body: Very great quality, THICK navy blue towels. These are exactly what I was looking for. They have a beautiful design and they just feel like they're very high quality. I usually say you get what you pay for, but with these towels you get a little more. I will be purchasing another set.Oh, and these hold up to everyday use and the laundry process very well. I've had them for three months now and haven't noticed any fading or shredding. I highly recommend!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2014
Author: MiamiTechnoLawyer
Title: Great Towels, Superb Value.
Body: I ordered these towels (725 Gram Pinzon) and another product Luxury Hotel & Spa Bath Towel 100% Genuine Turkish Cotton towels (4 towel bath towel set for just under $40) at the same time.  I was very satisfied with both purchases.  Luxury Hotel towel is a little softer and a feels slightly heavier despite the similar gram counts.  Both towels are the same length.  The Pinzon towel is 4 inches wider.  At $19.95 this 6 towel set is a superb value, I figure you are paying $6.00 each for the bank towels, $3.00 each for the hand towels, and $1.00 each for the wash cloths.  The Pinzon was the less expensive to the two products compared.Is this the thickest, softest, nicest towel I have ever touched.  No.  If you visit Bloomingdales, Saks, or Nordstom you can find a marginally better bath towel but you will pay $20.00 to $30.00 for it.  The Pinzon is better than anything you will find at Target or Lands End, and similar stores for two to three times the price ($12 to $18 a bath towel).  I have no idea why there are any 1 or 2 star ratings for this product the debate in my wind was whether to give this a 4 star or 5 star rating.  After trying out a test package I have already ordered more.  If I was giving this category grades I would grade as follows:  Softness A-, Size A, Weight A-, Quality A-, Value A+.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2016
Author: D. H. T.
Title: Pinzon 6-piece Egyptian Cotton Towel Set -Cream
Body: Update:  Several towels have unraveled at the corners and now look sloppy. This happened after between two and three months of fairly heavy use.Original review: My experience with these towels has been excellent. The towel set I received is high-quality, absorbent, good-looking, and seems like it will hold up well under normal bathroom conditions. They have been laundered three times with almost no noticeable change in appearance.I received no compensation for this review. I received a quality product. Credit where credit is due.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2018
Author: brett c pearce
Title: No other accessories in same color
Body: Cant find any other accessories in this color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2015
Author: Show Me Rick
Title: So far we love them!
Body: So far we love them! received this set, immediately washed and dried them. No damage occurred during the wash. The lint shed during the drying was typical of any plush towel set. If they deteriorate on further immediate use I'll update the review. My wife and I were very pleased with both the size and plushness. A lot of bang for the buck! UPDATE 15 MARCH 2015: Some minor shedding after only three washings. Still nice towels for the price, but dropped to 4 stars.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Wash up great & not a lot of lint.
Body: The color is just what I like. The towels are very thirsty . I usually use 2 towels but not now. They are great!!!!!!!!!!!Love them!!!!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2013
Author: Alanna K. Baker
Title: Not as good as my old towels
Body: Some of my towels had gotten dog-chewed, and the family is growing, so I thought it was time to order new towels.  These looked good.  But I noticed they are conspicuously less absorbent than my old Cannon towels; unlike my old towels, they slide right down my skin, pushing the water without absorbing it.  Disappointing.They're a nice color, though, and a nice size, and they wash well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2017

Title: Five Stars
Body: yup

Body: Color was extremely faded and “off” on some of the towels. Disappointed.

Body: Big and I mean BIG fluffy towels.

Author: Love2bAlive
Title: On the fence
Body: I ordered the plum set to go in a guest bath.  Due to the color I washed these by themselves.  Good thing because so far I have had to run my washer twice to remove the purple out of the tub.  The sides of one bath towel have started to unravel.  Other than that, that look good in the guest bath and other towels are fine.  I would probably buy them again for occasional use only.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2019
Author: kimberly nee
Title: Plum color not as pictured
Body: Ordered the plum color but not at all the color pictured. The towels I received were a light purple and got even lighter after washing them..... keeping them but disappointed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great for my purple bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2018
Author: Maximiliano Cotes
Title: Five Stars
Body: nice

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2014
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Poor Quality, Falls Apart and Drops Fuzz Constantly
Body: I have had these towels for only a couple of weeks, and have washed the complete set twice. Even after a couple of washes the fuzz coming off during use is unbelievable, and two of the pieces are already unraveling. I will be requesting a refund from Amazon, and am truly surprised they would carry something of such unbelievably poor quality. I could buy better at a local dollar store. The only good thing that I can say about these towels is that they are the color I actually wanted and expected.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2018
Author: Laney
Title: These towels turned yellow after getting wet. wherever there ...
Body: These towels turned yellow after getting wet. wherever there was water, it stained yellow,  as if it were bleach stains, but it wasn't because I have never used bleach.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2018
Author: butong
Title: wonderful set at an awesome price!
Body: wonderful set at an awesome price! my only regret is not buying 3 sets right away.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2015
Author: Ye Shall Be As Gods
Title: They shed really bad.
Body: The shedding from these towels is awful. Every time I used them after a shower I would have towel fuzz all over my body to the point I considered getting back into the shower to rinse it off. I had hoped the loose stuff would come off with laundering but after several washings and completely full lint filters after drying the fuzz factor is no better, and the threads from the sides of the towels are stripping off. They are nice and soft and they look nice, but I did not keep them very long.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2014
Author: brooke.berk
Title: Good, cheap price on a towel set, decent quality.
Body: Probably a two out of five as far as quality goes. I renovated the upstairs bathroom at my parents house and wanted to get a towel set to match the updates. After about a year, they've faded as you would expect towels to do. They don't really fluff any more in the dryer. Because they are grey, they still look nice hanging in the bathroom. Solid, thick, with kind of a hairy knap. You get what you pay for with linens.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2018
Author: cm
Title: Five Stars
Body: Very nice & thick towel set!  Still have lint though, even after many washings.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2014
Author: James Z.
Title: Great towels for picking up ladies or fellas
Body: These are great towels. I use them to pick up my kids out of the bath, and they really do the job well. Wait, what did you think I meant by the title?Jokes aside, these really are great towels. I purchased the gray color, and they look just as pictured. They are soft to the touch and durable for normal home use. We keep them in our guest bath, and our guests love them.I recommend these towels to others.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2014
Author: Brooke
Title: Great Quality and Price
Body: These were a really nice surprise. I was in dire need of extra towels and not much extra budget so I tried these in the hopes that at the very least they would do for now, but to my delight, these really are a great quality and that being said, it makes the price even better, especially since you get such a large set (2 Bath Towels, 2 Hand Towels and 2 Wash Cloths)! Also, the color is really vibrant and very true to the picture!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2019

Title: Does the Job
Body: Nice and soft after several washings.

Body: They are great..large, soft & luxurious ..

Author: Sissy Rice
Title: A lot of towel for your money
Body: High quality, nothing lightweight about this this purchase. Well made.

Author: DarkStreak
Title: Nice complete set
Body: As I mentioned in another towel review, we go through a lot of towels and seem to wear them out pretty quickly. I purchased 2 sets to try out and have been very happy with them thus far. I did wash them upon receiving them and was surprised by how much lint was left in the drier vent screen. But they are still very soft and haven't had one unravel yet. Can't beat them for the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2014
Author: J W Hughes
Title: Not absorbent
Body: I bought these towels as they were cheap and had some decent reviews. They aren't bad for the money but they are not absorbent at all. I have washed them 4-5 times with no fabric softener or dryer sheet but they still act like polyester rather than cotton, they just smear water around rather than absorbing it. Unfortunately my return window has passed so I'm stuck with them. For $20 it was a gamble. Maybe I'll donate them to charity.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2019
Author: Sarah Doucette
Title: DO NOT BUY
Body: DO NOT BUY THEM....... They constantly shed and DO NOT stop. They are covered with fuzz and do not go away.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2018

Title: I’ll order again
Body: Great texture. Worth the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
