Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2015
Author: lisa
Title: Coming apart already?
Body: Update: We have had these towels for quite a while now and I can confirm they are poor quality. They continue to snag and look worse every time they are washed. We still use them because they serve their purpose, but we never use them for guests because they look so crappy. Do not bother with these towels, they are not worth the money.-------I just got these yesterday and put them in the wash. One of the towels already has some significant unraveling along the edge - after just one wash/dry!! I'm disappointed about the quality. These were rated so highly by so many people that I expected better. Live and learn, I guess.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2018
Author: PS
Title: Two Stars
Body: Started unravelling within a month

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2013
Author: boondogg
Title: awesome Egyptian cotton
Body: This double set of towels are beautifully awesome.  I bought each of my five boys a set and they were much appreciated.  Of course they should be washed and dried a couple of times to fluff them up and remove lint.  Egyptian cotten is the best in the world.  They last forever.  Cold washes are best or, another Egyptian fact, soak them in salt water to help them retain their color.  Soak once in heavy salt overnight.  Then,wash as usual, cold water is my preference.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2014
Author: Lennie Moren
Title: 100% Egyptian Cotton Loops?
Body: I have dreamed of owning Egyptian Bath Towels all my life but could never afford them, that was until I found this sale. I live alone so I ordered just one set & when it arrived I immediately put it in my washer, with my old towels. I was shocked to find out how cheaply made these towels are. I swear I found half of the towel's material in the lint filter of the dryer. When I inspected the towel's label I realized it said, 100% Egyptian Cotton Loops, 100% Cotton- What is that all about?

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2018
Author: A Lopez
Title: Perfectly thick absorbent and color match was perfect!
Body: Love this brand of thick towel. Color was accurate and perfect. Sent several sets to my college student son and his colors matched to his liking as well!

Author: Wayne M.
Title: Four Stars
Body: Great towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2019

Body: Great towels. Great price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2014
Author: jacbethke
Title: Blue Dust Everywhere!
Body: These Navy blue towels continually coat my bathroom with blue lint/dust and it's almost impossible to keep up with cleaning it.  I've washed these towels at least 5 times each, and the dust just doesn't end.  I've purchased other dark colored towels and have not had this same experience.  At this point, I've stopped using the towels.  Aside from this issue, I enjoyed using them.  I do not recommend these towels unless you have a maid who cleans your bathroom at least twice a week.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2014
Author: A#1DutchTreat
Title: Soft & Fluffy Towels
Body: I give this product 5 stars because they met, or exceeded, my expectations. The 6 piece towel set perfectly matches the Wedgewood blue in my shower curtain, they're very soft against my skin, and are very absorbent. After washing and drying, they are ready to enjoy again without loss of their soft touch and absorbency. I recommend this product to anyone looking for comfort and quality in a bath towel set!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: SOFT
Body: Got 2 sets, SUPER SOFT! So comfy, and large enough to wrap your whole body.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2013
Author: frequent shopper
Title: excellent set for the price
Body: These towels are great. They're not luxurious or super plush but for 20 bucks you can't beat them. Thicker than average, soft, and have held up well after a few washes-no snags or loose thread. Not sure who got the oversized hand towels but mine were about the size of...well, a hand towel; 20in long or so-good to dry your hands with, probably what you've experienced before

Title: Excellent Choice
Body: I really like these. Not a bath sheet but slightly oversize they are a perfect size for the shower. When they arrived I did have to wash them using fabric softener to soften them up as the sizing put in them to make them look nice was a bit scratchy.  Very absorbent terry cloth material that feels plush and luxurious. The color was true to the pictures and I feel the quality is excellent. I bought two sets one in gray and the other in white. The contrast looks nice in the bathroom.

Author: Yellow Rose
Title: Daily Indulgence
Body: In this price range I have NEVER come across a set of towels that have the everyday elegance and practicality of this set.Thick, thirsty yet not too heavy they are a must for every family bathroom and appear as if you spent much, much more. I have the gray and the green and will be making more purchases very soon.Now all I need is a towel warmer and I can have the luxury of an upscale hotel bathroom right in my very own home.

Title: BOUGHT AGAIN because these are soft, absorbent towels
Body: This is the second round of this towel set, not because they are worn out, by any means, but because we are replacing old towels (different brand).  Tried these once before, almost on a whim (other than reading the reviews), but have been very satisfied with this purchase.  I would recommend that anyone who likes white and soft, absorbent cloth buy this  bathroom towel sets: the towels, hand towels and washcloths.  Love 'em!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2015
Author: Steven B
Title: Cheap & Better Than What Most Stores Offer
Body: Bought a set of these towels based on the reviews after wasting too much on towels from Target that were "quality" just to have them shed and fall apart.  Used the first set of bath towels for a few weeks before deciding to order another pack.  I don't think we have used the smaller hand towels that come with it.  I would have prefered to buy just the bath towel sizes and skip the little ones but what are you gonna do.

Author: Linda H.
Title: Five Stars

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2017

Title: I bought these for my vacation rental and was disappointed when I received them
Body: I bought these for my vacation rental and was disappointed when I received them.  I can go to Kmart and find towels that are far better than these.  They are not real soft and after I washed them I could see where they were starting to unravel. The reason I am giving them 3 stars is because it is almost impossible to get 2 sets of towels for the $21.99 that I paid for them so the value is very good but the quality is just not there.

Title: Great towels for the money
Body: Very nice!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2016
Author: Lindsay
Title: Wash them alone!
Body: The biggest tip I can give you about these particular towels is that they bleed so when you wash these towels for the first time make sure that you wash them by themselves. Also wash them before using them of course. They will leave fuzzies on your body if you do not wash them before you first use them.My husband and I got a red and a blue set and they both bled out, but still held their color and do not bleed anymore after that first wash. I have to admit these are some of the softest towels I have owned. I will be buying more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2015
Author: Don'tDrinkandPrime
Title: Wow! Soft. Heavy. Large.
Body: These towels surpassed my expectations x100. They are so incredibly soft. At this price, I was shocked at how large they are and how well made. I bought the purple/plum color and will say it is not "bold." If anything, I would say the color is a bit muted but they are still beautiful and fabulous in every other way. The color is definitely not something that would prevent me from purchasing these in the future. Some family members will probably be getting them for the holidays.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2019
Author: Darlene R
Title: Very Effective and Soft
Body: Nice, thirsty towels that is soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2013
Author: Ms. Jo
Title: Very Impressed
Body: At first I was going to cancel/return my order for this item. It arrived the next day, fully intact so I opened it and examined the towels. They were excellent quality, and weight - a good heavy cotton fiber as advertised, so I decided to keep them and order more in other color sets. When I washed them up and added fabric softener, they were an excellent choice and purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2018
Author: Chris Beres
Title: Four Stars
Body: Really nice quality for a treasonable price.  Wash well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2013
Author: DJ Ollie
Title: Excellent Buy
Body: I was expecting some thin, cheap walmart-type towels for the price of this set.  But I was extremely surprised by the quality of these towels.  They are good quality, very soft, heavier than I expected.  The dark gray look great.  There were some hanging threads upon unpackaging and after the pre-wash, so they aren't "premium" quality. But they are a solid mid-quality set of towels for a great price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2018

Title: Good purchase!
Body: Great towels. As expected.

Author: CHarding
Title: Rich Color and very soft!
Body: This is a GREAT buy for the set:)  Color is a very rich and the towels are nice and soft.  I'm a little concerned about quality over time so I'll return within a couple of weeks if I experience issues as other poster's have stated.  I resisted the urge to purchase another set, but if they do hold up well I'll be back:)  I washed them immediately and they seem fine right now.

Body: Beautiful set! High quality, thick, and lush! Perfect for my guest bath.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2017
Author: Shervin
Title: Falls Apart | Colors Fade
Body: While I am yet to find a brand that lasts beyond a few washing cycles and minimal wear and tear and still look great, this set from Amazon turned out to fail a year or so after purchase. Some which haven't been used have markedly darker colors and the one or two that were used sparingly and washed may be 4-5 times have significantly faded in color. Strings have come loose from all over the used towels (see photos). I use them now to dry my parrots after shower.  Not long lasting if that is what you were after.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Color not as pictured

Title: It's worth it
Body: In love with the size of the towels .

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2014
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Nice, plush and good size
Body: Nice, plush and good size. But, DANG, did these things shed the first time I washed them! I have NEVER had anything that shed that much fiber on the first wash and dry. :( I really hope this isn't a sign of things to come. The set is nice and its plusher than my current sets, but if they keep shedding like this I don't know what I'll have left after a couple dozen washes.Guess we'll just wait and see what happens.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2014
Author: Kenneth L. Kendrick
Title: This towel set was an exceptional value for the price ...
Body: This towel set was an exceptional value for the price. We will be buying more. The weight is exceptional as well as the drying factor.Update, We bought these because they were advertised to be 56", but they measure only 52" we were somewhat disappointed but they are still good towels. We have had no snagging as others have reported. Remember there has to be something in a machine for a towel to snag on.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2014
Author: Francie La Croix
Title: Poor Quality
Body: These towels look lovely and perfect until you wash them.  I ordered 3 sets, so a total of six bath towels, hand towels, washcloths.2 out of the six bath towels came unsewn on one edge and is frayed.  One hand towel and two washcloths also frayed.  I will not buy this brand again.Also, wash these separately the first 3-4 times because the water is cranberry color, even on cold wash with double rinses each time.  The amount of lint in the dryer after drying did not stay in the lint collector, and was all over the inside of the dryer each of the first 3 washes.  Crazy.

Author: Karen Shepherd
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love it

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2017
Author: Leah
Title: These are great!
Body: This is the 3rd set I have bought of these towels. They are great! I have never had any problems with holes or snags or loose strings. They stand up through my many washings on hot with bleach (I have the white sets). They do lose a little of the fluffy factor after a handful of loads but they never get uncomfortable. They are still soft just not as fluffy. I have tried a few other sets and ended up throwing them away. These are the towels for my house!!!  If only they made these washcloths in a separate set to buy extras... 😜

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2014
Author: Melissa
Title: Wet Dog
Body: Were these towels mislabeled??? They should have read, "FROM THE NON ABSORBANT COLLECTION"These towels are awful. Even after the third washing, fibers are still coming off. Plus, you look like you have a beard on your face after wiping with the hand towel. These towels are non absorbent. In fact, we were thinking of ordering more just to make rain coats. These towels repel the water instead of soaking it up. If you're looking for extra floating fibers to invade your home and any open orifice within a 2 mile radius and/or walking around like a wet dog, these towels are for you!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great quality!

Body: Se miran bien sólo las quería para decorar so la calidad esta bien

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2014
Author: Sigma
Title: quality issues
Body: The towels look good, the seem soft, but they shed A LOT. If you buy these be prepared to wash them 7-8 times and accept there is still going to be loose cotton on you after you dry off from the shower. I would not recommend these. I plan to replace them in the next month. I would return them but after having washed them so many times I probably cannot.I expected better from Amazon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2013
Author: Kathleen Berry
Title: Good, Sturdy Towel
Body: I got these because I really, really like every Pinzon product I have bought (with exception being the bat mats). They work just fine as towels. They aren't exceptionally soft, but they have a generous thickness. I haven't noticed any unraveling or pilling and I wash my towels once a week. Overall, I think they are an adequate, sturdy product, but I wouldn't recommend if you're looking for that extra bit of luxury.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2019

Body: Love them! I have a hard to please husband when it comes to bath towels and he loves them!

Author: Eric C
Title: A Little Lightweight
Body: I'll admit as an American gram versus ounces is still a bit of a mystery.  When I saw this product advertised as "725 Gram" it sounded like this would be a heavy substantial cotton towel.  I should of known that such a deal at the low price was just a dream.  I've used it once and waiting to see what's left after its first washing and drying.  But frankly, if I had picked it up at a store and felt the cloth and the heft of the product, I would not have bought it.

They all frayed around the edges, seams all pulled and there were what looked like snags all through these towels. I washed them by themselves so there couldn't have been anything in the load that did this to them. This was a COMPLETE waste of money, I bought nothing but aggravation.

Author: waddy
Title: towels as great as their sheets
Body: got this towel set and immediately washed them and they feel wonderful. purchased some Superior towels last year from amazon  and they were a real disappointment. towels had little lint ticks or ugly picks all over.  never used them except for cleaning floors in my garage.  these Pinzon towels are as fine as the sheets I buy from Pinzon.  this company makes quality goods.  5 star recommendation

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2018
Author: Tijana J.
Title: Pulls all over
Body: Not even a few months after having these they don’t look good. Have pulls all over them and they look awful and now trying to find new ones and having to spend more money

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2014
Author: Andrew G.
Title: Red fuzzies EVERYWHERE
Body: I have NEVER written a review positive or negative and have spent well over $1000 on amazon, over 200 items. I have never felt the need to until this point, the items have come as advertised. However, as the subject of my post says, these towels made me so angry that I had to write something.I have now owned these for over 2 months. I have washed and dried them upwards of ten times. The last time I dried them was the first time the lint in the dryer was anything but dark red. They had to be washed alone each time, they would leave red fuzzies on anything you washed or dried them with.I just started using this towel, for a couple days it looked like the fuzz had gone away. One week later and my white bathroom  very obviously has blood red fuzzies everywhere.I tried to like them, but the feel and the fuzzies were just not at all what I expected.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Four Stars
Body: Good quality!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2018
Author: KB115
Title: Four Stars
Body: Color a little off from what I was looking for but very soft

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2015
Author: Long Time Customer
Title: Only Partially Happy With These
Body: As always, I washed the towels before using.  That wash did get most of the fluff lint out of the towels. They seemed nice and thick and absorbent.  But I also found one edge of the hand towel had started to unravel.  I had ordered these towels before and this is the first set of these towels that had any defect so I am not totally unsatisfied...just disappointed that one of my new towels has a defect already.  I will see how they wear as time goes on.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2014
Author: Jazzy
Title: Ideal price, but not your ideal quality.
Body: I would give this towel set 4-5 stars for absorbency, but regardless the number of times I have placed in the washing machine they are still linty and shedding.  After I shower, I find cotton fibers on my face and skin.  It is less linty now, but still, when applying lotions on after washing, I roll the fibers off my skin.  When I first got these, even after the pre-use wash, the lint clogged my drain.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2016
Author: Christine
Title: Did not receive two hand towels...only one
Body: I have ordered these towels before and find them to be excellent.  However I only gave three stars as one of the hand towels was missing.  Beside to count your delivered towels and make sure you get them all.  I did not do this and washed first and realized I was missing the second hand towel when I folded them.  I would have returned them had I not already washed and removed the tag first.  They are still great towels and the price is very  fair for the quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2016
Author: Deplorable Patriot
Title: Satisfied Customer
Body: We are impressed, took that deep breath and ordered two sets, some reviews are not very favorable. We have been using them daily for a month now, been washed a couple times and there has been no coming apart or drifts of lint, they have a very soft feel and dries nicely, way to go on the quality of these towels at an amazing price. Nicer and larger than high end linens I've used in the past. I definitely recommend these towels, btw the grey and moss look great together.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2015
Author: Tim in Seattle
Title: Superior quality and an awesome deal.
Body: Usually saving on towels means the quality is poor, they fade in the wash or are about the size of two hand towels sewn together. These are made from the best cotton on the planet and if you check the dimensions you'll note the size is slightly larger than the big pricey towels you'd find at the store. These look amazing on display or feel very comfortable if want to use them as intended. Don't feel guilty about saving money :) sometimes you can have nice things and get a bargain.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2015
Author: Steven B.
Title: Good quality towels
Body: Good quality towels. Wife talked me into spending a little more than the "Walmart" ones, and we're happy with them.That is, until we cleaned the bathroom, and forgot bleach was on the towel rack, and hung one of these on it.Now it has a sweet white line across the middle... : \Obviously not the fault of the towel, so 5 stars!Very soft, no runs in them after 2 months of use.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2013
Author: J. Paine
Title: Great color (exactly as pictured) and very soft and absorbent (after a couple washes)
Body: This is a great set of towels.  They arrived packaged well and they are exactly the same color as what I had expected given the online photos.  Not only that, but they are SUPER soft and after a few washes they are very absorbent.  They are nicely weighted to feel like luxury towels but not so heavy that they are cumbersome.I definitely recommend these!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2016
Author: Stephen Brinson
Title: Best towel set ever.
Body: These are the best towels ever. I purchased 32 sets to use at a vacation rental house. They produce a tremendous amount of lent the first few washings. I used one set as a test for about 4 weeks prior to my bulk purchase. We washed the set every day for that time period. They held up great. NO lent after the second wash. They are amazingly soft and plush. I want to replace the towels in my home with these.I will definitely purchase more of these.

Author: Neal A. Strittholt
Title: Poor quality
Body: Very poor quality. More like burlap.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2014
Author: Mary Chilla
Title: These towels are Great!
Body: I bought four sets of these towels in different colors at a ridiculously low price for our new home. I thought I would just use them for show and not plan on them being very utilitarian, well I was so wrong! These are great towels, very large, soft and absorbent. They are well made, seams sewn and finished properly. I have laundered two of the sets and they come out soft and fluffy with no apparent shrinkage.

Author: laniegogo
Title: Poor quality.
Body: I put them in to wash before use and my wash machine was filled with lint when they were done. The dryer took even more lint and fibers from the towels, I had to clean the lint trap twice during that cycle, they looked thin and old before I even used them! The kicker is...they aren't even absorbent! I'd rather have 1 good bath towel than a whole set of these. Such a bummer. ZERO STARS! I had to give 1 star to even review these.

Author: BettyGee
Title: Large and Thirsty
Body: These towels are a good size, the color is very attractive and they are a good buy.  The only thing that is annoying is that they pill very badly.  For the first few uses you will find red fuzz on your skin and they definitely should be washed alone in the beginning unless you want red fuzz on everything.  Even with that annoyance they are a good product and I would definitely buy them again.

Title: Thick and soft

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2014
Author: DM
Title: Low Quality
Body: I bought a few of these sets. First wash, and several of the towels were falling apart. Two were so bad that it was unusable as a towel, it was mangled. Long story short, half of the towels survived over the next few weeks, the rest fell apart, and I bought 4 sets. These towels are not lush or soft, very "average" softness. If it's Egyptian cotton, it's scrap cotton, not the high quality kind you'd expect. I would never purchase these again, to be honest I don't think I'd use them even if they were free. Do yourself a favor, and spend a little more for a better set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2014
Author: Kindle Customer J. Staley
Title: Towels are of very good size.
Body: I ordered two sets of these towels, one in cream and the other in cranberry.  The darker set is not as bright as I would have liked.These towels are thicker and larger than most. They are absorbent towels, so I am able to dry off quickly.  The only complaint that I have is that one washcloth has started to unravel a little where the side seams are sewn.  For the price these towels were a good buy.

Body: Towels are very thick and plush.  Well worth their value.  Ordering another set.  Better than most sets purchased in stores.

Body: I'm disappointed in the color but the towels seem nice and soft

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2015
Author: CS
Title: I've never gotten good or bad feedback from the recipients but I was ...
Body: I bought one set of these because I've bought them a few times as gifts.  I've never gotten good or bad feedback from the recipients but I was looking for a new set for my home and liked the design and color choices.  I was worried because I saw a lot of bad reviews about them falling apart in the wash.I selected the moss color.  When I got them in the color was just too dark for what I was looking for and they felt scratchy so they sat unopened for the longest time.  I ended up going to a local store and getting what I wanted in a thicker but cheaper towel.  When I brought the new ones home from the store I put them in their first wash with a cup of white vinegar and nothing else and then dried them without any softener.  I was in love and very happy with my towels until...  I decided to just go ahead and wash the Pinzon set in white vinegar and no softener.I begrudgingly have to admit I was wrong and now my husband has claimed them for himself.  The ones I bought locally are thick and soft but they more push the water around your skin than absorb.  I don't mind because I like large and soft towels especially to wrap my hair in.  The Pinzon towels came out great from that first wash and softened up well.  The difference is that they are a brisk towel that dry your hair and body fast.  Very no nonsense which appeals to my husband.I've held off reviewing because I wanted to have a ton of washes in to be able to securely review the quality.  I originally purchased the towel on right around Christmas, it's now February 25th.  There's not been one busted seam, no picks, no holes, no tears and no fading so far.  I typically cram as many clothes into my washer as it can hold which to no end annoys my husband who is more of the type to fill it 3/4s of the way full.  We have front loaders, not sure if that would make a difference.  I will come back in a few months if anything changes but so far so good.  Hope it keeps that way.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2018

Title: Four Stars
Body: Nice towels but color bleeds so wash them several times when first received.

Author: diamondgirl85
Title: Nice towel
Body: We are in the hospitality business and go through a lot of towels. I used to buy them from JC Penney because hospitality towels are just pretty darn stiff. This time we chose the Pinzon towels because of the price and predicted quality. So far we are very pleased. The towels are nice and heavy, seem to be made well and the size is perfect. They do seem like they will last through our many washings.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2017
Author: Cole
Title: Best-in-class towel. Will they last forever? Survey says no. But are they absorbent, soft, durable towels? Yes.
Body: The title says it all. After about a year and three months of use, the seams of a few of these towels frail out (20-30%) but they've gone through the wash over 120 times -- and while they've been in service, these guys have been soft, quick-absorbing little monsters and I love 'em. They can't be beat by other stores regardless due to the price and the fact that two sets of these covers most household needs.**UPDATE 1/23/18** Most are still in great condition, one has start to shrink where the ribbon is at but they're still soft, durable, and effective at drying over two years later.

When I want new towels...I come online and buy these. No joke. These are the best towels I've EVER bought. And they're the only ones I buy now. Perfect product. And again...Egyptian Cotton! :)

Body: I don't understand how some cotton can be very very absorbent and other cotton can be like waxed paper trying to mop up water.  These are more like wax paper (not really that bad but not super absorbent)!  Also, the washcloths have a wide trim border on each end not leaving a lot of soft space.  They were inexpensive so I guess they are worth it.  The color is nice.  I finally gave these towels away....they were that bad!

I do not recommend these towels because I think they are poor quality and you can find better towels for a better price that last much longer. These towels are not well made.

Title: Decent with defects
Body: For the price, the cloth is soft and absorbent however there were numerous flaws in the fabric and seams.  Given the price, my expectations were fairly low, but I would certainly not put these towels out for guests.  The towels definitely had a manufacturing smell which went away after the first washing.  On the whole, an ok purchase, but I would have expected better quality from Pinzon.

Not sure I will buy them again, but I do like how soft they are.  I will repair the seams using the new Singer Machine I just bought.

Title: I think these towels are great! To me they are medium or better for ...
Body: I think these towels are great!  To me they are medium or better for thickness.  They had a few places where I had to cut a string off but nothing bothersome to me. They absorb just as well as my other towels of different thicknesses. I try to use little to no fabric softener on the towels and washcloths so they will absorb better. The color is more to the side of medium to medium dark grey.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2014
Author: Disney Fan
Title: These are the best towels and value
Body: These are the best towels and value!!  Once I got them and washed them I ordered another set.  I will order more in the future in different colors when needed.  They are very thick and absorbent!  I will say they left a LOT of lint in the dryer and some in the washer when I washed them the first time, but normal now.  I don't see any reason they won't hold up.  I'm very glad with the purchase!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2016
Author: 54yrold female
Title: I absolutely love these towels
Body: I absolutely love these towels.  I have bought many from other stores such as Walmart, Target, Sears, Macy's, etc and always have a problem with the towels bunching up in the decorated stitched section of the towel.  I own multiple of these, 2 dark purple, 1 tan, and this grey set was just purchsed to send my son off to college.  Even if you price towels at Big Lots or Ross/Marshalls, this is still a better deal for two sets of towels than I have seen anywhere else and I know the quality is good.

Author: LetTheGoodTimesRoll
Title: Fantastic Quality and Beautiful Towel Set
Body: These are a fantastic bargain!  They are beautiful and quality material, thick, lush and soft.  I found them to be oversized, not the typical sized smaller pieces.  I bought 2 sets in different coordinating colors for my guest bathroom, and was I ever surprised at the quality and beauty of these towel sets. They look much more costly than what I expected for the quality.  Another a great buy from smile.amazon.com!

Author: wrenhunter
Title: Good value for money
Body: You know the racks of towels at your local homeware store -- the first ones are cheap and feel like it, the second are pretty good, the third are getting fancy, and the fourth cost too much. These are the second ones. Not too thin, not very thick, absorbent enough -- perfect for guests, or you, if you're not too picky. I'm not, and I like them.They do shed a bit, even after washing in vinegar. But it gets better from the second washing.

We have at least 20 sets and only have had problems with people staining them. The towels are white and still look good and feel soft and the staining is not a fault of the product.

Author: David
Title: So soft you want to take a nap wrapped in them.
Body: Absolutely what I was looking for.  These towels are wonderfully made, feel super soft to the touch and most importantly were very absorbent.  We have a lot of pets in our house and end up going through towels quickly, when we wear them out they go to cleaning up the dogs so I needed some new ones for the humans. :)  These ones do not seem like they will wear out anytime soon and they are very durable.  Have already ran them through the wash a few times with no real signs of them fading or getting any less soft.  I love the way they feel and I honestly could have used them as a blanket and took a nap because of how nice they were.For the price, you CAN NOT beat these! I ordered the grey color and love it, the other colors are very nice and I will definitely be picking up more of these towels.

Author: Contented buyer
Title: Great Towel Set
Body: For my needs this towel set was perfect -- neither too bulky nor too thin (light). I was also pleased that only the first washing produced a lot of lint. After that, it seemed OK, not a problem. I also like the color -- seem so fresh and clean every time use them. Oh, and a big factor: the price is super reasonable for the good quality product! I'm single so the set is fine. Perhaps for a family another style would be more beneficial.

Author: Suzannah
Title: Beautiful color!
Body: These are a great color match for our 1940's red tile in our bathroom.  They match almost perfectly and gave my bathroom (along with new paint and shower curtain) a much need cheap makeover!  I gave it a 4 only because i had to wash them several times before they stopped shedding red lint balls everywhere.  That being said they have held their color well and are super soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2018
Author: Francis Mecredy
Title: Five Stars
Body: Perfect

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2013
Author: B Gator
Title: Excellent
Body: This was a great deal and the product is amazing. The towels are all very soft and have held up very well unlike some other towels I have used in the past. I wasn't expecting to look at the tag and see that these were made in Pakistan but apparently they make good towels over there. All in all this is a great product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2016
Author: Leah
Title: Good price & product
Body: Great for the price. These have held up as expected and are similar to the brand of towels that you would find at Target; a nice entry level quality for a college student/recent grad. I have used and washed these weekly for nearly a year now (wash & dry hot) and they have not unraveled at all, now do they show much sign of wear. They are thinner and not as absorbent as big, fluffy hotel/Egyptian cotton/expensive towels, but they are a great value set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2018
Author: charlotte
Title: I absolutely loved these when I first bought them
Body: I absolutely loved these when I first bought them.  However now 3 of 8 are coming unsewed at the end.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2018
Author: Heather Rawa
Title: They are really soft and wash great.
Body: I have purchased these towels in white, navy and grey.  They are really soft and wash great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2015
Author: Adam
Title: You get what you pay for
Body: Yet again I learn the lesson that you get what you pay for. I purchased the cocoa brown towels a week ago through prime. Shipping was rapid. The towels looked great. I washed them straight away and put them in our dryer. Some snags formed in the towels, and there was so much lint that it filled up the lint catcher (which was clean to start) and over flowed with lint. I measured an inch thick of lint! The tiwels still look mostly okay, but you can tell they are of low quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2020
Author: KK
Title: Great buy
Body: Color is beautiful.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2013
Author: CJ
Title: Soft and absorbent
Body: These are an excellent value.  They are very good quality, soft and absorbent.  I've used and washed them several times already and they are holding up perfectly.  And they go great with the shower curtain I bought from Amazon too!Unfortunately I have to edit my review.... these are fraying along the edge of the hand towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2020
Author: Simone
Title: Great value for money
Body: Money well spent!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2020
Author: Giselle
Title: Suelta pelusas
Body: Buenísimas lo que suelta pelusa

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2013
Author: Num1LSUFan
Title: Lint everywhere
Body: I knew the great price and nice colors were too good to be true.  I washed the towel set before using them and when I took them out of the washer, the entire tub was filled with wet lint.  After putting them in the dryer for 20 minutes, I checked and the lint filter was completely full.  I checked the lint filter two more times during the dry cycle and had to empty a full lint filter both times.  After drying them, I noticed the towels had loose strings hanging off them and seams were beginning to come apart on one of the towels.  That old saying "You get what you pay for" has never been more true.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2017
Author: florrie
Title: Used to love but quality has gone downhill
Body: I've bought these towel sets for several years.  With the last few sets, I've seen more fraying than usual.  The washcloth from this last set - although appearing well made and as soft as others I've purchased in the past - had the seam come completely apart down one side after just 2 washings!  It's a shame but I can't really give these towels more than 2 stars and will look for a new brand.  The prices are great, however, the quality just isn't there anymore.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2015
Author: MRC
Title: Some loose threads, overall great towels
Body: I was looking at similarly-priced towels at IKEA, and found them coarse and uncomfortable. These towels are soft, comfortable, and perfect for my intended use (occasional guest towels).I have noticed there are a few loose strings already, which is the reason for the -1 star. But overall, the quality seems good for the price, and they're much softer than other towels I've seen around the same price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2013
Author: amiralooli
Title: Great Towels from Pinzon
Body: These are true to the colors as they appear online.These towels wash well, despite other reviews on Amazon stating otherwise! Very plush,soft and absorbent!UPDATE: Five months later, these are STILL great! Can't BELIEVE how reasonably priced they are! I know have three sets in three different colors, and they are all threee still beautiful.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2015
Author: Mermaid Girl
Title: Affordable, Soft and Nice!
Body: These towels are super soft with a luxury feel. They did shed a lot of lint the first time washing but that does get better. I purchased the grey and cream and both keep their color nicely in the wash. The washcloths are very large which I thought would be overwhelming at first but I have found they work quite nice and are so soft for face or body. I love these towels and will likely purchase more!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2019
Author: Mrs Angela Edwards
Title: You MUST wash them a couple of times before use!
Body: Great colour and good quality!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2018
Author: Ruth C.
Title: Four Stars
Body: Beautiful color great for the price

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2015
Author: lrskfalls
Title: Great Value
Body: Looked at many stores during my travels and finally thought to look on Amazon.  Much better quality than many of the much higher priced towels I saw in department stores.  Used and washed for a couple of months now and they seem to be well constructed and likely to last.  If you are like me, this is definitely the way to go for rarely used guest bathrooms as you get the whole set for two for a great price!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2019
Author: Pamela Douglas
Title: Beautiful colors
Body: Love the quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2017
Author: hit at the party
Title: Five Stars
Body: Very nice!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2017
Author: Allecia
Title: These towels are amazing and wonderfully soft
Body: These towels are amazing and wonderfully soft. One of the hand towels showed up with a defect on one of the long seams about 3 inches in length and it has never gotten worse and I have had these since 2013. They are typically washed in sanitize with other things in the washing machine and these are still like the day I bought them. Even the minor defect hasn't ever gotten worse. Which is why I am giving 5 stars, even with the defect. They are wonderfully thick and luxurious and stand up to the test of time as well. I highly recommend. VERY good value and lovely towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2014
Author: David D.
Title: Nice towels, but don't hold up well
Body: I just got these today, the colors are nice, felt really soft and plush. So I decided to put them in the wash to clean them up before use and all buy 1 frayed. I am very shocked to see that such nice towels not hold up after one (1) wash!I can't say that I would recommend these to anyone, well, as long as you use the gentlest wash cycle you should be fine! lol

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2018
Author: Elizabeth Mcnair
Title: Softness
Body: Was a gift and they loved it

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2013
Author: A.M.styles
Title: two thumbs up
Body: I have had theses towels for awhile now.  I would suggest washing them alone during the first two washings because of shedding.  Overall I am pleased with the quality and size. They are large fluffy and durable. The only reason i gave four stars instead of five is because they could be a little more absorbent. Other than that they're great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2017
Author: M. Spisak
Title: Do use with acne products.
Body: I had 3 sets of these towels and they have worn very well. You do have to wash and dry them about 4 times at first to get rid of the shedding. The reason I'm  giving it three stars is the fact that it is not very color fast. If you get any type of bleach or peroxide product near it, it takes the color right out. My step-son moved in with us and uses a acne product with benzyl peroxide in it. Even after rinsing off well, it still bleaches the towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2014
Author: Stu
Title: Feels great, but...
Body: I was super excited to open the package when I first got these towels.  They're a nice crisp white and have fantastic feel to them.  They're super absorbent for how thick they are (not very) and the price was definitely right.  I washed the lot right away so I could put them to the test and poof.  Two of the towels now look like rags with the stitching all along the sides completely unravelled.  Now they're my favorite gym towels.  Do yourself a favor and spend the extra couple of dollars on something that'll last if you plan to use them more than once.  Pinzon earned stars with the quality of the material itself and super low price.  I wouldn't buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2013
Author: IheartShopping
Title: So soft! I love it and fast delivery!
Body: My husband got me this towel set after I mentioned the fact that we needed to renew all of our towels into new ones and I really like them. I have not had any bad experience with them as of yet. I actually like how soft they are against my skin when drying. I would recommend this to anyone.Great price, soft and fast delivery!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2020
Author: J. Kelly Salvadore
Title: Garbage- a waste of money.
Body: 1 wash and they started unraveling.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2013
Author: Android
Title: Average towel, not paticularly awesome
Body: Eh, I had high expectations based on the description and reviews here.  I suppose its a an example of "you get what you pay for" as they are not a nice as a plush towel that I expected. They are a bit thin but made well. material seems to be of average quality so far. But I don't think I will get any more, I am looking for something more plush.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2018
Author: Sharell carr
Title: Nice
Body: Nice material used them to decorate my daughter bathroom

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2014
Author: adobecasa
Title: Not too absorbent?
Body: These towels are pretty, but not as absorbent as they should be, if they are really 100% cotton.  Are they really a blend?  I washed them without using a dryer sheet, so they should not feel like they are not soaking up the water.  I feel sorry for people who live in more humid climates trying to use these towels.  Thankfully, we are in the desert Southwest!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2014
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Awesome price for quality towels
Body: I've waited to post a review so I can provide accurate information. After owning these for several months they have been used and washed many times. They are still very soft and absorbent. They did shed quite a bit during the initial wash but haven't noticed anything excessive since. This is a really great deal for a set of high quality towels. I'd purchase again in a heartbeat

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2018
Author: Matty
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love the towels. They are very  soft and absorbent

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2016
Author: B Franco
Title: 3 Stars at best
Body: EDIT: I've changed my review to reflect my overall rating after using these towels for six or more months. I've ordered four sets of these towels to stock my linen closet. Out of those four sets 75% of them the hems have come undone leaving frayed edges of towels. I'm shocked and appalled by the lack of quality stitching in these towels.great size bath towels, hand towels are a little large but a great set soft and absorbent

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2013
Author: S. Eckert
Title: You Get What You Pay For
Body: After having purchased the Pinzon Flannel sheets and being totally satisfied, I was thrilled to find towels made under the Pinzon label.  SHAME, SHAME, SHAME....you've lost ALL credibility in my eyes.  I followed the instructions and washed before using, thinking they would soften up some...well they did AND the seams frayed AND the threads pulled.  I'm sure they can't be returned after they've been washed plus it would cost me return shipping.  Maybe I can use them a few time to dry the dogs before they totally fall apart.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2014
Author: Beowolf Jones
Title: For Lint Lovers Only.
Body: Buy these towels if you like lint ! I washed them with a load of cloths and had to use a brush to get the lint off of my blue shirt and shorts. Lint, Lint, Lint. A high quality towel shouldn't shed as much as these do even in the first wash. The lint filter was packed ! I'll get my towels form JC Penny's from now on at least they don't have to be washed separately.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2014
Author: Cameron
Title: Okay, average low cost towels.
Body: Well, you do get what you pay for, and the price is quite low for this set of towels.  They do shed a lot of lint the first few times they're laundered, and there are some pulled threads here and there.  The sizing is generous, but they are on the thin side.  They are made in Pakistan.  Satisfactory purchase for everyday use , but I won't buy more.  I prefer a thicker towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2014
Author: LOVE IT OR LEAVE IT
Title: Hard to beat the price for what you get
Body: meets or exceeds my expectations, These are nice towels and for the money hard to beat. People can say what they may but what kind of quality are they looking for when you spend $20 to 30 dollars now days. Be realistic in consideration of price. I couldn't give them a perfect score because they do thin out after a few washes and shed material. I'm still happy with them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Quality
Body: Good quality

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2018
Author: CRISTINA STAFFORD
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great towels, great buy.  Soft and very absorbant.  Planning to order more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2015
Author: donnaleeii
Title: Great Bargain & Quality
Body: Department store quality towels and color is true to photo. Just be sure to wash on gentle cycle. The first time I washed them I didn't notice my washer was set on normal cycle and got some snags which I tediously removed by snipping with scissors. Moss shade matches Garland rugs in dark fern really well. Great vlue for the price. I would buy these again and have already recommended them to friends and family.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2018
Author: Antares Products
Title: Five Stars
Body: Nice

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2015
Author: pitsy88
Title: SO Nice, was going to use these just for decorating ...
Body: SO Nice, was going to use these just for decorating in my new bathroom.  But they are so nice perfect weight, they dry you great.  They wash well.  I ordered extra sets for hanging up pretty and some we get to use.  Big bath towels, soft absorbent,  I got the grey my bathroom is in multi slate, blue grey rust, just beautiful towels.  LOVE THEM, AND THEY COME WRAPPED PRETTY. Shipped quick

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2013
Author: Sandy
Title: Amazing value
Body: These are amazing value for the quality.  Nice colors, good weight, long enough. My dream towel would be a little more plush, but it also would be a lot more money. These are a higher quality and weight than the average towel, and the price is amazing. We had to restock our entire linen closet, so they were perfect.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Soft and plush.
Body: Plush.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2015
Author: AMAZON CUSTOMER
Title: not a match
Body: very disappointed in this item.  I searched wamsutta towels & this item suggested the color was the same - it is NOT. It is absolutely NOT NAVY & does not match the WAMSUTTA towels - these are more ROYAL BLUE.  This is the first item I've ever ordered from Amazon that I have not been satisfied with - but it is not worth the hassle of returning to me - it was a gift - so I will just keep it & use it myself.  I have learned my lesson - its NOT always a deal  - just because its less expensive.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2015
Author: Ashley L.
Title: Great buy!!! I'll never buy another brand of towels.
Body: Color was exactly what I expected ( I ordered cream). I've had these for about 3 months now, and there's no pilling, fading, pulling, or bunching. Which is more than I can say for the towels I bought from Bed, Bath & Beyond, where I got one towel for the price of all six of these. There's a lot of lint during the first 2 washes, but after the 3rd wash, there's no more than usual.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2015
Author: Roy S. Oppenheimer
Title: Poor Quality. Won't Last Long.
Body: Purchased these towels because of the positive reviews. I am starting to think too many people give reviews before running these through the wash a few times. Threads are coming out and it's obviously not going to last. We have only had these towels for 3 weeks now. Bought 2 sets and rotate them so each set has gotten about 2 washes each. Please don't waist your money on these. They were a good price, but you get what you pay for.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2014
Author: Jodi
Title: NOT AS SOFT AS MY OTHER TOWELS
Body: The softness and texture of a towel are the utmost importance to me.  We ordered one set of these to try them out.  The towel didn't seem very think or plush and certainly was not soft.  I thought if we washed it, it would be better.  It improved a little and certainly is usable and ok, but not the type of towel that I love.  It's just Okay.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2019
Author: Anonymous
Title: Awesome towels!
Body: Great quality

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2014
Author: BH
Title: Excellent value for money
Body: Excellent value for money, better than many more expensive brand name products. I would definitely buy again when the time comes. Do not be put off by the price, they are heavy weight, excellent cotton, absorbant (once washed) and have not yet (3 or 4 washes and tumble dries)shown any signs of shrinkage along the seams or the detailling. VERY very good value.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2014
Author: shonda brown
Title: I love these pinzon towels
Body: I bought a set as a wedding present for my nephew. I was so impressed with the quality I purchased 2 sets for myself. They are so soft and plush the colors are beautiful no fading. I ended up purchasing a set for my daughter who's going off to college and plan on purchasing more. The price is excellent the quality is so far beyond any expectations.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2017
Author: CG
Title: Would not recommend.
Body: The washcloth fell apart after only 8 months. The towel is still ok. Would not recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2019
Author: griffin320
Title: Beautiful
Body: Rich color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2015
Author: Crazy Cat Lady
Title: Zit cream ruined
Body: These are AMAZINGLY fluffy towels and I was thrilled when I got them, but my face wash caused them to bleach out to a gross orange color. If no one in your family uses benzoyl peroxide ORDER THESE TOWELS! Otherwise stear clear, I'm totally bummed. I have towels from Walmart that aren't phased by zit cream, and now I'm doomed to use those while my hubby enjoys the awesome fluffiness.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2013
Author: CJB
Title: Problem with one washcloth
Body: I love this set of towels, and for the price I don't mind that one washcloth is not for public display due to a defect.  I also noted that at least one of the hand towels is shaped more like a trapezoid than a rectangle, but it's barely noticeable.  All are of a lovely thickness which gives one that "pampered feeling."

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2014
Author: Jason M
Title: Great value
Body: Great value!  Towels are good quality but nothing fancy.  If you're hoping to impress people with "luxury" linens, this is not the product for you.  Otoh if you want a plentiful supply of clean crisp white towels without breaking the bank, you've found it.  I like this product so much I've ordered it twice for myself, and once more as a gift.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2019

Title: Nice and Large
Body: Very large and soft

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Prison
Body: Fabric and color

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2016
Author: jonas190
Title: but they won't look nice for long
Body: These were cheap, that's a plus. Unfortunately they also shed SO MUCH LINT. And they have bare threads on the edges after only a couple washes. They work well, but they won't look nice for long, even drying on low as recommended. I missed that note the first time and it may have accelerated the problem, but the lint issue is on-going. I have to empty the filter midway through to dry these things properly.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2013
Author: James
Title: Pinzon towels
Body: The package arrived on time. The number of items ordered was correct, that was the end of the good rating. I pre-wash all towels, and clothing. I was shocked at how much lint (I guess you would call it) was left in my washer and my dryer. Several of the towels and washer cloths are already coming apart at the seams. Do not purchase!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2020
Author: Mimi bennett
Title: Nice towels
Body: Soft

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2013
Author: George Anderson
Title: Plush!
Body: I just love the thick, soft absorbency of these luxurious towels! To give you an idea of just how absorbent this product is I can swab the excess water from me with just the facecloth (and that's after using it and wringing it dry again by hand!) May be the 'store brand' but this particular store (Amazon) stands for quality!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2014
Author: jazmin mejia
Title: Big, but leave residue behind
Body: I really like this towels and I ordered in different colors. They are not too bulky and they dry fast. The size is really big and I like that. The only thing I don't like is that it leaves me with some kind of residue all over my skin that I notice when I apply lotion, I don't know if it will change with subsecuent washes. Also, some threads were loose after a couple of washes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2017
Author: tusuenee
Title: Four Stars
Body: Haven’t washed yet .. will update later

Author: Johnnie
Title: The towel quality is excellent! The body towel
Body: Paid $21.95 for the set and no shipping cost for me as a prime member of Amazon. Order the towel set this morning around 9am and recieved this set of towels and other items by 5pm. The towel quality is excellent! The body towel, had I purchased it at any department store would have cost aleast $8 to $10 dollars all by its self. The towels are soft and thick! Love it and what a bargin!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2018
Author: Kathleen Reich
Title: Excellent quality at a very reasonable price
Body: Beautiful fluffy towels!  Washed well and color stayed strong.  Amazing price for a quality product.

Title: Good quality
Body: I noticed a lot of mixed reviews on these before purchasing.  They work pretty well, but do not absorb as much water as I would have liked.  I've only washed them a handful of times, but it seems they get a little better with each wash.  The first two uses after washing it works great, but seems to go downhill after each use between washes.

They do shead everytime I have washed them and fill up the lint container on my dryer. They have been washed 3 times now so I hope this will not happen for much longer.

Author: Cait
Title: Good price, bad product.
Body: I couldn't pass up these towels for the price, and most of the reviews seemed positive. I figured a little shedding wasn't much to worry about; a few washes and it would be gone. WRONG! I've washed these towels four times, they continue to shed with dryer-clogging amounts lint. I attempted to use one despite the shedding, and found the remaining fuzz just clings to wet skin. They're awful. Two stars, because while they look great, they're not at all useful.

Author: Alex
Title: Trash!

Author: Ed H.
Title: Nice towels
Body: Worth the money. Nicely made.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2013
Author: hgautier
Title: Great for the price
Body: These towels are not plush, they're on the thinner side, but that's what I prefer.  They're soft and look nice and a great size for taller people like my husband and I.  They do fill your lint trap in the dryer the first couple of times you wash them, so be prepared, but minimal fuzz on me so eh....  Couple spots where the threads have not been finished so they come undone, but doesn't affect the job they do.  They haven't fallen apart, just minor cosmetic issues.  For a six piece towel set for the price I'm very happy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2015
Author: Resheart
Title: The color on these towels rub off. The towels ...
Body: The color on these towels rub off . The towels are big and soft but I noticed after a month all of them had red spots . The rags , the hand towel and normal towel all have faded red spots now . They are placed separately and have not had contact with anything that would make faded red color appear . This doesn't effect their effectiveness but makes me worry about the what was used to dye these towels .

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2019
Author: arrowland
Title: Luxury towel feel
Body: Soft and absorbent

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2015
Author: LexNoir
Title: They shed like mad even after numerous washes and dries
Body: They shed like mad even after numerous washes and dries.  Never fails I get out of the shower, wipe may face, look in the mirror and their's lint all over my face, eye lashes, and eyebrows.  I ordered another set that weren't "Egyptian" same brand garbage!  Same lint issue.  And honestly the other ones I ordered look and feel just like these so called Egyptian cotton towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2018
Author: Matt
Title: great value
Body: Decent towels, great value

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2014
Author: Eric Jordan
Title: Surprisingly not good quality regardless of great reviews.
Body: I really felt good about this purchase based on the reviews.  These towels just about fell apart when I first washed them.  Plus it was a light wash with little detergent since they were brand new.  They had endless loose threads throughout towels, especially the corners.  The dryer lint trap had about a pound of cotton (Egyptian) which leads me to believe that these towels will likely completely disintegrate after a few more washes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2014
Author: Christopher A. Moreno
Title: Looks Great
Body: Got these on a lightening deal, so not sure what the regular price is, but it prob still worth it. We got them and they are very soft and absorbent. As expected the first wash found tons of fuzzies, but I expect that with any towel set. The color held up nicely and the set is great with the hand towels, body towels, and face cloth.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2015
Author: Toastayy
Title: Wouldn't recommend
Body: These are okay for the price, but definitely not Egyptian cotton worthy. My biggest gripe is that, especially with the navy color, the towels shed like there's no tomorrow. You can see navy particles all over the edge of the tub, the toilet and the faucet. I'm not used to towels shedding like this, so this was definitely worrisome, and annoying. I wouldn't buy these particular towels again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2018
Author: Chris Rush
Title: Not worth it
Body: These towels are your basic Wal-Mart towel, not soft, tough, stiff see not what I thought I was getting.

Again, very nice towels.

Body: What I like best about these towels is how soft and luxurious they are.  I chose these for the great price, but would order more for the softness.  They are true to the color in the picture.  They arrived within five days, had some shop threads on them, which you don't see on towels in stores, but of course I washed them off before using.  They laundered very nicely too.  If you want really soft, absorbent towels, chose Egyptian cotton.

Title: Poor quality towels
Body: Washed these towels brand-new prior to hanging them in the bathroom. The side of one washcloth frayed into a tangled mess and many loops in the terry cloth pulled out into strings. Bath towels are daily use household items; ought to be able to launder without having to immediately mend. Would not purchase these again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2017

Body: These towels are so soft and washed up great! I purchased the gray and it's a nice, neutral color. I highly recommend these!

Body: This is the second set of towels of this brand we got.After several months of abuse, they have held up well - an occasional loose thread.  Soaks up water well and still soft after tons of wear and washing.  Avoid fabric softner.A great inexpense towel set.  Highly recommend them.

Oh my God I am so glad I did, these towels just blossomed into the lovely plush towels and washclothes that I was expecting! Bravo Amazon! I want to buy more now!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2016
Author: JVR756
Title: Initially they were great, very soft
Body: These towels didn’t even last a year. Initially they were great, very soft, good size, etc. However, after about 10-12 months of light use, they are now thread worn in a number of areas. The edges are frayed beyond reason and they are essentially rags. I definitely expected more than a years’ worth of use out of them, and frankly, towels from the local *mart are better than this, and cheaper.

Title: ... was really fast and the towels look and feel nice.. here's the thing - I washed them ...
Body: Shipment was really fast and the towels look and feel nice.. here's the thing - I washed them before using, and the lint was unreal!  My lint filter filled twice, and the dryer drum had to be washed out before I could use it for anything else.  The fibers were everywhere!  We'll see what happens the first time a guest uses them - they are in my guest bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2020

Title: Nice towel set.
Body: It's good.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Very well made
Body: Love them very thick and comfortable

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2014
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Inferior quality compared to Pinzon 820 oz similar product
Body: Had previously purchased Pinzon towels through Amazon, but were 820 oz Egyptian Cotton fabric. They were and are really great! When these showed up, I ordered two sets, thinking they might be a little lighter in weight, but should still dry well. Nope, not so much. These towels do not absorb water worth a darn.  I have washed the towels several times thinking they might become more absorbing. Nope, not so much. If you want a towel with high absorption, these will not do the job. Spend a few dollars more and get the 820 oz. You'll be glad you did.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2015
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: These towels are a great deal
Body: These towels are great!  I replaced all of my towels with these.  The price is amazing for what you get.  I absolutely love these towels.  They are by no means the fancy ones that repel water.  Which I personally love.  They dry you off and wash up very well.  Where else can you get a set at this price?  If you are wondering if you should buy these, you should.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2014
Author: Jerry Ross
Title: Disappointed
Body: This towel set looks very nice on Amazon and the description made then sound as nice as they looked.  Once in hand they turn out not to be a plush as they appear and were described.  Also one towel began falling apart at the first washing.  Subsequent washings only made it worse.If you want to dry off with one towel; buy something else.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2015
Author: MizDee
Title: Love my towels.
Body: These towels are very good quality.  Don't be fooled by the price.  I was expecting just basic somewhat thin towels, but I was desperate.  I was happily surprised when I took these out of the plastic.  And unlike most thick, soft towels that I have used before these are actually absorbent and don't leave lint all over the place.  Oh, and the color is exactly as shown.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2018

Title: Five Stars

The color is a deep Navy Blue, glad I decide to see if this color was dark enough instead of getting the black set. Bargain at the price. Well worth the chance I took to get these. Now I know what to get for the other bathrooms. ABM.

Title: No lint!

These were great right out of the box. It;s a pretty color that was true to the pictures too. Plus and have held up so far (4-5 months?)

Author: Kindle Customer
Title: These towels are a deep beautiful cranberry red
Body: These towels are a deep beautiful cranberry red. It did run with the first wash, so we continue to wash them separately. Their absorption of water off my skin is different. It is fast, and somehow dryer than our old cotton towels. I love the feel of my skin when it is first dry.  Oh, and the towels have held their shape. That is very nice.

Body: At first i did like these towels, but after having to wash them i quickly realized that these are not very good. They look great and are soft (Not as soft as i imagined Egyptian cotton to be), but the fabric sheds horribly. Anything i try my hair i find cotton dust all over my hair and even on my body too. When shaking these towels it just lets loose, cotton sheds all over the place.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: they are pretty big I really like them
Body: Softness, Durability, they are pretty big I really like them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2017
Author: Snidely Whiplash
Title: Worse than expected :'(
Body: DEFINITELY you get what you pay for here. I expected their quality to be on par with a set of 5.00/each Walmart towels I own, but they're much worse actually. I've bought 3.00 towels from JC Penney that are better than these.  They're so thin I'm afraid to wash them, and definitely not soft; contemplating returning them and buying more Walmart towels. I will say the plum color is nice, and is represented nicely in the Amazon listing, so there's that.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2013
Author: David
Title: Worth the price
Body: While they are as listed and are very nice, I also purchased a different brand and these had so much lent in the dryer, about 1000 times as much as the other brand I am not sure how long (many washings) they will last.  If they did not have so much lent they would have been 5 stars too.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2013
Author: AllieBelle
Title: No way 725-gram terry!
Body: I have several sets of 800-gram towels, which I love. When I saw these, at less than half the price, I thought they just might do. However, when I opened the package, I knew immediately that they were much much thinner terry. To compare, I weighed one of the hand towels on my kitchen scale: 6 oz. I weighed one 800-gram hand towel of identical size: 10 oz. Now, 60% of 800 grams is not 725 grams, folks. Amazon is refunding my purchase price most amiably, but I cannot recommend these, except for the color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: They are soft
Body: I like the towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2015
Author: Bruce E. Elbertson
Title: I would suggest washing them several times before first use as they shed fibers like no towels I have ever used before
Body: The towels are very soft, but not very absorbent until washed at least 3 or 4 times. I would suggest washing them several times before first use as they shed fibers like no towels I have ever used before. I washed only once before first use and found them not absorbent and there was a visible layer of blue dust all over the bathroom from the towel loosing fibers. Now after several washes they are losing a bit of softness but gaining absorbance.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Perfect towel set
Body: Big and soft. Perfect color. Great buy for a great price.

Title: Great absorbent towels
Body: Great light weight towel set.  I hate the "full plush" towels most places sell.  They don't dry you off well.  These are made of great and absorbent cotton.  Love them so mooch I bought four more sets For the downstairs bathroom and will probably buy four for the upstairs.HIghly recommend

Title: Don't buy these.
Body: I ordered these towel a year ago and they still shed all over when using them and while the color is bright, they still bleed color when washing them. Super inexpensive but you need to wipe all the towel lint off of you after using them. They have begun to unravel at the edges and random buts of terry thread hang from the center of many of the towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2014
Author: BoatingGirl
Title: I want to love these towels
Body: I want to love these towels, but I'm unsure as of yet. I washed them 3 times to get all the lint out of them & see if they became soft. They became soft, but have some pulls here & there. Not a deal breaker at all. They are soft but still don't seem very absorbent. My skins still feels wet after drying off. They are perfect size too.

Author: aafeefy
Title: They had holes
Body: Okay, I'm not a big towel fanatic, and honestly I'm not the type of person that would know the difference between a 725 gram and a 600 gram just by looking at it. But the product had holes. I'm pretty sure no matter what the grams are, it shouldn't be coming like that. Colors fine. Towels s***.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2017
Author: SM
Title: Avoid these they fall apart after a few washings
Body: Pretty, but we all know that pretty is as pretty does. These towels have started fraying and the stitching is coming out.  Avoid these. I usually buy mine at JC Penneys. The one time that I bought them there, they started doing the same thing, after I had them for three months. I took them back to the store and they, no questions asked, replaced them at no cost.  That is customer service. Shame on me

We began to use them after one wash but there is still a layer of blue fuzz all over our bathroom (and our bodies after using). I'm hoping one more wash will do the trick.

Author: sara connell

Body: I like the shade of green that this egyptian towel set came in, but they are not as absorbent as I hoped. They look great in my bathroom, and hanging on the towel bar…but are too soft when trying to dry off after the shower. I like to use them to wrap my hair up after a shower, but usually reach for a different towel in the closet when I am hopping in the shower because it seems to take so long to dry off with it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2017
Author: daharper16
Title: Very soft!
Body: I bought one set each in the purple and grey. I didn't have any excessive fiber issues whatsoever; I just washed each set twice individually and dried as usual. I love the generous sizing! Only removed one star for the purple set for considerable fading and a bit of fraying on one of the towels, (I don't use any kind of bleach and always wash bath items solo). This is still a fantastic value; no regrets!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2018

We got two set for masterbath and two sets for guest bath, so they would always be a set availible when one was in the wash.  Let the kids use the cheap stuff.  Mom and Dad deserve the luxury towels!

Title: Love it

Body: I bought these towels because of the price and was actually expecting them to be thicker and plusher than what they looked like when they were delivered. Nevertheless, I've used them many times now and they have had their fair share of time in the washing machine and dryer. They've kept their shape nicely - no bunching of the stitching. Very serviceable and durable and a great value.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2014
Author: NAD
Title: Great
Body: The quality is great and plush however my bleach happy family some his spritz near this item and the fabric immediately turned so it is not like a bleach safe material....stay away from bleach lol it's a thick and vibrant grey so I cannot complain...except now I hide the from guest because it looks crazy pink n grayish now

Author: Carol Heathcliff
Title: Top quality and OOH SO SOFT!!
Body: Never wanted white towels as too many minerals in water turn whites gray however, real estate agent said white towels in bathroom are better when selling homes so I bought 2 sets. I was pleasantly surprised at how they dazzled after being washed. I added small pastel accents& the bathrooms really dazzled!!decided not to sell so now have lovely new towels that I love!!

Body: These towels are soft and fluffy, but some of them arrived with strings hanging.  I washed them and there were even more strings.  I cut them off.  Hopefully that will be the end of it.  I wanted these as a matching option for guests, so they haven't been used and rewashed yet.

Body: These towels are fluffy and absorbent, and have held up well after 6 months of use. We originally bought one set to test them out, since quality seems to vary, but were so happy with them that we bought two more sets.We've been happy with all of them. I will say that they seem to lose a bit of fluff every so often, but nothing that materially impacts their performance or appearance.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2015
Author: S. MCGUIRE
Title: The Perfect Towels!
Body: Read some scary reviews AFTER I purchased these, but found them to be  just what I wanted.  They are not too thin, and unlike some expensive towels I'd bought, not too thick.  They are just the right thickness to be able to conform to your body-shape and yet, thick enough to be plush.  Very happy with this purchase.  Actually, bought extras for gifts!
