Title: Great quality. Great price.
Body: I ordered these to replace some worn ones and add a little color. They are much thicker than I imagined, and very soft. They are red, so there was some heavy lint in the dryer the first couple times through, but it is back to normal after the 3rd washing. The red is more a deep cranberry, and that suits me well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2015
Author: Kelly
Title: Perfect for a guest bathroom
Body: They seem to be well made, although they're not the fluffy, cozy kind you're going to see in nicer hotels.  Still, they don't have strings hanging off, the color is consistent, the stitching is solid, and don't have a funny smell (I've had that with some in the past!).  For a guest bathroom (where they won't be used and washed every day), these are perfect.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2019

Title: Very nice towel set
Body: Nice and soft.

Title: For the price theyre great
Body: Theyre not the most absorbant towels but they do the job look nice and do have a thickness that you would believe to be of good quality. For the price though you can't really ask for more. I have friends that go to Wal-mart and buy soft big towels there, within 2 washes the towel is disintegrating.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2013
Author: la flor SLO
Title: Fit for a king and queen
Body: So soft!  So beautiful!  Towels that can't be compared to, for quality.  This shopping excursion has been unmatched, because these are thick, lush towels fit for a king and his queen!  It's not the same-old second-rate purchase that you make in so many stores -- these will last!  These are stunning, and Amazon consistently sends products to me so quickly, in stunningly like-new condition.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2015
Author: shirley blando
Title: THESE ARE WONDERFUL. I USUALLY BUY MICRO COTTON
Body: THESE ARE WONDERFUL.  I USUALLY BUY MICRO COTTON, BUT DECIDED TO USE THESE AS DECORATION.  WELL, NOW I AM USING THEM EVERYDAY.  THEY ARE VERY LARGE AND DRY REALLY WELL .  WHEN YOU USE THEM TO DRY OFF, THE TOWEL IS ACTUALLY VERY DAMP FROM TAKING THE WATER OFF YOUR BODY!!  THAT IS ALWAYS A GOOD SIGN!!!  I AM ORDERING SOME FOR MY DAUGHTER FOR CHRISTMAS.

Body: When I pulled these out of the box, they felt like good quality towels. They are nice and thick, really absorbent and seem well made.  My only problem with them was, the first time I pulled them out of the wash, the die had faded in spots.  It was incredibly disappointing. I'd purchased these twice, and for some reason, they were either stained or faded in spots with the second purchase as well.

Wash up ok, just aplain every day towl that I had hoped would be thicker.. Will shop for a nicer towelset but will keep these for every day use..would not buy again..

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2017
Author: CG
Title: I was going to have a guest and thought it would be the perfect time to break them out---after using them just a ...
Body: I purchased these in late October of 2016.  I had a lot going on over the last two months of the year and just recently opened the package in january to wash the towels and start using them.  I was going to have a guest and thought it would be the perfect time to break them out---after using them just a couple of times they are ruined.i don't know if it is the hand soap (mild and natural) or the laundry soap (also mild and natural) but they have ALL become discolored and splotchy....almost as if they had been used in conjunction with hairy dye or something (i do not dye my hair at home).wort set of towels I have EVER owned and I have owned many types/kinds.....do NOT buy them.:(

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2017
Author: Liv052020
Title: I don't know if anyone else likes bigger towels but I appreciate the size because I like having the extra fabric to make me feel cozy ...
Body: These towels are soooo soft and big. I don't know if anyone else likes bigger towels but I appreciate the size because I like having the extra fabric to make me feel cozy and warm. The only reason I am not giving these 5 stars is because these towels take a couple of washes before I don't get the blue fabric pieces left over on my skin. A little annoying but not annoying enough to not use them.

Body: They're nice enough for what they're for... but upon the first wash and dry, it sheds more than my 25 pound cat! I may come back with more after a few months...still shedding, but still soft... I don't regret the purchase, I'll leave it at 4 *'s until they start falling apart.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2016
Author: Tabby Lovel
Title: Good towels, but shed a lot
Body: Yes, these shed A LOT! At least in the first wash. I cleaned the lint trap in my dryer 3 times when I washed them prior to use. Contrary to many negative reviews, the set I got did not fade at all, and all seams are strong. Will wait to see how they hold up over time.They are of medium thickness, fluffy, reasonably soft, and the red towels are true to the advertised color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2015
Author: RT
Title: Nice but......falling apart at the seams
Body: I should have paid more attention to some of the reviews. I love the color and I bought them to change up my guest bathroom. However, like several other folks, they started coming apart after the first wash. They are fluffy and I didn't have too much lint in my dryer, however, I suspect the shredding will continue with each wash.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2018
Author: Marina
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great quality! I strongly recommend it

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2019
Author: Joe
Title: Bath Towels
Body: They were a nice and  soft towel

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2014
Author: S. Byrd
Title: Nice addition to guest bath, was more than once before use
Body: Bought these for the guest bath.  Washed them when they arrived and put them in there.  First person to use it came out covered with fuzz.  So make sure you wash them at least a few times before they are used post shower.  We will see how they hold up over time, but still looking good after two washes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2019
Author: Mo
Title: Quailty
Body: Color

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2014
Author: Aria Jensen
Title: great product
Body: I was unsure at first because of the reviews I read, but I am very happy with them. they are not as plush as I thought they would be, but they are surprisingly very absorbent and soft.they almost feel too soft, like they aren't wicking the water away. but when I am done I am shocked that I am dry. yes there was a snag or two after washing them, but nothing to get upset about. my dryer trends to ruin clothes anyways. the colour is still great after a few washes

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2016
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: ... now have two sets of these towels and absolutely love them. The largest towel is a great size ...
Body: I now have two sets of these towels and absolutely love them. The largest towel is a great size that you can comfortably wrap around your body without feeling like it's going to fall off. The colors come just as seen in the pictures. They can "shed" a little, so I would wash them twice before use; after that, mine were fine. The price of this set was great for the quality and quantity of towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2013
Author: Baileys Mom
Title: Ok product for the price
Body: These towels are ok.  Quick delivery and while reading the other reviews, discovered that they would just be kind of cheap towels for the price.  I just received them and put them through the wash, and there is some shredding but hey, they ARE $20 for the set.  They'll do for now:)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2013
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Bought the brown was just what I expected for the money
Body: I washed the set together with a pair of pants and a shirt.  But I washed on Gentle cycle. With all the reviews that say this product comes apart on first wash or lents.  So far I am not seeing it. but just checked in between the wash and rinse cycle.  Looks good so far.  more in a while after cycle and drying.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2016
Author: Lynn
Title: Good value
Body: It is true that there is a lot of lint the first few times these towels are washed.  I don't overdry my clothes and I dry on a lower heat so mine did not fall apart at all.  They are a large size and extremely soft after washing.  I would definitely recommend these towels but gave them 4 stars only because it may bother some people the amount of lint they produce.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: HORRIBLE product. Towels constantly pulling despite multiple washes
Body: HORRIBLE product.  Towels constantly pulling despite multiple washes.  Waiting for the towels to disintegrate at some point!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2018
Author: Tom Avery
Title: Three Stars
Body: 2 months old and stitching around edge is coming apart

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2019
Author: sandy sherman
Title: Soft
Body: Soft

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2018
Author: Wayne Reith
Title: The  Great color
Body: They work good nice and fluffy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2018
Author: Morgan J.
Title: Started fraying after a couple
Body: Started  fraying after a couple washes

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2017
Author: jazzy
Title: Don't Buy!
Body: If you but, don't use. Not even for drying your hands. Just for show. The 1st time I used these my daughter wet ine to wipe noxema off her face, a few hours later the towel was bleached. I used one days after that to clean my face using proactive and same results but I made the mistake if just drying off my face and hands after use smh. Wish I could if gotten my money back for this crap

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2015
Author: MW
Title: Soft and comfortable, but wash them before your first use
Body: Wow, these are soft towels. They remind me of the ones you get in hotels. And the Cream color is on point, just like in the picture! I did make the mistake of using them before doing an initial wash. Don't do that! They will rub loose cotton all over you. However, once I got past that, these became the best bath towels I have ever owned.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2017
Author: Alex Melnyk
Title: Three Stars
Body: Look nice but not very absorbent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2019
Author: Jody Nauhaus
Title: Thick and soft!
Body: Big n soft n fuzzy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2017
Author: BodyJewelryLover
Title: these have been great.. I haven't experienced what others has been ...
Body: So far, these have been great.. I haven't experienced what others has been experiencing—possibly because I've been washing mine by hand. I have, however, used these on my puppy; and, he seemed to Love them as well.. He never tried to destroy them, although I had come home to find them on the floor. I plan on buying another set, BUT considering the reviews, I may wait until after I've washed them in a washing machine first.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2016
Author: WP
Title: Great price and size.
Body: Great price! Good quality so far. Color was more of a royal blue than navy. They have a purpleish hue. They still work in the bathroom however. They are big soft and absorbent. I haven't had most of the problems I've read about them yet. I did notice a big amount of lint in the dryer. They are for my guest bath so they don't get used all the time so we shall see I guess.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2017
Author: Avery
Title: Super soft!
Body: I've had these towels for a few years, and recently bought a new set as they were wearing out. I still like the towels, though I feel as though they have decreased in quality since the last time I bought them. Particularly, they've changed to very obnoxious looking paper tags that are difficult to hide. When I tried tearing off the tags, it left damage on the stitching of the towel. Obviously this isn't the end of the world, but I would absolutely appreciate easily removable tags.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2019
Author: Tomas
Title: Muy excelentes
Body: Excelente

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2017
Author: Margaret M. Cooney
Title: These are great towels. The company was able to ship them ...
Body: These are great towels.  The company was able to ship them early.  Thank you.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2013
Author: alex shaw
Title: nice but fuzzzy!
Body: i would suggest these towels but i would also suggest washing them about 10 times before you use them or you will be covered in fuzz! they are soft and wick away water well we have used them for about 8 months with no issue once we got the fuzz to go away!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2015
Author: Denver area
Title: one year later, upgrading rating
Body: Upgraded to 5 star (1yr later) after initial 3 star. You do have to wash them a few times to stop the shedding. However, after almost a year, they have held up nicely.  Really like these towels and will order more. I stopped using fabric softener on my towels, and they are still fluffy/soft. They also now absorb more water.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2017
Author: Venus Shackelton
Title: Five Stars
Body: I like these towels very much.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2016
Author: Susan
Title: Won't buy again.
Body: Thick, plush towels! They look really nice....but....they don't absorb water well.....it's like you are just pushing the water around on your body! They also leave LOTS of lint on you & in the dryer!  Now that I've washed them about 10 times..... they aren't so bad. I probably wouldn't buy them again. They arrived quickly - so no problem with the seller!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2014
Author: Minerva Bryant
Title: Disappointed In The Color
Body: the towels arrived as stated within two days. The color wasn't what I was expecting . Cranberry turned out to more of a Peperika coloring. There wasn't the vibrant colored that was displayed more of a dull finish. Not happy at all with the color I will keep them but will not order from this manufacturer again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2019
Author: Marie Nielsen
Title: Very nice
Body: Yes very good material

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2013
Author: Ro-en
Title: Good Towels
Body: I really like this towel set. I have been using them for a couple of weeks and yet to see any of the tearing from other reviews. They are large in size and thick, especially the wash cloths. I do have trouble getting soap out of the washcloths, though that could contribute to my water pressure.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2013
Author: Sally Hanneman
Title: Great buy
Body: These towels were a great size, color and softness. I know that there are many others that are bigger and softer but for the price these are wonderful. We had no trouble with the quality and after several washings they no longer bled color. Do remember to wash and dry them several times before use.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2018
Author: Tyshawn Williams
Title: Good product

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2018
Author: Kinyattera Williams
Title: Very nice
Body: Exactly what I expected. Very nice

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2013
Author: Hebgb
Title: Very nice towels.
Body: These are BIG towels and are very absorbent. The ONLY "complaint" i have is it took me three washes to get rid of the shedding. Little specks of lint would fall in my shower, but after washing a few times that stopped. Overall, great towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2018
Author: Marcia quinn
Title: Strange smell
Body: Have not washed them took them out of plastic bag and they have an unpleasant odor

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2016
Author: MissingAFishbowl
Title: Durable and absorbant
Body: These are not as absorbent as some fluff-ball monstrosity, but I would never have one of those in my house.After a great deal of wear, no threads have yet to come loose, and they still come clean.You will want to give these a wash in hot water by themselves before their first use, to bleed out some dye and get them fluffy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2015
Author: Cotton Flower
Title: Great price and decent quality
Body: Great price and decent quality. Biggest complaint is the lint! Oh my God, this thing produces so much lint! I bought 2 sets for our vacation home and when I did the first wash, I literally had to clean the lint out not once, not twice, not three times, but 4 times! I will update this review after I used them for a little bit longer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2018
Author: Carol Kerns
Title: These towels are so so. The strings are coming ...
Body: These towels are so so.  The strings are coming loose from the ends of the hand towels,

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2013
Author: Jenn
Title: Great Towels!!
Body: I did not have the lint issue that I have been reading about.  I have been using them for about 2 months, my kids not fight over who is using them.  The come out of the dryer softer and fluffier each time I wash them.  I really like the quality of these towels, and I love the price!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2014
Author: akicita
Title: really good set Egyptian towels
Body: when they first come out of the package, I wasn't too sure about the quality of these towels so I put them through a wash cycle on cold with an extra rinse first. not only are they good towels to use after a shower or bath, they look very nice if they're used for the decor only.the package arrived in a very timely manner.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2017
Author: Nathan
Title: Four Stars
Body: These leave pills until thoroughly broken in

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2018
Author: Kerry MacDuff
Title: Two Stars
Body: Dull color compared to the pictures.Would not have bought IRL.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2015
Author: Tess
Title: Great Product for the Price!
Body: I love the quality of these towels for the price!!! I had previously purchased two other sets for my in-laws for gifts, and once we remodeled our bathroom, I decided to add these to our collection! The size of the bath towel is perfect, as I am not a fan of the bath sheet as is my husband. Overall, great product!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2013
Author: sabrina
Title: Crazy fuzz
Body: Although the size and feel of these towels are wonderful they are still shedding fuzz and the side edges are frayed after just the first wash, not talking about the hem on the ends but the long side of the towels.  They do the job but are a mess for the washer and lint catcher in the dryer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Not colored as pictured
Body: We loved the sand colored Pinzon towels we got for our wedding so much. They were soft and fluffy like a towel should be, so we ordered these purple ones too. When they arrived, I was disappointed to find they are quite a VERY different shade than in the picture! They are actually a light dusty lavender.Beautiful color, just not the color they were advertised to be.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2013
Author: K. Corey
Title: These towels are not overly fluffy
Body: I hate fluffy towels. These are nice, everyday towels with a little flourish in the band. I bought these to put out in the bathroom when we show our house for sale. But I like the weight so much, I'm going to start replacing my ancient towels with these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2017
Author: J
Title: Five Stars
Body: Soft and warm, absorbs water very well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2015
Author: Sid Brewer
Title: very good size. You can't beat these for the price
Body: This is our 3rd set of these towels.  We bought our first two a little over a year ago.  They get a lot of use.  They hold up well to the abuse of constant washing and drying.  Very soft, very good size.  You can't beat these for the price.  We have paid more for towels that are nowhere near this quality.  Great buy!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2017
Author: Adelina
Title: Thought I had chicken pox or something
Body: I washed and dried the towels then used as normal. After a nice hot shower, I dried off and I look down and see red dots down low. My mind starts racing. Then I see the same red dots on my face and arms.Slightly relieved but still freaking out. Then I realize the red dots are the TOWEL FREAKING SHEDDING ON ME. 😑😑😑 So annoying because they look nice, but the shedding is unbearable.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2015
Author: GQ
Title: Mediocre
Body: You get what you pay for. Don't be fooled, these towels are cheap and fray easily. Definitely not luxurious as I thought they would be, but then again that's what happens when you shop on the internet. Luckily these towels are only used in my spare bathroom. If you are looking for a quality set of towels, this isn't it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2013
Author: Jill
Title: Nice Towel Set!!
Body: This towel set was perfect for my guest bathroom, since I couldn't decide on a specific color scheme. The towels are quite thick, and the price was better than I could have bought with my employee discount!!! Yes, I would recommend this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2013
Author: William
Title: Wayyy nicer than expected!
Body: Bought this set just cause I was tired of using one microfiber travel towel over and over. Didn't expect them to be this nice for such a cheap price. So soft, the towels are pretty big (I'm just about 6 foot 180lbs and they're big for me), and I keep forgetting it is a 6 piece set. So far have only used just the one towel and I would have paid the same price just for the one.*Just one tip- Wash them before you use them. Probably sounds obvious but they felt pretty good when I opened the package and i was like, gotta try em out.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2013
Author: Audrey LaGar
Title: love
Body: these towels are a great deal. they are vibrant red, large sizes and have stood up to the wash just fine.never got any fuzzies coming off like I have had happen with other towels. Im so thrilled with this deal, if I ever need more towels I know where to get them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2017
Author: Little Jimmy Two Balls
Title: Purchased as a gift for me from my wish list ...
Body: Purchased as a gift for me from my wish list.  First wash on gentle, warm deteriorated the hem on one of the hand towels.  Extreme lot of lint in the washer and the dryer...guess you can expect that but I'm wondering if it will 'shed' even more or the next wash.Failed to find contact information of Pinzon.  Maybe they will replace the towel when they see this.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2015
Author: Jwinter0520
Title: The shedding never ends...
Body: These appear plush and high quality upon first look...but the quality is terrible. I've now washed and dried mine (in dryer) six times and they are still covered in massive amounts of lint. They will fill the lint trap on the dryer twice in half an hour and there is still so much lint on the actual towels. With so much shedding, I can't believe there's any towel left! There is nothing more annoying than getting lint all over yourself as you try to dry off. Ugh. Will not buy Amazon's originals anymore when it comes to bed and bath... you get what you pay for.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2014
Author: ljm
Title: Get what you pay for
Body: These towels have been washed 2 times and are already starting to fray along the edges.  They are thick and fluff up nicely after washing, but produce LOTS of lint.  I am disappointed because I thought I would get a nice set of towels for a good price.  These will have to be replaced soon because they are coming apart along the edges.  I would not recommend buying them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2014
Author: jp
Title: Continues to drop lint :(
Body: i bought the brown set. the towel size is exactly what i was looking for but the quality is poor. After two months this towel still drops lint all over skin and my washing machine. I am extremely disappointed and so the search continues for a dually, economical and quality towel set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2014
Author: Linda
Title: Nice but pieces are not all from same dye lot
Body: Nice bath set, very lush, but just don't expect all the pieces, the wash cloths, hand towels and bath towels, to be made from the same dye lot.  The wash cloths and hand towels delivered to me in the set are lighter and the variance is fairly obvious if it matters to you.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2015
Author: Virginia G.
Title: Very Nice
Body: These towels are very nice and do the job.  They are very linty for the first few washes.  I am finding that they are getting more soft and absorbent with washings.  No loose strings, decorative band does not shrink up like some other towels I have had.  Overall, I like them well enough to have gotten another set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2018
Author: Thayná Menezes
Title: Thought it would be softer
Body: Once you wash, it’s not soft at all!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2018
Author: Michael Gerard
Title: Five Stars
Body: Quality is excellent!  We are so pleased.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2013
Author: Suzanne Willman
Title: Pizon basics 725 gram towel set
Body: The towels are ok only.....the  725 gram weight was not as luxurious as I hoped. I have ordered 900 gram from a different manufacturer, and they were TOO thick. I had hoped the 725 would be the perfect weight, but these are not. I would not recomend these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2018
Author: Marizela Guerra
Title: Best money I've spent Best ever quality I spent
Body: I  purchase three times now people keep stealing my towels quality f****** towels five-star

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2014
Author: Louise
Title: Nice
Body: The set of Egyptian cotton 725 Gram 6-piece Towel Set, white were very nice set for the price.  I am very pleased how easy these  have stayed clean between washings.  The towels were also a good match to my other white towels  They really brighten up the bathroom.  Thanks

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2015
Author: Panchi
Title: Good quality, but...
Body: In general, the towel set is of good quality. I gave it three stars because after the first wash, a couple of the towel came apart at the seamed edge. However, the other towels are holding up well in that respect. I've washed them about four times and they still continue to shed a bit in the washer, which surprised me.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2015
Author: Theo
Title: Red fuzz invasion
Body: I can't put these in the dryer with anything else.  Red fuzzies all over any other clothes, practically impossible to remove.  A year later, still red fuzz.  Odd, because I bought a blue set without the same problem.They do perform well.  Just inconvenient to wash.  And I have to clean my bathroom more often because of red fuzz.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2019
Author: Marilyn Chinnock
Title: This towel set is fine
Body: I Think this product is OK, I am using it in my Bathroom

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2013
Author: not near ad fun as the first three in this series
Title: wrapped in comfort
Body: these towels are soft and comfortable.  they answer the old question: what gets wetter the more it dries? the are loads of colors and these fits our décor. The shipment arrived quickly as usual. we will purchase more as gifts and the price is more than right for the top quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2014
Author: Push Girl
Title: Great value for the money
Body: This is the 5th set I've purchased; the 2nd I've given as a gift. The first set was purchased nearly 2 years ago, and has kept its color & shape, so I felt confident repurchasing these. The brown was a great shade--a rich chocolate rather than a muddy hue. Will be purchasing again in the future.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2015
Author: mdaz
Title: Threads pull after first wash.
Body: These towels are ok. After washing them the first time, threads already started to pull (and I washed it on gentle cycle). I expected a lot of lint when drying them, but after 5 washes I am still getting a ton of lint in the dryer. They're not that soft and don't seem to hold up in the wash too well. Disappointed in this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2016
Author: Beth B.
Title: Big and Fluffy!
Body: I love these towels! They are so soft and absorbent! They're big and fluffy, the perfect towel. I'm a huge fan of egyptian cotton, and decided to try these. They definitely don't feel cheap or thin. I chose white because I like to change my decor every few years and white goes with everything. And I can bleach them to keep them looking bright and clean.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2015
Author: RookieWife
Title: Horrible, thin towels
Body: Something has changed with these towels. I purchased a purple set about 2 years ago and a white set in the last 6 months.  Both are amazing! Thick, soft towels that feel so luxurious. This last round of gray Pinzon towels is nothing like it.  I think I could have purchased better towels at Walmart. I wish I had returned them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2013
Author: Mike D. Hackney
Title: DO NOT BUY!!
Body: First wash and all the towels shredded in the washer because seams are not sewn.  In dryer they clogged the lint tray.  The absolute worst set of towels that we have ever bought.  Amazon should take these towels off their site. If I could give it a minus 5, I would.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2019
Author: Hana gacem
Title: Perfect material
Body: Love itttt 😍

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2017
Author: George Mcdaniel
Title: Five Stars
Body: Good thick towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2017
Author: tofuloaf
Title: I love them.
Body: The bath towels are large and thirsty.  I love them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2013
Author: A. McCarthy
Title: Had high hopes
Body: I just got around to washing the towel set. I followed the label exactly, but I came up with frayed edges after the first wash. I'll be contacting Amazon to see if I can get a replacement. Other reviewers have mentioned this issue , but some said it wasn't a problem for them, I guess I'm in the first group. The color is nice and the towels are soft. I can't review their drying ability, because I don't want to have the wash them again and have them fray even more.  If the next set I get fares better in the wash, I'll update this review.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2018
Author: Jennie
Title: One Star
Body: Item loses it color fast

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2013
Author: Tricia
Title: VERY dark but plush set
Body: Went through the ringer with these towels, but still have no regrets of ordering them.The color in them was SO dark one could not even see that they were purple!!  So I thought I'd bleach them a little, but it turned out to be too much!  THEN I went through the day-long chore of dying them with my own dye, and finally got them a true purple!But I am still amazed to be able to buy a full set of 6 articles for the price I received from Amazon.com!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2018
Author: Richard
Title: The towels are nice enough in themselves however are very susceptible to being ...
Body: The towels are nice enough in themselves however are very susceptible to being bleached. The pictures are of the hand towel I used to dry my face after washing w/ my usual very mild benzoyl peroxide cleanser. It ate the color right out. I have had this problem before w/ other towels I have bought (not from Amazon). And if one of them does it they all will. Please be aware if you do buy them that even the most mild of soaps & cleansers have the potential to have the same effect. I have returned mine for refund.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2013
Author: Patty barlow
Title: Very nice towel set
Body: These are very nice towels - thick and absorbent and feels good next to your skin!  I thought the quality was very good and especially for the price.  The only problem is they are very 'linty' and I had to wash them 3 times before using them to try and get most of the lint off them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2019
Author: Raggadant
Title: Well worth it!
Body: Great towel at a lower cost that department stores.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2014
Author: L Brewer
Title: Nice weight, questionable sewing on washcloths
Body: After a couple of months of moderate use, these towels are still soft and thick. My only complaint is that 4 out of the 6 washcloths (from 3 separate 6 piece sets) completely came apart at the edges, rendering them worse looking than many of the cloths I've had for 9 years. The towels have a few frayed spots, especially the corners, but not too bad. You get what you pay for.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2017
Author: Genevieve
Title: Must buy!
Body: THESE ARE SO INCREDIBLY SOFT AND CHUNKY. I bought two sets for my upstairs bathroom and These are some of the best towels I have ever purchased. The lint is not overwhelming, and nothing sticks to your body when you dry off. They wash ans dry well and have not stained. They are good sized towels and very absorbant. I will be buying at least 1-2 more sets of these!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2013
Author: Amy Culley
Title: Amazing Starter Towels
Body: Great price for a great basic set. They aren't the only towels you will ever need, but they are amazing towels to start with. I have washed my set many times and the colors have yet to fade. The one towel I use the most though, has begun to fray the tiniest amount, but once again, for the price I cannot complain. I would buy these again and have recommended them to friends.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2016
Author: Devrose
Title: Beautiful
Body: These towels are great super soft and we'll made held together in the dryer their a beautiful color a deep dark plum color that hasn't faded a bit with washing and drying it's a great set for the price and all the pieces are really big compared to normal sized bath towels from the wash cloths to the actual towels will definitely purchase again

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2013
Author: Julie
Title: Pretty Good Towels
Body: Likes:I feel like the color is about the same as the picture.The towels are softer than I expected.Dislikes:They are thinner than expected.There were lots of loose threads on the towels after the first washing; I trimmed these and haven't had any unraveling problems.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2018
Author: Dominique
Title: Smell
Body: Towels have a horrible smell

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2014
Author: shopping junkie
Title: Not a huge fan
Body: I wish these were thicker towels. The quality is poor, strings have come loose left and right after the first wash. I'd return them but I've already washed them.  You get what you pay for. I'd say if you're looking for very average (or below average) towels at a good price, these are it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2016
Author: Kizu Rai
Title: Good towels, does what a towel does
Body: Had a weird smell when I first got it so I threw it in the washer first thing.The towels didn't lose any colour and it doesn't look like there's any loose strings. They're comfortably thick, though not that fluffy and they get the job done. The colour is a little lighter than it appears in the pictures though, it's a touch more lavender.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2013
Author: Chip Larsen
Title: Towel
Body: Overall a pretty absorbant towel, but the ends unravel like Nixon at the Watergate Hearings after a few washes.  I suggest you try Sam's Club for about the same price and are a little more durable.That's all I got to say about that.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2014
Author: JanieO
Title: Nice for the price
Body: For the price, you get well-made towels that feel plush and hold up in the wash. These are definitely a bargain. For folks who prefer high-end, expensive towels- well, these are probably not for you. But for everyday use, they are absorbent, thick, and look great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2017
Author: Chatchanok
Title: Five Stars
Body: Very soft love it

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2017
Author: Tabitha Perez
Title: I loved these towels
Body: I loved these towels , Thank you so much Amazon. They don't leave a residue in my body I'm in love.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2013
Author: mkultra
Title: Not sure about all the negative reviews...
Body: Really, what can you expect for $20? At the current price we're already probably supporting sweatshops. :( These are an excellent value though. Nice and thick, looks great in the cream color. Seems like they will last a good long time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2017
Author: Jill
Title: A bit darker int he picture!
Body: The only reason this is only getting 4 stars is because the color is slightly off from the picture. The picture shows them a bit darker than they actually are. It is very close though and the quality of the towel is very nice. I don't feel like I got the color i was looking for but the towels are quality and I have no intention of sending them back.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2018
Author: Theresa Bivens
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2014
Author: Jenn
Title: Doesn't dry well
Body: These are ok. I like how soft they are but trying to dry off after a shower can get annoying. It doesn't dry you off very well, it gets wet and stays really wet for a while. They look nice and have held up through 2 washes. Just doesn't dry as well as I'd like.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2016
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Good product at good price
Body: Bought these towels in gray about a month ago, have been very happy with them. They are  very absorbent and quite soft, though not plush or fluffy. I actually like their weight, not so thin they feel cheap and get saturated immediately, but thin enough to dry quickly when hung on a hook. My old towels were a bit thicker and would get stinky from lingering dampness so this is definitely a plus for me and my poorly ventilated bathroom. I've washed and tumble dried them several times, no issues with fraying seams as others have complained. Set is a great value for the price, I'll probably buy a few more sets now that I've tested them out.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2013
Author: N5NAR
Title: NOT VERY ABSORBENT
Body: I'm hoping their absorbency improves after washing. I've washed them probably 5-6 times without much improvement. The color was true to what was online.  They are fluffy and have the feel of high quality, just wish they didn't repel water!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2014
Author: ctomfin
Title: great towels
Body: These were very thick and soft. Thiswas what I was looking for, however there were a lot of threads on them. My wife said they seemed like seconds.There was a spot on one of them that did not wash out.  But for the price they were well worth the money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2014
Author: lj681
Title: The worst. Wash once and they are destroyed
Body: The worst. Wash once and they are destroyed. Super disappointed because I had bought them once before and they were awesome! When I bought more they must have changed manufacturers because they were a different shade of gray and fell apart in the washing machine. :(

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2014
Author: Nanqi You
Title: Quality declined dramatically
Body: This is my third time ordering the same product.  I have 3 vacation rentals and these towels served me well in the past.  This time, the lint was just as bad but I washed them twice and dried them twice before putting them for guest use.  That is OK.  I wish I didn't have to do it, but could deal with it.The worst are the edges, they came apart after first wash.  I had to sew many edges together, and cut so many loose threads from the edges.  Not worth the trouble any longer.  I will pay more for better quality products.I feel Amazon lured me in and now produces less quality products.  If I didn't really need them, I would have returned them for refund.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2014
Author: Allie
Title: Great towels!
Body: I will definitely be buying these towels again! They are soft and absorb water great! I suggest washing them separate when you first get them as they give off little fuzzies in the very beginning. Don't worry this doesn't continue! You can't beat the price for the awesome quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2014
Author: Mike
Title: New towels!
Body: Ordered a couple sets of these. For $20 dollars - it almost fells like we're robbing someone. After you wash these and they fluff out a bit - they're really nice. I'm going to buy more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2013
Author: J. Martello
Title: Don't buy these.
Body: I thought this was a good bargain and looked forward to them, but they are of pretty poor quality.  Pulls on towels and one washcloth was very frayed after only one washing, and I have a new washer that doesn't beat things up.  I think I'll be returning the whole set.  Disgusted!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2015
Author: Dolphin
Title: Nice looking but they re not soft and thick out of the package.
Body: Color:  WhiteNice looking towel set out of the package, but they're not soft and thick, especially for having such a high thread count.I'll update my review after I've washed them a few times.  Hoping they soften up.  Bought them for an upcoming visitor.  Was hoping for the best.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2013
Author: MCPandaPants
Title: love these!
Body: They're so soft and pretty! Such an awesome deal too! I want to order them in another color! Do yourself a favor and get a set(edit)They DO NOT last. all of them frayed after a few washes. Still very soft but poor quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2014
Author: LeahTortilla
Title: Soft, and they get more absorbent after a few washes
Body: I really like my towels, they were the color I wanted and are some of the softest towels I've owned. They just were not very absorbent the first few times I used them. They had to be washed and dryed a few times before they started being more absorbent. That is why I gave 4 instead of 5 stars.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2019
Author: Mike
Title: Awesome.
Body: Loved everything about it

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2013
Author: ChattyCathy
Title: College Dorm, Guest Towels, Personal Use  A-Okay
Body: Bought the Wedgwood Blue as college dorm towels for my son.  They washed up nicely - fluffy and soft.  I didn't find the length of the hand towel or wash cloth to be a problem as I read in another review.  For the money, no complaint here.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2013
Author: shopper
Title: Gave as gift
Body: Great deal for the price! I gave this to my sister-in-law as a gift and she was thrilled to receive it! She needed a bath towel set and her favorite color is purple, so the plum set (which is a beautiful deep purple) did the trick. Have not heard about how they perform yet.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2019
Author: j h
Title: Soft and as described
Body: Lovely

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2013
Author: Keystone Colorado Mother
Title: To feel comfortable, purchase these Towels
Body: I read all the complaints about these towels and I have to say that I haven't experienced any of their issues.  I have owned these towels for over a month and I plan to purchase more.  I only wish they made the larger version with the same design.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2017
Author: bookster100
Title: Great Quality for the price
Body: I purchased these as 'extras' at the same time I purchased some very expensive 900 gsm towels. I was quite pleased with the quality of these for the price. After a couple if washings they softened right up and though they are not the quality of the 900 gsm, I use these towels regularly too with no complaints. I went ahead and ordered another set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2018
Author: Pamela
Title: One Star
Body: The color was no where close to what was stated

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2014
Author: Rholf Bellow-Pierced
Title: Nice towel set,poor quality control inspection.
Body: Arrived quick great size soaks water pretty well BUT,one whole towel edge lookd like it caught in a blender,threads and knots hanging off edge.hand towel edge same thing edge all chewd up threads hanging off.Nice set,to bad came all trashed and trimmed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2019
Author: ANGELYN CLEMONS
Title: Bathroom towels
Body: The softness and color

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2013
Author: Andrew Watkins
Title: Careful when Washing, Great Value
Body: These are great towels, soft and fluffy. My only complaint is that they tear up easily in the washer. I have a newer HE washer and still, every time I take them out, there's a few strands that have been torn up while washing. Aside from that, they are great and have stood up to almost two years of daily usage.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2013
Author: Isabella
Title: Extremely good for the price
Body: I've felt softer, fuller towels before, but not for anything like this price.  This set is a huge bargain that I wouldn't ever pass up.  I am so happy with the towels; a set of 6 for $20 is absolutely mind blowing.  As long as these towels remain this economical with so much quality, I'll probably never get anything fancier.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2018
Author: niolynn
Title: Poor material
Body: Fell apart within 1 week of use

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2015
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Really nice - very absorbant
Body: Really nice - very absorbant, just the right size for a bath towel. After a few washings the color is holding up just like new which is nice. I have gotten towels in the past that fade after just a few washings with "color safe" bleach. These are doing nice. And SO soft - very very nice.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2014
Author: Joy Williams
Title: They're large and thristy (not super fluffy, but that's fine with me)
Body: These towels are a tremendous bargain! They're large and thristy (not super fluffy, but that's fine with me). They shed very little even in the first wash, the color didn't bleed or go splotchy. And the price can't be met anywhere else that I'm aware of. I'll be ordering some more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2013
Author: Skytaker
Title: product quality not there
Body: I originally bought Pinson towels when they were made in Turkey and had a gram weight of over 800. Now they are made in Pakistan and the gram weigh is significantly lower enough to notice. The quality of build has gone down quite a bit and they do not hold up as well as the original. Now granted these newer towel are much cheaper in cost...but that was never why I bought them in the first place....Amazon dropped the ball on this one....cheap does not equal value on this one...sad

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2014
Author: Linda P
Title: I like these towels
Body: I like these towels , they came well packed and very quickly although they were supposed to be here in two days according to amazon it came in 4 .. but they wash well , they still look good , no shedding or threading .. I gave two packages away , so I will be back for more

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2018
Author: Sl
Title: Sheds fluff
Body: Whenever i use these towels i get dark blue lint all over my body :(

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2015
Author: Harry
Title: Nice towel set
Body: Towels appear to be good quality.  The wash cloth is a bit larger then I'm used to and feels heavy when using it.  The bath towel dries me off and hardly shows that it absorbed all the shower water from my body.  I would recommend this set to anyone interested in buys some new towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2018
Author: Christopher J
Title: Used, Thin, & Unraveling
Body: Towels were used, thin, and unraveling. Worst towels ever.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2018
Author: Char
Title: Great towels
Body: These towels are a terrific weight and very absorbent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2015
Author: June
Title: ... purple lent in the dryer so these towels seem like they are padded with something
Body: I have had these towels for a while now and every time I wash and dry them there is tons of purple lent in the dryer so these towels seem like they are padded with something. the towels used to feel fluffy now they are all raggedy looking no longer feel soft and the color has faded . I cant recommend this brand.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2014
Author: R. J. Bennett
Title: Nice towels
Body: they look great, are fluffy and have a good weight to them. The only slight downside is that after repeated washing they still behave like brand-new towels - aka don't soak water up as they should. On the positive side, they hold the color and shape perfectly.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2014
Author: Theresa Witte
Title: misrepepresented towel color
Body: I was very torn having to return these towels but the color was closer to butter yellow than cream. It would not go with either of my bathrooms. They looked and felt great and were delivered promptly,but the color was not the same that was pictured online. I would have ordered another set but had guests coming to stay with us and could not risk the wait/and or an off color possibility. I will try again another time..they looked great,just recommend a more accurate picture.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2013
Author: Leonard
Title: Nice Towels
Body: Good buy for the price, very absorbent and big enough to wrap around your waste providing you don't have that huge of a gut. I might buy some more down the road. Unless I find a better deal of course. Amazon Prime is great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2017
Author: George
Title: I will have to order something else
Body: Not fluffy at all like the pic.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2015
Author: tannya
Title: Very please with this purchase
Body: so far the textile is fine. I already wash them twice and no loose ends.  Because of all the bad posteds I will buy to see how they go before I buy more of this Pinzon Towel Set because I will very much like them for presents of my family.The shippment to Mexico was very fast and cheap.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2013
Author: J. M. Timlin
Title: Very nice addition
Body: I already have a brown and black bathroom, these just gave me another set of towels.  Theya re very nice, te towels themselves are big and the hand towels match everything that is already in my bathroom.  Highly recommend this product

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2019
Author: E Taylor
Title: Towels
Body: Nice towels for the price

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2016
Author: RJ Smith
Title: Top-notch Towels - Really Delighted with quality, size, colors available -
Body: Hmmm. I should have known that Amazon would come through with towel sets that are great at a very good price. Very happy with the price, the colors available,  the size of the towels (some bath towels are on the small size- these are a great, normal size), and the speed in which they arrived. I'll be buying them again for sure.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: I really like them. They go with most of my stuff in the bathroom. Thanks:-)~~JAT

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2014
Author: Beverly
Title: Towels are great, but....
Body: I love the towels and find that they are a great deal. But the issue is that while I ordered them in plum, the ones that arrived were navy blue. There was a sticker on the bag that said plum but it was placed over one that said navy. Amazon please double check your merchandise!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2014
Author: Laura
Title: Not plush - very thin
Body: These are very thin towels. I normally buy plush towels. Based on some of the reviews, I though that it what I was buying. These are not what I expected. They are thin but come out soft from the dryer. I bought them for the bathroom my grandchildren use so it's fine for them

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2015
Author: Kay N.
Title: Both LOOKS great. But
Body: I bought 2 sets in cream and 2 sets in driftwood color. Both LOOKS great. But, shocking amount of lint came out of the dryer for the first and second wash. You can stuff a good size pillow with the lint. Then my entire family is complaining about how TERRIBLY non-absorbent they are. Wish I can return them. Hoping after dozen more wash, things may improve.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2017
Author: V. McKee
Title: Four Stars
Body: Beautiful color!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2013
Author: Kate
Title: Beautiful Color
Body: These have a absolutely beautiful color (cranberry). I have them in the guest bath and get loads of complements on them! They do shed a lot a first but I washed them a couple times before putting them in the bathroom and haven't had any complaints.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2015
Author: Leah M.
Title: Luxurious
Body: Super thick & luxurious. I've never bought towels of this high quality for so inexpensive. I am so happy with my purchase that i am gifting a friend of mine (newly on his own) two sets as a housewarming present. Just can't say enough good things about this product. Thank you Amazon!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2014
Author: keith kelly
Title: Not what I was expecting
Body: I needed a nice set of towels for college and was highly disappointed when I got these and they started shedding lint all over the place. My first set was so much worse, but the quality of these towels is definitely lacking. They weren't that expensive, so I guess I got what I paid for, but ultimately they were bad quality. They also don't absorb water that well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2014
Author: William Cipolli
Title: but they're definitely better than Wal-mart or Target towels at about the same ...
Body: Completely ridiculous original pricing, but they're definitely better than Wal-mart or Target towels at about the same price point. The white towels are super bright; they make the room seem brighter. They are soft and survived the first washing with no problems.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2017
Author: rhoffa
Title: Super soft, fluffy and absorbent.
Body: The towels are soft and fairly plush. Very good quality for everyday use, and are much better than average. So far they've held up superbly to laundering. Also my set did not have any hanging threads that others have complained of. My favorite thing about these towels is that they really are generously sized, which makes a difference.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2014
Author: Goopy1950
Title: It's a shame
Body: I bought these because of the reviews that I read.It seemed great, Egyptian cotton, Oh boy.When I washed them the first two times the color ran. Not a good thing, because my set is now a light brown and look washed outI won't buy these again....

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2016
Author: diegorel
Title: Brace Yourselves, Lint war is coming
Body: These towels feel nice, look nice and dry nice. However there is a big BUT in these.. They shed so much lint even after the 5th wash, that I'm starting to think of giving them away. With each dry they clog the lint filter to the point I have to stop the cycle and clean it manually just to finish it. Disappointed

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2015
Author: Book Lover 21
Title: Great towels!
Body: These are great towels! There was a lot of lint after the first wash and dry but they are still thick, soft and absorbent. The 30" X 56" bath towels average about 31.5" X 56.5", the 13" X 13" washcloths average about 13.5" X 13.5" and the 18" X 30" hand towels average about 16.5" X 31".

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2013
Author: James B
Title: Soft Comfortable Towels/Questionable Threading
Body: These towels are comfortable and absorbant. However, the threading started to fray on these after the first wash.. They haven't fallen apart just yet but are a bit annoying when you have guests and you give them what looks like an old towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2017
Author: RBreinich
Title: We bought a set of red and a set of ...
Body: We bought a set of red and a set of black.  In both sets, after washing them, there were several threads that unraveled and caught some of the normal lint that I would expect new towels to shed in the dryer.  I trimmed them off, and there does not seem to be any loose or ripped seams.  The colors are rich and the towels are soft and plush.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2013
Author: HappyParrot
Title: Just what I was looking for!!
Body: I really like these towels.  The quality is very good for the price.  I recommend prewashing and a long dryer run to remove excess lint.  They are a good size and the color is perfect. They are fairly thick and very absorbent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2013
Author: Shae
Title: Cheap n Decent
Body: You get what you pay for. These towels are a bit rough. I've used fabric softener but they're still not comfy. However, I needed towels and had a low budget so they fit the bill. Keep in mind, white towels don't stay white for long. Even with bleach!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2019
Author: BC
Title: Came in great
Body: great product

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2016
Author: T. Tyler
Title: Good for the price
Body: Lose threads and a few runs in the cotton, right out of the box.A few months later they still hold together well, they are soft and maintain their color. But the cotton looks a few years old because of the runs and loose threads.I'd give them 5stars if they held up better cosmetically,  they perform fine

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2015
Author: Graewolf
Title: LOVE them!!!
Body: Thick, soft, plush, absorbent, beautiful color which lasts and doesn't fade even when washed in hot water. I love them. They look like high quality, ARE great quality at a great price, and have not raveled or gotten any loose threads. They still look new after many uses and washings. I highly recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2015
Author: Andy
Title: I was expecting them to be nice and soft and decent qulity
Body: I am so disapointed with these towels...I was expecting them to be nice and soft and decent qulity, but of course that wasn't the case these towels are a bit hard and super thin. I washed them before using them since they came in a plastic bag and the smelled of plastic. After the first wash the thread started coming undone, after my shower I grabbed the towel to dry off and there was red fluff all over me!! I was covered in red fluff so was the floor and the bathtub. I will not buy this again nor do I recomend it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2014
Author: lovestoread
Title: Look like rolled in lint
Body: I usually am very happy with products I get on Amazon but in this case I would give a lesser rating if possible. When I received the towels I immediately washed them and started using them. My husband used them first and when he complained about the lint I really didn't pay attention. However, when I used them I realized if anything he under complained. After using this towel I looked I was rolled in navy blue lint. I washed them six more times and it did reduce the lint some but not nearly enough.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2015
Author: Margaret N.
Title: Not colour fast
Body: I was very pleased with the appearance and feel of this towel set when I received it but the minute I started using it, the water ran bright RED with dye. How is it possible to sell a towel set which runs when it comes into contact with water? In fact, NO other towels I've bought in the last 20 years have run-- who knew there were throwbacks to the bad old days still on the market?And it does not look as if it's going to stop after the first wash which means you can never wash them with any other items. I'm upset and disappointed and also feel cheated because I live too far away to return the unused ones. Amazon should withdraw this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2014
Author: Skee
Title: Seams unraveling in places
Body: The seams were not properly sewen. They are begining to unravel along parts of the seam, especially the bathtowel. They are great for drying off after a shower. The bathtowel is nice and large. A little ackward to use whule in wheelchair, but still nice.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2013
Author: MYK
Title: Decent for the price
Body: Be VERY VERY CAREFUL NOT to wash these with anything else because they have a lot of lent or cloth or whatever that comes off the first time.  After that they are still very soft and heavy enough that they should last awhile.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2013
Author: Checkers
Title: Really pleased!
Body: I love these towel sets. They are oversized and luxurious. Washed them before first use on delicate cycle and dried them on low. Had a small amount of shedding, but towels are great! I have ordered in 5 other colors. I love these towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2016
Author: Lindsay DeCarlo
Title: Great quality for the price
Body: Great quality for the price. They are fluffy and nice thick material - not like the cheap towels that leave fuzz on you.Stayed great even after washing and the rich royal purple color has stayed bright and vibrant.This is a good set. I live alone and it was the perfect amount for myself and a guest.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2015
Author: D. Blanks, Sr.
Title: Great, but could be a little better
Body: I purchased two sets of these.  Make sure to wash them first, as with any towels.  Very well made.  The bath towels are soft and are great for drying off.  The hand towels take a very long time to absorb water and doesn't hold it very well.  But overall, I'm satisfied with them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2017
Author: Patrick L. Mccabe
Title: It's In the Details
Body: This is the second time I've bought these towels.  The first time I gave them 5-Stars, this time several of the towels/washcloths/hand towels are coming un-sewed at the seems on the ends.  Nothing impossible or even hard to fix, but it shouldn't happen and I've taken a star away.  Other than that, these are great everyday use towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2016
Author: Brandon
Title: High quality towel set for the price.
Body: There are better towels, but they obviously cost much more. They're thicker than I expected as well. I've read some reviews stating that these lose a lot of lint in the dryer. New fabrics always lose a lot of lint in my experiences. My towels have been washed 3 times now, and they're not losing any more than normal now.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2017
Author: Dustin Antuna
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2013
Author: Gerald J. Wyckoff
Title: Decent towels
Body: Bought as a gift, the towels seem decent with the as advertised color. They definitely need a wash before use to get rid of the sizing. I didn't notice and fraying or color lose after a good vigorous wash.Pretty much as advertised.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2014
Author: Aleata Jordan
Title: Decent set
Body: This set is very decent for the price. My only issues were that the towels were smaller than I was expecting and some of the threads came loose during the first pre-use wash.The thickness is actually quite nice. And the softness feels great on the skin.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2014
Author: steve grosso
Title: Beautiful color (cocoa brown) and so nice and soft
Body: I got these from my husband Steve for Christmas.  They are just what I wanted! Beautiful color (cocoa brown) and so nice and soft.  The big towels are fluffy and big-not like those skimpy almost see-through ones.  Very happy with my hubby's choice.  He did Good!!!Sara

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2013
Author: John Armstrong
Title: cheap & Thin
Body: We have some of their better line up so we bought these on line - what a major disappointment.  If they were any thinner, you could see through them.  We put them right back in the box and set them back - gotta love PRIME

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2016
Author: Patrick R
Title: Amazing, and I mean it
Body: Just excellent. Buy these. I have the white and am really pleased with the performance in every respect. More than thick enough, dry well and hang dry quickly. Plush feel, but not that silly plush that serves no purpose. Good construction. Couldn't believe the quality for the price. Buy lots before that price goes up.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2016
Author: L42
Title: Nicer than the price
Body: Nice set, especially for the price.  Softened up when I washed them.  They still shed red lint after a few washes, but I think they'll be through most of in in another wash or two.  Really good towels for the price. I was actually surprised at how nice the quality was when they arrived.  Well worth the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2014
Author: KAT
Title: LOVE THESE
Body: I love these towels. All the kids are gone! Nice, wonderful replacements for just me. I bought 2 packs of the cream color. They were excellent quality. I was expecting to get something just a little bit less. So, I was really really happy with these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2017
Author: Katie
Title: $20 is a great price for these to last hopefully at least 6 ...
Body: I ordered the cream color and washed once before use. I didn't have the lint or tearing issues posted by other reviewers. Even if they do go through some wear and tear quickly, $20 is a great price for these to last hopefully at least 6 months to a year. I think they will hold up regardless. Such a great deal and the towels feel great!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2016
Author: RJAG32123
Title: They are a great quality and have now become the towels we use ...
Body: Bought these for when I had family coming over.  Had zero issues with them.  They are a great quality and have now become the towels we use all the time.  The color goes perfect in our bathroom and came exactly like the picture.  I'll probably buy some more in the near future in another color just to have around.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2016
Author: Abrad4
Title: Will buy more
Body: I've had these towels for 4 months now and are my primary bath towels. So needless to say I've washed them a lot. I bought them in Plum (the color in the picture is not what you get) but they haven't had any unraveling. They are still as soft as the day I bought them and I'd purchase them again. The color did slightly fade but it's nothing too bad (picture below).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2017
Author: MariLynn Mulheron
Title: Problematic unless you like the tie-dyed bleach effect
Body: Two-thirds of these towels and up not being colorfast—one wash and they look like you’ve spilled bleach on them. (At first, I thought maybe that happened, except it happened to three batches of towels in three different washing machines across three states in two years and I haven’t kept bleach in my home for at least 15 years.) I was buying more replaced the defective ones, but the same thing happened. So frustrating. I do like the colors and the weight and the price, but you have to buy 2-3 times what you need hoping you’ll have some survive the first wash.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2015
Author: Molly
Title: Very nice
Body: I am very pleased with these towels. The bath towels are generously sized, as are the hand towels and wash clothes. The color looks as pictured, a pretty, vibrant blue. These are not lush but very good for the price. They hold up after laundering. I'm sure the color will fade, that usually happens.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2013
Author: JN
Title: great for the price
Body: great for md level events, like house party or bbq.  nive enough to put out but not fancy enough to worry about. washes ok, but not as plush as the description makes it seem, but for the price, and amount of towels and such fast delivery, wotrth it!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2015
Author: Mike
Title: Great for the price unless you wear contacts
Body: They've  held up better than I expected for the price. After 6 months of regular use, they're still in great shape. They still lose some fuzz though . After the first couple washings, I didn't notice anymore, but my husband still won't use them. Apparently, the fuzz is still a minor issue, which is major when you wear contacts and rub tiny pieces of fuzz into your eyes. i certainly wouldn't use them on glasses either. Or a mirror.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2013
Author: K. Bowser
Title: Great Deal
Body: For this price, I can't believe how nice these towels are.  I got the cream colored and they are like cream icing...a little bit of yellow, but it is attractive and they are also really soft and absorbant.  They washed up great, too!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2016
Author: DKThorn
Title: Package arrived wrapped in plastic which was nice since you never know what can happen during shipment
Body: Package arrived wrapped in plastic which was nice since you never know what can happen during shipment. Towels were very soft as you would expect Egyptian cotton to be. The color was true to the photo when making the selection. Tags displayed care instructions as they should. Simple to wash and take care of. I imagine the towels will last if these directions are followed. Great purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2016
Author: A,E. Giaquinto
Title: towel set
Body: exact towels I've been looking for. heavy nap, nice and scratchy when I towel off.  similar towels in department stores cost 3 or 4 times as much..Make sure you wash them before use. they will leave some "nubs" in the washer. Shake them out after they're dry to get rid of some fluff.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2014
Author: anonymous
Title: pertect
Body: I was looking at buying these for a month and finally pulled the trigger.  These towels are soft, big, and good at absorbing up the water.  Basically the best towel I've owned so far.  I got it in white, and it reminds me of nice hotel towels.  aka this was a good buy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2019
Author: Erica K.
Title: They’re okay
Body: 4 stars

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2013
Author: ABanana
Title: Not as thick as I thought
Body: I guess for $20 I could not expect it to be thick and heavy.  The Costco brands ($8.99) bath towel is thicker and fluffier.  This is comparable to their $7.99 bath towel.  So I would say for the price, 6 pieces for $20, it is appropriate.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2015
Author: RafaMac
Title: they look nice, finished well
Body: Hi, they look nice, finished well, but do not dry the skin as I expected, to pass through the skin, leaving the trace of moisture and wet, I thought that if he used enough time, accustoming to wash and dry in the machine, could improve, but did not improve over time, so do not recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2018
Author: Pam miller
Title: One Star
Body: The yarn was all over my hour; after one week; threw it away; waist of miney

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2014
Author: shortie
Title: Awesome!
Body: Soft and the navy is a great color! The color doesn't wear off either.Also dries you up in a short time. And when the ones you're using gets old, you can always take out the new ones because this set contains two pieces of everything!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2014
Author: Gabriel Ugarte
Title: Great buy
Body: I like white because I can have it laundered and it retains a clean crisp look.  They are nearly identical in size and quality to some Name brand towels I purchased at my favorite local warehouse club. They come neatly packed in a set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2014
Author: Dana
Title: poor quality
Body: I've washed these towels over 10 times now and they still leave red lint all over my body after the shower. Not to mention I have to wash them alone or else everything is covered with red lint. They don't even absorb the water well. I bought towels from target for 8$ that were 10 times better quality. Hopefully they eventually stop "shedding".

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2018
Author: Jodi-Ann Mitchell
Title: Five Stars
Body: Good quality and the color is amazing. Just like in the picture.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2014
Author: D&J
Title: Very nice towel set - as others have mentioned they do ...
Body: Very nice towel set - as others have mentioned they do throw off some serious lint, but only in the dryer here.  We've not had any issues with them when using to dry off and we did wash them before we first used them.  Color, gray, is as pictured.  Great price!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2013
Author: Katie C
Title: Great value
Body: I bought this set of towels for a bridal shower gift. I was quite impressed with the quality for the price. So much so I plan on buying myself a set. You get 2 bath towels ,2 face towels, and 2wash cloths. Very nice set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2016
Author: Wendy
Title: I did not pay attention to the customer reviews I ...
Body: I did not pay attention to the customer reviews I read before purchasing these towels...I wish I had..I bought a set of beige and brown.  The brown towels seem ok so far but the beige have ugly faded out, color lost splotches the third time i washed them..I would not buy again, in fact I would not take them if they were free.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2017
Author: lyzinskey
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great quality for the price, color as shown.Would recomend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2013
Author: Carl
Title: Best Towel Set I've Ever Owned!
Body: I've been labeled as having champagne taste with a beer budget, but this budget-buster was a must have, especially after I had the chance to use them. So soft and so dense ... true quality purchase at a phenomenal price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2018
Author: Beverly Campbell
Title: Buy these they are Great!
Body: The towels are larger than standard, wash and dry well and are very soft. I would buy them again!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2016
Author: Marcia Brinkley
Title: Long-Lasting Towels
Body: I've been using this set of towels for 2.5 years and they still look almost like new. I'm always wash my towels on delicate cycle in cold water, which may might help them last a little longer, but otherwise I don't baby them. The ones I bought are a light aqua. They still feel nice and think and have never shed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2015
Author: Sunb
Title: Great for the price
Body: I wasn't expecting too much after reading some of the reviews but when I got the set they look and feel fine like they feel soft and although they weren't fluffy at first I ran them through the wash and dryer with some dryer balls and they came out just as fluffy and nice as my other towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2014
Author: Drewski
Title: a great deal on a heavy set of towels
Body: dont know why so many people bitch about this set..they are a very good towel set at a very low cost..mine was 18.90 but went up since..im very pleased..almost 5 lbs of towels when you receive them..i went with blue..really nice and heavy!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2014
Author: Georgiasun
Title: Poor
Body: The towel themselves are okay nothing special but the first time I washed them the started to fall apart along the edges which is very disappointing. To be honest I would have sent them back if I would have known they were going to fall apart so quickly.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2016
Author: R.C. Hope
Title: Luxurious towels, great quality and value
Body: Luxurious, plush towels! I bought these to match a holiday shower curtain in my guest bath. I wasn't interested in the quality as they just were temporary for the holidays to hang on the towel rack. Once they arrived and I discovered the great quality I will definitely use them year round and be buying more for my other bath rooms.
