Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2015
Author: GDR, Las Vegas, NV
Title: Lose Color
Body: I washed the towels before use.Towels are absorbent and well made.Unable to give the sets a 5 star rating.The washcloths lost color.I use a very mild soap (Tone soap and shower gel).After 1 use they are now no longer grey,they are now taupe.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2013
Author: molly m
Title: Nice towels
Body: The towels seem nice , although I haven't laundered or used them yet , but wanted to post this about the color. The color of the towels are  not nearly as dark in reality as the picture. I was disappointed in that .

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2014
Author: Some Old Hippie
Title: Very nice.
Body: I was in desperate need of some new towels. So, I thought I would try these. The price seemed reasonable enough. I was delightfully surprised that they were of much better quality than I thought they would be. I am sure they will last quite awhile.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2013
Author: AKA Rocket Scientist
Title: Pinzon means quality
Body: These are the only types of towels i'll buy online now. They're thick, absorbant, pretty soft and feel substantial. I love their bath mats as well. The only other brand of towel that is as good for the money are the Target brand ones.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2014
Author: Sarah
Title: Perfect for guests!
Body: We got this to compiment our blue guest bathroom, with dark wood. This towel set is a nice quality, soaks up water well, and I like the size variety for my guests. The large towels are as large or bigger than many hotels, so that's a plus too.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2015
Author: B.S.
Title: Nice towel set.
Body: Love these towels, bought 6 sets.  They are priced well, well constructed, and the color is fantastic.  Very absorbent and don't have that weird quality that I hate when a towel is too fluffy that it doesn't feel like it gets you dry.  Would buy again.  Have recommended them to family members.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2013
Author: gldwng
Title: Very good, soft towels
Body: My wife and I really like these towels.  We normally buy our towels from a nationally known department store.  The description, price and reviews of these towels prompted us to give them a try.  We are not disappointed.  These are definitely a good buy for the price in my opinion, and are very comparable to the more expensive ones we normally buy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2015
Author: buckeyegoddess
Title: Best towels I've ever purchased
Body: Best towels I've ever purchased, and the price can't be beat.  These towels are better than the ones you find in hotels, and the full size towels (instead of that weird size that just covers your... nether region) are wonderful.  I wish they had more colors; I would buy them all!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: first couple uses have passed and I have to say I'm a little disappointed with this set
Body: Well, first couple uses have passed and I have to say I'm a little disappointed with this set. The picture shows the set as slightly darker than what I recieved and I was expecting the towels to be quite a bit softer for being Egyptian cotton. They're good if you need them but you could get the same quality product at walmart for a fraction of the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2013
Author: C.R.
Title: Pinzon cotton towel set
Body: I very much like the 6 piece Pinzon cotton towel set; the towels are thick and absorbent.  I did not want to spend too much $$$$ on a matching set, but wanted them to meet my needs.  These towels are the answer!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2019
Author: emily roberts
Title: hkfh
Body: hkfhkf

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2018
Author: SC
Title: Loose Threads
Body: Washed these towels once and loose threads on every towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2014
Author: Heinyken
Title: Exactly What You'd Expect
Body: This towel set is more or less precisely what you'd expect: a nice, decently fluffy towel set. Wash them and run them through the drier a few times before use - cleaning the lint trap. You'll have lint EVERYWHERE for the first use/wash or three.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2018
Author: Charlotte Perryman
Title: Five Stars
Body: Good deal

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2015
Author: BBrown
Title: Great Value for the Cost
Body: Make sure you wash them by themselves the first couple times as they will put red fuzzies all over your clothes.  Have had them for 6+ months now and are still in great shape.  They are very thick and absorbent.  Very surprised at how nice they are considering the cost.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2014
Author: Billy's
Title: Love, Love, Love them!!
Body: I'm so glad I ordered these towels.I figured if I didn't like them I was only out 20 bucks.I washed and dried them and I was not disappoionted the first time I used them.Now I can't wait for payday so I can order some more!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2015
Author: Jen
Title: Great soft towel, great set!
Body: I LOVE THESE TOWELS! Such a better deal than walmart.  They are big, soft and don't tear up easily.  They do say "Amazon" on the tags, but they look so great and feel great.  I love them and want to buy a bunch more! I got a bunch for my wedding too!LOVE THEM!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2014
Author: Guempel Family
Title: Love them so we bought more!
Body: This is our second time buying these towels and we love them. Haven't had any of them unravel. They are strong yet soft. Yes, the hand towels and wash cloths are big but we really don't mind. We just got the white towels because you can't go wrong with white!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2016
Author: Jay W
Title: Great towels for the price.
Body: I just got my set 11/4/16, and they are really soft and plush with a heavy knit. They are very absorbent and dry rather quickly after being used, which means they don't get the musty smell. I read quite a few reviews about the towels fraying and tearing in the wash/dryer. These did just fine in their first wash

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2016
Author: John OCD1.1
Title: Excellence!
Body: Unquestionably Premium Quality,I used my last pair of Premium Heavyweight Egyptian cotton towels for about 12 years,at which point they were fairly tired and worn-out.I do expect these will hold up as well, If I can resist buying more for that long..Fat Chance.-John

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2013
Author: GG_BCEagles08
Title: I love red towels
Body: I had red towels for a couple years and was always on the search for new towels that were the right color red and the right quality... and the right price. These were them and I am happy I stumbled across them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2014
Author: Angelino
Title: Good Enough for the Size and Price
Body: This product survived the 'intial wash before use' (while respecting the 'how to wash' label within the seams of the towel): they came out really soft; a few 'snags' and a few stitching came off but didn't damage/morph the actual product; but, the dryer's lint catcher was full after a 'slow tumble/low heat' setting.It's what's expected from a economically priced towel set of this size.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2016
Author: DIY40
Title: Rapid fade
Body: Faded with 2nd wash (cold water, no bleach)! I had other unwashed set for comparison; the washed set definitely dulled compared to the buttery yellow. 2 stars given due to poor dye quality, otherwise, the towels are nice quality, plush and absorbent. White is apparently the best option with these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2013
Author: Diana Loring
Title: We're enjoying these towels
Body: These were a good purchase with some cautions.Be sure to wash them with dark colors as this color bleeds through several washes.They are extra thick and absorbent (not fluffy and soft).  I like them very much.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2013
Author: Barbara
Title: Great towels at an excellent price
Body: Great towels  - they have held up well in the year since I have bought them. It would have been nice to have purchased the pieces separately since we do not use the wash clothes often - but in general - and excellent towel set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2014
Author: Ekaterina
Title: Great Towels, Would Purchase Again!
Body: Love these towel. The color is great, the quality is lovely, the thickness is perfect, they're not too soft and not too hard, they don't leave fuzz on you or all over the washer and dryer. If I ever need to redecorate my bathroom, I would look for these towel in a new color before I look anywhere else! If you're on the fence about these, go ahead and order yourself some.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2013
Author: Bill5673
Title: Seams fall apart!
Body: I washed the towels 3 times and now the edge piping is coming unraveled.  Out of the box they seemed like thick, nice towels for $20 but after the first wash, there were pils and pulls all over them.  They also don't seem to absorb as nice as they should even after 3 washes.  The last bummer is it has now been 60 days since I purchased them so I can't return them.  Poor quality product!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2015
Author: SRB25
Title: Gets the body dry, color looks faded somehow
Body: These towels do the job. Never owned a set of towels that got you dry in a single whipe down. Took two washed to get rid of the lint (I think another reviewer mentioned this) but otherwise good. The color could be a tad more deep...they looked faded before I washed them the first time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2013
Author: C. A. Duffy
Title: Very soft, good price, not as well made as the previous version of these towels
Body: I had a few sets of these towels from 4-5 years ago, they were the same price but much better made. These are super soft, and a good deal but I've had one of my towels start to unravel after a few months of use.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2013
Author: Mona
Title: Perfect
Body: Please be aware that you're getting more then what you paid for this. Super deal!! They are soft and hold up to normal wear & tear, they get regular usage and wash and months later still in perfect condition.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great quality!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2013
Author: Warren A.
Title: oddly non-absorbent
Body: They certainly look and feel plush. But after 4 washings, they still aren't very absorbent. Water can still roll off. Not like any cotten towels I ever used. And the edge bindings are starting to let go after 4 machine washings. Meh.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2016
Author: sicbeatz
Title: For the price, quality it as expected.
Body: For the price, quality it as expected. The towels shed quite a bit until they go through at least a couple washes. They do seem soft and luxury towel-like, but they don't seem to absorb the water as well other towels when drying off. Kind of feels like it's just moving the water around on me after getting out of the shower vs. actually removing the water/soaking it up. These are fine if you need an inexpensive set of matching towels. Don't think I'd buy them again, though.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2015
Author: Senior citizen
Title: great deal
Body: I bought a set in plum, and liked them so much that I ordered two more sets in Wedgwood and in driftwood.  You need to wash them once or twice before using them, but they hold up really good.  Better quality than others I have paid more Money for.  Would recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2015
Author: Pattie
Title: These towels are great, so far
Body: These towels are great, so far.  I did wash and dry them and have them on my towel racks in bathroom.  I found the Bath Towel to be a good size.  I cannot comment further, as using them for decor right now... But they feel nice, and will dry well when out of the shower.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2016
Author: MIKO
Title: Nice for the price
Body: These towels are perfect if you don't like too thick. They are not cheaply made and washed very well for over a year.The color stayed true, and looked stunning in my bathroom.A lovely shade of gray.The were delivered very quickly, I'm very happy with the purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2017
Author: Tom C
Title: Four Stars
Body: Very nice. Good quality

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2014
Author: Terri
Title: Not a quality product
Body: When washed there was large "chunks" of fiber...as if pieces were falling apart...in the wash.  It continued to disintegrate at such a rate I didn't think there would be any towel left after a second washing.  Returned!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2013
Author: EightInTheNest
Title: What a deal
Body: AWESOME. We love these towels. We've purchased many. We've always gotten the pistachio color, but bought the navy for my MIL, and she said the color made everything else in that load of laundry turn blue.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: One Star
Body: Does not match the color shown 😕

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2013
Author: Michelle
Title: Great Towels, Great Price
Body: The color matched perfectly with the new shower curtain we bought.  I couldn't find a deal like this at any department store.  By the third wash and dry almost all the extra fuzz was gone and towels were more absorbent.  So far, very happy with the quality and price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2018
Author: Shawn
Title: Lol I'd never buy again
Body: Sandpaper of the towel world

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2015
Author: Flowersnknuckleheads
Title: Great towel set for the price.
Body: For the price these towels are great quality. After wash and dry - no pilling, no shedding and the borders did not shrink. They do their job well - absorbency and drying time. Color was very good. Recommend these - at the price for the number of towels, well worth it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2015
Author: Michael
Title: Great, soft towels
Body: I bought these towels as a gift for my in-laws, and they are surprisingly plush and soft.  My mother-in-law tells me they washed up well, and they look great in their bathroom.  So far, they're holding up just fine.  These are a great product for the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2014
Author: S. Caron
Title: I like them a lot
Body: These towels came out of the wash full of lint. However, they came out of the dryer lint free, soft and fluffy. I like them a lot. I would definitely recommend them. They're just the right weight. i don't like my towels too thick, or too thin. Perfect for me!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2015
Author: Locksmith
Title: Nice Towels
Body: Was looking for these colors of towels for our rustic bathroom. Wife said it was a very good price and that they would look nice and that I should buy them. Received them and my hard to please wife gave me a smile of approval. Thanks Pinzon Egyptian 6-piece towel set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2013
Author: TheDaddy
Title: Top of the Line
Body: I was a little skeptical about ordering a towel set online that I couldn't hold in my hand and feel.  This product way exceeded my expectations and are very full and fluffy.  You can tell by the feel it is made to last.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2014
Author: golftaxi
Title: The worst towels I ever bought
Body: The worst towels I ever bought. Fell apart and shredded the first time washed. Handfuls of lint on the first washing. I would rate these towels with No Stars except for Amazons return policy which refunded my purchase price and shipping costs.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2014
Author: Nick
Title: Good value
Body: I have know purchased 5 sets in many different colors. They feel good. The pictures show all the colors as being darker then what the really are. but that set aside, the colors are still nice. Just not true to the picture. Great quality  Great value.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2013
Author: BRENDA R
Title: Great Towels
Body: They're a pretty rich brown color and they are really soft and thick, The bath towels are very large and the hand towels are as well. They are great, especially for the money. I feel these towels are a very good buy!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2014
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: poor quality
Body: I washed my set before I started to use it, and the lint filter was totally clogged.  All the threads on the towel started to unravel and they look very, very used already.  I was very disappointed and will not buy this again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2013
Author: Adriana Lovera
Title: My opinion
Body: why do you choose this rating: Due to that the service and quality are excellentwhat do you like or dislike? All like to meWho would you recommended this products to? I recommended all persons

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2014
Author: Dan
Title: Fine towels for the price.
Body: Towels have a few snagged threads after washing, but nothing major. These towels are plush enough to be soft when you dry off, but still get you dry without spending 5 minutes like you would with other "luxury" towels. Would buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2013
Author: pamela nosko
Title: Luxurious....
Body: These towels are not only beautiful, but they are soft and luxurious too.  Plus, they wrap around the body perfectly. The only reason I gave 4 out of 5 stars is that after five washings they still shed in the dryer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2013
Author: Chris LaRosa
Title: Pure C*R*A*P
Body: Ok, we ALL know the saying "you get what u paid for".  Well, baby, these towels personify that old adage.  These towel were CHEAP...and they ARE cheap.  Sure, they look perty, and I must admit the colors are current and oh-so Pottery Barn, but these ain't PB by ANY stretch of the imagination.  More like DOLLAH TREE.  So be forewarned: these towels are really pretty hanging on your guest-bath towel bar, but DON'T WASH THEM--  They'll fall apart faster than Marcus Bachman at a gay strip club.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2014
Author: Thomas Meyer
Title: Comfy towels.
Body: Fluffy towels. I bought one set to check them out.  Washed (in vinegar as recommended in another review), tumble dried, and used it the next day.  Promptly ordered another set. The fit/finish look good and I expect they will last a long time.  Recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2015
Author: Natalie
Title: These are perfect for the guest bathroom- I washed them with fabric ...
Body: These are perfect for the guest bathroom- I washed them with fabric softener and they feel great, they're just fine for me! I don't expect too too much since they were so cheap, so time will tell, I will let yall know how they stand up- but so far--SUPER awesome!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2013
Author: Miguel A. Grullon
Title: Worst Product ever buy at Amazon, my unique bad experience
Body: This are the worst towels you can get.Product came with a lot of quality flaws, i even had to use a scissors to cut a lot of imperfections, then… i took a bath and when i try them i was all cover in towel residues.I won't recommend you to buy this towels or from this vendor, they should have at least had a look at them before shipping, it was noticeable they were not in perfect condition.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2015
Author: Elbeau
Title: Decent But Not More
Body: These are hardly luxury towels.  While better than average, they aren't especially fluffy or soft. They are okay, but not great, on absorbency. They are on the thin side. They do a decent job of drying. All things considered, they are decent but not luxury.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2014
Author: NYC Coach
Title: These are okay
Body: Very nice, soft towels. I was amazed as to how soft they are. However they shed. You have will have fuzzes from the towel at your feet, and on your skin. The wash clothes and hand towels haven't shed like the large bath towels yet.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2014
Author: RJ4
Title: Pinzon Towel set
Body: This item was shipped and received ahead of schedule. These were a gift for my wife. These towels look great but we haven't had them long enough to know if they will hold up for long usage but she seems to like them alot.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2013
Author: Joanna
Title: Horrible
Body: These towels are horrible, I have no idea why anyone would say they're absorbent, as I feel like they just smear the water all over and don't pick up anything at all!! And they did shed a lot in the wash also.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2016
Author: Clovergirl
Title: Good quality Towels!
Body: These towels are amazing!  I was not expecting to receive something this nice!  It is hard to find quality towels at a reasonable price.  These towels are heavy and the edges are finished nicely.  I have proudly placed them in the guest bathroom for my guests.  I would definitely recommend these to others!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2018
Author: Gustavo
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great product! I've been using it for over 2 years and it's still great!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2017
Author: Joe
Title: Great value!
Body: Great value, BIG, thirsty, soft towels.  Just ordered another set!  Love em!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2014
Author: GA peach
Title: a lot of fuzz
Body: I love the color and it is a good absorbing towel.  I do not like having to wipe up red fuzz from the towel all over my bathroom after it goes through the dryer (enough comes out in the lint basket but more is left on the towel).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2015
Author: Ric
Title: Excellent bath and shower towel set!
Body: Towels look great, feel soft but warning. Don't be in a rush like me. WASH these towels FIRST because they bleed. After the first wash or two they're fine. Also wash separately (meaning nothing else in washer!!!) They actually tell you that & I recommend listening.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2018
Author: Melanie fuchs
Title: Speed of service and price
Body: Great product

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2014
Author: H.C. Davis
Title: Excellent product.
Body: These towels are well made and soft. I am very happy with their construction. I liked the first set so well that I bought a total of three and replaced all of our household towels. Even with daily washing, these towels are showing no sign of unraveling or disrepair.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2013
Author: lol
Title: Gets you Dry
Body: I needed some new towels to get me dry. These do the job. They seem like nice quality. I am not a towel expert so Im not really sure how to elaborate or judge towels. If you are wet and need to get dry, these will do the trick.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2015
Author: Amazon13
Title: No color lost after four washings!
Body: I love these towels, they are soft and pliable and stand up, so far, to washings without damage or ripping with no color lost after four washings! The bath towels are great for shampooing your hair, keeps the water from running down your neck and back!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2015
Author: Adams Outlet
Title: Not great...
Body: So there are two pretty similar types of these towels by the same company, I opted for the more expensive set after reading some negative reviews on the cheaper ones. I am sad to report that the only positive thing about these towels is the color, and the decent price. They shed like a moose in heat.. Even after washing three times- I could probably make another towel with the lint from my dryer... And even worse- they are hardlyAbsorb any water. I have two 6 year old scratchy ikea towels that I prefer over these... Pretty bummed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2013
Author: jean
Title: After first washing, great product
Body: Thanks to previous reviews, I knew this product would shed, so washed it immediately.  And it DID shed - a lot.  But afterwards, they are still great, soft,oversized, absorbent towels.  Can't beat at the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2018
Author: Rebecca Eve
Title: Best towels I ever bought
Body: These are the softest damn towels and I love it! They are very absorbent as well and have a rich color that so far has not faded. The only downside is that everything my body touches after a shower had little red pills and fibers all over them. My hairbrush has a nice layer of a deep red dust bunnies. And don't even get me started on what my deodorant has collected. But that being said, I certainly don't regret buying them at all, and I'm very happy with them. They are so nice and warm after a shower and they go very nicely with the color scheme in my bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2015
Author: Trish
Title: These towels are wonderful! I just washed them after delivery
Body: These towels are wonderful!  I just washed them after delivery, they are soft, fluffy and a great size....not too big, not too small.  They absorb a lot of water, so that you don't have the feeling of being a little damp after you have toweled off.  I will be passing on my good find to others. Couldn't believe how little they cost for the quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2014
Author: Vv
Title: Quality of this product is  extremely poor
Body: The quality of this product is  extremely poor.I cannot normally use it, because of cottonfluff or cotton dust (I do not know, how to callit correctly).I have tried to clean it up several times - when I just got it, after  laundering, when it was wet, later, when it got dry and it still has a lot of this fluff. After using this product, I have to clean this fluff from my body.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2015
Author: N. Eggleston
Title: Great towels, poor color
Body: The color is inconsistent even within the same pack. It's upsetting when a single package has three different variations of the same color. I've ordered several packages to try to and get matching sets.The towels are great though. They are great quality other than the issue of color

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2017
Author: Leileigh
Title: A-OK
Body: These are cheap towels that you get online. Better than most cheap towels, and they dry you off good, but they're not super soft or anything. They kind of saved us though, because we lost a lot of our stuff when we moved and we didn't have a lot of money. They are above average for the price

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2015
Author: Selana I.
Title: These are okay
Body: There were strings on it and it unraveled a bit before a single use, but at that point, I had already washed them so you get what you pay for, I suppose.The colour is as expected and other than that (and it was just one towel) no problems.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2016
Author: Mugsy
Title: These are great towles. They are soft and absorbent
Body: These are great towles. They are soft and absorbent, unfortunately, my wonderful hubby thought the washcloths would be perfect for cleaning his guns and working in the garage.  I guess they work great for that also. I figure they are towels and are replaceable, my hubby isnot.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2013
Author: Brooklynn
Title: Nice for the money
Body: These area nice set for the money.  Yes they do "fray" a little when you first wash them-- but all in all... For ppl who like something like a lower grade " Jcpenny like" towel --- these are good quality. I do recommend that you wash them a few times first only because they have little lint balls that shed.  This would be my only complaint. For someone that thinks shopping at Target is appropriate..... These will suffice.  If you are used to Saks..... NO.  Simple as that.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2016
Author: Tammy Skye
Title: Pretty Good quality
Body: Pretty Good quality.  The towels are quite nice and very soft.  The bath towels seem larger than most standard towels so they wrap around your body and feel very luxurious. Fast Prime shipping.  Very pleased with my purchase.  I will likely get them in black for my other bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2013
Author: Maryland Mom
Title: Nice soft towels, but stitching did not hold up
Body: I received the towels and washed them before use. The stitching on the edges unraveled on several pieces in the very first wash. Very disappointing to see poor sewing. However, the towels are soft, fluffy and absorbent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2017
Author: Tull1
Title: Surprised at how thick and soft these are for the price.
Body: Surprised at how thick and soft these are. Great value!  In an era where "they don't make them like they use to" exist, these towels exceeded my expectations. I recommend washing them first in cold water (and dry) to take off any lint.  I've washed these twice since and look/feel as good as new.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2016
Author: WS
Title: Nice towels/short life
Body: We like the feel of the Egyptian Cotton and it's drying capability.  That being said, after only two uses, one towels seam began coming loose.  The other towel got a snag after about five uses.  Nice towels but their useful life will probably be less than one year.  Too bad the quality does not match the material.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2014
Author: Julie Anne
Title: Good Towels, Fair Price
Body: This is a good set of towels.  They are thick enough and appear to be well made though I've had better towels in the past.  They do shed, at least for a while, but I expect that will stop after enough washings (?).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2016
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: A good buy!
Body: The towel set is really nice!  I like when you wash them they are nice and fluffy when they come out of the dryer.  I have bought towels from other companies and they are so stiff when they come out of the dryer or when I hang them on the wash line. The olive is really pretty and they are worth the price I paid for them.  I would order another set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2013
Author: dearjess
Title: Not as soft
Body: I bought this set as a gift for my grandmother. Whereas she is happy to receive it, it's not as soft as I expected it to be. It's actually rather scratchy. They're a good size however and decent quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2018
Author: Marcie Vu
Title: Love these towels
Body: So soft! Love these towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2016
Author: K Haynes
Title: or the like, thinking that they would just look nice and ...
Body: These towels are so soft!  I bought them on Amazon I THINK as a lightning deal, or the like, thinking that they would just look nice and go with our bathroom theme of grey & yellow.  My boyfriend was actually the first to mention how great they felt and if I had tried them yet!  And he can be hard to impress..  I recommend!  If I ever need more towels I'm looking here first!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2014
Author: Cognitive Bias
Title: Nice, quality towels at an affordable price
Body: Ordered another two sets of these after I got the originals.  Nice, quality towels at an affordable price.  I personally am a bit of a snob in the towel department and these met my expectations well...they are large and luxurious.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2016
Author: Jen C. S. Vieth
Title: Nice quality and great colors
Body: These towels are a great buy. They are absorbent and hold up after several washes. The only downside is that I bought a second set a few months after I bought the first set and the grey are a different shades. Not a show stopper, but it could drive a more picky person mad.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2015
Author: DH
Title: Not as bad as a "decorative" style towel
Body: Pros:- Thick- Fairly absorbent- Have held up well through several washesCons:- Take quite a while to dry- Could be more absorbent. Not as bad as a "decorative" style towel, but not the most absorbent towel I have used.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2014
Author: Chris Yang
Title: Not as good as I expect
Body: It's no difference than those sold at Walmart. If you want to save the time of traveling to the supermarket, you may wanna purchase it here. Otherwise it's perfectly fine to buy it next time when you go to Target or Walmart.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2013
Author: 1BigGeek
Title: Really big and absorbent
Body: These towels aren't the softest I've ever used. They are however extremely absorbent and oversized. For the price you can't beat these. I have already recommended these to friends. Get some.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2018
Author: Samantha
Title: Five Stars
Body: Very soft, large towels. Just what I expected!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2013
Author: Robyn Hunter
Title: Sweet
Body: I love the feel of these. Even my husband loves the softness.  He also likes the color as it isn't just done in the lighter tones.A good buy and I would highly recommend these!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2017
Author: Dror Dayan
Title: Four Stars
Body: A lot of shedding after the first wash/dry but good after

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2013
Author: anon
Title: Towel Set/Egyptian Cotton
Body: I was taken aback by the quality of these towels for such a fantastic price and beautiful color, I hope the seller/Amazon will offer other related items for the home because I am satisfied with my purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2014
Author: Marilyn Fields
Title: Worth the money
Body: This had some not so good comments from previous purchasers on this towel set.  I don't have a clue why.  They are well worth the money, oversized, fluff up nicely and do what they were designed to do.  Granted, they are not as thick as some towels that I have had, but I didn't want that.  I am pleased with these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2014
Author: rlh505
Title: Great quality for the price!
Body: I was a little skeptical of cheap towels that I couldn't acually feel, but these have turned out to be a great bargain!  They are soft and seem to have held up well (3mo).  Quick shipping and colors are true to images shown.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2013
Author: Elizabeth Machado
Title: Pinzon Basics/Pike Street Egyptian Cotton 725-Gram 6-Piece Towel Set...
Body: I had to replace all my old ripped towels and these were a great deal. I am surprised how soft and fluffy they are.  I am also super impressed with the quality of these. I have already bought 4 sets, and I couldn't be happier.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2016
Author: Speechless
Title: The absolute best!
Body: I've had these towels for 3 1/2 years, and they still seem new.  Since they're my only towels for 2 of us, that's pretty amazing.  They're the best towels I've ever seen, and I HIGHLY recommend them! They are thick and fluffy and soft, and they never shedded, even when they were brand new.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2014
Author: Sherwin
Title: The hand towels fares much better. They are quite soft
Body: These towels don't absorb as much water as I initially hoped that they would, maybe with more washings they will. The hand towels fares much better.They are quite soft, however, and very comfortable to wear and use!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2014
Author: Riley
Title: Seconds
Body: The towels are covered with pulls as I wash them. Very disappointed. For the price I expected they might not be thick but didn't think they'd look like rags after three washings. They are very thick and absorbent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2014
Author: David Ickowicz
Title: bad quality towels
Body: As soon as I got these towels, I proceeded to soak them in water with salt, then wash them in gentle cycle. Not good!!!  the stitchings on the borders got loose and now all my house is covered in fluffy stuff that was released from this towels as I hung them to dry.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2014
Author: Suzi Linthorst
Title: Quality
Body: When I took these towels out of the dryer (first washing), they came out totally snagged.  I have never had this problem before with snagging, so I know it is not my washer/dryer.  Very disappointed in the quality.  Beautiful color though.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2017
Author: Jose
Title: Five Stars
Body: The best quality!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2015
Author: Mary Ann
Title: THese bath towels are perfect. The larger bath towel is great for after ...
Body: THese bath towels are perfect. The larger bath towel is great for after bath or shower. Other towels I bought were too heavy and thick, Pinzon Cotton is just the perfect amount of softness and absorbability. THey wash up nicely and stay fluffy and soft for years to come.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2018
Author: Juan Serres
Title: Perfect!!
Body: Ok. Perfect!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2014
Author: Lorie Hurne
Title: Do Not Buy Falls Apart!
Body: First wash fell apart in the machine i mean fell apart chunks were missing iam still trying to get it all out of my machine do not buy also the wash cloth were so big you would need to use them as towels you could never use them as intended

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2014
Author: Susan
Title: Fab Towel Set
Body: These are the best towels for the price. You can't beat it anywhere that I have looked. They are soft and stay fluffy without falling apart after laundering. I have 3 sets now and will purchase again. Couldn't be happier!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2018
Author: Megan E.
Title: Five Stars
Body: Fuzzy and absorbant!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2015
Author: Barbara Dunham
Title: Loved everything except the comforter set
Body: Loved everything except the comforter set.  I sent an email explaining my opinion about this item but have not heard back. I was very very disappointed when I opened it. The website stated it had grey colors and it looked like just what I was wanting for our bedroom but it has a black bed skirt, black pillow, black pillow cases, and the picture I saw was so awesome and couldn't wait to get my bathroom and bedroom done in greys and get some accent colors for the walls. As you see I ordered grey towels, grey rug, and ordered earlier grey sheets. I really like ordering from amazon but am now skeptical of future orders.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2013
Author: lone wolf
Title: Bath time
Body: So far I have not had any problems with these towels. For twenty bucks you cant beat that. Yes they should be washed just like all towels and bedding that goes next to your skin.No Problems

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2013
Author: Em Johnson
Title: After a year, they're stil soft!
Body: I have two sets of these towels (green and cream), and I'm very happy with them.  They have held up very well after a year of use (with regular washing), although one of the seams has started to fray.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2013
Author: Troy Metzger
Title: Great Towels at a great price.
Body: I find that most quality towels even after multiple machine washings, still shed terribly. I only had to wash these twice before the shedding stopped. These are absorbent, thick and the best towels I've found in many years.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2014
Author: Patti Shel-Touzinsky
Title: okay, though not the greatest quality
Body: It's okay, but not the greatest quality made. After one washing/drying the most of seams were coming unraveled. We only purchase them to use as replacement towels. If your looking for better quality, best to consider paying more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2014
Author: T. Ware
Title: Soft and fluffy.
Body: I love these towels.  They are so soft and absorbent and feel lovely on my body as I am drying off.  The color is deep and stays true after several washings.  Well worth the price.  I wish I would have purchased a few more sets.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2015
Author: Susan Benson
Title: Pinzon Egyptian Cotton towels
Body: A gift to my daughter. She changed her color scheme in her bedroom to purple/plum and wanted a set of nice Egyptian Cotton towels for her bathroom. The color matched her other items. Nice soft towels, soaks up the water when drying off. Great towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love these towels. Color is really pretty and good quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2013
Author: RDuncan
Title: Good quality, great price
Body: I bought these towels in the cocoa/dark brown color first and liked them so much I bought another set. They aren't especially thick but are very absorbent and dry fast. They are also larger than average size towels. I may only be 5'2  but i swear the wash clothes are huge and the the bath towels are more like blankets!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2015
Author: Linda Boccia
Title: Pinzon Egyptian 6 piece towel set
Body: These towels were back ordered and they took forever to come.  When they did arrive they were thinner than expected and the color did not match the bath mat, but I decided that some things are not worth the effort to return and decided to keep them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2013
Author: Sneedle
Title: Don't buy these towels
Body: I love the color, but that is it!!I have washed them twice and I still get lint all over me when using them.They also don't absorb water at all, the water just sits on top of the towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2013
Author: PAToygal
Title: Pinzon Basics Egyptian Cotton 725-Gram 6-Piece Towel Set, Cranberry
Body: Nice towels;good deep color. A little soft for maximum absorbancy, however with a few washings, they will be great!Smooth transaction, with fast shipment.Would buy from again!Thank you!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2016
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Just ordered another set
Body: I just ordered another set of these towels.  They are really nice and absorbent.  I first ordered for my son to move into the dorm.  When he moved back home the family started using these towels and they are our favorite.  After 2 years, the color has faded from bleach, but they still feel really nice.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2016
Author: MW2
Title: I love these towels
Body: I love these towels.  All of the pieces are bigger than I expected which I really like.  I bought these to match a shower curtain and wound up not matching, however, the color is still really nice.  Instead of hanging them for decor, I'm using them regularly and I really like them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2013
Author: Kelly
Title: Disintegrated!
Body: These completely shredded at the edges upon very first wash, and the towels were as scratchy as leaves off a tree.  Will not purchase any Pinzon/Pike St items, or any items from this seller again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2013
Author: Gwenda Betzina
Title: Soft towels just don't dry!
Body: They do not really absorb the water, just smears it across your skin.  I've only washed a couple of times so far, they are soft but leave little fuzzies behind, hopefully they will get better after a few more washes.  They are soft though! :)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2013
Author: Brittnie Wilson
Title: Will buy again!!
Body: I love the color but I cant comment on the quality really since I just got them lol The towels are big though which I really like and they are a lot better than some other cheap towels I've purchased.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2018
Author: luc t
Title: Excellent price/Quality
Body: Excellent price/Quality

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2013
Author: Jane Doe
Title: Great towels
Body: Bought two sets of white. Washed them & did not have any issues with them fraying or lots of lint. They are great towels and even better for the price! I will be buying more in the future!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2013
Author: Lannemei
Title: Nice soft towels
Body: I am very happy with these towels. The only reason I gave it a 4 star is that they shed a bit even after washing. I am hoping that after the second wash it will decrease. Other than that, they're perfect.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2014
Author: Gina_D
Title: Cozy!!!
Body: These towels are sooo comfy! I never realized how terrible my other towels had been until I bought towels as warm, fuzzy, thick, and warm as these. The cream color matches perfectly with my Gypsy Ruffled Cream shower curtain.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2013
Author: Todd M Sames
Title: Great set of towels !
Body: Bought these because of the price point and was pleasantly surprised with the overall quality and weight of the towels.Nice colors, nice detailing and great quality for the money spent. Very pleased.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2014
Author: Cheryl
Title: We love these towels
Body: My whole family is happy with these towels. Once washed they are very soft and absorbent. I have ordered 4 sets so far and plan to get a couple more to finish replacing all my old towels. The colors are great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2015
Author: Dave
Title: Good buy
Body: Economical but good quality towel. This is not your 30/towel product, but it does the trick when not looking to buy expensive towels. I bought these and some seafoam blue towels, and the blue ones are fading and splotching while the brown are fine.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2014
Author: WritingRighter
Title: You won't regret this online buy!
Body: Amazing!  To get 2 towels, 2 wash clothes and 2 hand towels for under $30 is amazing, but then to find it to be top notch quality was even more surprising!I was very please, and I believe you will be too.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2013
Author: Doti Jean
Title: Good quality at good price. They look good in bathroom
Body: and I look forward to having them out for guests, as well as enjoy using them myself. Will look for other products like this when shopping in future.  Good quality terry; rich color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2013
Author: sassyorange
Title: Towels
Body: These towels are very nice. They are thick and plush.  Deep true colors. I wish I had an excuse to buy more. I wish I had more room in my cupboards to store more. Definitely a nice gift item.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2013
Author: Marina S
Title: Nice Fluffy Towels
Body: These are heavy, fluffy towels with just enough decoration to make them perfect for use as guest towels. I washed them and got no pulled strings and no pilling, which is wonderful.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2013
Author: Jahra Mack
Title: You get what you pay for!
Body: These towels are thinner than I was led to think and though I washed them before first use, they shed on my skin. For the money, they do look great on the rack and they are pleasant and soft on my skin.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2014
Author: Plain Jane
Title: Did not get six pieces
Body: Bought these for a gift and the wash clothes where missing. On the other hand I like the over sized hand towels  and the bath towels seem to be nice. Amazon got the wash clothes to me with speed I am very happy with purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2014
Author: MHRI12
Title: Super .... quality and value.
Body: Just as I expected....nice quality towel set (s).  I purchased the Navy Blue.  Nice thickness....not too heavy or too thin. Ordered on Sunday and I received them on Tuesday with a 5 8- shipping schedule.  Worth the money!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2013
Author: Determnator
Title: Christmas gift for inlaws
Body: Family loved these towels.  I got to use them after Christmas and they're super thick, but super wicking.  I was pleasantly surprised at the quality for the price!  Great towel!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2018
Author: melissa butler
Title: Four Stars
Body: I liked them a lot price is excellent there mice

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2015
Author: DIVEMASTER™️
Title: These towels are pretty soft. They don't pill or bed up after ...
Body: These towels are pretty soft. They don't pill or bed up after constant daily use. I've had them for a while now and I thnk I'm oing to order more just to have. I'm really surprised at how soft they are my wife even uses them for our toddler.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2015
Author: Debbie J.
Title: Very happy with this purchase!
Body: I've waited to give my review of these towels on purpose because I wanted to wash them a few times to see how they are holding up. They are great. Yes the arrived with loose threads hanging...but they were not connected to the towels so no big deal. They release a LOT of lint the first few washes but they a thick and absorbant and the color is staying. In fact, the more I've washed them, the more absorbant they've become. Very happy with this purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2015
Author: TheDude
Title: Worth spending more on something else
Body: For some more money you can get made in USA towels from Walmart.com which are much higher quality.  A set of six towels from their made in USA offerings would be about $45.  It's better quality and not made in a sweatshop in Pakistan.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2013
Author: T. Forden
Title: Soft towels but they shed like crazy
Body: These towels are soft and I like that. The downside of them is that they shed all over. My floors quickly get little specs of the towel on them after I use them. Also don't wash these with your clothes unless you want the same little specs all over your clothes. I've never had towels do this before.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2013
Author: D. Clark
Title: Imagine drying your hands on a shedding dog.
Body: I really wanted to love these towels, but no matter how many times I washed them they left gross blue fuzz everywhere. You have to wash them separately or else you'll get fuzz on everything you own. Even my washer had to be wiped out each time I washed them. Seriously, try drying your hands off on a shedding dog and that's about what you get with these towels. Total waste of money as you can't even use them as junky towels. Had to throw them away.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2016
Author: gregg
Title: They look and feel very nice but, both of the Lrg
Body: I have had/used these towels for a couple months. They look and feel very nice but,both of the Lrg. bath towels (grey) have "faded" into a reddish/brown color in the middle.They aren't really the kind of thing I would like company to see.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2015
Author: homestead homebody
Title: Curiousity cured
Body: I bought these to see if they really have as much lint as has been reported.  I could not believe that any towel could have THAT much lint!  Well, they do.  In fact I had just as much lint during the second washing!  I wonder if there will be any towel left by the fourth or fifth washing.  So, if you are like me and need some cheap towels and want to experience copious amounts of lint buy these towels.  If not, try another towel with better comments.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2017
Author: Mo
Title: Five Stars
Body: Good quality, luxurious

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2017
Author: budgiehawk
Title: I will buy these again.
Body: These towels and wash cloths spoil you for any other.  They are extra large, extra thick, and extra thirsty.  They have held up well in the washer and dryer and have remained soft.  I have them on a shelf with other high-end towels and these make the others look cheap.  I could not be more pleased

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2013
Author: Charles H. Cherry Jr
Title: Fantastic Deal
Body: This is one of the best purchases we have made in a long while. We got our monies worth while getting a good quality product. I washed them and the color did not fade, they are soft and just the right size not to big or to small. Great deal!! We even bought a set for our daugther and son-in-law, great gift, never can go wrong with new towel they are always needed. We will be back for more, hope they are still available then.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2014
Author: Jane T.
Title: Good quality
Body: I love these towels. The color is exactly like the picture. I'm not sure why some reviewers said that the towels were too big? The hand towel is perfect on my 12 inch rod in my powder room. They wash well too.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2014
Author: DeeDee A.
Title: Okay Towels.
Body: I needed really dark brown bathroom towels. I purchased these and found they were not as dark as I wanted.  They are okay towels.  Thy are not soft enough for my taste.  I was looking for something a little more plush.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2016
Author: Rion
Title: Nice, but not very soft
Body: I bought these towels because I needed softer fresh towels, and these come with a great amount of towels for the price. However, they're not the softest. I recommend these for quick trips when I'm need of towels while on the go, which is very necessary at times. But for everyday use, not so much if you're sensitive.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2014
Author: Valentino Massimo
Title: Outstanding
Body: Excellent bath towel sets..  only issue is the bleeding of dyes.. you will have to wash 4 or 5 times for this to stop.. and fills your dryer filter each time so make certain to change the lint filter.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2014
Author: amazon
Title: Poorly made
Body: I like the size and thickness of the towels. But after washing one time, seams and threading came out in towels and hand towel.  After one wash they appear as if I've had them for years.  I have older and cheaper ones from WalMart in better looking condition.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2013
Author: b. Molloy
Title: nice quality for the price
Body: nice, soft, absorbent -- good deal on sale. Thick enough but not too heavy to air dry hanging up, after a shower,in between trips to laundry.They've lasted well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2014
Author: Anna
Title: They shed a little bit, especially when they were ...
Body: They shed a little bit, especially when they were newer, but its not a major issue to me. I bought one set to try them out and have since bought two more sets. They've all survived several washes and remained white and fluffy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2016
Author: Daniel
Title: I've bought 6 sets of these, I liked them so much!
Body: Excellent towels! The Plum is a bit too purple, the cranberry is VERY nice, the Gray is also very nice, and the Moss is nice. I'd imagine the other colors are equally dyed, and I think they'll hold their color a long time. GREAT price for such decent towels. Thank you.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2013
Author: Josh Tan
Title: So Far So Good
Body: Haven't really tested it so not sure it's performance in the long run. I have washed them once. So far no major issue except some loose strings. Will provide update in a few months.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2017
Author: Stephanie
Title: Bleach spots without using bleach
Body: These towels washed and dried fine, normal amount of lint in dryer trap. I used 2 after a shower, one for my hair and one to dry off and now I have what look like bleach spots. Not sure if it poor quality towels, as my old towels never did this, or my hair products do not mix well with this type of cotton. Otherwise, comfortable towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2013
Author: Doodle
Title: Good quality cotton towel set
Body: This is my 2nd time of buying this set. The first was brown and now, white. I have no complaints whatsoever. I strongly recommend it will continue coming back for more whenever needed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2014
Author: Steven
Title: As others have said......
Body: With the first washing these towels started to shred, I suggest you purchase a different brand. Right now the only real use we have for these is to use them after we wash our car and need a way to dry it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2017
Author: Mike Crash
Title: I am still very pleased, especially with how inexpensive they are
Body: We've had the towels for about over 5 months now. They are holding up well in the wash. They still feel soft and absorb water very well. I am still very pleased, especially with how inexpensive they are. I wash them using the recommended care instructions on the label on the towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2016
Author: Holly C. Elkins
Title: Beautifully Made
Body: These towels are the nicest I have ever purchased.  They are extremely well made, thick and luxurious, and as long as you follow the laundry directions, they retain their beautiful color.  I am replacing all of my cheap, thin, worn towels with these.  I love them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2014
Author: dawnyd528
Title: ... towels for when we have guests and they are perfect. I bought another set for our own bathroom ...
Body: I got these as extra towels for when we have guests and they are perfect.  I bought another set for our own bathroom because they were even nicer than the towels we were using.  Great price and great quality.  Will probably be back again for more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2016
Author: Maria Mohr
Title: Not sure about these yet. Have had them for ...
Body: Not sure about these yet. Have had them for 2 weeks or so and the initial washing did leave a lot of red fuzzies in the wash and dryer. From time to time I get some on my body after a dry. Hoping more washes stops this. So far they haven't fallen apart

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2015
Author: dalelynn
Title: nice towel set except of noted flaw
Body: liked this at first but after month and half one of the towels has started to come apart  and has developed a flaw(hole) where the decorative band is located in the towel. Only been laundered probably 6 times when this started to appear

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2016
Author: Anon88
Title: I'd buy more but I don't think I need them
Body: Initial wash was with 1/4c vinegar then extra rinse (its supposed to help get whatever residue is on them off). Completely filled up dryer vent (expected), still gets fairly full but not bad now after a few months. Tags are SIMPLE to tear off, which is something I realized is awesome, towel tags can be a pain if they don't tear-away. Color was as expected from photo

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2014
Author: Gamma
Title: Nice, heavy towels!
Body: Love this brand here at Amazon -- towels are soft and very thick and nice -- colors are true to pictures - and overall reasonably priced considering you get 2 bath, 2 hand and 2 washcloths :)  Always have them on my list to keep replacing old sets.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2013
Author: Nancy R
Title: Large, luxurious feeling bath towel set
Body: These are very nice towels.  Washed very well and the first/second washings produced lint, but I alwaysexpect that with new towels.  Great feel when drying off.  Excellent purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2016
Author: Ginger West
Title: SUPER soft and plush
Body: Gorgeous color, SUPER soft and plush. Washed upon receipt and did notice a good deal of shedding. However, they have been washed since use and no further shedding, so hopefully it was a 'newness' thing. I will most certainly be buying more colors from this seller!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2015
Author: G.Glee
Title: Very nice towels
Body: I bought two sets of these towels; one for a gift. They're very nice, especially for the ridiculously low price. Only problem is you have to wash them over and over to get rid of the lint. I've washed them three times so far and a few threads pulled.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2013
Author: ER_Reviews
Title: I like the feel of these towels however seem to come unwound after a couple of washes.
Body: Like the color options on these towels, kind of sad to see them start to show frayed strings etc after a couple of washes.I may purchase more in the future if they are lower priced.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2014
Author: Kimber
Title: Time will tell...
Body: So far love these, just got them and only washed them once and there was a lot of lint but still very nice. Time will tell on how they hold up. For the price you can't beat it, I ordered a second set right away.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2013
Author: Mrs. Peaches
Title: Very nice.
Body: I ordered the Pinzon Basics Egyptian Cotton 725-Gram 6-Piece Towel Set in Cranberry. They look very nice. These are large, thick, good quality towels. I'll definitely be ordering a few more sets.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2016
Author: Patricia
Title: I was very disappointed by that
Body: The color fades after several washings and I have never used bleach or any other product other than soap. The color is irregular on some towels and just faded on others. I was very disappointed by that. They dry your skin very well, but the color has been a real problem.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2013
Author: Lee Carey
Title: Good towels
Body: These towels are great, heavy weight and dry you off! We've washed them a few times now and they are holding up well. We will be adding a set of gray ones for the Master bath.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2013
Author: Emi
Title: Towels
Body: Very good deal. Good price. Good quality. Colors have stayed well, no fading. I see no reason to pay so much money for 'luxury towels' when these look and work great. Gave as a gift.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2013
Author: akballer
Title: Good for a second bathroom...
Body: Great for the price. need to wash them once before they start to really absorb. Until then, they're kind of useless and super fuzzy. But with a wash or two, definitely great for a guest bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2013
Author: Anna K.
Title: Very nice
Body: The price is very reasonable and quality of towels is good. I put 4 stars only because I didn't use them yet and I didn't wash them yet so I don't know how they will look like after washing. You definitely get what you pay for.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2014
Author: AREVIEW
Title: Very luxurious, rich color
Body: Very soft, and a nice, rich color. Larger than I thought! I thought this was what they call bath sheets!  So heavy, that they have a hard time drying out in my windowless bathroom on humid days.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2015
Author: Deepa
Title: Love these white towels
Body: I bought a white set over a year ago and am still using them. For the first wash, I washed them in 1/2 cup vinegar, followed by detergent wash and then dried them in low heat. I always keep my towels clean. Wash them at least once a week or whenever necessary. Prefer to dry in low heat after using, rather than air dry. They still look good as new. Its fluffy and big. I use three sizes for different purposes; large ones for after bath, smallest ones for only face & hand, and medium sized ones for my feet and legs only. I never bleach my towels.These towels look so luxurious and nice that my husband also wanted to give white towels a try. We recently ordered a new white set for my husband. I hope it turns out good as the first order. Never wash or dry with other colors, laundry separately. If you take care of it well, it will stay nice for a long time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2018
Author: Rosa Gonzalez
Title: Five Stars
Body: Very good quality  nice color

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2013
Author: ZS
Title: Just the right thickness
Body: I thought these towels would be too thick for my liking, but I tried them anyway. If you're expecting large plush towels you'll be disappointed. I was happy with them, they are a standard towel and feel pretty soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2015
Author: Sarah
Title: Cheap, poor quality, don't waste your money!!
Body: These were terrible towels. With just one wipe of my hands with water they turned color! Buy the Target brand. About the same price, much more resilient, and better quality. I should have paid attention to the other reviews. Save your money, don't buy!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2016
Author: Carrie RA
Title: Great!
Body: Wish they had other colors, but the purple is nice! Washed and dried these immediately in my apartment building's not so great machines and they still came out fine :) No tearing at the seams or anything. Have had them for over a month and all three sizes are doing fine.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2017
Author: Dianne Ferrell
Title: Gave as a gift. Did not use for myself ...
Body: Gave as a gift.  Did not use for myself.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2013
Author: AZAmbler
Title: Stands up to sun well
Body: I use these towels to protect my patio furniture from the fierce Arizona sun and dust storms. Every couple of weeks we pop them in the washer, and they look good again. Nice product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2015
Author: Urgo
Title: nice color, nice plush, nice shedding...
Body: very nice and plush, also got these in sand-color and in blue. Only giving the red-ones three stars because for reasons unknown to mankind, these red towels shed like crazy, even after several washings. Not so for the other colors that we got.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2014
Author: EJB
Title: Best towels I have ever used
Body: I bought these on Amazon after a bathroom remodel. I must say these are some incredible towels. It seems they last about twice as long before needing to be washed and the cotton is very soft. Great product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2014
Author: Lois
Title: THE BEST SET OF TOWELS EVER !!!!
Body: These are the BEST set of towels by far I have ever purchased.  They are soft, wash very well & durable.  I am ordering two (2) sets to replace the ones that I paid ALOT more for from the fancy department stores.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2015
Author: Mamanti 2018
Title: Nice soft towels
Body: Great soft towelsLoved the price and the speedy delivery.Also the large towels are a decent length and they cover me properly, surely didn't short change on the length. You get two complete sets so that was nice as well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2018
Author: Chloe
Title: Five Stars
Body: I love these.  The quality is excellent

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2017
Author: llb
Title: Great towels for the price!
Body: I try to keep my household expenses on budget so won't drop $100 on sheets, towels, etc. Also would rather keep price reasonable to have extra for visitors and to keep myself from having to do laundry  constantly just to keep up! Amazon is my go to merchant for my purposes!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2013
Author: M. Heilbrun
Title: Nice towels
Body: The quality of these towels are very nice. Made of good materials. These towels look and feel like really expensive towels. Great patterns and color. Very pleased.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2014
Author: bgreen0722
Title: Nice towels
Body: For the price, this is a nice towel set. The bath towels are larger than a standard towel, but not as large as those bath wraps. But it is plenty big for an average person, and they are a good thickness.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2013
Author: Swede
Title: nice towel set
Body: I like these towels and wash cloths - they are nice and thick, dry you well, and I've had no problems with lint - the only drawback is that it takes the wash cloth a long time to dry after you use it ---

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2013
Author: Carmen
Title: Not exactly the color pictured
Body: I was going for a plum color and the towels I got are much lighter than the color pictured. I like them and they are good quality but I was just a bit disappointed in the color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2016
Author: Laura Phillips
Title: Still shedding!
Body: Still shedding like crazy after two washes.  I kept them because they match our master bath, but we don't actually use them- just for decoration!  Disappointed because I love all things Amazon.  Two stars because they are nice quality minus the shedding.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2014
Author: Eyesis
Title: Plush value for your dollar
Body: These towels are large and plush, and well made; amazing for the price. I couldn't be more pleased.  Check back with me after I've washed them. If they hold up, I'll be buying one in every color

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2016
Author: Lazarus
Title: Do NOT buy...total waste of money.
Body: A total waste of money.  Numerous washings and dryings and the product still leaves cotton residue on the skin and all over the bathroom floor.  It fills the dryer lint catch to brim every time.A totally useless product.  Threw it out.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love these towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2013
Author: C. Hinton
Title: They shed a lot
Body: I read about shedding in other reviews. I held off writing this until my towels had been washed a few times. They still shed so I am not sure I would order them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2013
Author: Sparklebauble
Title: Very good quality at a reasonable price
Body: Looking for only a handtowel I found this SET a great color match for the bath mat by the same maker.  All are absorbent and soft.  After the 2nd washing the furry bits go away.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2016
Author: Morris
Title: Excellent Towels
Body: I was unable to find the Moss color anywhere locally which led me to his siteI was pleasantly surprised by the quality of these towels.  A good variety of sizes and extremely soft.  After a few washings they seem to be holding up very well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2017
Author: MJenness
Title: excellent value
Body: Great towel set for the price. I washed them at the laundromat the first time just in case there was a lot of lint. Then by the third washing they were plumped and fluffy. These towels are a very nice mid-quality set that seem more expensive than the price. They are nicer than the ones I bought at World Market for more money....much fluffier and softer! They are an excellent value. I bought these for an airbnb unit and feel like our guests are getting very nice towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2017
Author: Allie3
Title: I'd recommend IKEA towels over these any day because of the ...
Body: Little pieces fall off after the first wash. When you continue to wash, the color fades so make sure you use an anti fading agent.I've now started to use the towels as decorative only.I'd recommend IKEA towels over these any day because of the quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2014
Author: Book Reader
Title: Nice towels for the price
Body: I bought a bunch months ago and use them for my guest bathroom.  They are holding up well and feel soft. The only reason I didn't give it four stars is because it leaves lots of lint in my dryer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2014
Author: SJinAK
Title: Good quality for the price
Body: Very nice set of towels. Like other reviews indicated, did leave a lot of lint after the first wash, and one towel did loose a few strings. But overall, good quality for the price and generous size. I'll buy more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2014
Author: Peter from Newton, MA
Title: Reasonably priced towel set.
Body: Ordered 2 sets to replace old towels.  Good color match to picture, good size bath & hand towels.  Reasonably absorbent, not overly fluffy.  Had one thread snagged in a bath towel, but cut it & seems ok.  Have come through one washing cycle intact, some shedding.  OK for our light-use household.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2015
Author: Kristin The Boss
Title: Great deal
Body: Great towel for the money. I always put off buying towels but once I bought these, I got them fast and they were fluffy. I washed them and they got even fluffier. I am very happy with these. Great price, fast shipping.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2018
Author: Catherine Pargee
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2014
Author: Lauren
Title: Great value! So soft!
Body: I can't believe these towels are so inexpensive! They are big, soft, absorbent, and look very nice! They are the first towels I've ever bought for myself and I can't wait to take them with me to college in the fall! The color is beautiful (I ordered plum, but all of the colors seem very nice) and so far they haven't bled while being washed. I highly recommend these if you want a good, inexpensive towel set!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2015
Author: Shaded
Title: soft and comfortable, but definitely not as great as my old ...
Body: Not very absorbent, soft and comfortable, but definitely not as great as my old towels. My hair still is wet all over and these things take at least 8 hours to fully dry out. Going to look at a different set of towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2013
Author: Jane B. Marsh
Title: Lovely Towels
Body: This is a lovely set of towels.  I am still using them today.  I purchased two sets, and they are still after all this time looking and feeling like new!  Very nice product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2015
Author: Jack
Title: Not so great.
Body: They don't dry me off all that well. I prefer other towels. These don't seem to absorb much water, so it is like trying to dry off with a wet rag. The colors are fine and they don't shrink like some other towels, which is nice.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2015
Author: Donna Cliborne
Title: Nice sheets for the price
Body: These are great towels for the price!  They are soft and absorbent and have held up well through several washings.  I would suggest washing several times before using b/c they can leave behind lint on your body, if not.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2015
Author: Phia7
Title: The first time I washed them they held up really well and came out nice and fluffy like when I took them out of ...
Body: I think these towels are so absorbent and very soft! The first time I washed them they held up really well and came out nice and fluffy like when I took them out of the package. They match my bathroom decor really well!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2014
Author: BrettBeez
Title: best buy for towels
Body: Bought a new house figured my wife and I would get new towels bought this 6 towel set. They feel good on the skin and dry perfectly! Forget going to target or bed bath and beyond get them from Amazon they had the best price and quality for what I needed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2014
Author: Ryan-Christine
Title: Soft with Poor Stitching
Body: These towels are quite soft, but not particularly absorbent. They worked great for a guest bathroom; however, not for everyday use, as the stitching began to unravel from each towel after only 1 washing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2017
Author: nikib0701
Title: Great towels, color is not as bright as appears in photo.
Body: These are great towels for the money.  I have them in white and blue and love them.  They wash well (soft) and hold their color (through at least 7 washes so far). I only gave the Cranberry ones a 4 star because the photo makes them appear brighter in color than what they actually are.  I will be returning these, as they don't match my bathroom colors.  They truly are a deep cranberry so if you want a color that pops, the cranberry color is not what you're looking for.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2013
Author: Judy Raiten
Title: Wonderful towels
Body: These are so luxurious.  And big!  Even the washcloths are much larger than normal - thick and absorbent.  I thoroughly enjoy these towels and am glad I bought two sets.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2017
Author: Jared
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great color vey plush full towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2013
Author: Johnfam
Title: Nothing better
Body: Not sure, how Amazon manages to sell this set for only $20.99, but this is so plush, you'll want to bathe all day long! Such a great buy. Got 4 sets in different colors.
