Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2014
Author: Lori Herron
Title: Great Towels
Body: I ordered these for my main bathroom.  I am really picky about my towels and these are really nice ones!  They are big and thick and soft.  They were delivered promptly and I am very happy with them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2014
Author: M.Croft
Title: Poorly made
Body: I choose one star due to the poor workmanship of these towels. They arrived quickly and when opening the inner package I found each and every towel with uncut threads in the toweling, and at the seams. After cutting off all of the threads I prewashed per the directions and dried on low heat. Upon removal from the dryer I found seams had come undone. Not an acceptable product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2013
Author: Slava Midwest
Title: great towels
Body: And good deal, this towels set was for the same price as half of this sort of set in Target but the quality is way better. Those towels are fairly thick and soft. I would recommend it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2017
Author: Leah S.
Title: and I'm glad I did
Body: Purchased dispute mixed reviews, and I'm glad I did. These towels are great quality, thick and launder well.  My only complaint is that the plum towels I received were a few shades lighter than what is picture, but that worked in my bathroom anyway and I still liked the color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2013
Author: Jessica G
Title: Quality made with the wrong material
Body: The towels have held up nicely through several washings. Problem is, it just glides the water around on the body. It also seems like the water sits on top of the towel and doesn't soak in.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2014
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: I just trimmed the threads and they're fine. Susequent washings haven't frayed further
Body: A couple of these frayed slightly after the first wash, but for the price, I wasnt bothered by that. I just trimmed the threads and they're fine. Susequent washings haven't frayed further. I might order more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2014
Author: Trekincat
Title: AWESOME
Body: I LOVE these towels, the color is gorgeous. The towels are big heavy and very absorbent. I bought 2 sets, plum and grey and  couldn't be happier, they look and feel like much higher priced towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2013
Author: Ninja Warrior
Title: VERY high quality towels
Body: These are turning out to be some of the better quality towels in our bathroom. They seem to hold up well after several washings, with little to no fraying or discoloring.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2014
Author: Jenn
Title: Thick, absorbent towels. Just not as soft as I'd hoped.
Body: They're thick, absorbent, and wash well (so far). The fabric seems to be high-quality; unfortunately the towels are not nearly as soft as I had expected. I've been on the hunt for fluffy, plush white bath towels but these didn't hit the mark.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: One Star
Body: big pink spots all over them after one wash

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2015
Author: darwin hinson
Title: It Is A Better Deal Than The Nearby Super Stores
Body: This Set Seems To Be Very Thick, Durable, And, Colorfast. We Bought 2 Sets For Our Oldest Daughter's Birthday In April; And, I Think Their Same Conclusion Is That, For The Price, It Is A Better Deal Than The Nearby Super Stores. Thank You. D. Hinson.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2015
Author: Maggie16
Title: Looking For Some Awesome Towels That Are Soft And Work Great?
Body: Looking for some awesome towels that feel soft? These are the ones to get!! They work awesome and that Egyptian Cotton in these towels is amazingly soft!!! Try them and you will see how wonderfully soft they are and how great they work!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2015
Author: bw
Title: Poor quality for Amazon.
Body: These towels are not what I expected from some of the better reviews.  They are thin, not soft and the first few washing have left behind in the dryer and washing machine enough lint to creat another towel.  I am returning them to Amazon.  What junk.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2014
Author: Clairish
Title: Great color.
Body: I was so happy to get these at such a good price, but they have way too much lint and I have to wash them separately as they shed fuzz all over anything washed with them.  They are okay, but not great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2014
Author: Adam B
Title: Towels
Body: We bought this, and a bath mat, to match the decor of the bathroom in our new house.  The towels feel great, but they are not terribly absorbent.  They work great if you are not in a rush to get dry.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2014
Author: uradell holmes
Title: egyptian towels
Body: the towels were as stated in the description listed on amazon.  they were soft and the bath towels were large.  i will suggest that others who desire to purchase towels, do so on amazon

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2016
Author: B. Benjamin
Title: Meh, spend more and get one that's more plush.
Body: Not plush, barely absorbs water after a shower, however it is not completely hideous thanks to the Egyptian cotton stitching. If it weren't it would like a towel made from shaved dog hairs. I kept it for guests I don't like, and bought myself some nicer towels from a brick and mortar store.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2013
Author: Diana I. Andersen
Title: Really nice towels for the price
Body: For the price I paid for these towel set I'm very pleased. The bath towel is big enough for me and my husband, although we are not that tall. They feel nice, not too fluffy, but they do dry.I haven't washed them so I'm still have to see how that goes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2014
Author: krusty
Title: it looks like hotel towels but they are not up to the ...
Body: this is decent but there are bit of stray hairs (when I wipe my face). it looks like hotel towels but they are not up to the feel of them. it's not a bad buy though if you're not picky about about that.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2013
Author: Anar
Title: Thick and soft
Body: These are very good quality towels.  They are thick,  soft and absorbent and also wash very well. I recommend them. At this price, im getting another set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2014
Author: Texas Red
Title: Fantastic Plush!
Body: These were a gift for my daughter and my grand kids for their new home.  She loved the color and I thought the quality was exceptional.  I will order others in a different color for her birthday soon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2013
Author: Oden AK
Title: Nice feel.
Body: These towels came ith a few snags and didn't notice until I put them out at Xmas. O well they looked great so if they come down in price I will order more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2014
Author: J & M's mom
Title: They easily pull. I think mine had a pull or ...
Body: Towels are "B" grade.  They easily pull.  I think mine had a pull or two when they arrived.  Didn't return because guests were arriving and I needed towels.  Thick and absorbent.  Rich color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2014
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Nice towels, really soft and absorbant
Body: I really like the towels, the first time I washed them, there was a "lot" of lint in the lint catcher in the dryer.  Same thing the second time, don't know if this is normal or not.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2014
Author: Jaryn Barker
Title: Definitely seconds
Body: The towels smelled like some kind of chemical, but after a couple of launderings, the worst of the smell went away.  The towels were poorly finished, with some of the end stitching not completed, and unravelling.  The main towels each had several long snags.  I hope they don't rip along those areas.  I plan to use them to line my pet's bed since they can't be used to hang in the guest bathroom.  A total waste of money.  I'm now buying decent towels elsewhere.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2015
Author: J. Bishop
Title: Unexpected luxury.
Body: These are really nice thick towels for the price. I was happily surprised at how luxurious they are. Color is as described and they wash up really well without a lot of puckering on the hems. I'm very happy with them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2014
Author: Kristen P. Landon
Title: Perfect fit
Body: These towels are super soft, a good size, Even for larger people, & they are very absorbent. I love getting them in white because if they do need to be bleached you can. I Love these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2015
Author: Kendrick Adams
Title: Love!
Body: These are seriously amazing quality, and I was pleased to see the tag says "100% cotton", instead of polyester, like I've read on other reviews for other "Egyptian Cotton towels". I am SO happy I purchased these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2018
Author: thaddeus thompson
Title: Great quality
Body: The softness

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2013
Author: Bak38
Title: ok towels
Body: These towels are an ok quality. The lint comes off onto your hands when you use them to dry your hands. The towels are not as plush as I hoped they would be. A simple and fair purchase I suppose for the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2013
Author: MJMBrinkley
Title: Blue My Favorite Color
Body: These towels are great. I don't want anyone even touching them because they are so soft and just the right color of blue for me and my new apartment.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2013
Author: KBW
Title: I've been pleased
Body: Was very hesitant to purchase but decided to give it a shot and I purchased these towels in white back in April.  It is now July and I have had no problems with them at all.  I've been very pleased and plan to purchase more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2016
Author: L J
Title: Soft and beautifully made
Body: Love the color and just purchased the grey.  They felt a little stiff out of the box, but lets admit it, who would use them without washing first?  I threw them in the wash and they are soft and no loose threads, fraying, nothing.  I like

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2017
Author: Joshua Ramsey
Title: Good product
Body: They're not as soft as I imagined but I'm not too picky. However, I don't know how everyone else has been having issues with it fraying and falling apart. I washed mine and dried it on the delicate cycle and they look and seem fine to me. Color is true to what's shown here.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2013
Author: Carole
Title: To: Amazon
Body: These towels were a gift and they were so soft.  I bought them for my Granddaughter and she just loved them.  I tried to purchase more sets later but Amazon was out of them.  I should have bought more sets than just the one.  The price was very reasonable also.  Everything I have bought from Amazon, I have been extremely happy with.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2014
Author: laurapin
Title: Great price, but shed
Body: Great quality for the price. Caveat: these towels will shed lint in unbelievable quantities for the first 5 washes or so. Be sure not to put anything with them that you do not want covered in fuzz.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2013
Author: Frank Rodriguez
Title: GREAT product
Body: Wash beforing using, and don't wash it with anything in the wash. These towels release lots of lint.Otherwise the towels as nice and soft, and assortment of color to chose from. Nothing negetiveto say but the lint issue. I will make other purchases.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2014
Author: Catherine
Title: Fantastic quality!
Body: These towels are soft and luxurious- really fantastic quality at such a reasonable price! I had no problems laundering them. Of course there was some lint in the trap the first time I dried them, but that just shows that they are high quality. They're definitely my new favorites, and since there are two of each size in the set, I can use one for myself and reserve the other for special guests!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2015
Author: TP
Title: Look and feel great.
Body: These towels feel great and are very absorbent.  The color has stayed strong through about a half dozen washes so far.  The towel size is pretty standard for a bath towel (medium).  It is large enough for me at 6'00, 210 lbs.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2014
Author: KGRoo
Title: Poor Quality
Body: These towels shed, even after you have washed them a few times. They would leave residue on my skin. Although they are soft, the green little balls of residue was too much. Poor product quality!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2014
Author: Kelly Lehman
Title: Very nice
Body: I ordered some of these also in Purple as I was redoing my bathroom color scheme.  They are a great size, well made, soze, durable, I'd buy more if I needed to add to my towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2015
Author: StevieW
Title: Not "plush" but they do the job...
Body: Not quite as "plush" as the women in the household would prefer - but - they work for me.  ( This guy not into "designer" bathrooms anyway )Good value for the $$$  Most likely will order more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2014
Author: S Coppedge
Title: ... seems to "shed" water beware - dark color bleeds like crazy - have to wash separately good price
Body: sheds a LOT at firstnot very absorbent - even after several washings seems to "shed" waterbeware - dark color bleeds like crazy - have to wash separatelygood price tho

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2013
Author: capegator
Title: Plush
Body: perfect...just what we wanted...great fast sevice. houseguest loved them and loved using them ..will keep in mind for next order...thank you very much..Kent

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2015
Author: Lloyd Armstrong
Title: These towels are pretty nice and it is a great value for the ...
Body: These towels are pretty nice and it is a great value for the set.  That said, mine arrived with some snags/pulls.  The bath towels are quite large and certainly plush enough.  As for the bath mat, nothing too special.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2016
Author: javon solomon
Title: These towels are great quality, soft and absorbent
Body: These towels are great quality, soft and absorbent. When I bought them I wondered how they would be, and I'm really  pleased with them, after washing and drying the are much more fluffy, And I love the color. It is a nice size for use after a bath and is very plush. I will definitely consider buying more of them in the future !

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2014
Author: KEITH
Title: Love the quality of these towels
Body: Got this today and was impressed with the size.  The feel was better than I expected  I love the 100% cotton that actually felt better after washed  The border on the towel gives it a rich look

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2016
Author: Jane Swanson
Title: These towels are amazing - especially for the price
Body: These towels are amazing - especially for the price.  I was skeptical due to the price and the negative reviews - but I took the risk and went for it and am so glad that I did!  Great size - thick and semi-luxurious.  Wash extremely well.  I've had these 2 months now. Even if they only last a year (which I anticipate them lasting longer) they are SO worth it!  We have the dark gray as shown.  Color is great for our newly painted and redone bathroom!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2014
Author: Stihl here
Title: Fair'
Body: These look real nice. But. The description. Must be. Read!  There. Egyptian. Loop style.  Not Egyptian. Cotton,  how ever they look nice.  Just. Not that soft  Can get. Better cheaper ones at walmart!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2015
Author: T. Copeland
Title: Replace your old towels with these, you won't be disappointed.
Body: Replaced some old towels with these Pinzon towels that were recommended by Amazon. They are long, soft and absorb a lot of water. I recommend these to anyone looking to replace old bath towels. I'm buying a second set soon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2015
Author: Suzurb
Title: Poor quality
Body: I buy from Amazon quite often and the quality has never been an issue, until now. The set I put out in the guest bath for summer has been washed twice and already are fraying. I don't know about the other set yet but I won't buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2013
Author: Joel
Title: Lots of Lint, dries so so
Body: I've washed these towels twice after a week and there is a lot of lint in the drier after.  It also takes a bit longer to dry yourself off after a shower.  Maybe they will improve after a few more washes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2013
Author: Teena
Title: Not as Described
Body: I returned these towels as they were very hard and on receipt not soft as described.  Color was more of a mocha than a chocolate.  Too dark for my choice.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2014
Author: diane miller
Title: These towels turned out to be nicer than I thought ...
Body: These towels turned out to be nicer than I thought they'd be.  They're thick enough without being too thick and wick up moisture quickly. Thinking about getting another two sets in another color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2014
Author: Dana
Title: Suprising
Body: For the cost, these are excellent towels. I will say that one of the pack looks slightly lighter than the rest. I can't tell if it's the direction of the loop, but it's not PAINFULLY obvious.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2016
Author: CAP
Title: Superb towel set at this price range!!
Body: This is about the 5th set of these I have bought.  One for my wife and I and 4 others as gifts.  We have had ours for about 4 years and they are still great with daily use as our main bath/shower towels.  Nice and soft at a price you simply cannot beat!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2013
Author: Lynda S
Title: sheds too much
Body: I get red lint everywhere even after washing these towels prior to using them.  They have been washed several times now and still shed red lint!  Would not recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2014
Author: Fisher
Title: Good Quality
Body: Towels seem to be of good quality, but still pretty new to judge the absorption. Some of the smaller ones had threads sticking out of the stitching but some quick snips and it was good to go. I am hoping they turn out okay.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2015
Author: bookah
Title: but then they are wonderfully soft and absorbent
Body: anyone who says they dont absorb water simply hasnt 'broken them in.'  give them a couple washes, they will release a ton of extra lint, but then they are wonderfully soft and absorbent.  i bought 2 sets

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2013
Author: girlacross
Title: Almost there ...
Body: While I've been pleasantly surprised by the quality of other Pinzon items (sheets, bedskirt, mattress pad), these towels are not quite up to the same quality. The stitching is sloppy in places for instance. That said, they are well priced and probably a good deal for someone  who isn't as finicky as me.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2013
Author: Trish in NY
Title: Soft
Body: Beautiful towels, beautiful price, soft, soft, soft, washes well and stays soft! I encourage people to buy these towels, couldn't find anything like them anywhere.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2014
Author: j. lyon
Title: Better than I thought
Body: This is a great value for the price.  Towels are large and very soft even before washing.  The dark navy color does run when washed the first time so don't mix with other colors.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2014
Author: PR Girl
Title: Towel Set
Body: They are very nice and look just like the ad on Amazon.  Everything came on time, as well.  I'm very happy with the towels and would recommend them to other Amazon customers.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2015
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Good quality set
Body: The color was not quite what I expected and at first I didn't think they were that soft but when I took a look at them a few days later I realized they are pretty soft and the color grew on me. I expected them to be a little more vibrant like the picture, the color is a bit muted. I'm sure with a wash they will feel great!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2013
Author: Ann
Title: I had to send 1st Set back because they fell apart after one wash
Body: The next set did not fall apart as badly and I had gone over the 30 day period before I used them and washed them. Amazon should not sell this poorly made product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2014
Author: L. Gadd
Title: A little disappointing
Body: After one wash I noticed a washcloth fraying. Love the color and size, but they are not as absorbent as the family likes. Hopefully a few more washings will rectify this issue.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2014
Author: Roger
Title: Quality towels at good price
Body: Saw the good price and all the excellent ratings on these towels and decided to try them.  Like them so much I have ordered another set and recommended to several friends.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2015
Author: ChrissayB
Title: WOW these were great towels for the price
Body: WOW these were great towels for the price. I was torn to purchase these or get ones from Macy's. These were much cheaper and they are a much better quality than the tommy ones that were on sale there.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2014
Author: Sue r
Title: The Best Towels EVER!!!!
Body: I received a set of these towels as a gift last year and loved them so much I had to purchase another set. They hold up really well after many washes, maintaining the softness. They are super soft and feel good against the body. The size of the body towel is very generous. They have met my expectations, I am very pleased.The price for this set ($19.99) is a terrific buy. In a store this set would sell for $40.00 easily.I would recommend this set and I will be back for more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2015
Author: K. Daisley
Title: Craptacular
Body: So disappointed.  I loved the color and the feel of these upon opening the package.  But, after the first washing, the edge of one of the hand towels complete fell apart and started to fray.  Totally poor quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2017
Author: brandon
Title: Happy with this purchase!
Body: I was NOT paid to give this review - I took a chance on these towels and was very happy with the purchase. They have not sustained any damage after washing and drying. The color is really good and they look great in my bathroom. They are soft and absorbent, and I may purchase a second set!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2016
Author: Stargazer
Title: I really loved these towels at first
Body: I really loved these towels at first. They are big and thirsty. Beautifil colors! Above all it was a great bargain for the price. Now after 3 or 4 washes they are falling apart. Too late to return as i bought them 2 months ago. Now im bummed. 😕

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2013
Author: wspirit119
Title: Quality of Assembly is Poor
Body: The Egyptian cotton is fabulous. The bias material longitudinally is stitched to less than adequate material and will most likely prematurely pull away after several washes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2015
Author: tina
Title: A really nice towel set at bargain price
Body: I usually pay good money for towels that last a decade, so I was wary about these. But, I'm pleased w/ the color, the weave, the texture, and quality for the usual (not sale) price. A good price and a nice addition to my RV.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2014
Author: Jim Bklyn
Title: Beware
Body: Very disappointing. The colors ran when I washed these towels. And I don't mean that the red dye just seeped out a little bit. No, it looked like a bloodbath. Will not be buying them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2014
Author: Jen
Title: Pinzon Towels
Body: These towels are absorbent and are a very nice color. They were a gift for my son which his favorite color is green. They came packaged very well and were easy to unwrap.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2018
Author: Laurel Browne
Title: Five Stars
Body: Good weight and soft

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2015
Author: KIM K
Title: Not a total "wash" out...
Body: This is a nice towel set. I'm just using them mainly for decorative purposes but they are supple enough to be used for everyday. They wash up nice with minimal shrinkage.I would think twice next time, especially since they were a little pricey.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2016
Author: B
Title: It started off looking great when it arrived
Body: After 4 washes, still bleeding color and constantly losing fibers/pilling.  It started off looking great when it arrived.  Then it just keeps losing color. But it will dry you off and the clothes and towels are fairly thick.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2017
Author: MoMo
Title: Recommended
Body: Hello! It has been a good while since I have bought these towels and I would absolutely recommend buying them. They are pretty soft and big and have held up very well. They do a very good job soaking up water and not leaving any lint behind. I will be investing in them once again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2014
Author: Anthony
Title: Great towels! The only thing is be sure to ...
Body: Great towels ! The only thing is be sure to wash them alone for the first few times they was a lot of lent but now after a few washing it seems to be a lot less. I would still buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2013
Author: Cheryl Hullin
Title: Better Quality for Less Money
Body: Rich, thick, luxurious feel of much pricier towels at an everyday "white sale" price!  If you're like me and have a penchant for "the finer things in life" you'll love these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2013
Author: Native Texan
Title: Not bad for the price
Body: Not the best towels I've ever used but they are also not the most expensive towels I've used.I liked them good enough to buy a second set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2013
Author: DanCooperMedia
Title: Not the finest, but they feel good, are absorbent and dry quickly
Body: These are quality towels at an amazing price. The look good. They wash and dry well. They're absorbent. They feel good on the skin. I'm happy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2014
Author: Taijimon
Title: Unraveled
Body: Hand towels and wash clothes unraveled at first washing prior to use on original order as well as replacement order. Large towels okay....so far. Optimistic at best. Would not recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2014
Author: NO
Title: Nice
Body: These towels were purchased for the camper, but they are so thick and soft I want to keep them in the house and use them all the time.  Great quality, very soft.  I will buy more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2014
Author: Rizz
Title: Pinzon Egyptian Cotton 725-gram 6-Piece Towel Set, Moss
Body: Tired of thin wash cloths, hand towels and bath towels ? Pinzon is thicker, plush, and larger than other towel sets !!! REALLY LIKE THE PRODUCT !! Also a great price !!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2013
Author: Diane
Title: Nice, soft and large towels
Body: These towels are an excellent quality.  They are large, thick and look really expensive.  We use these in our rental properties and the guests love them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2014
Author: GS
Title: Best bang for your buck
Body: I bought this for a house overseas that my boyfriend is stationed at in the military.It does the job. Not the best quality but do-able for a short term towel set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2014
Author: oktarb
Title: Meh, just towels.
Body: Wash these two or three times before using them. Lots of blue lint will run off on you if you don't wash them first. They don't seem as absorbent as other towels I've used.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2013
Author: Jorge
Title: i love these
Body: they r soft and comfy, ive washed them 3 times so far and no threads have come apart, perfect addition to my bathroom. for the price its great quality

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2015
Author: Amazon Junkie
Title: Doesn't hold up
Body: Awful. I don't feel completely dry when I used the towel. I washed them before I used them, and it already looks like it's years old. For me personally, the color was also too dark for my bathroom decor.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2014
Author: A. Salyers
Title: Soft towels
Body: We needed a set of good towels and I'm so glad I took a chance on these.  I read a lot of reviews before purchasing them.  They washed up well and so far haven't lost their shape.  I plan on buying another set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2015
Author: Roger
Title: Great towel set
Body: This is a beautiful set of towels and a real good value for your money. We have decided to purchase a 2nd set after having had the first order for the time needed to assess them. We'd recommend them to anyone.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2013
Author: kim
Title: Very Soft!
Body: These towels will be a great addition to our bathroom, and perfect for guest use. The towel color is a lighter purple than show in the picture, but not by much, and still very pleasing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2013
Author: Jmclean
Title: Dont buy
Body: Just washed them and they left my washing machine a mess. They shed a LOT. When I removed the tag from them, one of the sides came apart.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2013
Author: Pattie Ann
Title: So soft
Body: These towels are great.  They are nice and soft, hold up well after laundering, and are nice and large.I would recommend these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2017
Author: mickhubb
Title: Great Price, above my expectation of quality, thickness, and size !!!
Body: Bought these as a gift, I washed them for the receiver and was sad they did not come in the color I needed. Very Large bath towel Super thick Great quality from what I could see. I would definitely purchase for myself if they had my color!!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2013
Author: liz
Title: Super soft!  Great size, quality and the best deal ever!!
Body: Are you looking for beautiful expensive looking bath towels? FOUND IT!  Why pay $10/towel when you can pay $20/set?? AWESOME!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2016
Author: East Bay Buyer
Title: Wish they had more color choices!
Body: These are great towels for the price. There were no flaws when I got them, and they washed up nicely. Still no flaws, and very little lint. The towels are a nice size. They have an okay feel, but are not real soft and fluffy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2014
Author: TRINITYTALKS
Title: Bought 3 sets
Body: Love these towels - although they shed for awhile - they are luxurious, large and soft.  They do bleach easily so be careful around the washing machine and cleaning products

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2014
Author: Computers are my thing
Title: running low on towels
Body: these are beautiful, soft, plush and didn't lose their feel in the wash. They also don't have cotton stickin to your body after a shower. Love em and will be ordering more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2013
Author: cel
Title: Great towels!
Body: I am super happy with these towels.  They wash so well.  They're super thick and soft and are an amazing deal!  Definitely recommend this product!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2013
Author: Kevin McDonald
Title: Absolute trash
Body: These towels literally fell apart as I was drying myself.  Then they literally fell apart in the dryer.  I cleaned up the fibers that were spread across by bathroom and my garage, and then I shipped the towels back.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2016
Author: Danielle McNish
Title: Great Quality Towels for Great Price
Body: These towels are a much nicer quality than I expected for the price (and also after reading some of the reviews). We got the white, and they are a good size and fluffy thick, though not super plush. I have since ordered another two sets.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2017
Author: Elizabeth
Title: Excellent Quality
Body: Very happy with these towels, I own 4 sets now. They take a few uses/washes to stop shedding, but the amount is very reasonable. Color and stitching have held up very well over the past 6 months. The size and absorbency of the towels are fantastic!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2014
Author: marusc
Title: Faded fabric, lots of loose threads
Body: Right out of the box the fabric looks faded (not dyed thoroughly) and there are tons of loose ends. I bought several other sets of towels at this same time and these have way more loose threads than the others. I haven't used them yet but I guess for the price they serve the purpose, but it's better to spend $10 more and get a decent set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2013
Author: Dionne Baldwin
Title: Not bad but not my favorite.
Body: For the price these are decent towels. Definitely WASH before the first use. Even after a few washes these towels are not the best at soaking up water. Accurate color, pretty soft and so far has held up ok.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2015
Author: ZZ Walden
Title: They have water resistant coating - don't dry well!
Body: They are coated with something to make them fluffy - which means they also are water resistant - and they don't dry your body, I have washed them 10 times and they are starting to get better. Bummer!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2013
Author: Hailey
Title: Love them!
Body: I love these towels! They're soft, fluffy, and do the job well. They're a great deal as well considering the price and how many towels come in the set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2014
Author: Kimberly
Title: Nice towels
Body: I bought my daughter, husband and myself these towels in different colors and I really like how they wash and feel. I wish they were bigger but nice overall towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2013
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Soft Towel Set
Body: Upon receiving these, I thought that they were a little rough to be Egyptian Cotton.  After the first wash, they came out super soft and absorbent.  Love this towel set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2014
Author: morenachica
Title: nice starter set
Body: I bought this as a starter set for my new place and they have held up well. The only thing is when you wash them and dry they do leave fuzz balls on other towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2013
Author: George Marsinko
Title: towels
Body: Perfect for the price. a great gift that my grandmother really enjoyed.  buying and options avialable also made these a great purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2013
Author: DARLENE M.
Title: Nice Towels
Body: These towels are not as thick as some of the more expensive brands but, they are a great basic.  I suggest that they are washed prior to use as there is a little stray fuzz.  For the price you can't beat them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2014
Author: Janet Edgar
Title: Very Pretty, great color, but not very absorbant
Body: Overall, I'm disappointed - I still feel wet after drying myself with this towel.  But it looks great in the bathroom and will put up with it.  But I wouldn't buy it again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2016
Author: gobby148
Title: Okay
Body: These towels are fine. They aren't great quality- the hand towels seem to discolor easily from different soap/hand products. They also get stringy very quickly. They are a short-term towel solution if used regularly.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2018
Author: Lina
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great product. Excelente quality

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2013
Author: Burgman
Title: Super absorbant heavy thick towels
Body: Really good towels that do what towels should do. They get you dry fast and soak up all the water that you don't want dripping around the bath.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2014
Author: shoe fanatic
Title: WONDERFUL
Body: I love these towels.  They have a nice trim to them and the large sized bath towels feel plush.  I love this color too.  I should get more in other colors!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2014
Author: Avid Reader
Title: Love My New Towels
Body: I love these towels. They're soft, super absorbent, and at such a great price! They are more blue than the blue-gray tone the picture shows. Worth the investment!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2016
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great price for a full towel set
Body: Great price for a full towel set.  The color is true to the picture/description.  They aren't the most fuzzy, warm towels, but they look nice, do their job, and handle the washing machine/dryer just fine ( have had for roughly one month).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2013
Author: Christy
Title: Loved These
Body: Gave these to dad for Christmas last year and they're so soft and the color is fabulous.  They wash well and they keep right on going with their quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2014
Author: Latina Peterson
Title: Soft
Body: These are my towel that I hide in my room that only I use and wash. No one can touch them but me. The best towels I ever purchased. They are perfect and kids can't touch them!!!!? Lol

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2016
Author: Rainmaker
Title: I would buy another set in a heartbeat.
Body: Great color, beautiful design, these towels have been through about 5 washings there was not a lot of lint through out the first five washings and have held up absolutely perfect. So far so good I'll keep you posted.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2014
Author: SF Guy
Title: they weren't luxurious
Body: I was ready to spend anything to get the finest towels, but these are not the finest.  they felt like they would be harsh after a few washes, so i returned them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2013
Author: gmaqueen
Title: Great value
Body: These towels are great!  Soft, over sized, true to color.  Love these!  Will be buying another 2 sets asap.  Could not be happier with them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2017
Author: diana garner
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love them so far

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2014
Author: Dee
Title: Buy these towels!
Body: I purchased two sets of the cocoa and two sets in gray. All washed up nice, very minimal limiting & they're so nice and thick both hubby & I grab these first!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2013
Author: Thoughtful reviewer
Title: Good towels
Body: I've bought several sets of these towels now. They are a nice weight, soft, absorbent, easy to wash and bleach (I have the white towels), and a good price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2014
Author: Sue
Title: Towel Set
Body: Towels were packaged good and looked nice when received.After washing they left lint all over everything - I would not purchase this brand in the future

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2013
Author: Rebecca
Title: Nice Towels
Body: These are a great value.  Much like any new towel, these require a few washes to bring them to the point of optimum performance.  Nice color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2014
Author: W_Parmantie
Title: Great Soft Shedding Towels...
Body: Very nice, and soft towels.  Unfortunately, they do shed a lot, even after several washings.  Recommend washing before using.  There is also a lot of excess dye.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2016
Author: OlgaVlady
Title: but what's worse - it's pulling off terribly
Body: I owned it for 4 years now, and it doesn't hold well unlike my other towels. Color faded very significantly, but what's worse - it's pulling off terribly. I just hate using it :( Looking for better quality even if it costs much more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2015
Author: Neptune
Title: BUYER BEWARE!  VERY POOR QUALITY!
Body: POOR QUALITY!!!! Color fades as though it's been bleached.  I bought a gray set and after washing the first time they looked as though we spilled bleach on them.  Save your money and buy another brand.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2015
Author: spaynneuter
Title: Great towels
Body: These are really nice towels, especially considering the price. Really nice. The color is true to the pictures and the size is generous. They wash and dry well. I'm very pleased with this purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2014
Author: K.Beckwith
Title: Not the best
Body: These towels are alright, but after running them through the wash and dryer once the edges started to come undone. I purchased the same towel set in cream which did not do this, but I do not think I will be purchasing any other sets.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2015
Author: Jodi
Title: Very soft
Body: Soft thick towels. Can't beat the price either. Very happy with them. I did wash them twice before using to make sure I didn't get towel lint all over me but I always do that when I buy new towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2014
Author: Donna S Magee
Title: These towels are wonderful, big and thirsty and wash well
Body: I always order from Amazon and know I can never go wrong.  These towels are wonderful, big and thirsty and wash well.  I have ordered 8 sets so far.  They are amazing!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2015
Author: Floridian
Title: I thought that it would get better over time
Body: I never knew that terry cloth could be non-absorbant!  I was as wet after using the towel as I was stepping out of the shower.  I thought that it would get better over time.  They never did...just raveled.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2015
Author: Joshua
Title: Great towels!
Body: I have purchased a total of three set of these towels. They dry quickly and are soft and made very well. I do bleach these towels and have not had any problem over this last year of owning them. I would buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2015
Author: Raleigh Ann
Title: ... buying these towels just because they were such a good price, and because towels have a tendency to ...
Body: Was a little iffy about buying these towels just because they were such a good price, and because towels have a tendency to be rough... But these turned out way better than I expected! I ended up buying another matching set and would definitely recommend them to anyone considering them! They're super soft, perfect size, and they don't shrink or get rough or deteriorate after going through the wash a couple times.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2014
Author: Dee Dee
Title: CAN'T GO WRONG WITH THESE!
Body: I was so impressed with these that I am going to order more!  I LOVE THEM!  I have paid over $10 a piece for towels of this quality and weight.  I took a chance because it is Amazon's brand and Amazon stands by their name.  I told my sisters, and plan on looking into purchasing from their line of sheets and bedding.  Can't go wrong with these!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2013
Author: VirtualLife
Title: Couldn't ask for better
Body: They are soft and seem to hold up. Washed them a few times and can't tell they are used yet. They do drop a lot in the lint trap, but not a big deal.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2014
Author: A.B.
Title: Great looking, well made, soft and plush!
Body: I am so happy I bought these! Great value!! I'm buying another set. Great looking, well made, soft and plush with no pilling or snagging from the washer and dryer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2014
Author: Trish
Title: Great plush towels
Body: Very reasonable price for excellent quality set, I ordered two sets and will order more.Dries you off quickly, hand towel and face clothes are good size also.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2013
Author: Morales Family
Title: Great price
Body: Love these towels. Great quality and great color. Colors haven't faded, but I don't use them much. Just for guests. Great, elegant and soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2013
Author: W J B
Title: Okay towels
Body: The towels were okay, but they were not a fluffy as expected.  After 5 washing, the towels finally stoped leaving residue in the dryer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2015
Author: Janet
Title: not very absorbent
Body: Disappointing.  Although the towels feel soft and nice, they are not absorbent.  Feel damp, rather than dry with  use of these after a shower.  They look nice and feel nice, just don't get the job done

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2015
Author: cyntsnel
Title: The description of the towels made it sound like they are really thick and plush
Body: The description of the towels made it sound like they are really thick and plush.  They are just OK.  A little thin.  Not any better than what I could have found at a "superstore" type place.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2016
Author: JUANITA K GILLESPIE
Title: ... these towels after reading the reviews but I am glad I did
Body: I  was afraid to buy these towels after reading the reviews but I am glad I did. They did leave a lot of lint behind in the dryer lint trap but I have never saw new towels that didn't have lint. These towels are very soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2016
Author: Gabrielle I.
Title: Great towels! They're very soft and look nice
Body: Great towels! They're very soft and look nice, but the only downfall is that they shed. I've washed them multiple times, but I still have lint coming off and sticking to my body after I shower. For the price, I will most definitely buy again!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2014
Author: Krystal
Title: Price + Quality
Body: The towels, like others have said, are a lot bigger than "normal" towels, which is nice. The color is true to the pictures and they're actually reallllllyyyy soft. I love the set, and the price was definitely worth the buy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2013
Author: Tip-Top Beat Shop
Title: Feel and look GREAT
Body: These towels are amazing for the price! They are super absorbant and actually larger than most of my other bath towels. I would highly recommend these to anyone looking for a great towel/wash cloth combo at an affordable price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2014
Author: Patsy Packer
Title: Plushy Towels
Body: Nice weight towels with great drying capability.  The assortment of colors available and the pricing makes these a great bath and shower "fill-in".

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2013
Author: BBCaprice
Title: Very nice Towels for the price!!
Body: Good quality, after a few washes towels became more absorbant fluffed up more. No pulled strings. Bought these because the ratings and glad I did.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2015
Author: Matt
Title: It seems like the dye is disappearing
Body: I don't know why but they are turning orange in spots, It seems like the dye is disappearing.If you don't care what your towels look like, they are big, comfortable and absorbent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2017
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: These towels are an excellent value for the price
Body: These towels are an excellent value for the price.  They are soft and absorbent, the color is very attractive, you just have to wash them before using them to prevent the shedding problem (but, you would wash them first anyway, right?)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2014
Author: Stella
Title: Great
Body: Great towels.  Absorb well and the larger than usual bath towels are luxurious.  Definitely worth the money.  Washed several times, still look and feel great.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2017
Author: done320
Title: Five Stars
Body: is good one

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2015
Author: KO
Title: Sturdy and great color.
Body: Love these. They have held up nicely over 12 visitors so far, including teenagers. They still look brand new and teenagers are the ultimate test. The color has also held up while washing on warm/cold.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2015
Author: Serg
Title: Great quality towels
Body: Great quality towels: absorb water well and don't shed much (need one-two washes). Not sure why other people are not happy with them, maybe I just got luck or it depends on the color - I got grey.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2013
Author: Emmitta J. Lewis
Title: Economical Choice.
Body: Great looking towel set - that's all I can say haven't used them yet -- but a bargain at 6 for the price of 1 or 2 at an excellent price!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2013
Author: onit4fun
Title: Nice towels
Body: I gave these as a gift at Christmas and my sister loved them.  The color was true to the picture and they were thick and absorbant.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2013
Author: Tasha
Title: Not what I expected
Body: This was the first time I ever tried to buy towels on line, mistake.  For me - I need to see and feel them in the store.  From all the write ups I thought these towels would be thicker and more lush.  They felt like kitchen towels.  They were worth the money - $20 on sale, but not what I want to use in the bath for a couple of years.  I returned them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2013
Author: Peggy Chambers
Title: Nice Towels
Body: Pretty, plush and practical.  I love them but am concerned that at this price somebody is not being appropriately compensated.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2014
Author: RR
Title: These are horrible towels. They get lint all over your entire ...
Body: These are horrible towels. They get lint all over your entire house. Just having them in the bathroom my bathroom is covered in lint and they lose their color in one wash. It's on my windows even! They completely filled my dryer lint filter to overflow and still do multiple washes down the line. There must be a disparity between sellers of this brand or they chose to outsource to a cheap knockoff in China recently. Horrible towels. Don't buy them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2014
Author: Sherry
Title: Beautiful color
Body: The color is beautiful and the towels, wash cloths and hand towels are all nice and thick, but they are anything but absorbent - that's why they get only a 3.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2014
Author: Justin Wright
Title: Waxy substance on towels?
Body: I bought these towels because they matched the theme I wanted to go for in my bathroom.  After several washes, they just felt like they were pushing water around instead of soaking it up - similar to something that would have a very thin wax coating on it.  Needless to say I was very disappointed in them, but hey, they were only $20.  Now they're dog towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2015
Author: greg
Title: IS not EGYPTIAN COTTON
Body: These are being marketed as Egyptian cotton they are not even close plus they do not specify the thread count. But over all a decent mid quality set.  My  definition of mid quality is1.  Decent softness and do not fall apart in the first wash (have not washed them yet)2.  What type of deal am  I actually getting for my price.3. Is their false marketing used to sale the products

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2014
Author: CountryLogic
Title: Towel set
Body: These towels were perfect for my needs. My only complaint is there seems to be a lot of strings that need to be trimmed off after the first couple of washes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2014
Author: grace lorenzo
Title: White Towel Set!
Body: Lovely to look at and feel. Very thick and luxurious. However, product comes apart upon first wash. Bummed as I love white linens, and felt I had a dependable resource!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2013
Author: Ken
Title: We are Pleased
Body: we are pleased with our towels! we had some shedding with the first wash but there working out just fine.There very good quality for the price,and they came pretty fast. Thanks

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2015
Author: Shaun
Title: Great Towels
Body: I bought these towels for decoration in the bathroom. I do not use them for anything but decoration so I can only say that they feel very soft and look very beautiful in the bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2013
Author: Peter S
Title: Good of towels
Body: This set of towels is exactly what it promises to do very comfortable good color and so far so good I really enjoyed them when I get out of the shower

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2017
Author: Subversive
Title: Good towels
Body: Good towels for the money. Thick, fairly soft, absorbent. I'll definitely buy more. Would've given five stars if they were even softer. Do wash and dry twice before using. And yes, expect lint...they're cotton towels for goodness sakes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2016
Author: D R Ulmer
Title: A total waste of money!
Body: The description and picture is misleading. I bought some $4.99 bath towels at Walmart and found that the cheap Walmart towels were more plush and softer! Do not believe the hype of Egyptian cotton. These towels are wafer thin!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2014
Author: I. G. King
Title: My Egyptian Cotton towels are wonderful. They are still fulffy after many washings
Body: My Egyptian Cotton towels are wonderful.They are still fulffy after many washings. Very absorvent for toweling off after a shower or after a  trip to the beach.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2014
Author: K. Blair
Title: not the best
Body: These towels are large and very nice looking, but not very absorbant. I have washed them several times, and they are a bit better, but I would not buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2015
Author: MiOb
Title: Looks great. Nice set
Body: I bought the cream colored one. Looks great. Nice set. Is comfortable and dries me quickly. It's not a thin towel, where it gets soaking wet drying you up. It's a good size, soft and isnt falling apart!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2017
Author: Reasonable Voice
Title: I hate the off white color
Body: I hate the off white color, it looks more like a yellow.  The towels are OK, but not plush at all and have a cheap feel, though I have washed them a few times and they haven't fallen apart, the loops are splitting in a few spots.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2014
Author: Itazuke
Title: Not very good
Body: Not real happy with the freying and the lint the first few washes was excessive.  The washer still has lint in it.  Clogged up the drain a bit.  They're not that wonderful; I wouldn't buy them again

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2013
Author: ERM
Title: Great towels
Body: Great towels. Thick, large and absorbent. They've been washed a good many times over the past two years and have yet to fray or fade.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2016
Author: mom2stella
Title: Great quality, great price
Body: These are really good quality. We run Airbnb out of our home and give these towels to our guests. We're buying more so that we are fully stocked with towels in case anything happens - or guests steal them. lol

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2015
Author: Deborah Croft
Title: Nice Towels
Body: These towels are very nice. Large size bath towels, as well as the hand towels and wash cloths. Very pleaseed with these towels and they fit in well with the color scheme of my bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2013
Author: Patricia A.
Title: towel set
Body: a combination of xmas gift /wedding to my who got marriedI got lucky on color choice he and his new bride liked the gift

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2013
Author: L. C. Carsley
Title: Pinzon Basics Egyptian Cotton Towels
Body: Very soft big pretty towels. Wash and dry easy. Great color and matches my bathroom decore. Love them so soft feel great when drying off.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2014
Author: Roman Mezhibouski
Title: Amazing deal, great quality
Body: Good absorption, almost no shedding after first few washes.Was concerned that this will shed heavily ad other reviews point out, but this is NOT the case.Towels have good thickness and balance roughness and being thin.For the price this is a bargain.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2014
Author: Mary Ellen Rock
Title: Blue Towels
Body: These are pretty good towels.  I live alone so I do not need massive thick towels.  They wash well and hold the color.  Prettyattractive in the bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2014
Author: Andy Davis
Title: Fine material
Body: Not what we would buy to replace due to its's color.  B ut, a GREAT set and we havefound a color that matches our bathroom and will order from tis group.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2015
Author: James S.
Title: Not awesome
Body: These shed *everywhere*, even after multiple washes. I wouldn't consider them to be luxury towels - not very soft. On the plus side, they are functional and look nice on a towel rack.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2015
Author: sandylou
Title: Pinzon Egyptian Cotton 6-Piece Towel Set
Body: I was really disappointed in these towels, as when I washed them, they raveled on the edges and will soon look bad.  I will use them, but really prefer my old towels compared to these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2016
Author: Sammie
Title: Lavenderish..
Body: This is my SECOND time purchasing these towels (purchased ONE grey set the first time, & still use them; it's just my 2 year old decided to spray them with Clorox. Yay me!) This go around I bought a grey & plum set! The only thing I didn't like was that the plum set is not as deep/rich as the picture perceives. They are more of a lavenderish color (see picture). Thankfully they still go with the colors in that particular bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2016
Author: dlmarch
Title: Very Nice Towels
Body: Considering the price, I initially didn't expect these to be as soft and fluffy as they turned out to be.  After a pre-use washing/drying, they are soft and absorbent.  The color is a great match to my bathroom.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2015
Author: Jessica
Title: Great towels! They absorb nicely and dry out as ...
Body: Great towels! They absorb nicely and dry out as expected. The hand towels and washcloths are really nice too. We use them in our master bath and they are fluffy and medium size. Great value to the set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2013
Author: Farid
Title: thanks for all
Body: thank youvery quickly realizedeverything is fine and no problemsquality is highThank you for your workI am very pleased with theI hope to work more with you

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2016
Author: numberonesup
Title: they are great great towel
Body: I may have reviewed these before ..... anyway, they are great great towel. They are the color described ( Unlike others I purchased Online). They are also a very good size. All around a great towel at a great price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2015
Author: Foxy
Title: Not very soft, but good quality.
Body: They are ok. Got them in purple and white. The colors match the pictures, the quality is good but it's not the kind of towels you're waiting to wrap around yourself. Not too soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2016
Author: WTS
Title: A Waste
Body: Horrible. After only two laundry cycles (without bleach) the color drastically washed out in random areas. Appears as if chlorine bleach was spilled on them (which I don't even use). As these were supposed to be complementary colored towels for a bathroom remodel, I cannot even use them. They are now reserved as the "grubby towels" after only a couple months of purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2013
Author: J. Butschli
Title: Beautiful towels
Body: These towels are exactly as described in the listing.  The are an excellent quality and I received them quickly. I am very happy with my purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2013
Author: Amy Ward
Title: Moderate Quality
Body: Given the price and the number of pieces per set, its probably the value for the price.  I experienced same with the first washing with strings hanging etc. and anticipate after much use that it will shred and bunch up at the decorative gathering.  Probably last attempt to purchase towels online without inspecting and being able to feel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2013
Author: edwin f ortiz
Title: Towels for me
Body: I love the color of these towels unfortunately the color starts to fade only after the second washa total disappointment. Would never recommend

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2013
Author: Qatgirl
Title: Amazingly plush!

Body: I was told they are very plush towels and heavy duty. Getting gifts for nephew going to college and they just washed them and they held up really well. They are pleased with the the product!

Body: These towels look nice and feel nice, but after about 4 washes they still produce an unbelievable amount of lint. My apartment is covered in it. YGWYPF (you get what you pay for).

Body: bought these and would say they are good for the money, kids or guest towels but dont expect luxury towel but you shouldnt for the price

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2016
Author: MJoseph
Title: These made a perfect accessory to the area
Body: We just moved into our new home and I decorated our new bath.  These made a perfect accessory to the area.  I bought them in a few colors.  My husband tried them out the same night and aid they were soft.  Will def but again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2014

Title: Great Price For Soft Egyptian Cotton Towels!
Body: Great set of towels at a FANTASTIC price. Very soft and towels that actually wraps around fully! Will definitely buy more when it's time to purchase towels again. Thank you.

Author: Satisfied Kindle Customer

Body: Loved the color and softness.  Have washed several times and the towels are still leaving the filter in the dryer full of fuzz.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2016
Author: Brian C
Title: Very nice for the price
Body: Very nice for the price! On the label it clearly states egyptian cotton loops. The entire towel is not egyptian cotton just the loops which is a bit misleading from the description. If you compare these to towels you can get for a similar price offline (value towles from wally world) These are FAR superior. If you are expecting the quality of a $150 egyptian cotton towel set you will be disappointed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2015
Author: Loven
Title: They are pretty, hand nice and I have yet to wash ...
Body: The towels were great--however I thought I ordered grey to match my new bathroom--oh well, I have a green bathroom too!!  They are pretty, hand nice and I have yet to wash them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2014
Author: customcustomerreview
Title: Great quality large towels worth the money
Body: Great qualitylarge towelsworth the money.you would pay more in any store on towels these are a great find :).I have them in grey and moss green as well !

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2014
Author: John Smith
Title: Cotton Towels
Body: They look and feel much nicer than my other towels. I even got compliments for them. Or at least the towels got compliments. No fuzz all over me on first use. I do not regret my impulse buy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2015
Author: Denise Cossich
Title: I order A LOT of them and have not been disappointed. I have sets that are 3 years old ...
Body: You can't beat the price on these towels.  As an owner of a B&B, I order A LOT of them and have not been disappointed.  I have sets that are 3 years old and look like the new ones.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2016
Author: D&R
Title: nice towels
Body: These towels are comfortable and soft while also effieicnt in drying!  They look true to color and have held up very well over their use.  They seem to be made well and we expect them to last much longer as well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Beautiful Towels
Body: I was extremely pleased with the towel set, especially for the price. The bath towel was longer than my usual bath towels. I loved the quality of thickness...which was not so thick, that they would take longer to dry. I will definitely order more of the same.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2014
Author: Ina T.
Title: Great Deal for the Price
Body: Bought these for my spare bathroom. I expected cheaper quality since the price is so low--but I am more than happy with what I received! Very good quality and good price!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2015
Author: pdxrose
Title: Four Stars
Body: You look at the price and can't believe you're getting really luxurious, thick towels.  You are.  Many use the words, but these are the real deal.  That's why I'm reordering.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2014
Author: Rebecca Hales
Title: Super happy with this purchase
Body: True color.  Have washed 3 times without any fraying.  Wash them before using to get rid of excess lint.  Super happy with this purchase.  I have ordered 2 more sets of different color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2014
Author: Amazoncustomercdhd
Title: Nice towels
Body: Good size, good color, great price and good texture! I wasn't sure about buying something directly from Amazon (as in the brand) but I am pretty dern happy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2013

Title: Not amazing
Body: Much lower quality than I expected, and they're already starting to fall apart in the dryer. They also shed. I've only had them for two months.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2018
Author: John Moran
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great will buy another

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2013

Body: These towels are fluffy, nice and soft. I just ordered more. Very niceI ordered for guess towels but returned to order some for myself

Body: These are high quality towels and a really good value. I could not believe these were so nice. I think they are as good as you can find anywhere.

Body: Nice, soft, but wash them first, separately from anything you don't want "Cranberry" colored. They have a little "shedding" to do and color to bleed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2015
Author: Jude
Title: Great towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2014

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2014
Author: Jessica L. Webster

Body: These were infested from the warehouse. Fell apart in the pre-use wash. I lagged returning them, so no refund. These are a burden, not super useful.

Guests have commented that they appreciated the soft, fluffy towels!  I will purchase again when we need more towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2013

Title: towels
Body: They are nice and held up well in a wash. They could be much softer for the price. They are perfect for a gest bathroom.

Title: ripped

Body: I'm glad I only paid ca. $20 for this set.  After two washes, they look washed out. Good for daily use, but I wouldn't use for the guest bath which is why I purchased them.

Author: trish
Title: Odd color.
Body: These towel sets were thick and thirsty. The color seemed to be more yellow tinged than cream, or a yellowish cream, if you prefer.If I saw this tone in the store, I would have passed it by. It wasn't so disappointing to send it back, though.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2016
Author: Keira
Title: Not bad for the price!
Body: Now that I've washed these a few times I can say you definitely get a lot of bang for your buck. They aren't falling apart and do a great job of drying me off. I'll definitely be buying more when we move to a bigger place!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2014

Body: Same problem as with the yellow set, after washing them before use as recommended, they had snags. Will keep using them as they are nice towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2015

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2016

Body: This is just a matter of time will tell. Color is nice, soft enough. It sheds a bit into my face when I dry with it after 3 washes. Only time will tell if the color will stay and the towels hold up.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2013

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2014

Body: Value purchase! My only negative is that it's red. Not a cranberry. Does not match like a darker red would but they are big cozy shower towels that work for the price!

Body: Looks great, nice and soft. For some reason it doesn't seem absorbent. Color is great. Good cost (4 stars factoring cost; 3 without cost).

Body: I been using this towels for 3 years. I have no complains whatsoever. They're really well made, I wash them every week and they still look like new.

I decided toget another set but couldn't get it in time, so I bought a set at a local store which wasn't as complete and wasa little more expensive--even though I didn't have to pay shipping for the store bought set.

Body: Absolutely wonderful.  They hold up washing after washing.  I love the price and the quality of the product.  Do not hesitate to invest in these towels.

Body: Thought this price was too good to be be true but these are very soft, thick and high quality.  They compare to towles costin 3-4 times as much.

Body: Good for the price.  This is the second time I've ordered these, the first was a few years ago.  For the price, we won't mind replacing these annually if need be--held up well so far.

Title: Very POOR Quality. SHED forever.
Body: These towels look and feel very plush at first. BUT... They shed so badly that after dozens of washes, they're still shedding!!!And the color fades badly as well. I do NOT recommend them.

Title: Do you see the price. that's it.

Title: Great!!
Body: So soft & great quality! I'm usually hesitant to purchase towels online. One towel I purchased years ago had massive lint rub off and scarred me for life. I'd be covered in navy fuzzies. These towels do no such thing!!

Title: Great set for the money
Body: Great set for the money! I had to wash them 2-3x and dry on low to get them to de-shed but after that they were fluffy and good to go. I purchased the beige color, it's lovely and warm/neutral.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2014

Body: no matter how many times I washed these things the red fuzzy balls just would not stop so I had to get rid of them it definitely was not worth it.

Author: HugeAmazonFan

Body: These towels are pretty good for the price.  Yes, the first time I washed them, I had tons of gray fluff all over the dryer but after that they were fine!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2014
Author: Meme
Title: Wonderful price also
Body: These towels were purchased  as a gift .They are very soft and seem quite luxurious. Wonderful price also. I am sure the person who receives these will be pleased.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2014
Author: Sandy
Title: great towels
Body: For the price, these towels are a great value. They hold up very well through laundry without pilling or pulls. Also no fading. I will probably buy more sets.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2014
Author: Rubyredvette
Title: heavy weight...filler.
Body: Wow, there is a lot of filler in this towel set. The dryer screen was covered. I was amazed when I laundered this towel set, it certainly does not feel as nice after the laundry. It is for a guest bathroom and it appears I should have not run the set through a laundry cycle.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2015
Author: Natasha
Title: Great bathroom towels
Body: Great bathroom towels! I bought one set first just to make sure they were what I was looking for and once I received them I was very pleased with the design,color,and quality of these towels, so I ordered another set.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2013
Author: Joan M. Devlin
Title: Great towels!
Body: They look wonderful in our new FLorida house bathroom and we used them and they wash great and are nice quality!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2015
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Mmmm... Cotton
Body: I'd give these 6 stars if it was an option. These are the best towels I have ever owned. Not the most expensive I've tried but soft and absorbent. Exactly what a towel should be.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2014
Author: Allen
Title: No quality
Body: It is okay for the price but I would not buy this again and I will pay more to get the better quality. You can't wash with good quality towel because all little thing stuck in other towel and can't be removed easily. Very cheap in quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2016
Author: Curious Jane
Title: Good quality; cream color is a little off
Body: These are nice - not too thick, not too thin. Lots of lint with the first couple of wash-and-dries but that's to be expected. The only slight negative is the color - I chose cream because it looked most like a pale beige, but the actual towels have much more yellow in them than the picture suggests. Still, they're neutral enough and pale enough that they blend in OK; not a perfect match, but not so far off that I'd return them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2015
Author: n3ptune
Title: Good purchase, good value
Body: Very nice towels. The cotton rings are not quite as tight as I had thought they would be, but after a preliminary washing, the first use convinced me: this was a very good purchase!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2013
Author: Bobby
Title: Perfect
Body: Perfect set loved it will reorder again Pinzon Egyptian Cotton 725-Gram 6-Piece Towel Set, Gray just what I needed  thanks again

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2014
Author: murph
Title: Great towels
Body: These are great towels at a good price,make sure you wash them first,dark colored towels such as red ect need a few washes first because of bleeding

Author: Kristi H
Title: The recipient really liked the color
Body: This was a wedding gift.  The recipient really liked the color, and was happy with this gift.  From that regard, it was a positive outcome.  Since it was a gift, I can't tell how the towels have continued to hold up.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2016
Author: Margo C
Title: Good quality but color does not match
Body: Beware - the color does not match the picture - at least for the "Plum" ones. They are NOT plum - they are a muted purple color. It's an ok color - but not what I wanted! These are good quality towels and I would have given 4 or 5 stars if the color was correct, but now I have towels that don't match.

Author: Michael R. Purcell

Body: The Pinzon towels are sturdy and soft and I am really enjoying them. I would suggest washing them before using them which will make them softer and more absorbent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2015
Author: MmarieB
Title: Great towels.
Body: These are big, fluffy and have not faded since I purchased them. Have gotten in another color as well. 1st washing had lots of lint in the dryer, but it was not an issue.

Title: Great product ...
Body: Great product that has worked well for the first month! I did wash them twice before using and have only noticed occasional lint. I enjoy nice towels, these are nice towels, especially if you are on a budget.

Author: David Duncan
Title: Not as soft as I expected.
Body: I splurged on these because I wanted to know what it would be like to have nice fancy towels.These are about as soft as what you can find at Walmart. Rather disappointed.

Body: Good towels. They're soft, absorbent and the standard size. The color was slightly different than pictured. I thought they were going to be a slightly tan/gray but they're definitly true gray. Could have just been my phone.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2013
Author: FJTDMT
Title: Nice towels
Body: Any towels will shed some lint for a couple washings.  Towels are large, soft and a great value.  Don't hesitate.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2017

Title: Five Stars
Body: Thick and soft

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2014
