Body: cheap fabric, not very absorbent and threads pull out after washing and a few more words to meet the required number lest I get a failing grade

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2014
Author: Will Waverly
Title: Heavier and fluffier than some similarly priced towels bought at ...
Body: Heavier and fluffier than some similarly priced towels bought at Kohls. I don't know much about towels other than this comparison, but these come out ahead.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2014

Title: Excellent
Body: Wow, much better than what I expected for the price!  Could NOT beat this deal!! These were for my RV, will be getting different color for home!

Body: Have had no problems! they match my bathroom perfect! Wash very good, you do get some lint on bthe but what towels don't you?

Author: Elaine
Title: 4 stars
Body: I was quite surprised by the quality of this towel set. They did lint quite a bit in the dryer, but it didn't seem to make them less thick. Overall I am pleased with the product and price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2016
Author: Nuesha
Title: Some really nice quality towers
Body: Some really nice quality towers... I got these for my grandmother for her birthday. I bought this color and the dark blue. She uses them in her bathroom as decoration towels. She really loves them :)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2017
Author: SJM
Title: Scratchy, thin, cheap, return!
Body: I really wonder about the four star average review here. These are scratchy, cheap looking, thin, cheaply made, not soft, towels. If scratchy and cheap is what you're going for, by all means, go ahead and purchase these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2014

Body: Great size, very soft and nice color.  They are not very absorbant though.  You'll double your dry off time if you purchase these towels.

Body: I didn't necessarily need the wash cloths, but the bigger towels are a good size, and the hand towels are perfect.

Body: The Towel Set is more than expected!  Beautiful Towel Set!  Washed & Dryed & Hung them up in the Bathrooms...  They look wonderful!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2016
Author: rachel
Title: but overall a good towel for the
Body: Got the plum towel set. They are more absorbent after being washed once. Have not had any issues with shedding. Wish they were a little more absorbent, but overall a good towel for the price

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2014

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2013

Body: I have purchased these for display only and haven't used any of them yet. Sorry, this doesn't add to your curiosity.

Body: Great towels; they're soft and plush. I gave them 4 starts because after the first wash the lint that came off was considerably.

Body: Very nice towels.  I bought two sets and now thinking buy enough for the whole house.  GREAT SET!!!  Heavy and great color choices.

Body: The towels are pretty soft and absorbent at the same time. The only thing is they drop a lot of lint, even after washing them a few times, they continue dropping lint while they're hanging.

Author: Bos

Body: I love these towels and the price is hard to beat! Best set of towels I have ever had. Color stays after multiple washes. Big, soft, and gets you dry pretty quick. I have purchased three sets at this point! If I ever need anymore I know exactly what I will be getting in the future!

Body: These towels are very plush and wash up well. In addition, I am tall and the bath towel is big enough for me. I sometimes have problems with towels being too small but these are not.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2013
Author: LKMeador
Title: Coming apart at the seams
Body: I just received these towels and washed them before use. When I took them out of the dryer (with a huge amount of lint) 3 of the six items in the set had threads already unravelling on the seams. One bath towel has about 12 inches of the seam unravelling. Terrible...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2013
Author: John R. Poremba
Title: Pinzon Egyptian Cotton 725-Gram 6-Piece Towel Set, Cranberry
Body: These towels are awful. They do not dry, they just move the water around. They leave fuzz everywhere - the floor, the tub, the shower, and especially your body. They bleed. I've washed them four times now to get the "coating" off and to "set the color", and after the second washing they began fraying at the seams. Very poor quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2013
Author: jc
Title: looks nice, but falls apart
Body: Ordered this for my wife for our anniversary.  Looked great out of the box, matched all of our bathroom stuff.  We washed it before use.  After putting in the dryer they pretty much came apart. Started to fray on the ends and linted all over. Nearly overheated the dryer with the amount of lint that they put out.Don't buy this product unless you plan on never washing them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2014

Body: The negative reviews were correct, these towels do fray when you wash them. I washed mine in a towel-only load so there weren't any zippers/clips/etc. causing this. They look cute enough when you cut off the frayed bits but come on, you shouldn't need to groom a brand new towel. Disappointing

Why can't anything be made in the USA?

Couldn't even dry my hands on these because so much lint was left on my hands I couldn't even put on moisturizer without rinsing my hands. :/. Tried everything for two months and I'm finally just going to donate them. Even left lint on my bathroom vanity.

The dryer caught excess lint, but was not out of the norm.We will be buying more sets to stock the house!!!!!

The stitching is very well done, and the accent stripe has a sheen to the stitching so it looks like an expensive well made towel.
